0001.en: Chapter 1, Reset 1: I Don't Want to Be Corrupted!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 第1章 重置1 恶堕什么的才不要啊！

0001.en: Pain, as if his body was being torn apart.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 疼痛，仿佛身体被撕裂般疼痛。

0001.en: The young man opened his eyes in agony, his fingers uncontrollably clawing at his face. It felt like the only way to stop the piercing itch and pain was to rip his own skin off.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 青年在难以忍受的剧痛中睁开双眼，双手食指控制不住的抓挠在脸上，那钻心的瘙痒与剧痛好似唯有将这副皮囊撕开才能缓解。

0001.en: The edges of his vision turned a bloody red. His bones grew uncontrollably amid an itching and painful sensation. Under his once-fair skin, hideous purple veins appeared, turning his skin an unnatural shade of purple...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 视野的边缘镀上了一层血腥的红，骨头在酥痒与疼痛中不受控制的生长，人类原本白皙的皮肤底下出现了根根狰狞的紫色经脉，衬得皮肤原本的颜色朝着异化的紫色发展……

0001.en: It felt as if horns were about to push out from his forehead. The small carriage filled with an air of desire.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 额头两侧像是有角要顶出来一样，狭小的车厢内充斥着欲望的气息。

0001.en: Something felt like it was about to burst from the end of his tailbone. His body felt like it was soaking in boiling water. Overwhelmed by the heat, he instinctively slammed his head against the wooden carriage wall.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 尾椎骨的末端更是有什么东西将突破血肉的限制生长出来，身体更像是被泡在沸水之中，燥热难忍之际，他本能地将头撞向了马车车厢的木质车厢壁。

0001.en: "Thud!"
0001.speaker: 旁白

0001.en: The sudden sound of impact drew the attention of the people outside the moving carriage.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这突如其来的撞击声吸引来了这辆还在行驶中马车外面的人的注意力。

0001.en: "What's happening? Why is there a banging sound coming from the carriage?"
0001.speaker: 陌生男1
0001.cn: “怎么回事？车厢里怎么会有撞击的声音？”

0001.en: "Is something wrong with the Young Master? You should go check!"
0001.speaker: 陌生男2
0001.cn: “是少爷出什么问题了吗？你快去看看！”

0001.en: Two deep male voices spoke outside the carriage, followed by footsteps. Just as the steps got closer and the door was about to be opened, another voice suddenly interrupted.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 两道浑厚的男性嗓音在车厢外响起，紧接着是脚步声，就当那脚步声靠近车厢门即将被打开之时，突然又一道声音突兀的插入其中。

0001.en: "What are you doing? Who told you to stop?! Don't you know the Ice Saintess's minions are about to catch us? Are you trying to get the Young Master killed? Get moving, full speed!"
0001.speaker: 玛拉
0001.cn: “你们在做什么？谁让你们停下的？！知不知道冰雪的爪牙马上要追上来了？你们是想害死少爷吗？还不赶紧驱车全速前进！”

0001.en: The sharp questions seemed to stun the two men outside. The carriage, which had stopped, slowly began to move again.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 一连几句的质问声似乎是将马车外的那两名男性给震住了，停下的马车又开始缓缓起步。

0001.en: That voice sounded strangely familiar.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 那声音似乎也透着股莫名的熟悉。

0001.en: Leaning his head against the wooden wall, the young man gasped for air. Sweat streamed down his delicate face, and even his breaths sounded soft, not like a man's.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 脑袋半靠在木质车厢壁的青年大口喘着粗气，大片大片的汗水顺着他那略显阴柔的脸颊滑落，就连喘息声也变得格外软糯，不似男性。

0001.en: As soon as the three voices spoke, the pain and heat in his body suddenly eased. The strange feeling of bones breaking through his flesh also faded away. But after being tormented like this right after waking up, he was now exhausted.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 从刚刚那三道交谈声响起，他体内的疼痛和燥热突然得到了缓解，那种骨头突破血肉的异样感也渐渐消失，但一醒来就被折腾了这么一阵，现在的他也是精疲力尽。

0001.en: His confused mind couldn't think about much else. He just tried to observe his strange surroundings. So... where was he?
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 混乱的大脑无力去想更多的事情，只是尽可能的打量这陌生的环境，所以自己这是……

0001.en: "Creaak~"
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: “嘎吱～”

0001.en: The wooden door of the carriage opened, and a figure walked in.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 车厢的木门被打开，一道身影随之走入。

0001.en: The young man managed to lift his head and saw a woman before him. Her face was old and withered, and she wore a white nun's habit, different from a normal one. And that face...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 青年勉强的抬起头，只见出现在他眼前的是一位女性，她面容枯老，身穿着一件与普通修女不同的白色修女服，而那张脸……

0001.en: As the old nun's face was reflected in the young man's eyes, he subconsciously frowned. At the same time, the old nun who had entered the carriage spoke.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 青年的瞳孔中倒映出那老修女的脸庞，下意识的就要皱眉，同时，这进入车厢的老修女也开口。

0001.en: "Master Selen An, don't you worry. Even if I have to give up my old life, I, Mara, will ensure your safety."
0001.speaker: 玛拉
0001.cn: “塞伦安少爷，您别担心，我玛拉就算拼上这条老命，也定会让您安然无事。”

0001.en: It would have been better if the old nun hadn't spoken. The young man had only found her face vaguely familiar, but with her voice, her calling herself Mara, and calling him Selen An, the sense of familiarity was now overwhelming!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 这老修女不张口还好，青年只是觉得他的面容莫名的熟悉，她的声音配合上玛拉的自称，以及对他塞伦安的称呼，这熟悉感已经不是一般的浓重了！

0001.en: No way, it can't be such a coincidence, can it?
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 不会吧，不会这么巧吧？

0001.en: He had just been playing an 18+ "healthy" game called "Six Saints' Lament: Dawn's Bond" all night. At an exciting part, he felt something move in his pants and reached down to adjust it, but then his heart fluttered, his vision went black, and he lost consciousness...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 自己只是熬夜通宵玩一款名为《六圣挽歌：破晓之绊》的18＋“健康”游戏，玩到兴奋处，感觉裤子动了，伸手欲调整一下弹道，结果一阵心悸，眼前一黑，失去了意识……

0001.en: When he woke up again, he was hit by a pain like his body was being torn apart, then he heard that conversation and saw the nun named Mara before him.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 再次醒来，便遭受到了身体被撕裂般的疼痛，然后就是听到了那段对话，见到了眼前这位叫玛拉的修女。

0001.en: Mara, isn't that the alias of the Demon Clan's spy in the Winterlein family?
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 玛拉，这不是那个温特莱恩家族中魔族卧底的化名吗？

0001.en: Knowing the game's plot, this thought immediately popped into his head. And this old nun called him Selen An, a name that was even more significant.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 熟知游戏剧情的他脑海中立即蹦出了这个念头，而眼前这个老太婆修女又叫自己塞伦安，这名字更是个重量级。

0001.en: Selen An's full name was Selen An Winterlein, the last direct descendant of the family that inherited the blood of the Water Saintess in the game. And as everyone knows, in this kind of 18+ healthy game, any character related to a saintess would have a very... "exciting" end, even if Selen An was a man.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 塞伦安全名为塞伦安•温特莱恩，是游戏中继承了水之圣女血脉的家族直系末裔，而众所周知，在这种18＋健康游戏中但凡跟圣女扯上关系的，最后的结局都会非常的刺激，纵使塞伦安是个男的，也不例外。

0001.en: In the story, Selen An's status had led him to develop an arrogant and domineering personality from a young age, a typical spoiled villain who had done countless bad things.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 剧情中，塞伦安由于身份的缘故从小就养成了嚣张跋扈的性格，是典型的纨绔恶少形象，做过的坏事数不胜数。

0001.en: Normally, a character like this in a more standard game would be a typical villainous cannon fodder for the protagonist. But in an adult game, he would become the "aggressor" who could do whatever he wanted. But this game was different...
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 按道理讲这种人设形象放在其他正常一点的游戏里是典型的恶役炮灰男配，是主角的垫脚石，放在黄油里，就会变成那种疯狂开炮，为所欲为的“施暴者”，但这款游戏不一样……

0001.en: In order to awaken the bloodline within him and gain power that would let him be even more unrestrained, the spoiled villain named Selen An was foolish enough to collude with and trust the Demon Clan, the mortal enemies of the Saintess's family. As for the ending, for a male character, it was more tragic than death.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 名为塞伦安的纨绔恶少为了觉醒体内的血脉，获得能让他更加为所欲为的力量，竟然愚蠢到去勾结，去相信与圣女家族为世代死仇的魔族，至于结局，对于一位男性角色而言算是比死还要悲惨了。

0001.en: He was framed by the demons and implanted with a Succubus Seed. Under the dual pressure of being assassinated by his childhood friend, the Ice Saintess, who was fulfilling a divine oracle, and the demon cavalry, he completely broke down. His noble saintess bloodline was tainted by the Succubus Seed, his spirit and soul were severely twisted, and he degenerated into a "shameless" female succubus under the watch of his friend and the demons.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 他被魔族陷害，体内种下了魅魔之种，在被其履行神谕的青梅竹马冰之圣女刺杀和魔族铁骑的双重压力下，彻底崩溃，尊贵的圣女血脉被魅魔之种污染，精神灵魂被严重扭曲，在青梅以及众魔族注视之下堕变成了一只“不知廉耻”的雌性魅魔。

0001.en: And the one who framed him, who implanted the Succubus Seed in him, was this very governess nun named Mara. Her true identity was a demon spy planted in the Winterlein family!
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 至于陷害他，给他体内种下魅魔之种的正是眼前这位叫玛拉的教养修女，而她的真实身份则是魔族安插在温特莱恩家族的魔人卧底！

0001.en: So, so... so I've really been transported into an adult game!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 所以，所以……所以自己真是穿越进了小黄油里！

0001.en: And I've become a spoiled villain who is about to be corrupted into a female succubus!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 还变成了一位即将暗堕成雌性魅魔的纨绔恶少！

0001.en: As this thought raced through the young man's mind, he suddenly felt a cold touch on his forehead, where a bump had not yet faded. The old nun's dark voice whispered in his ear.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 青年脑海中正如此想着，突然只觉得自己的额头接触到了一阵冰凉的抚摸，那里还有未消退下去的凸起，老太婆修女阴暗的声音从耳畔传来。

0001.en: "Don't be afraid, Young Master. These changes in your body are all normal. Don't resist them. Accept them, embrace them. As long as we shake off Princess Serenia behind us and escape to Craigmore..."
0001.speaker: 玛拉
0001.cn: “不要害怕，少爷，您身上的这些变化都属正常现象，不要去抗拒它，去接受它，去融入它，只要甩掉身后的瑟蕾妮娅殿下，逃到克雷格默……”

0001.en: "There, Young Master, with the Demon Lord's help, you will surely awaken the power within you and be reborn!"
0001.speaker: 玛拉
0001.cn: “在那里，少爷，您一定能够在魔君的帮助下，觉醒体内的力量，迎来第二次新生！”

0001.en: Perhaps the original Selen An in the story was too foolish, too slow, or perhaps he was too frightened by the situation to notice.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 或许是原剧情中的塞伦安太过愚蠢，迟钝，又或许是那时的他，早已被当时的阵仗给吓破了胆，没有注意到。

0001.en: But now, the young man who had transmigrated into this body could clearly feel the strange fervor and suppressed excitement in Mara's voice as she spoke.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 反正现在穿越到这里的青年在这副躯体里，能够明显的感觉到玛拉在说这两句话时声音中诡异的狂热和压抑的兴奋。

0001.en: Excitement? What was she excited about?
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 兴奋？兴奋什么？

0001.en: Was she excited that the sole direct heir with the purest blood of the Water Saintess was about to degenerate into a shameless, desire-craving succubus under the watch of all the demons?
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 是在兴奋自己这个拥有着水之圣女最纯净血脉的直系独苗，即将在众魔族的注视下，堕落成那不知廉耻，渴求欲望的魅魔吗？

0001.en: Selen An felt a deep chill!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 塞伦安感到深深的恶寒！

0001.en: This kind of TSF plot might be strangely exciting for players in an adult game, but if it became reality, and he was the main character, all he could feel was the developers' twisted sense of humor and goosebumps all over his body.
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 这种tsf的剧情放在黄油里，或许会让玩家感到莫名的兴奋，但若此刻变成了现实，而自己还是这种剧情的主人公，他能感受到的只有制作组深深的恶趣味，以及全身激起的鸡皮疙瘩。

0001.en: What should I do? What should I do?
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 怎么办？怎么办？

0001.en: If the story unfolds as it originally did, I'll escape to the Craigmore wasteland in a carriage, where the Ice Saintess, Serenia, fulfilling her divine oracle to assassinate me, will catch up to me. She'll hold the Sword of Judgment to my neck and listen to my last words.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 如果真按原剧情发展下去，自己乘着马车逃跑到了克雷格莫荒原，履行刺杀神谕的冰之圣女瑟蕾妮娅就会在那里逮住机会，追上自己，手持着审判之剑架在自己的脖子上，倾听自己的遗言。

0001.en: And the demon army, having received their own message, will quickly surround us. Under that double pressure, even if I could withstand the mental stress and not break down and corrupt, what then?
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 而得到接应消息的魔族大军也会很快围上来，将两人团团包围，在那种双重压迫下，自己就算真的能顶住精神上的压力，不至于崩溃恶堕，但然后呢？

0001.en: At that point, it seems I'd only have two choices. Either I beg Serenia to give me a quick death and slit my throat. In the game's story, she and I were childhood friends, so I believe she would do me that favor.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: 到了那种境地，自己似乎只有两个选择，要么请求瑟蕾妮娅给自己一个痛快，一剑抹了脖子，游戏设定中自己与瑟蕾妮娅算是勉强的青梅竹马关系，相信对方也会给自己这个面子。

0001.en: But getting your throat cut would be so painful. The feeling of blood slowly draining from your body, growing cold, your vision blurring, gradually being enveloped by the shadow of death... just thinking about it is enough to make you wet your pants!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 可是抹脖子很疼的，那种感受着血液从自己体内一点一点的流出，身体逐渐变得冰冷，视野模糊，渐渐被死亡的阴影笼罩，这种事情想想都会尿裤子的吧！

0001.en: But if I don't want to die and get caught by the demon army, those inhuman demons have plenty of ways to accelerate the Succubus Seed inside me. When I truly degenerate, I won't even be human anymore!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 可要是不想死，被魔族大军逮到，那些没有人性的魔族有的是办法催化自己体内的魅魔之种，到时候真的堕落之后自己连人都不算了！

0001.en: More importantly, in this game's setting, once a human degenerates into a demon, their soul becomes severely polluted and twisted. The soul controlling this succubus body wouldn't even be my original self anymore!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 更关键的是，在这个游戏设定中，只要人类堕落成恶魔，灵魂就会被严重污染扭曲，到时候控制着这副魅魔之躯的灵魂都根本不算是原本的自己了！

0001.en: It's like becoming a monster completely, both in body and soul. So there's no such thing as what people online say about "just enjoy it if you become a succubus, spread your legs and have fun..."
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 简直就是从身体和心灵方面都完完全全变成了怪物，所以也就完全不存在网友所谓的变成了魅魔就享受，双腿一叉就是乐……

0001.en: That ending is no different from... no, it's more tragic and humiliating than death!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 这种结局跟死也没有什么……不，是比死还要悲惨，还要耻辱！

0001.en: This is such a scam!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 坑爹呢，那这是！

0001.en: So how am I supposed to play this impossible starting situation?!
0001.speaker: 塞伦安
0001.cn: 所以这种天崩开局到底该怎么玩啊？！

0001.en: P.S. New author, writing a new book isn't easy. If you think this theme is good, please add it to your collection. Thanks for your support.
0001.speaker: 旁白
0001.cn: ps：新人作者，新书创作不易，如果觉得这个题材不错的，就点点收藏，谢谢支持。

0002.en: Chapter 2: Reset 2 - A Humiliating Plot
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 第2章 重置2 耻辱的剧情

0002.en: Faced with such kind comfort from Governess Mara.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 面对教养修女玛拉如此贴心的安慰。

0002.en: Was he moved?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 感动吗？

0002.en: He wasn't moved, he was frozen. Selen An truly didn't dare to move!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 不敢动，塞伦安是真不敢动！

0002.en: Come on, the pain and the bone-deep itch just now were so real, it couldn't have been a dream. If his guess was right, then he was just a powerless, weak young master, and this old governess who looked so withered...
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 拜托，刚刚的疼痛和钻入骨髓的瘙痒那么真实，这已经排除是梦的可能了，如果真如他猜想那般，现在的自己只是个没什么能力的战五渣废物少爷，站在自己面前，这看似形容枯稿的老修女……

0002.en: ...was actually a succubus who could kill without blinking an eye!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 实则是个杀人不眨眼的魅魔！

0002.en: Don't think the succubi here are like the ones in lewd anime, who only know how to drain people and provide fan service. In the game's setting, all demons were considered absolute evil!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 不要以为这里的魅魔就如大众所看的羞羞动漫里的魅魔一样，只知道一味的榨汁和发福利，涅法雷姆大陆中的所有魔族在游戏设定中都算得上是那种绝对的恶魔！

0002.en: They loved to kill, enjoyed pleasure, craved flesh and blood, and were merciless. In short, if you angered a demon without any way to protect yourself, you would definitely meet a terrible end.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 它们喜好杀戮，享受欢愉，贪食血肉，嗜血无情，总而言之，真要是激怒了一位魔族，在没有自保力量的情况下，是绝对没有好下场的。

0002.en: Selen An didn't want to be drained of his essence and then torn apart right after transmigrating.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 塞伦安可不想一穿越过来就尝试一次被榨干身体精华，然后五马分尸的惨状。

0002.en: Even if he wasn't completely consumed, he might trigger the "Corruption" plotline early, which was even more terrifying. For a female character, corruption was a huge humiliation, and now he, a man, was about to receive this "special honor."
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 就算不被吃干抹净，那也可能提前触发恶.堕剧情，那就更可怕了，女角色恶堕对于角色本身而言都是极大的羞辱，而如今自己一个男的享受这种“殊荣”。

0002.en: The thought of this body one day sitting on some troll's lap in a depraved demon den, having "fun," sent a chill down his spine.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 一想到以后这副身体很有可能会在糜烂的魔窟中坐在某位巨魔的胯上纵情欢乐，他就忍不住的一阵恶寒。

0002.en: A person's first reaction to danger is always to run, but how could a normal person like him escape from a succubus?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 面对危险人的第一反应总是逃，可在一位魅魔面前，身为普通人的自己又怎么跑得掉？

0002.en: Rely on the two guards outside the carriage?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 依靠马车外的那两个侍卫？

0002.en: Don't be ridiculous. As a veteran player of this game, he didn't recognize their voices at all, which meant they were probably useless NPCs. Rely on regular NPCs to defeat a mid-game elite monster?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 别开玩笑了，先不说作为这款游戏老玩家的自己对那两个人的声音根本没有一点印象，没有印象就代表着那两个家伙几乎就是毫无大用的NPC，依靠普通NPC反杀中期精英怪？

0002.en: He wouldn't even dare to dream of it!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 做梦都不敢这么做的！

0002.en: So what should he do?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 那该怎么办？

0002.en: If he wanted to save his life, he had to lay low!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 想要保住小命，就只能苟！

0002.en: Selen An remembered a saying from before he transmigrated: "First be a servant, then you can be a master."
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 塞伦安犹记得自己穿越前听过的一句话——先穿袜子后穿鞋，先当孙子后当爷。

0002.en: He had to endure for now. The bigger picture could wait; his life was what mattered most!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 忍一手，大局当前小命要紧！

0002.en: "I'm alright... Mara..."
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: “我没事的……玛拉……”

0002.en: Selen An pretended to be weak, leaning against the carriage wall and letting the old governess stroke the bump on his forehead with ill intentions. In reality, he really was very weak.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 塞伦安装作一副虚弱的模样倚靠在车厢壁上，任由那位老修女不怀好意的抚摸着自己额头上的凸起，实际上，实际上，他是真的很虚弱。

0002.en: By showing the same weak and useless expression as the original owner, making Mara think he was still that same indecisive, panicky good-for-nothing, the imposing old governess finally left the carriage for a while.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 在表现出一副和原主完全相同的懦弱无用的神态，让玛拉误以为自己还是那个毫无主见，慌神乱窜的废柴，这位即使没有暴露真身也极具压迫感的老修女终于暂时从车厢中开。

0002.en: As long as she felt she was still in control, Mara probably wouldn't notice anything unusual.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 只要让她感觉主动权还掌握在她手中，玛拉应该就不会察觉到异常。

0002.en: The carriage fell silent again for a moment. He lay on the soft cushion, almost completely exhausted, wiping the sweat from his forehead while trying to sort out his chaotic thoughts.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 车厢内又暂时恢复了安静，他近乎虚脱般的躺在柔软的坐垫上，伸手擦着额头上的汗，同时，大脑整理着混乱的思绪。

0002.en: A long time ago, the old governess had secretly planted a Succubus Seed in this body's original owner. Before being fully activated, this item, which could change a creature's race and twist its soul, could slowly cause a person to undergo Corruption.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: 这具身体的原主很早之前便被这位老修女暗中种下了魅魔之种，这种能够转化生物种族，扭曲灵魂的道具在未被完全激活前，可以潜移默化的做到让一个人恶堕。

0002.en: Luckily, he was a man. If this Succubus Seed had been planted in a woman's body, she probably wouldn't have lasted this long and would have already had her mind twisted and her body and soul completely corrupted.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 好在自己是个男的，如果这颗魅魔之种种入女性的体内，恐怕根本撑不了那么久，早就精神扭曲，身心彻底堕落了。

0002.en: After all, this was the world of an H-game, which was a bit too unfriendly towards women.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 毕竟这里是小黄油的世界，对于女性而言还是有些太过不友好了。

0002.en: But even though he was male and had some resistance to the Succubus Seed, he couldn't hold out for long. As everyone knew, the succubus race only had females, no males. Having been planted with a Succubus Seed, he would slowly but surely transform into a female succubus.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 但就算自己现在是男性，对于魅魔之种拥有一定的抗性，也维持不了多久，众所周知，魅魔族只有雌性，没有雄性，而被种下魅魔之种的自己也会在潜移默化中不断的向一只雌性魅魔靠拢。

0002.en: How to remove the Succubus Seed was his top priority, but there was something even more urgent right now: how to escape.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 如何取出魅魔之种，成了重中之重，但眼下还有一件事比这更重要，那就是如何逃脱。

0002.en: He had a ticking time bomb inside him, but at least it hadn't gone off yet. As long as he could disrupt the plot to some extent, he could probably remain human-like, and that was enough.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 体内有一颗定时炸弹，但至少现在还没爆炸，只要在一定程度上破坏剧情，自己大概率还能维持个人样，这就足够了。

0002.en: The so-called Succubus Seed was basically a type of curse, and this body's Winterlein Family was skilled in purification magic. The original owner's sudden escape with Mara would definitely attract the family's attention. The family wouldn't let their only direct heir wander around outside and would surely send people to find him.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 所谓的魅魔之种，其实还是相当于一种诅咒，而这具身体所属的温特莱恩家族最是擅长净化魔法，原主被玛拉带着突然逃窜，必然会引起家族的注意，家族不会放任这么一个直系独苗在外流荡，一定会派人寻找。

0002.en: As long as he had a chance to escape and ran back along the route they came, he would definitely run into people from his family.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 只要自己有机会逃跑，按着路线回头跑，就绝对能与家族的人撞上。

0002.en: Once he returned to his family, their power would protect him and also purify the succubus curse in his body. The crisis would be solved.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 只要回到家族，家族的力量会庇护自己，也同时会净化自己体内的魅魔诅咒，危机顿解。

0002.en: But the question came back to the starting point: how could he escape from under the nose of a ferocious, lustful succubus?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 可话题兜兜转转还是回到了起点，自己怎么才能在一个凶暴色欲的魅魔眼皮子底下逃跑？

0002.en: The two useless NPCs outside the carriage had already been ruled out. For now, the only person he could possibly use was the Ice Saintess who was chasing him relentlessly, who was also this body's childhood friend, Serenia Glacies.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 马车外的两位废物NPC已经被淘汰，眼下似乎唯一能够利用的只有那紧追着自己屁股不舍的冰之圣女，同时也是这具身体的青梅竹马，瑟蕾妮娅•格莱西斯。

0002.en: Unlike him, Serenia was one of the most combat-proficient among all the Saintesses. Her combat power was off the charts. At this moment, chasing him all by herself, killing a succubus would be effortless for her.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 不同于自己，瑟蕾妮娅在众圣女之中，也算是极为擅长战斗的那一类了，战斗力酷酷爆表，此时，单枪匹马追过来，斩杀一只魅魔毫不费劲。

0002.en: But the problem was, in the game's plot, this villainous young master had already become an irredeemable scumbag in the eyes of his childhood friend, the Saintess. Even the God of Ice had issued a divine oracle demanding his death as a human traitor who had defiled the faith of the Water God.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 但问题是，黄油剧情中，自己这个恶役少爷已经成了青梅竹马的圣女眼中无可救药的人渣，就连冰之神都特下神谕，要求杀死自己这个玷污水之神信仰的人类叛徒。

0002.en: In short, his current situation was terrible from all sides. The Saintess wanted to kill him, and the demons wanted him to fall into corruption. It seemed like there was no good option, but based on Selen An's deep understanding of the game's plot and characters, he had to approach Serenia in this seemingly hopeless situation.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 总而言之，自己的现状就是里外都不是人，圣女要杀他，魔族要他堕落，看似哪一边都不好使，但以塞伦安对游戏剧情和角色人设的深度了解，眼下，这看似两边堵的情况，只能从瑟蕾妮娅下手。

0002.en: This famous Ice Saintess of the continent was known by many titles like "Ice Beauty," "pure and noble," and "untouchable flower." But beneath that cold, unapproachable exterior was a young girl's heart that longed for affection and warmth.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 这位整个大陆都赫赫有名的冰之圣女，被人们冠以冰山美人，冰清玉洁，高岭之花等各种标签，那看似高冷，令人难以接触的外表之下，实则埋藏着一颗渴望感情与温暖的少女心。

0002.en: To put it simply, she was a classic example of "cold on the outside, warm on the inside." Plus, they had a childhood friendship. Selen An felt it was worth taking a gamble.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 说明白点，就是最典型的外冷内热，再加上彼此还有这么一层青梅竹马的关系，塞伦安觉得能赌上一把。

0002.en: If he won the bet, he'd turn his situation around completely. He would return to his great family unharmed, and in the future, he could do good deeds to change his image as a spoiled villain. For the rest of his life, he could enjoy all the privileges of being a noble. The only price might be having to work hard to produce a few heirs to continue the dwindling direct bloodline.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 赌赢了，单车变摩托，完好无损的回到大家族，日后再行善积得，改变一下自己这个纨绔恶少的形象，余生就可以尽情享受贵族带来的各种特权，唯一的代价可能就是要努努力，多生几个子嗣给这凋零的直系血脉开枝散叶。

0002.en: But for a modern person, was that really a price to pay?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 但这对于一个现代人而言是代价吗？

0002.en: This was clearly a reward!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 这特么分明就是享受！

0002.en: The marriage partners his Saintess family would offer him would surely be noble ladies of high status and great beauty. Such a life was much better than his old one where he had to rely on "Miss Five Fingers."
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 圣女家族给自己提供的联姻对象必然是身份高贵，貌美如花的贵族大小姐，这样的生活不比自己在原世界，依靠着五指姑娘度日强多了？

0002.en: And if he lost?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 至于输了？

0002.en: That would be another X-rated scene. Either he would die immediately, or he would be captured alive by the demons, making even death a luxury.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 那就是另一个少儿不宜的画面了，要么立马死，要么不死被魔族逮住，以至于死都成了一种奢望。

0002.en: Selen An clearly remembered that in the original plot, this body's previous owner not only degenerated into a female succubus in front of his childhood friend, but in the end, he also dragged the pure Serenia down with him, and they both became tools for the demons' amusement.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 塞伦安还清楚的记得，原剧情中，这具身体的原主不仅仅在青梅竹马的眼前堕落成雌性魅魔，最后还将冰清玉洁的瑟琳妮娅一起拉下水，沦为魔族肆意玩弄的工具。

0002.en: This led to later CG scenes where these two "sisters," who had both become succubi, led the demon army to attack their former allies. Then, at the city gates, they were singled out by the demon generals and subjected to all sorts of unspeakable acts.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 以至于后期的剧情CG中，出现了这两位共同堕成魅魔的“姐妹”引领着魔族大军攻打昔日的盟友，然后在城门前，被魔将们单独拉出来，做出了各种不可言喻的事情。

0002.en: Because this incident was a heavy blow to the Saintess Alliance, it caused a chain reaction that led to the subsequent fall of four other Saintesses, turning the entire world into the demons' "playground."
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 因为这件事对圣女联盟带来了沉重的打击，以至于引起的后的一系列连锁反应，导致后续四位圣女接连沦陷，整个世界沦为魔族的“游乐场”。

0002.en: No, no, it absolutely cannot get to that point!
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 不行，不行，绝对不能发展到那个步！

0002.en: But what power did his weak self have to rewrite the plot?
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 可弱小的自己又有什么力量去改写剧情呢？

0002.en: Just as Selen An was about to lose his cool from anxiety, a golden light flashed before his eyes. Just when he thought his eyes were playing tricks on him from the stress, the light froze in front of him. As he watched, holding his breath in shock, it turned into a golden virtual panel.
0002.speaker: 塞伦安
0002.cn: 就当塞伦安急得快红温之时，突然，一道金光从自己的眼前一闪而过，正当他觉得是自己急红温了眼花了，那道光芒又在他的眼前凝滞，在他惊得呼吸都快停止的注视下，化作了一面金色的虚拟面板。

0002.en: PS: This work does not contain too many system elements. Readers can treat this system-like element as a part of the setting. In any case, the main plot has little to do with system-flow novels.
0002.speaker: 旁白
0002.cn: ps：本作不存在过多的系统元素，读者们可以将这类似于系统元素当做一种设定，反正大体剧情跟系统流小说没什么关系。

0003.en: Chapter 3: Reset 3 - Has the System Update Arrived?
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 第3章 重置3 挂到账了？

0003.en: Before he could react, a golden light flashed before his eyes and shot into the space between his eyebrows.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 说时迟，那时快，一道金光从眼前一闪而过，瞬间没入眉心。

0003.en: In that moment, the aura of his body was no longer suppressed and began to reveal itself... Just kidding. It was just a daydream.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 刹那间，他身体的气息终于不再压抑，显露而出，九……九点还做白日梦，隔壁网友见了高低得灌点黄汤醒醒神。

0003.en: The cheat system he had imagined didn't arrive, nor did he hear the familiar "ding" from typical web novels. The golden light simply gathered before his eyes, eventually forming a golden panel floating in mid-air.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 想象中的金手指没有到来，耳边也没有传统网文套路中那熟悉的“叮”一声，那缕金光只是在眼前凝聚，最后显化成一面悬浮在半空中的金色面板。

0003.en: Text appeared on the panel:
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 只见面板上出现文字：

0003.en: Name: Selen An Winterlein
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 姓名：塞伦安•温特莱恩

0003.en: Gender: Male
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 性别：男

0003.en: Race: Human (Half-Succubus Transformation)
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 种族：人族（半魅魔化）

0003.en: Class: Profligate Scion
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 职阶：纨绔恶少

0003.en: Level: Noob Warrior
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 等级：菜鸡战士

0003.en: Attributes: (Average person is D+)
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 属性：（普通人平均等级为D＋）

0003.en: Strength: D
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 力量：D

0003.en: Speed: D
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 速度：D

0003.en: Stamina: C+
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 耐力：C＋

0003.en: Recovery: B
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 恢复：B

0003.en: Magic: D+
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 魔力：D＋

0003.en: Skills: Marksmanship Expertise (Increases accuracy with ranged weapons like bows and firearms.)
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 技能：射击专精（使用弓弩，火铳等远程武器时，射击精度提高。）

0003.en: Class Skills:
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 职阶技能：

0003.en: Afraid of Death (Stamina slightly increased) [A fixed trait for the villainous side character. Better stamina helps you survive. When in danger, your will to live will be much stronger than others, and your chances of successfully begging for mercy are higher.]
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 贪生怕死（耐力小幅度提升）【恶役男配的固定性格，较好的耐力能够帮助你更好的活下去，在遇到危险时，您的求生欲将远高于他人，且您求饶成功的概率将高于常人。】

0003.en: Arrogant and Domineering (Recovery greatly increased) [As a noble, you believe you are naturally superior to the commoners. Please look down on people with your nose in the air. This is the pride of a noble!]
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 嚣张跋扈（恢复大幅度提升）【身为贵族的您自认为天生便比那些贱民高出一等，出门请用鼻孔看人，这是身为贵族的高傲！】

0003.en: Treasure:
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 宝具：

0003.en: Sword of Peace (Unsealed) [Proof of the Water Saintess's successor, symbolizing peace. It has never been sharpened. "A blade without an edge, for true peace requires no killing" — The teardrop-shaped emblem of the Water God is engraved on the hilt.]
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 和平之剑（未解封）【水之神代行者的证明，象征和平，从未开锋，“剑锋无刃，因真正的和平无需杀戮” ——剑格处铭刻着初代圣女泪滴状的水神明眸。】

0003.en: Although he knew the original owner of this body was a weakling drained by women, with terrible stats, he still couldn't help but get excited for a moment when the panel appeared.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 虽然早知道这具身体的原主是一个被美色掏空了身体的战五渣，数据烂的会是一坨屎，但是在面板出现的那一刻，他还是擅自在心底默默激动了一小会。

0003.en: What if? What if he was favored by the goddess of luck?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 万一呢？万一自己被幸运女神眷顾了呢？

0003.en: With the anticipation of opening a mystery box, he read through all the data on the panel, then looked away with a blank expression.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 抱着类似开盲盒的期待心理，他看完了面板的全部数据，然后面无表情的撇开了目光。

0003.en: He admitted he was a curious cat. Even knowing it was garbage, he felt a rebellious urge to taste it for himself.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 他承认他是个小馋猫，明知是答辩，却还是产生了逆反心理，亲口尝了尝咸淡。

0003.en: Damn it!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 淦！

0003.en: Could these stats be any more useless?!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 这面板数据能不能再操蛋一点？！

0003.en: Setting aside the "Half-Succubus Transformation" tag on his race, just look at the stats. At first glance, you might think there's something decent, but all the key stats are D. What's the point of having such high stamina and recovery?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 先不提种族上面的半魅魔化标签，就是那串数据，第一眼不仔细看，还以为有可圈可点的地方，结果关键的数据全是D，耐力和恢复点那么高，是什么意思？

0003.en: In other games, this might be a highlight, but this is an adult game world. In the future, he would even become a female succubus. High stamina and recovery, in short, just meant he was "durable" in bed!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 别的游戏或许还能以此为亮点，但这是一个黄油世界，在后续剧情中，自己甚至会变成一位雌性魅魔，耐力和恢复数值高，用两个字来简单概括，不就是明摆着说自己“耐*”吗！

0003.en: And this skill, Marksmanship Expertise, seems fine at first glance. But on second thought, the original owner of this body was a direct descendant with the purest bloodline of the Water Saintess.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 还有这技能，射击专精，乍看一眼似乎没毛病，反过来一想，这具身体的原主是继承了水之圣女最纯净血脉的直系后裔。

0003.en: In the continent of Nephalem, every Saintess followed the path of a traditional mage. Damn it, his ancestor was a top-tier mage, and he, the descendant, was supposed to use a crossbow?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 涅法雷姆大陆中无论哪位圣女，走的都是最正统的法爷路线，尼玛，老祖宗是最顶尖的法爷，你让他这个后裔去玩弩铳？

0003.en: Giving up being a mage to be an archer?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 法爷不当，当弓兵？

0003.en: This was completely outrageous, not loyal at all!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 这简直是大逆不道，一点也不忠！诚！

0003.en: The game designer who filled this character's panel with such nonsense must have been drunk.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 能给他这个角色的面板填成这种牛头不对马嘴的东西，数值策划的家里高低是请哈基高了。

0003.en: But that wasn't even the most ridiculous part. Compared to the class skills below, it was nothing.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 但这还不是最逆天的，与下面的职阶相比，简直是小巫见大巫。

0003.en: If you don't want to give class skills, then don't. But using negative idioms like "Afraid of Death" and "Arrogant and Domineering" as skills?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 不想给职阶技能可以不给，【贪生怕死】和【嚣张跋扈】这两个贬义成语也能拿来当技能凑数？

0003.en: Look at this skill description, especially "Arrogant and Domineering." Is it afraid that he, the Profligate Scion, won't die fast enough?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 看看这技能描述，特别是【嚣张跋扈】，是嫌自己这个纨绔恶少死的还不够快吗？

0003.en: Looking down on people with his nose in the air? If he dared to do that to the old nun outside the carriage right now, he'd probably be crawling on the ground like a dog for her in a few days.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 还拿鼻孔看人，自己现在要是敢拿鼻孔去看车外的那位老修女，恐怕过不了几天，自己就得趴在地上给她当狗。

0003.en: Seeing all this was already infuriating enough, but the final treasure truly made him laugh in anger.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 本身看完这些就已经够恼火的了，最后的宝具，着实是给他气笑了。

0003.en: He thought that even if the attributes and skills were unreliable, a real treasure would be useful, right?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 本以为属性技能不靠谱，货真价实的宝具总能发挥点作用吧？

0003.en: The Sword of Peace, unsharpened because it symbolizes peace. Heh, heh...
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 和平之剑，因为象征着和平，所以未开锋，呵，呵呵……

0003.en: Never mind that it has no special bonuses, this unsharpened, blunt sword is basically a fire poker. It's not even as useful as a farmer's hoe from the side of the road!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 没有任何特殊加成都不说了，这种没开锋的钝剑完全就是烧火棍，甚至还没有路边农户家的锄头好使！

0003.en: In short, looking over the entire panel, it could be summed up in one word—despair.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 总而言之，整个面板一眼看下来，总结下来就两字——绝望。

0003.en: It was so damn hopeless. There was nothing useful at all.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 太特么绝望了，一点能用得上的东西都没有。

0003.en: The only seemingly useful skill, "Marksmanship Expertise," was useless since he didn't have any ranged weapons. It was like a swordsman without a sword, powerless in a fight.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 唯一看起来有用的技能【射击专精】，自己身上还未携带任何远程射击类的武器，这好比一个剑客手中没剑，赤手空拳跟人打架一样无力。

0003.en: In this situation, it seemed that apart from suddenly awakening his bloodline, he could only pray for a miracle from the Water God his family had believed in for generations.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 眼下这个情况，似乎除了自己突然觉醒血脉之外，就只能祈求自家家族世代信仰的水之神为自己降下奇迹了。

0003.en: But as everyone knew, among the six creator gods, the Water God was the only one who had fallen into a deep slumber for no reason. This was why the one who issued the divine oracle to hunt him down for blaspheming the Water God's faith was the Ice God instead.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 可众所周知，六位创世神明之中，水之神是唯一一位陷入沉睡的，且毫无理由，这也就是为什么自己这个亵渎了水之神信仰的家伙，而下达神谕追杀自己的反而是冰之神。

0003.en: Because in the myths, the Water God of peace and the Ice God of judgment were sisters. He had been targeted by a god with a protective sister complex!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 因为神话之中，象征和平的水之神和象征审判的冰之神是一对姐妹，自己这是被某个护妹狂魔的神明给记恨上了！

0003.en: I'm so dead!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 要死！

0003.en: Selen An couldn't help but curse the original owner of this body for being such a troublemaker. If he had just stayed quietly in his great family and not caused trouble, the family would have provided for him because of his bloodline and status. His only task would have been to be a qualified stud, producing heirs for the direct line. Life would have been carefree. But now?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 塞伦安不禁在心中咒骂起这具身体的原主真能作死，明明只要安安心心的待在大家族里，不惹事，家族会因为他的血脉和身份好吃好喝的供着，而他唯一的任务就是当一个合格的种马，为直系开枝散叶，日子逍遥自在的很，可现在呢？

0003.en: He craved some so-called power, wanted to awaken his bloodline.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 渴望什么所谓的力量，想要觉醒自己的血脉。

0003.en: Come on, it's good to be ambitious, but can't you use your brain? Asking the Demon Clan for help? Isn't that just walking into a wolf's den?
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 拜托，你有上进心是好的，可能不能长点脑子？求人求到魔族那儿去，这不是把自己送入狼窝吗？

0003.en: In the eyes of the demons, this sole heir of the direct line was a fat sheep, both personally and for his political value. Moreover, colluding with the Demon Clan was a direct violation of the bottom line of the creator gods and the Church, which would inevitably lead to being hunted down relentlessly.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 在魔族眼里，自己这个直系独苗简直就是个大肥羊，无论是他本人还是他本人所蕴含的政治价值，而且一旦勾结魔族，这几乎就是触犯了创世神明和教廷的底线，必然会一直追杀他，不死不休。

0003.en: In short, the original owner had stepped on every landmine possible, and after doing so, he just died and left this mess for a miserable guy like him to clean up.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 总而言之，原主是将能踩的雷坑都踩了个遍，踩完之后头一歪气一咽，就轮到自己这个苦逼来收拾烂摊子了。

0003.en: If he couldn't handle it, he would have to choose between getting his head cut off or his body run through.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 处理不好，就只能在“分首行动”和“身体被贯穿”两个结局中选择一个。

0003.en: Just as he was worrying, the moving carriage came to a sudden stop. The immense inertia sent him flying headfirst into the wooden wall of the carriage.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 正当他苦恼之际，正在行驶的马车一个急停，巨大的惯性带着他直接一头撞在了马车木板上。

0003.en: "Thud!"
0003.speaker: Narration

0003.en: Selen An was so dizzy he saw stars. Before he could recover and figure out what was happening, the carriage door was opened again. The governess, Mara, reached in from outside, grabbed him, and pulled him out with a forceful "Get over here~".
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 塞伦安几乎被撞的眼冒金星，还未等他缓过神弄清状况，马车的车厢门再次被打开，教养修女玛拉，从外伸出手，直接一个“过～来～”就将他拽了出来。

0003.en: In his daze, he smelled the strong scent of blood from outside. The smell stimulated his brain, and he instantly sobered up. He saw that the two guards in front of the carriage had fallen into a pool of blood, their eyes wide open in death.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 头昏眼花之间，他便嗅到了外面浓烈的血腥味，血腥味刺激着他的大脑，立即清醒，只见马车前的两位穿着侍卫服饰的男人已经倒在了血泊之中，死不瞑目。

0003.en: "What..."
0003.speaker: Selen

0003.en: It was the first time Selen An had been so close to death. He could feel his heart pounding in his chest.
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 塞伦安第一次如此近距离的接触死亡，只觉得心口的一颗心脏砰砰直跳。

0003.en: "Master, don't worry about them. These two were spies for the demons. I discovered them and took care of them. The killer behind us is about to catch up, let's go quickly!"
0003.speaker: Mara
0003.cn: “少爷，别管他们了，他们两个人是魔族的奸细，被我发现，趁机暗中解决了，后面的那位杀星要追过来了，我们赶紧走！”

0003.en: The nun Mara grabbed Selen An's hand and walked forward quickly. The strength in her hand was not something an old nun should possess. The young man turned his head to look at the two guards by the carriage who had died tragically. The pool of blood on the ground stimulated his nerves.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 修女玛拉拽着塞伦安的手就往前疾步行走，那巨大的手劲完全不是一个老修女所能拥有的，青年扭头去看马车旁那两位死相惨烈的侍卫，地上流淌的血泊无一不刺激着他的神经。

0003.en: Mara wasn't even bothering to hide her intentions now. Seeing that they had arrived at Craigmore, the demon's rendezvous point, she couldn't hold back any longer. She killed the two guards and dragged her mission target away.
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 玛拉现在是盐都不盐了，眼看着到了克雷格默这个魔族的接应地点，她便再也按捺不住，顺手杀了两位侍卫，拽着任务目标就走。

0003.en: And Selen An, knowing Mara's true identity and what he was about to face, did not dare to resist. He just let Mara drag him forward. The bloody scene replayed in his mind, as if warning him...
0003.speaker: Narration
0003.cn: 而明知道玛拉的真实面目，也知道自己接下来将面临什么的塞伦安却一点也不敢反抗，只是任由玛拉拽着他往前走，他的脑海中不断的回放着那血腥的一幕，仿佛在告诫他……

0003.en: If he acted impulsively, that would be his fate!
0003.speaker: Selen
0003.cn: 一旦冲动行事，那就是他的下场！

0004.en: Chapter 4, Reset 4: The Showdown Already?
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 第4章 重置4 这就摊牌了？

0004.en: After traveling day and night, when Selen An was pulled from the carriage, he had already arrived at Craigmore.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 经过没日没夜的奔波，塞伦安被拉下车时，已经到了克雷格莫。

0004.en: Craigmore was a vast wasteland with scarce resources, barren land, and few people. It was always seen as the buffer zone between the allied nations and the demon territory.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 克雷格默是一片占地面积巨大的荒原，资源匮乏，土地贫瘠，人烟稀少，一直是被视为联盟诸国与魔族领地接壤的缓冲区。

0004.en: Being here meant they were not far from the rotting lands of the demons, known as hell on earth. Since it was a buffer zone, you might see bloodthirsty demon soldiers or powerful Church knights, but you were most likely to run into demons.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 到了这里，也就意味着距离被称为人间地狱的魔族腐殖领地不远了，由于是缓冲区，这里既可能看到嗜血残暴的魔族士兵，也可能看到雄武强壮的教廷骑士，但很大概率碰到的是魔族。

0004.en: Because not many sane people wandered around this buffer zone for fun. Even if they did, they would have long become a pile of white bones somewhere in the vast wilderness.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 因为没几个脑子不正常的人，没事在这缓冲区溜达，就算是有，也早就成为这一望无际荒原上某处不起眼的白森枯骨了。

0004.en: Run, run, run...
0004.speaker: 塞伦安
0004.cn: 跑，跑，跑……

0004.en: Even though he knew running now was unwise and impossible, the instinct for survival still drove him to call out that simple, short command in his mind.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 即使知道现在逃跑是不明智的，也是不可能的，但求生的本能却依旧驱使着他在内心中呼唤着那最简单，短促的命令。

0004.en: Even as he desperately tried to stay calm, cold sweat poured down his back like cold water, soaking his clothes and dampening his palms.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 即使拼命的想要保持镇定，拼命的想要冷静下来，可冷汗确实如冷水自头顶浇灌一般，布满了后背，浸透了衣服，潮湿了手心。

0004.en: His heavy breathing might have been covered by the sound of his running feet, but fear was never an emotion that could be hidden. Ahead, Mara, who was pulling Selen An along, suddenly stopped.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 粗重的喘息或许被逃跑的脚步声给掩盖，但，恐惧从始至终就不是靠掩饰能够抹去的情绪，前面，拉着塞伦安不停前行的玛拉突然停下了脚步。

0004.en: She looked old and frail, her facial skin loose and yellowed like old tree bark, yet she moved as fast as a sprinting adult, leaving the young man forced to follow her breathless and panting.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 明明看着垂垂老矣，面部的肌肤松弛枯黄犹如老树皮一般，可她的疾行却宛若成年人的疾跑一般，让被迫跟在他后面的青年跑的气喘吁吁，上气不接下气。

0004.en: This body was too weak, drained by a life of pleasure, but he had already surpassed ordinary limits by lasting this long. The endurance stat on his panel was not just for show.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这副身子实在是太弱了，被美色掏空了身体，但他能一路坚持到现在已超过常人，面板上的耐力属性并非虚设。

0004.en: The sudden stop made him cautious. His right arm was still held tightly by the old woman, her thin fingers clamped around his forearm like iron pliers, impossible to break free.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 突然的停顿，让他的心中一阵谨慎，他的右手臂还被那个老女人紧紧的攥着，枯瘦的手指宛若铁钳一般死死的抓住他的小臂，根本无法挣脱。

0004.en: "Mara, why did we suddenly stop? We..."
0004.speaker: 塞伦安
0004.cn: “玛拉，怎么突然停了？我们……”

0004.en: Selen An, feeling uneasy, only got halfway through his sentence before forcing the rest of the words back down his throat. He trembled uncontrollably, his pupils reflecting a strange smile like the cat-faced old woman from a childhood horror movie.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 心中没底的塞伦安刚开口说了一半，剩下的半句话，却被他硬生生的咽回了嘴里，他浑身不自觉的颤抖，瞳孔中倒映出那仿佛童年恐怖片中猫脸老太太的诡异笑容。

0004.en: All the wrinkles on Mara's face seemed to bunch up together, but it wasn't a frown, it was a smile. Age had corroded her skin, but it hadn't clouded her eyes. Those eyes, squeezed between what looked like old tree bark, held a strange, mocking expression.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 玛拉脸上全部的皱纹仿佛挤在了一块，但那并非皱眉，而是在笑，岁月腐蚀了她的肌肤，却并未浑浊她的眼睛，那双仿佛挤压在枯树皮中的眼眸散发着那似笑非笑的诡异。

0004.en: "Master Selen An, what are you afraid of?"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “塞伦安少爷，你在恐惧什么呢？”

0004.en: Her voice was very soft, yet carried a peculiar sharpness, like a needle piercing the young man's heart, causing it to flutter for a moment.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 她的声音很轻，却又带着股别样的尖细，那声音像是一根针扎入了青年的心脏之中，令他感到一瞬的心悸。

0004.en: His voice couldn't help but tremble.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 声音中忍不住带着颤音。

0004.en: He could feel a chilling cold flowing through his entire body from his captured forearm, as if it were about to freeze all the blood in his veins.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 他能感觉到一股阴寒，顺着自己被抓的小臂正流淌入全身，仿佛要将他全身的血液冻结。

0004.en: He wanted to break free, but he couldn't.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 他想挣脱，可挣脱不开。

0004.en: A sense of powerlessness enveloped him. The words he wanted to say, the things he wanted to do, even his thoughts were smashed to pieces by the great hammer of fear, churned into a messy pulp.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 无力感顿时将他包裹，要说的话，要做的事，甚至是思维都被恐惧的大锤击的粉碎，搅成了一片浆糊。

0004.en: "Master, you actually already know something, don't you?"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “少爷，你其实已经知道了些什么，对吧？”

0004.en: She was still smiling, and her smile grew more and more delighted.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 她还在笑，且笑容愈发的愉悦。

0004.en: "Ever since the carriage inspection midway, I noticed something was off. Normally, when you suffered such pain, Master, you would have been rolling on the carriage floor, groaning with tears and snot..."
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “从中途那次上车检查开始，我便发现有些不对劲了，平日里，少爷遭遇到那些痛苦恐怕早就在车厢内打滚，呻吟的涕泪横流了……”

0004.en: "But not that time. As I got closer, I could see the fine sweat on your forehead, but I felt it was more from fear than from pain~"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “可那一次，却没有，接近时，我能看见你额头上的那些细汗，可我感觉那些稀罕更多的并非来自于痛苦，而是恐惧～”

0004.en: "The feeling of fear has been lingering around you from the very beginning, and every time I approached, the scent of your fear grew stronger, even though you were trying to hide it~"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “恐惧的情绪从一开始就在少爷您的身上萦绕着浓郁不散，而每次我的接近都会让你身上恐惧的气息更浓郁一分，即使少爷你已经有意在掩盖了～”

0004.en: For some reason, hearing this alluring and captivating voice come from that old woman's wrinkled mouth didn't feel strange to Selen An at all.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 不知为何，这妖娆勾人心魄的声音从那张老太婆皱巴巴的嘴中说出来，竟没有让塞伦安感到多少的违和感。

0004.en: Perhaps it was because he already knew her identity, or perhaps it was due to the demonic nature that was rooted deep in her bones.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 也许是早就知道了他的身份，也许是她身上那扎根入骨子里的那抹魔性使然。

0004.en: "But what I'm most curious about is, Master, when did you become so clever? Clever enough to see through all my little secrets without a sound~"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “不过我最好奇的还是，少爷，你何时变得这么聪明了？聪明到妾身这些小小的秘密被你无声无息间看的一干二净～”

0004.en: Her voice grew more sickly and crazed, yet at that moment, she unexpectedly released her iron-like grip.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 她的声音愈发的病态和疯癫，却在这种时候出乎意料的松开了如铁钳般的手。

0004.en: Her dry, bark-like skin swelled up as if filled with water. The age spots faded from Mara's face and hands, revealing tender, deep purple skin. Her stooped body straightened, and the traces of old age vanished, replaced by an unnatural 'youth'.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 她那干瘦如树皮般的肌肤像注了水般鼓胀，黄斑从玛拉的脸手褪去，露出了深紫色的娇嫩肌肤，佝偻的身躯变得挺立，苍老的痕迹在从她的身上消失，取而代之的是一种异样的“年轻”。

0004.en: A pair of goat-like horns grew from the top of her head, her skin all over turned deep purple, and a tail with a heart-shaped tip emerged from under her leather skirt.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 头顶伸出一双如山羊般的犄角，全身的肌肤化为深紫，末端带有爱心的尾巴更是从皮裙下探出。

0004.en: In the blink of an eye, the nun Mara had completely transformed on the spot. Goat horns, a heart-shaped tail—these were the classic symbols of a succubus.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 不过眨眼间的功夫，修女玛拉就直接来了个现场大变样，山羊角，爱心尾，这是典型的魅魔象征。

0004.en: And those orbs... they were bigger than his head!
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 还有那球，简直比他的脑袋还大！

0004.en: "As expected of an 18+ game, even an old woman can be made this lewd."
0004.speaker: 塞伦安
0004.cn: “真不愧是黄油，老太婆都能搞得这么涩情。”

0004.en: This complaint popped into Selen An's mind for no reason. He was about to try and escape during the opponent's transformation animation, but with just a single motion of turning around, a high wall of fire erupted in a five-meter radius around them.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 塞伦安等脑海中没理由的冒出了这么句吐槽，他刚想趁着对方处于变身动画的僵持期间，试图逃跑，可仅是转身的一个动作，以他们为中心半径五米的范围燃起了高耸的火墙。

0004.en: The flames cut off his retreat, forcing this complete weakling to face the succubus who had just stripped down at the drop of a hat.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 火焰截断了他的退路，让他这个战五渣不得不直面这位一言不合就爆衣的魅魔。

0004.en: Under the sun, the succubus Mara was completely naked. Her original nun's habit had turned to ash after her transformation. But even stark naked, there wasn't a hint of shame on her inhuman face.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 阳光下，魅魔玛拉不着片缕，她原先身上的修女服在变身后就灰飞烟灭，但就算赤身果体，也不见他那张异于常人的脸上露出丝毫的羞耻。

0004.en: Demons generally lack human morals. This was one of the more logical settings in this 18+ game world.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 魔族基本没有人类的道德观念，这是这小黄游世界中较为符合逻辑的一些设定。

0004.en: "What, you've been exposed? Are you going to kill me to silence me?"
0004.speaker: 塞伦安
0004.cn: “怎么，暴露了？要杀人灭口了吗？”

0004.en: Selen An faced the pressure of the succubus. He tried his best to maintain a calm exterior, but his legs wouldn't stop shaking.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 塞伦安直面魅魔的压力，他想尽力的维持表面上的镇定，可一双腿却在止不住的抖。

0004.en: It felt like how a hominid ancestor on the savanna would feel when targeted by a saber-toothed tiger—a fear at the genetic level, impossible to resist.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这种感觉就像是草原上人类的先祖古猿被作为猎手的剑齿虎盯上一般，基因层面的恐惧，无法抵抗。

0004.en: "No, no, no, Master. Since you could figure out my identity, you should understand why I captured you..."
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “不不不，少爷，你能猜清我的身份，就应该明白我抓你的目的……”

0004.en: "You are my dear little treasure right now. How could I bear to harm you, Master? After all, in just a few hours, we might be calling each other 'sisters'~"
0004.speaker: 玛拉
0004.cn: “你现在可是我的小心肝呢，我怎么舍得伤害少爷您呢？毕竟说不得几小时后，你我可就要姐妹相称了呢～”

0004.en: Selen An felt a chill as she stared at him, and the final word, 'sisters,' made his heart pound violently.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 塞伦安被盯着一阵恶寒，再加上那末尾的“姐妹”两字，心脏咚咚直跳。

0004.en: Mara was approaching step by step. The closer they got, the more Selen An could feel the thick aura of 'desire' radiating from her.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 玛拉在一步步的靠近，双方的距离越是拉近，塞伦安越是能感受到对方身上的散发着的浓郁的名为“欲望”的气息。

0004.en: Succubi are a race that feeds on desire. In their eyes, all males are food.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 魅魔是以欲望为食的种族，在她们的眼中，一切雄性皆为食物。

0004.en: "Stay back!"
0004.speaker: 塞伦安
0004.cn: “别过来！”

0004.en: The young man suddenly shouted. A shard of glass had appeared in his hand at some point, its sharp, irregular edge pressed against his neck.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 青年突然喊道，手中不知何时多了一片琉璃碎片，碎片边缘不规则的锋利正倾靠在脖子上。

0004.en: This was one of the countermeasures he had thought of in the carriage: smashing the glass bottle to use as a weapon for suicide.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 这是他马车上想到的对策之一，将车厢内的琉璃瓶摔碎作为自杀的利器。

0004.en: If before he was still stuck in his modern-day habits, fantasizing about a no-damage escape, the current situation had forced him to bring out his ruthless side.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 如果说之前他还遗留着现代人的老毛病，幻想着无伤通关逃跑，但眼下的情况已经逼着他激发出性子中的那股狠劲。

0004.en: Mara's ultimate goal was to hold him tightly in her grasp until the demon army arrived to carry out a series of humiliating and vicious plans.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 玛拉最终目的是将他紧紧攥在手心，等到魔族大军来接应，实行一系列屈辱而恶毒的计划。

0004.en: But all of this was based on the premise that he, a direct descendant of the Water Saintess, could be brought to them alive. Before, the only one who could threaten his life was the Ice Saintess hunting him from behind. Now, there was one more: himself.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 但这一切的前提是，他这位水之圣女的直系能活着被接应到，之前能危及到他生命的只有那位一直在后方追杀的冰之圣女，而现在又多了一位，他自己。

0004.en: Even though Selen An knew this small glass shard couldn't completely stop a succubus, at a critical moment, every second counted. To turn the tables, he had to wait for that key person who was on her way.
0004.speaker: 旁白
0004.cn: 即使塞伦安清楚这一片小小的琉璃碎片，并不能完全阻挡一只魅魔的步伐，但到了关键时刻，能拖一秒是一秒，想要翻盘，他必须要等到那位正在赶来的关键人物。

0005.en: Chapter 5: Reset 5 - Is This Really the End?
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 第5章 重置5 难道真的要堕落了吗？

0005.en: "Tsk, tsk, tsk... so decisive, using your life as a bargaining chip without a second thought. If it weren't for the scent of the Succubus Seed on you, I would've thought the young master before me had been replaced."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “啧啧啧～如此果断，毫不犹豫的将自己的性命当做筹码，若非你的身上还有魅魔之种的气息，我恐怕都会觉得眼前的少爷已经被人掉包了吧～”

0005.en: The woman before him covered her mouth and chuckled softly, her movements alluring. The small, fleshy wings on her back fluttered with joy.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 眼前的女人捂嘴轻笑，动作妖娆，身后的小肉翅欢快的扑腾着。

0005.en: "Actually, what I'm most curious about now, Young Master, is how you discovered me?"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “其实我现在最好奇的还是少爷，您如何发现我的呢？”

0005.en: "My disguise fooled so many people, and with your intelligence, Young Master, you should have been one of them..."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “明明我的伪装骗过了那么多人，而以少爷您的智商也应该算作其列……”

0005.en: At this, she couldn't help but let out another chuckle.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 说到这，她又不禁噗嗤一笑。

0005.en: "But now it seems you were hiding your true skills, Young Master. Such a clever boy. Your change makes me want to speed up the plan."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “不过现在看来，少爷您应当是藏拙了，真是聪明的孩子，您的变化让我忍不住的想要加快计划的进程了～”

0005.en: No, it wasn't about hiding skills, the person inside had simply been swapped out.
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: 不，并非藏拙，只是单纯的换了个芯。

0005.en: She swayed her tempting figure, but Selen An, his heart filled with fear, was in no mood to appreciate the view before him.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 她扭动着诱人的身姿，但心中被恐惧占满的塞伦安完全没心思去理会那送到眼前的福利。

0005.en: "Come now, Young Master. In my hands, there won't be a trace of pain."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “来吧，少爷，经由我手，不会有一丝痛苦。”

0005.en: She reached out as if to caress the young man's face, but Selen An instinctively dodged away.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 她伸出手，好似要抚摸青年的脸庞，但被塞伦安下意识的躲闪给躲开了。

0005.en: "I won't believe anything you say! Get out of my way!"
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: “不管你说什么，我都不会信的，让开！”

0005.en: He shouted coldly, both to intimidate his enemy and to bolster what little courage he had.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 他冷喝道，既是为了震慑敌人，也是为了给自己那本就并不多的勇气加油打气。

0005.en: "So fierce? You'd better think this through. You have to go through this one way or another. If those trolls handle it, they aren't gentle, and it will be very painful at the start."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “这么凶吗～你可要想好了哦，反正你都是要经历这一次的，要是由那些巨魔族操作，他们不知轻重，前期可是会很痛苦的～”

0005.en: "I'm different. Big sister knows men best. I'll help you shed this stinking human skin comfortably and transform into a noble Succubus!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “我就不同了，姐姐最了解男人了，姐姐会让你舒舒服服的褪去人类这身恶臭的皮囊，蜕变成高贵的魅魔！”

0005.en: At this moment, she was like a fanatical preacher. Unfortunately, she wasn't preaching about God or any creator, but trying to drag someone into an endless hell of desire.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 此时的她又像是位狂热的传教士，只可惜，她并非宣传上帝，也非宣传某位创世神明，而是想拉着人堕入那无边的欲望地狱。

0005.en: Selen An didn't speak, just glared at her fiercely.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 塞伦安不说话，只是恶狠狠的瞪着她。

0005.en: Mara saw that the hand he used to grip the glass shard was trembling nonstop, and the mockery and desire in her eyes grew stronger.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 玛拉看清了他抓着琉璃碎片的手在不断的颤抖，眼中的戏谑与欲望更加旺盛。

0005.en: "Are you refusing because you're afraid?"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “不愿意接受，是因为恐惧吗？”

0005.en: "Young Master, why be afraid? Desire is the nature of life. If you fear desire, life cannot continue."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “少爷，何必畏惧呢？欲望是生命的天性，畏惧欲望，生命可就得不到延续了～”

0005.en: Perhaps Selen An's actions had stirred some memory in her, as the succubus suddenly began to preach her philosophy with a fanatical expression.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 不知是不是因为塞伦安此时的动作或行为激起了她但某些回忆，无衣魅魔突然面色狂热的开始传授她的道理。

0005.en: "Seeing you, Young Master, is like seeing my former self. I was once just like you, indoctrinated by the Church's teachings, viewing the Demon Clan as a great evil. I once swore to dedicate my entire life to the god I believed in, but what happened in the end?"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “看到少爷，我就仿佛看到了以前的我一样，曾经的我也与少爷一般在教廷教义的耳濡目染下，视魔族为洪水猛兽，我曾发誓要将自己的一辈子都奉献给信仰的神明，可到头来呢？”

0005.en: Mara looked at her own rejuvenated skin with admiration, the tide of desire swirling in her deep cyan eyes.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 玛拉用欣赏的目光看着自己重回娇嫩的肌肤，深青色的眼睛中欲望的潮水在荡漾。

0005.en: "Old age, sickness, oppression... I prayed day and night, sacrificing my youth and my life, but all I got in return was this despairing treatment, haha..."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “衰老，疾病，压迫……我日日夜夜的祈祷，将青春，将生命不顾一切的奉献，换来的却是这些令人绝望的待遇，呵呵……”

0005.en: "Devout faith weighs less than a few rotten copper coins on the world's scales. Our so-called temperance and suppressed desires are just ways for the powerful to rule us better. They exploit, they oppress, they feast on the blood of their own kind and indulge in pleasure!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “虔诚的信仰在这世界的天平上，甚至不如几个腐朽的铜币来的有分量，我们所谓的节制，压抑的欲望，不过是为了让上位者更好的统治我们，他们剥削，他们压榨，他们吸食着同族的鲜血，纵情欢乐！”

0005.en: "The compensation for my child's death in battle became a bargaining chip for those nobles to play with women in brothels. My sacrificed youth and the tears I shed fell to the dust without making a single ripple!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “我孩子战死的抚恤金却成了那些贵族在妓院中玩弄女人的筹码，我奉献的青春，流下的泪水，滴入尘土激不起一丝浪花！”

0005.en: She suddenly moved extremely close, slapping the glass shard from Selen An's hand with one of her own and tightly gripping his neck with the other, lifting him up.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 她突然凑的极近，一手拍掉了塞伦安手中的琉璃碎片，另一只手则死死的掐住了他的脖子，将其提起。

0005.en: Selen An kicked his legs desperately, struggling, but the pain of suffocation prevented him from letting out even the slightest groan.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 塞伦安拼命的踢着双腿，挣扎着，可窒息带来的痛苦，却让他发不出哪怕一丝一毫的呻吟。

0005.en: "Why fear desire? It should be a blessing of life that we embrace with open arms. Look, Young Master, the youth that once faded from me has now returned after embracing pleasure!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “何必恐惧欲望呢？这本应该是我们张开怀抱接受的生命的赐福，看哪，少爷，那些曾经从我身上流失的青春，在拥抱欢愉后，此刻又回来了！”

0005.en: "I am no longer that weak and useless nun, but a Succubus, nobler than any of you aristocrats! This is the power of desire. Don't try to resist it; you must accept it..."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “我不再是那位懦弱无用的修女，而是成了比你们这些贵族更加高贵的魅魔！这就是欲望的力量，不要企图去抵抗它，你要去接受它……”

0005.en: "The Church has so many missionaries every year, working tirelessly. Many dedicate their entire lives, but there's one desire they can't forbid: the desire for money."
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “教廷每年有那么多的传教士，辛辛苦苦传教，很多传教士将自己的一生都献了出去，可他们唯独禁不了一种欲望，那就是金钱。”

0005.en: "Humans subconsciously think that with money, they can satisfy all desires. But in their ignorance, they are still trapped by the Church. Truly enjoying desire isn't just about exchange; it's about abandoning everything to embrace desire itself. And everyone who understands this truth chooses, without exception, to find their new life in demonic corruption!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “人类下意识以为拥有了金钱，就可以满足一切欲望，但愚昧的他们还是在不知不觉中被教廷框住，真正的享受欲望不是单纯的交换，还是抛弃一切拥抱欲望本身，而但凡知道这个道理的人，都无一例外的选择在魔堕中迎来自己的新生！”

0005.en: "Rejoice, Young Master! Today, I will guide you into the real world. Embrace desire, for it is the mother of your rebirth! Accept desire, for it is the self you can never refuse!"
0005.speaker: 玛拉
0005.cn: “庆贺吧，少爷，今日我将引领你进入真正的世界，去拥抱欲望吧，那是你新生的母亲，去接受欲望吧，那是你永远无法拒绝的自己！”

0005.en: As her voice fell, a power seemed to flow from Mara's hand on his neck into his body. Something in his lower abdomen ignited, and an unholy fire of desire burned through him.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 随着声音落下，好像有力量顺着玛拉紧扼住自己的脖子灌入体内，小腹中似乎有什么东西被点燃，名为欲望的邪火焚遍全身。

0005.en: "Arghhh..."
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: “呃啊啊啊……”

0005.en: Selen An felt his consciousness uncontrollably sinking into an abyss, as if a pair of invisible hands were kneading his soul, trying to reshape it into another's form.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 塞伦安感觉自己的意识不可控制的坠入深渊，那种感觉就像是有一双无形的大手，肆意揉捏着自己的灵魂，欲将其塑造成别人的形状。

0005.en: The Succubus Seed was activated ahead of schedule! This old hag isn't following the script. This is different from the original plot. She's not waiting for the demon army and is forcing my corruption right here and now!
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: 魅魔之种被提前激活，这老太婆不按套路来，和原剧情发展不一样，没等魔族大军接应，就准备就地强制自己魔堕！

0005.en: Desire washed over him like a tide, relentlessly crashing against the small island of his sanity.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 欲望似潮水般涌来，连续不断的冲击着那座名为理智的小岛。

0005.en: At that moment, Selen An wished he had a strong will. But in reality, apart from being more patient and resilient than the average person, his mind was just that of an ordinary man.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 这时候的塞伦安多么的希望自己能够拥有意志坚定的特性，可实际上，他除了耐心和恢复比常人优秀，在精神方面真的只是一个普通人。

0005.en: The flames of desire engulfed his entire body, the vortex they created threatening to swallow him whole... I-I can't hold on much longer!
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 欲望的火焰点燃了全身，邪火掀起的漩涡像是要将他彻底吞没……快，快撑不住了！

0005.en: Just as Selen An felt he was about to lose his grip on his mind and fall, a blast of cold energy grazed his nose. The bone-chilling cold seemed to freeze the very blood in his veins, and in an instant, it cleared his head slightly.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 就当塞伦安感觉自己即将守不住心神，沦陷之际，一道寒罡从他的鼻尖划过，刺骨的寒意仿若能冻结血液的流动，也在一瞬间让塞伦安清醒了些许。

0005.en: But what truly woke him up was the sharp pain of landing on his rear, as jagged stones dug into his soft skin.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 但真正让他彻底清醒的，是屁股接触到地面，尖锐的碎石扎在他白嫩的肌肤上带来的痛觉。

0005.en: The pain forced his eyes open. He saw a severed hand, still connected by threads of blood, roll to his side. Mara, who had lost a hand, instinctively tried to grab his collar with her other one.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 痛苦逼迫着他睁开了双眼，就见血丝连接着断手滚落在了自己的身旁，而失去了一只手掌的玛拉，还下意识的想用另一只手去拽住自己的衣领。

0005.en: But reality did not go her way. A freezing storm of wind and snow had formed a barrier of icy energy around Selen An. The moment Mara's hand touched it, a thick layer of frost formed over it.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 可现实并没能如她所愿，极寒的风雪在塞伦安的周身凝成了一圈无法接近的寒罡风暴，玛拉的手只是刚一接触，表面就凝上了一层厚厚的冰霜。

0005.en: Realizing she couldn't take Selen An, she decisively retreated. The circular wall of fire she had set up earlier had long been extinguished by the cold wind. Snow began to fall from the sky, and the air temperature dropped suddenly.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 察觉到无法带走塞伦安的她果断后撤，之前她所布置的圆形火墙早就被寒风扑灭，天空开始落下白雪，空气的温度骤然下降。

0005.en: Selen An collapsed on the ground, clutching his neck and coughing violently. Noticing the change in the environment, he almost wanted to cry with relief.
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: 塞伦安瘫倒在地，捂着脖子剧烈咳嗽，察觉到环境的异常后，内心差点忍不住激动的哭出来。

0005.en: She's finally here! The only variable in the plot. If my dear lady hadn't come, the next time she saw me, it would probably be under a few burly trolls in a demon den.
0005.speaker: 塞伦安
0005.cn: 总算来了，剧情中唯一的变数，她姑奶奶的再不来，下一次再想见到他，恐怕也只能在魔窟内的几名彪形巨魔族的胯下看到了。

0005.en: Although the unholy fire in his body had not completely vanished, the cold in the air seemed to suppress it.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 身体里的邪火虽未完全消弭，但空气中的寒意却像是起到了某种压制的作用。

0005.en: "Click, clack."
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: “啪嗒，啪嗒。”

0005.en: It was the sound of high heels stepping on the wasteland grass. The succubus Mara clutched the wound on her severed wrist, a rare look of fear in her eyes as she looked into the distance.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 那是高跟鞋踩在这荒原草地上发出的声响，魅魔玛拉捂着断腕处的伤口，眉目中罕见的带上些许忌惮的看向远处。

0005.en: From within the white, misty snow, a graceful figure holding a sword emerged. As she drew closer, her appearance became clearer...
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 只见那白雪雾霭中，走出一道持剑倩影，随着距离的拉近，那道身影的模样愈发清晰……

0005.en: Her long, silvery-white hair cascaded down like a frozen waterfall, its ends adorned with fine ice crystals. Her ice-blue eyes were as cold and clear as a polar abyss. Her snow-white saintess robe was embroidered with silver thread in snowflake patterns, and a translucent ice-silk scarf drifted with the cold air. The hem of her skirt was adorned with frost flowers carved from ice.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 银白长发如霜瀑垂落，发梢凝结着细碎冰晶，冰蓝眼眸似极地寒渊般冷彻，雪色圣女袍绣满银线勾勒的雪花纹路，半透明冰纱披帛随寒气飘动，裙摆流淌着冰凌雕琢的霜花。

0005.en: The exposed skin of her shoulders and neck was paler than new snow, and a diamond-shaped ice gem hung on her forehead. The long sword in her slender fingers glowed with a faint blue light. Wind and snow swirled around her, forming a misty barrier of cold. With every step, an ice lotus of frost bloomed. She looked like a goddess, the very embodiment of winter.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 裸露的肩颈肌肤比新雪更苍白，额间悬着菱状冰魄额饰，纤长手指握着的长剑泛着幽蓝寒光。风雪在她周身旋绕成寒雾结界，每步落下都绽开冰莲霜纹，整个人宛若凛冬具象化的神祇。

0005.en: That was... the Ice Saintess.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: 那是……冰之圣女。

0005.en: PS: The transformation plot in this book is a bit long. The female form will be fully revealed around chapter 20. Please be patient. After all, this is a new genre, and I'm trying a new kind of story.
0005.speaker: 旁白
0005.cn: ps：这本书的变身剧情有些长，真正显露出女身要到20章左右，请各位耐心等待，毕竟是新的题材，我也在尝试新的故事。

0006.en: Chapter 6 Reset 6: Are These Reinforcements for Real?
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 第6章 重置6 这救兵正经吗？

0006.en: In the middle of the snowstorm, a beautiful figure surrounded by ice appeared, walking on a path of ice.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 风雪之中，被冰雪簇拥的倩影踏冰而至。

0006.en: She's here! After desperately calling for her in my heart, she's finally here!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 来了，在内心千呼万唤之下，她终于来了！

0006.en: The Ice Saintess, praised as having the purest bloodline, the strongest talent, and the most beautiful appearance in the history of the Glacies family—Serenia Glacies!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 被誉为格莱西斯家族历代以来，血脉最纯，天赋最强，容貌最美的冰之圣女——瑟蕾妮娅•格莱西斯！

0006.en: Selen An was so excited he almost cried. At this moment, seeing her was like seeing his own mother. The world outside was too terrifying, the old succubus was too aggressive, starting with wild words, choking him, and then blowing in his ear. How could an innocent young man like him stand it?
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 塞伦安心中激动的都快哭出来了，此时他看见对方就跟看见自己亲妈一样，外面的世界太恐怖，魅魔老太婆也太霸道，上来就是一套虎狼之词，又是掐脖子，又是吹耳朵，这让他这个纯情大男孩怎么受得了？

0006.en: Indeed, only a beautiful childhood friend can be trusted.
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 果然，唯有漂亮的青梅竹马才能给予信任。

0006.en: Although, this childhood friend's purpose for coming here was to kill me...
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 虽然说这位青梅竹马此次前来的目的是来刺杀自己的……

0006.en: But dying at the hands of a beautiful girl is better than becoming a monster!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 但死在美少女手里，但也要比变成怪物要好！

0006.en: Serenia wrapped Selen An's body in ice and snow, restricting his movement at the same time.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅用冰雪裹住了塞伦安的身形，也同时限制了她的移动。

0006.en: Facing the Saintess who had suddenly appeared, a trace of fear flashed in the succubus Mara's eyes. It was clear that, as a former nun in her human days, she had certainly heard of the current Ice Saintess's reputation.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 面对突然杀出来的圣女，魅魔玛拉眼底闪过一抹忌惮，很显然，作为人类时期还是修女的她定然听说过现任冰之圣女的威名。

0006.en: As one of the Six Saintesses of the continent, the Ice Saintess was naturally different from the other five. When the other Saintesses held grand festivals, the Ice Saintess was slaying demons; when other Saintesses helped their followers, the Ice Saintess was slaying demons; when other Saintesses knelt before their gods in pious prayer, the Ice Saintess was still...slaying demons.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 作为涅法雷姆大陆的六圣女之一，冰之圣女天生就和其他五位圣女不一样，当其他圣女在隆重的节日下举行圣祭时，冰之圣女在砍魔族；当其他圣女为信众排忧解难时，冰之圣女在砍魔族；当其他圣女跪伏在信仰神明的神像前虔诚祈祷时，冰之圣女还在看魔族……

0006.en: And this habit seemed to be passed down through generations; every Ice Saintess was the same.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而且这种习惯仿佛是代代流传一般，每一任冰之圣女皆是如此。

0006.en: Starting with the last one, she was either slaying demons or on her way to slay demons. It was more fitting to call her a god of slaughter than a Saintess. In terms of kill count, perhaps only the Fire Saintess, who worshipped war and glory, could compete.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 从上任开始，不是在砍魔族，就是在砍魔族的路上，说是圣女，不如说是杀神算了，在杀敌数量这一方面，或许唯有信仰战争与荣耀的火之圣女能为之一拼。

0006.en: It was impossible to say there was no pressure when facing such a madwoman who killed demons without batting an eye.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 直面这么一尊杀魔不眨眼的女疯子，说是没有心理压力，是不可能的。

0006.en: But she couldn't let her prize escape. The succubus Mara first glanced at Selen An, protected by the ice. Realizing her power couldn't break through the ice barrier, she quickly looked away and focused all her attention on the woman before her.
0006.speaker: 玛拉
0006.cn: 可煮熟的鸭子也不能让它飞了，魅魔玛拉先是看了一眼被冰雪保护住的塞伦安，在预估自己的力量，无法立即突破这层冰雪封锁线，她便立即收回了目光，将全部注意力放在了眼前这位女人的身上。

0006.en: "The Saintess of the Glacies family, known to be the most talented in a hundred years..."
0006.speaker: 玛拉
0006.cn: “温特莱恩家的圣女，被誉为百年以来最具有天赋的……”

0006.en: The succubus Mara wanted to start with a taunt to mock her opponent both mentally and physically, while also stalling for time to find an opening.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 魅魔玛拉本想整一段开场台词，从精神和身体上讽刺一下对方，顺便拖延个时间，寻找下破绽。

0006.en: But Serenia clearly wasn't going to give her that chance.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但瑟蕾妮娅明显不给他这个机会。

0006.en: Before Mara could finish her sentence, the figure that was at least fifty meters away had already become an afterimage. In a blur, a blade of extreme cold slashed towards her neck.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 玛拉话未说完，那道原本距离自己至少还有五十米的身影已经化作了一道残影，视野一花，极寒的冰剑朝着脖颈斩去。

0006.en: It all happened in the blink of an eye. Attacked at close range, Mara retreated to dodge. Though her reaction was extremely fast, avoiding a fatal blow to the neck, the sharp edge of the blade still grazed her collarbone.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 一切的发生，不过眨眼睛的功夫，被近身袭击的玛拉后撤躲闪，即使她的反应已经极快，避开了致命的脖子，那尖锐的锋刃依旧是划伤了她的锁骨。

0006.en: A cut several centimeters long appeared on her deep purple skin, but no blood flowed out, because the icy poison from the blade had already contaminated the wound, spreading into her flesh.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 深紫色的肌肤被划出了几厘米长的口子，却未流出血液，因为剑锋之上的寒毒已经沾染在了伤口之中，蔓延入血肉。

0006.en: A vicious look flashed in the succubus's eyes. The nails on her unharmed right hand grew long and sharp, and without hesitation, she dug out the flesh tainted by the icy poison. Blood the same color as her skin trickled down and dripped onto the ground.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 魅魔的眼底闪过狠厉，右手完好的五指指甲，变长变尖，毫不犹豫的挖去了那沾染寒毒区域的血肉，与肌肤相同颜色的血液顺着肌肤流淌，滴落在地面。

0006.en: The scene instantly turned bloody, and the real battle had just begun.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 场面一下子变得血腥起来，而真正的战斗才刚刚开始。

0006.en: The beautiful, otherworldly ice maiden swung the ice sword in her hand, each strike aimed at a vital point. With her movements, an extreme cold constantly clung to and corroded Mara's skin and flesh, gradually slowing the flow of her blood.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 清丽绝尘的冰山少女挥舞着手中冰剑，每一招都直击要害，极寒的风雪随着她的动作不断的附着侵蚀玛拉的肌肤血肉，血液的流动逐渐变得缓慢。

0006.en: The clash of nails and sword blade rang out like metal striking metal. The movements of the woman and the demon were so fast they were nearly a blur. Trapped by the snow and ice, Selen An could barely see their condition, the real-life special effects, far more dazzling than on a screen, nearly blinding him.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 指甲与剑锋的碰撞发出精铁交鸣之声，一人一魔的动作，快到近乎模糊，而被风雪禁锢了行动的塞伦安勉强看到两人状况，那比之屏幕更加炫酷的现实特效简直要亮瞎他的眼。

0006.en: Holy crap, that's so damn cool! Is this real magic?
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，好寄吧酷炫！这就是真实的魔法吗？

0006.en: If I can survive this... Coach, I want to learn!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 如果能活下来……教练我想学！

0006.en: Back when he was a player, his favorite character in the game was Serenia. To this day, he still remembered the stream of curses that had erupted from his mouth when he first saw her character art.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 本身他还作为玩家的时候，游戏中他最喜欢的角色就是瑟蕾妮娅，至今，他仍忘不了第一次看到这位角色的立绘时，口中爆出的连续不断的国粹。

0006.en: Holy crap, silver hair!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，银毛！

0006.en: Holy crap, blue eyes!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，蓝瞳！

0006.en: Holy crap, so pale!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，大白！

0006.en: Holy crap, white stockings!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，白丝！

0006.en: Holy crap, an ice queen!
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: 卧槽，雪糕！

0006.en: Every detail was exactly to his liking. Every pixel of the Ice Saintess seemed to radiate a special charm just for him. Her very existence was a dance on his deepest preferences!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 每一个细节都对上了自己喜欢的点上，冰之圣女的每一个像素点似乎都在朝他散发着别样的魅力，她的存在简直就是在苏云天的XP上跳舞！

0006.en: And when the plot reached the point where Serenia was captured and forced by the demon general, along with her fallen childhood friend, to do those indescribable things in front of the human city gates, his mind didn't have any lewd thoughts. Instead, a rage he couldn't describe erupted in his chest.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 而当剧情进行到瑟蕾妮娅被俘，甚至被迫和他那已经堕落的青梅竹马，被魔族将军强行摁在人类城门前，做出那些不可描述，无法形容之事时，他的脑海中并没有产生对应的黄色想法，胸膛中迸发出了那连自己都无法形容的怒火。

0006.en: It felt as if someone he liked in real life had been forcibly defiled for no reason. The most important reason he had stayed up all night playing the game was to try and find an alternate "if" route for Serenia's good end.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 那种感觉就好像是现实中自己某个喜欢的人无故被别人强行玷污了，而他连续熬夜打这款游戏的最重要原因，也是为了试着找出瑟蕾妮娅good end的if线。

0006.en: As a result, he stayed up too long and died suddenly in front of his computer, only to be reincarnated into this game.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 结果熬的时间太久，直接猝死在了电脑桌前，这才转生到了这款游戏中。

0006.en: The fight between the succubus and the beautiful girl was a feast for the eyes—dazzling light effects, speeds so fast only afterimages remained. Although it lacked the visceral punch-for-punch satisfaction of a boxing match, the clash of magic and swords was a scene every boy dreamed of!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 魅魔和美少女之间的战斗简直赏心悦目，炫酷的光效，快到只剩残影的速度，虽然没有拳击赛场上那拳拳到肉的爽感，可魔法与刀剑的碰撞却是每一个男孩子心底梦寐以求的画面！

0006.en: The battle wasn't the stalemate he expected, but a one-sided affair. Mara was consistently pushed back by Serenia. Her exposed skin was either covered in thick white frost or cut by the sharp edge of the sword, dripping with blood.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 这场战斗并非想象中的僵持，而是一边倒，玛拉被瑟蕾妮娅压制的节节败退，暴露在空气中的皮肤或是凝上了厚厚的白霜，或是被剑身的锋利刺伤，嘀嗒流血。

0006.en: As expected of one of the most skilled Saintesses in combat, after just a few exchanges, Mara couldn't hold on any longer. She had multiple injuries, and blood carrying the thick scent of desire splattered on the ground.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅不愧是最善战斗的圣女之一，仅是几个回合，玛拉招架不住，身上多处挂彩，带有浓烈欲望气息的血液泼洒满地。

0006.en: Realizing that her head would sooner or later be taken by this emotionless Saintess if she continued to fight, Mara suddenly spread the small demon wings on her back and flew up!
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 察觉到再这样纠缠下去，自己的首级迟早会被这位毫无感情的圣女殿下亲手斩下，玛莎突然展开了身后的小恶魔翅膀，飞了起来！

0006.en: Serenia raised her sword, pointing it at the succubus in the air, her ice-blue eyes devoid of warmth.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅举剑，指向空中的魅魔，冰蓝色的眸子中毫无温度。

0006.en: "Traitor, die!"
0006.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0006.cn: “叛逃者，死！”

0006.en: She issued it like a command, making Mara, in the air, tremble.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 她像是下达某种命令，让空中玛拉浑身一颤。

0006.en: She finally didn't dare to linger any longer. She shot a vicious glare at the silver-haired girl, then looked at Selen An, who was protected by the ice, with a strange smile.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 她终于是不敢再过多逗留，只是恶狠狠的瞪了眼银发少女，有似笑非笑的看向了被冰雪护在其中的塞伦安。

0006.en: "You can't escape, Master. My current state is your future. It's destined. You can't escape!"
0006.speaker: 玛拉
0006.cn: “你逃不掉的，少爷，我如今的姿态就是你的未来，这是注定的命运，你逃不掉的！”

0006.en: With that, before Serenia could react, a pair of bat-like wings flapped rapidly, and her figure quickly vanished from sight.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 说吧，不等瑟蕾妮娅反应，一双宛若蝙蝠般的翅膀迅速扇动起来，身形迅速的消失在了视野之中。

0006.en: Serenia just stood leaning on her sword, watching the figure disappear completely, but she didn't give chase.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅只是杵着剑，注视着那道身影彻底消失，却并没有追杀。

0006.en: Demons were like that. No matter how much blood they lost in battle, whether their abdomen was pierced or their chest was cut open, as long as their head wasn't chopped off, they were very hard to kill.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 魔族是这样的，无论在战斗中流了多少血，或是腹部被刺穿，或是胸膛被剖开，但只要不被砍下脑袋，就很难杀死他们。

0006.en: But as troublesome as it was, as a Saintess with the divine blood of the God of Ice, a symbol of judgment and moderation, Serenia could skillfully dissect her into a pile of parts. But there was no need, because her main objective this time was right beside her.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 但麻烦归麻烦，可作为流淌着审判与节制象征的冰之神神血的圣女，瑟蕾妮娅可以很熟练的将其解剖成一地的零件，但这没必要，因为这次的主要目的，就在她的身边。

0006.en: She turned and walked step by step toward Selen An.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 她扭过身看向塞伦安的方向，一步步靠近。

0006.en: The ice storm swirling around the young man finally dispersed, allowing Selen An, a devoted fan of Serenia in his past life, to see the girl's true appearance so clearly and up close for the first time.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 萦绕在青年身旁的冰雪风暴终于散开，也让塞伦安这位前世对瑟蕾妮娅的狂热粉如此真实和近距离的看清少女的真容。

0006.en: "Serenia..."
0006.speaker: 塞伦安
0006.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅……”

0006.en: He couldn't help but call out her name. Before he could say anything more, or even react, before he had enough time to admire her face, the cold edge of a sword was already silently resting on his neck.
0006.speaker: 旁白
0006.cn: 他情不自禁的唤出了这声名字，稍微等他说出更多的话，或做出更多的反应，甚至连这张脸都没有足够的时间欣赏，冰冷的剑锋却已在悄无声息之间架在了他的脖子之上。

0007.en: Chapter 7, Reset 7: When Strength Falls Short, Acting Fills the Gap
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 第7章 重置7 实力不够，演技来凑

0007.en: As the blade rested on his neck, he felt for the first time that death was so close.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 当刀刃架在脖颈之时，他第一次感觉到死亡竟距离他如此之近。

0007.en: "For the sake of the Winterlein name, I will allow you to leave some last words."
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “看在温特莱恩名义上，我允许你留下最后的遗言。”

0007.en: Her ethereal yet sharp words echoed in his ears. The young woman's cold voice seemed to have no warmth, and just hearing it sent a chill through his soul.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 空灵却又凛冽的话语在耳边回荡，清冷的少女之音仿若毫无温度，仅是聆听，便让灵魂不自觉的产生寒颤之感。

0007.en: The young man's mind went blank as he struggled to move his eyes. He could clearly feel a sharp, icy sword against his neck.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 大脑一片空白的青年艰难地转动着眼珠，他能够很明显的感觉到自己的脖颈处正架着一柄冰霜利剑。

0007.en: If the sword moved even a little, it would easily cut his main artery, and he would die right here.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 此剑但凡前进一丝一毫，就能轻易割开自己的大动脉，让他葬身于此。

0007.en: Damn!
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: 淦！

0007.en: The reinforcements he had waited for so anxiously turned out to be a beautiful psycho who wanted to chop off his head without a word.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 自己费尽千辛万苦等来的援军，到头来竟然是一言不合，就要砍自己头的疯批美人。

0007.en: Dealing with her feels even more dangerous than dealing with Mara, the succubus, doesn't it?!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 感觉与她接触，明明比身为魅魔的玛拉还要危险好不好？！

0007.en: "Wait, Serenia, can you just listen to my explanation first? I was tricked! That traitor Mara set me up!"
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “等等，瑟蕾妮娅，能不能先听我解释？我是被蛊惑的！玛拉那个叛徒她设计害我！”

0007.en: Right now, Selen An had no desire to admire his 2D waifu, even though she was so close.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 眼下的塞伦安没有半分欣赏二次元老婆的心思了，即使近在咫尺。

0007.en: Come on, is a beautiful woman more important than his own life?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 拜托，美人再好看能有小命重要吗？

0007.en: What he needed to do now was to shake Serenia's determination to carry out the divine oracle. Then, using his knowledge of the plot, he had to guide her step by step to avoid the worst possible outcome for both of them.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 他现在所需要做的就是动摇瑟蕾妮娅执行神谕的决心，然后通过自己对剧情的先知性，一步步的引导她，从而避免双方走入最坏的结局。

0007.en: But this was very difficult, even the first step. After all, this was another world, not his modern, materialistic society. Believing in gods was common here, and Serenia was no ordinary believer.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但这很难，第一步就很难，毕竟这里是异世界，不是原来的唯物主义现代化社会，信仰神明，在这里是一件很普遍的事，阿瑟蕾妮娅也并非普通的信徒。

0007.en: The duty of a Saintess was to convey and execute divine oracles. Entrusted with such a heavy responsibility, there was no doubt about Serenia's devotion to her faith and her god.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 圣女的职责是传达，执行神谕，能被委此重任，瑟蕾妮娅对于信仰，对于神明的虔诚无需怀疑。

0007.en: Getting her to defy a divine oracle was almost impossible, but his identity offered a small chance for an exception.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 想要让她违反神明下达的神谕，这几乎是不可能的事，但，自己这个身份存在一定的例外可能。

0007.en: After all, according to the plot, although Selen An was a jerk, he was one of only two people close to the Saintess Serenia.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 毕竟从剧情上来讲，塞伦安虽然混蛋，但也的确是圣女瑟蕾妮娅心目中唯二的亲密之人。

0007.en: Although that closeness had long since faded with their childhood, left behind in the past.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 虽然那份亲密早已随着童年，留在了回首的过去。

0007.en: But nothing mattered more than his own life. He was already at a gambling table he couldn't leave, and no matter how small the chance of winning, he had to bet!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但不管了天大，地大，小命最大，眼下的自己已经上了无法下台的赌桌，不管赢的概率有多小，他都必须赌！

0007.en: If he won, he might still have a chance to be a noble stud. If he lost, it was either off with his head, or he would be forced into endless piston-pumping in a dark demon den...
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 赌赢了，或许还有机会当个贵族种马少爷，赌输了，要么人头落地，要么就只能在日后黑洞洞的魔窟中做着没日没夜的活塞运动了……

0007.en: The young man's desperate attempt to explain himself made the girl's sword pause for a moment.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 青年那急切拼命解释的模样，让少女手中的剑为之一顿。

0007.en: Noticing this slight change, Selen An felt a surge of joy.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 察觉到这微弱的变化，塞伦安心中一喜。

0007.en: It seemed the original owner still held a significant place in Serenia's heart. At least his words could affect her. There was a chance!
0007.speaker: 旁白
