0007.cn: 看来原主在瑟蕾妮娅心目中的占比还是比较高的，至少自己的话，能对她造成一定的影响，有戏！

0007.en: The girl with ice-white hair frowned slightly. Her gaze toward the young man was a mixture of disgust and pity. When he called out her name, a faint sadness appeared in her beautiful, ice-blue eyes.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 冰洁白发的少女微微蹙眉，她看向青年的目光既带着厌恶又混杂着悲悯，随着青年呼唤出她的名字，那仿若冰蓝之心的绝美眼底又多了一抹淡淡的忧伤。

0007.en: But this sadness quickly faded, and the grip on her ice sword became firmer.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但这抹忧伤很快就散去，连同她手中的冰霜之剑也愈发坚定。

0007.en: "Selen An, you know that begging me now is useless. The divine oracle has been issued, and there is no room for you to be saved."
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “塞伦安，你知道的，这个时候怎么求我都没有用，神谕已经降下，你已经没有挽回的余地了。”

0007.en: "Even the gods cannot tolerate the evil deeds you have committed, and this time you have made a terrible mistake..."
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “你之前犯下的诸等恶事，连神明都无法容忍，这次更是酿下滔天大错……”

0007.en: "No one can save you. I know you fear death, so I will try to make it as gentle as possible."
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “没人能救得了你，我知道你畏惧死亡，所以我会尽可能的让你温柔的死去。”

0007.en: "If you still consider yourself a member of the Winterlein family, please stop your cowardly begging. Don't... bring any more shame to the family name."
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “如果你还认为自己是温特莱恩的一员的话，请你不要说出那些懦弱求饶的话语了，不要……再让这个姓氏蒙羞了。”

0007.en: The girl's words were like ice spears, piercing the young man's heart, making his breath grow weak and his blood run cold.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 少女的话语宛若一根根冰矛，深深地扎入青年的心脏，令他的呼吸逐渐微弱，令他的血液渐渐凝结。

0007.en: A gentle death...
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: 我嘞个温柔的死去……

0007.en: I'm just saying, I want to live. Is it possible not to die?
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: 咱就是说咱想活着，能不死吗？

0007.en: Of course, he couldn't say that out loud. He still needed to rely on his childhood friend to get him out of this mess. The most urgent thing now was...
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 当然，这话是不能直接说出口的，他还得依靠着这位青梅竹马带他破局呢，眼下最急切的事情就是……

0007.en: Gritting his teeth, the young man ignored the sharp blade at his neck, reached out his grubby hand, and tightly gripped the wrist of the girl's free hand.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 青年一咬牙，直接无视了架在自己脖颈上的锋刃，探出自己的咸猪手，紧紧的抓住了少女没握剑的手的皓腕。

0007.en: A look of shock filled the girl's ice-blue eyes. Since awakening her bloodline and becoming the Saintess, her pure body had never been touched by a man.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 少女冰蓝色的眸子中一惊，自从她觉醒血脉，继任圣女之位之后，这冰清玉洁的身子何曾被异性触碰过？

0007.en: Because of her bloodline, her body was always colder than a normal person's. Most people who got close to her couldn't stand the bone-chilling cold, so they kept their distance.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 因为血脉的缘故，她的身体常年维持着比之常人更低的体温，靠近她的人大多无法忍受那刺入骨髓的冰寒，从而人人都对她敬而远之。

0007.en: Growing up, the only peers she could be close to were her own younger sister and the man in front of her.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 从小到大，她真正能够亲密接触的同龄人，我有自己的亲妹妹，以及眼前这个男人。

0007.en: One was because they shared the same bloodline. The other was also because of bloodline; as a direct descendant of the Winterlein family, he was her only male friend outside of her family during childhood.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 一个是因为拥有着相同的血脉，那另一个，也同样是血脉，拥有温特莱恩直系血脉的他，是自己童年时期除亲人以外唯一的异性朋友。

0007.en: And now, her wrist was held tightly in his palm. Perhaps from the recent exertion, the young man's body was very warm, and the contact between his palm and her delicate skin even felt a little hot.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 而此时，她的手腕正被对方紧紧的握在手心之中，似乎是因为刚刚经历过剧烈运动，青年的体温很高，掌心与娇嫩肌肤的接触甚至让她觉得有些发烫。

0007.en: She instinctively wanted to struggle, but she was afraid of hurting his weak, ordinary body, so she didn't dare use force. Just like that, her hand was pulled over and pressed against Selen An's lower abdomen, over his clothes.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 她下意识的想要挣扎，却又顾及着对方那孱弱的普通人体质，不敢用力，就这样她的手被对方强行拽过去，最终隔着布料贴在了塞伦安小腹的位置。

0007.en: When Serenia saw where her hand was, a rare, faint blush appeared on her face. She was both shocked and angry. Just as she was about to pull her hand back forcefully, she heard his sincere-sounding voice.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅看见自己的手竟放在那个地方，脸上罕见的浮起一抹难以察觉的红晕，她又惊又怒，刚想用力抽回手，却又听到对方那近乎诚恳的声音。

0007.en: "You can feel it, can't you? The unclean thing inside my body."
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “你能感受到，对吧？我身体里的那个不干净的东西。”

0007.en: Selen An's tone suddenly became calm, so calm that he didn't seem like the debauched and ignorant person Serenia remembered.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 塞伦安的语气突然变得平静，平静到根本不像是瑟蕾妮娅印象中那个花天酒地，不学无术的他。

0007.en: The girl was startled. She carefully felt the young man's lower abdomen through his clothes, and a look of shock flashed in her eyes.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 少女一怔，这才隔着布料贴着少年的小腹细细感受，随即眼底闪过了一抹震惊的神色。

0007.en: "A Succubus Seed! Those demons actually planted something like this inside you!"
0007.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0007.cn: “魅魔之种，那群魔族竟然给你体内种下了这种东西！”

0007.en: Clearly, her regular "dealings" with the Demon Clan allowed her to recognize the time bomb inside Selen An.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 显然，日常跟魔族打“交道”的她认出了塞伦安体内的那颗定时炸弹。

0007.en: "Serenia, I don't deny anything you said before. As you can see, I am indeed a jerk."
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅，我不否认你之前所说的一切，如你所见，我的确是个混蛋。”

0007.en: First step in getting into character: to slowly gain the other person's trust, you must show sincerity. What sincerity means is different for everyone. But for a classic spoiled villain like Selen An, what could be more sincere than a weak, arrogant, and fake young master admitting his own faults?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 表演入戏第一步，想要让对方慢慢的信任你，就要展现出诚意，所谓的诚意在每一个人身上都不同，而作为经典模板的纨绔恶少塞伦安——有什么比一个懦弱无能，狂妄虚伪大少爷主动承认自己的过错要来的更让人感受到诚意呢？

0007.en: The young man wore a bitter, self-mocking smile. He looked steadily at the girl, his eyes free of greed, pleading, or stubbornness. His sky-blue eyes were as calm as still water, pure and peaceful.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 青年的脸上此刻噙着一抹自嘲的苦笑，他定定的望着少女，眼神中没有贪婪，没有求饶，没有执拗，天蓝色的眸子静得如一滩静水，纯粹平和。

0007.en: "I won't run anymore. What I've been through on this journey has made me understand that some things are impossible to escape..."
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “我不会再继续逃下去了，因为这一路上的遭遇，让我明白，有些事是逃不掉的……”

0007.en: "I have committed countless sins, and many people have suffered or lost their families because of me. If those people or the gods want to kill me, I deserve it. But before I accept my judgment, I have just one small request..."
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “我犯下了无数的罪孽，因我而遭受苦难或家破人亡的人不在少数，如果那些人或神明要杀我，那是我罪有应得，但在接受审判之前，我唯有一个小小的恳求……”

0007.en: "Serenia, as the last descendant of the direct Winterlein line, maybe my past actions don't deserve this name. But when I die, I want to at least die as a human..."
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅，我作为温特莱恩直系的末裔，或许我之前的所作所为根本配不上这个姓氏，但在临死的时候，我想至少以人类的身份死去……”

0007.en: "In these last moments of my life, can you grant me this one small request?"
0007.speaker: 塞伦安
0007.cn: “在人生的这最后时刻，你能否能完成我这微不足道的请求？”

0007.en: Second step, after showing sincerity, persuade with emotion and reason. For a girl like Serenia, who seems stubborn and rigid on the outside but is actually warm-hearted, you have to play the emotion card and be reasonable.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 第二步，在展现出诚意之后，劝人要晓之以情，动之以理，对于瑟蕾妮娅这种表面固执死板，实则外冷内热的少女，要打感情牌，要讲道理。

0007.en: Emotionally, Selen An had a natural advantage. After all, the "childhood friend" label wasn't for nothing. Childhood feelings are the purest and most unforgettable, and playing this card was sure to have an effect.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 感情方面，塞伦安天生就占优势，毕竟这青梅竹马的标签不是白加的，孩童时期的感情最是纯粹，也最是令人难忘与不舍，打出这张感情牌不信对方不受其影响。

0007.en: The hardest part was reasoning. If it came to grand principles, a typical spoiled villain like Selen An deserved to be sentenced to death by a thousand cuts.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 最难的其实是讲道理，真要是讲大道理的话，像塞伦安这种典型的纨绔恶少，就算是被拉出去千刀万剐，抬上断头台都不为过。

0007.en: But that was the original owner! Not him!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 可那是原主！不是他！

0007.en: He just happened to die suddenly while playing a game and crossed into this body. It would be a huge injustice to be executed as a villain!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 他只是恰好玩游戏猝死穿越到了这个身体里，要是被当成恶少处死了，可就太冤了！

0007.en: But the reality was that the word "transmigration" probably didn't even exist on the Nephalem continent. If he said he had transmigrated and wasn't Selen An, people would just think he was crazy.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但现实是，穿越这种词在涅法雷姆大陆或许根本都没被创造出来，说出自己是穿越来的，不是塞伦安或许只会被别人当成疯子。

0007.en: But as the saying goes, there are always more solutions than problems. It was unrealistic to try to completely clear his name through reasoning, so he had to push things in a direction that favored him.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但俗话说得好，办法总比困难多，想要通过道理方面直接为自己脱罪，显然不现实，那么，只能尽量向自己有利的一方推。

0007.en: Since it was unreasonable for him not to be killed, he had to delay and buy as much time as possible within reasonable limits.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 既然不杀自己不合理，那就在合理的区间内，尽量的拖延和争取时间。

0007.en: How could he delay things reasonably?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 怎么才能合理的拖延时间？

0007.en: He had to use his status, just like the emperor in a TV show who said, "An emperor has an emperor's way to die; how can a sword be used on him?"
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 那就得从身份上做文章，就像电视剧中某位二世而亡的皇帝说的那句，“天子有天子的死法，怎可刀剑加身？”

0007.en: He was now a top noble and a descendant of a Saintess. In this world where a Saintess was equal to a king, his status wasn't much different from an emperor's. Since an emperor couldn't be killed with a sword, it was reasonable for him to want to die as a human, right?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 咱现在可是顶尖贵族，还是圣女末裔，在这个圣女能跟国王平起平坐的异世界，他现在的身份也与皇帝差不了多少，既然皇帝死的时候不可刀剑加身，那么同理，自己死的时候想混个人形，很合理吧？

0008.en: Chapter 8: Reset 8 - This is bad~
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 第8章 重置8 不妙咯～

0008.en: As it turned out, Selen An's idea was correct.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 事实证明，塞伦安的想法是正确的。

0008.en: He forced a straight face, using a calm and indifferent expression the original owner had never shown, and made a request that sounded like last words.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 当他强绷着脸，用着原主从未露出的平静淡然神色说出了那宛若遗言般的请求。

0008.en: Serenia's ice-blue eyes suddenly softened. She lowered her gaze slightly, ripples once again stirring in her clear blue pupils.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅冰蓝色的眸子豁然软了下来，她微微垂眸，那澄澈的蓝瞳中再次荡起涟漪。

0008.en: After a long moment, the girl's red lips parted slightly.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 良久，少女红唇轻启。

0008.en: "...I promise you."
0008.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0008.cn: “……我答应你。”

0008.en: At the same time, her gaze toward the young man grew complicated. She could never understand why this childhood friend, who she had played with, had turned out this way and done such foolish things.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 与此同时，她看向青年的眼神又带上了一抹复杂，她始终无法明白，这位小时候同她一起玩耍的伙伴，为何到头来会变成这副模样，会做出如此愚蠢的行为。

0008.en: The innocent face of his childhood had long been drowned in the public's curses, along with the many crimes Selen An had committed as he grew up.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 小时候孩童那天真的容颜，随着长大后赛伦安犯下的种种罪行，一同淹没在平民谩骂的唾沫之中。

0008.en: Judging by his crimes, Selen An deserved this fate.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 若论其罪，塞伦安罪该如此。

0008.en: If her childhood friend had clung to her leg, crying and begging shamelessly, she might have already struck him down with her sword.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 如果说面对自己的刀剑，自己的这位竹马抱着自己的大腿涕泪横流，露出懦弱无能的模样，毫无尊严的求情，她这一剑或许已经砍下。

0008.en: It wasn't because she was cruel, but precisely because she still cherished their pure childhood friendship that she had to kill him immediately.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 并非因为她无情，而正是因为她心中还念着那一份儿时纯洁无暇的友情，她才要立即杀了他。

0008.en: For this childhood friend, whose nature had rotted to the core, death was the kindest release. His life was not only a torment to himself, but also an injustice to the innocent.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 对于这位本性已经烂到根子里的儿时好友，死亡是给予他的最轻松的解脱，他活着，不仅自己痛苦，也始终没办法给那些无辜的人一个交代。

0008.en: But now, he had changed. He no longer seemed like the person she remembered. His emotions, his gaze, and even his tone had shed their old absurdity and childishness. He had suddenly matured...
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 但眼下，他却变了，变得不像是她记忆中的那个人，他的情绪，眼神乃至是语气都好似脱去了往日的荒唐与幼稚，霍然间成熟了……

0008.en: Perhaps, facing death, even someone as absurd as him could understand some things in the final moments of his life.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 也许面对死亡，即使是荒唐如他，在人生的最后一段时间内也明白了一些道理。

0008.en: Selen An deserved to die, but as he said, dying as a human was a show of respect not only to himself, but to the entire Winterlein family and the Water Saintess.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 塞伦安该死也理应死去，但正如他所言，以一个人类的身份死去，不仅是对他个人，也是对整个温特莱恩家族乃至是水之神的尊重。

0008.en: She never hesitated when facing the Demon Clan, but now, faced with the most infamous scion in all of Kelt, Serenia wavered...
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 面对魔族，她从不心软，可面对眼前这位整个坎尔特都赫赫有名的纨绔，瑟蕾妮娅犹豫了……

0008.en: For the sake of their childhood bond, her heart softened, and she agreed.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 看在儿时的那一份情分上，她心软了，应允了。

0008.en: Hearing her answer, Selen An let out a huge sigh of relief. The first part of his plan had succeeded. He wouldn't have to die for now. Serenia was someone who kept her promises. Since she agreed to help him remove the Succubus Seed from his body, she would definitely find a way to do it.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 听到回答，塞伦安心中猛松了口气，计划成功的一半，眼下自己暂时不用死，瑟蕾妮娅是个遵守承诺的人，她既然答应帮自己拔除体内的魅魔之种，就一定会想办法办到这件事。

0008.en: No matter how many difficulties she faced, she would do what she promised.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 无论中途遇到多少困难，她答应的事一定会做到。

0008.en: But completely removing the Succubus Seed was no easy task. It would take time. In other words, through his own effort and acting, Selen An had successfully changed his immediate death sentence into a suspended one.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 但想要彻底拔除魅魔之种，绝非易事，这需要时间，也就是说，塞伦恩通过自己的努力和演技，成功将死刑立即执行，改判成了死刑缓刑。

0008.en: As long as he could cling to Serenia's coattails during this "probation" period and return to the Empire, the Winterlein family would definitely protect him, given their influence and the fact that he was the sole heir.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 只要在“缓刑”的这段时间内，抱紧瑟蕾妮娅的大腿，回到帝国，以温特莱恩的影响力，看在自己是直系独苗的份上，绝对会死保自己。

0008.en: The chilling ice sword moved away from his neck. Selen An secretly sighed in relief, but his expression remained unchanged.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 令人胆寒的冰剑从脖子上挪开，塞伦安暗松了口气，但脸上的表情依旧未变。

0008.en: This was another key point. After gaining a girl's initial favor, you must not immediately reveal your true self or make a mistake. You have to maintain the act, so she feels she made the right choice.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 这也是注意一点，在初步获得了女生的好感之后，绝不能立即露出原形或马脚，一定要保持状态，这样才能让对方觉得自己的选择没有做错。

0008.en: Just as he was repeating these precautions in his mind, Serenia reached out again, pulling his hands forward and putting them together.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 正当他心中不断的重复着注意事项，瑟蕾妮娅周回见，却又是再次探出手，将他的两只手强行拉到了身前，并拢。

0008.en: With a light tap of her fingertips on his wrist, a pair of ice handcuffs appeared out of thin air on Selen An's previously free hands.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 随着瑟蕾妮娅指尖轻点他的手腕，塞伦安原本活动自如的双手上竟凭空出现了一副寒冰手铐。

0008.en: This sudden development startled him, but luckily, he had expected it. He resisted the urge to twitch his lips, maintaining a calm and indifferent look.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 这突如其来的状况令他心中一怔，但好在早有预料，他强忍住嘴角抽搐的冲动，依旧保持着镇定且不在乎的模样。

0008.en: A person who has already accepted death should not show surprise at such a small incident.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 一个已经接受死亡的人，绝不应该因这么一点小插曲，而露出错愕的表情。

0008.en: Serenia watched the young man's expression the whole time. Only after seeing nothing unusual did she speak.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅全程注意着青年的表情，在没发现异常之后才开口道。

0008.en: "Don't even think about escaping. Otherwise, you'll only die faster."
0008.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0008.cn: “别想着逃，不然，你只会死的更快。”

0008.en: She said coldly, then turned around, intending to pull the ice chain connected to the handcuffs and lead Selen An away.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 她冷冷道，转过身，便想拉着连接着寒冰手铐的冰链带着塞伦安离开这儿。

0008.en: But at that moment, the calm wasteland ground began to tremble without warning.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 可就在此时，平静的荒原地面却开始毫无预兆的震颤。

0008.en: The two of them instinctively turned their heads and saw—
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 两人下意识的扭头，就看见——

0008.en: A cloud of dust that blotted out the sun rose from the horizon, as if the entire wasteland was boiling. Black heavy armor reflected the crimson sunlight, and demonic war banners tore through the smoke, fluttering loudly. The roar of thousands of iron hooves trampling the earth sounded like the earth's final scream before being torn apart.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 地平线尽头腾起遮天蔽日的沙尘，仿佛整片荒原都在沸腾，黑色重甲折射着血阳的残光，魔纹战旗刺破烟幕猎猎作响，数千铁蹄践踏大地的轰鸣如同大地撕裂前的哀嚎。

0008.en: The troll knight in the lead held a serrated longsword high, its six-legged bone lizard mount breathing out sulfurous flames. Its red scales burst open as it charged, revealing blood vessels flowing with lava underneath.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 为首的巨魔骑士高擎锯齿长刀，座下六足骨蜥喷吐着硫磺火焰。它们赤红的鳞甲在奔袭中片片炸起，暴露出皮下流淌着岩浆的血管。

0008.en: The winged demon legion following behind stirred up a hurricane with their wings. Their horned faces were covered in eerie blue demonic patterns, and the lightning spears in their sharp claws crackled.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 紧随其后的翼魔军团振翅掀起飓风，犄角嶙峋的面孔布满幽蓝魔纹，尖爪中握着的雷光长矛噼啪作响。

0008.en: The sand and gravel turned into a scarlet mist under the iron hooves. The unique stench of the Demon Clan, mixed with a wave of heat, rushed towards them.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 沙砾在铁蹄下化作猩红血雾，魔族特有的腐腥味裹挟着热浪扑面而来。

0008.en: Selen An saw the beast-like heavy cavalry charging at the front—three-meter-tall monsters covered in bone armor, with writhing fleshy tumors on their exposed shoulders and necks.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 塞伦安看到冲在最前的兽魔重骑兵——那些三米高的怪物浑身覆盖着骨板甲胄，裸露的肩颈处长满蠕动的肉瘤。

0008.en: When they roared, the drool hanging from their fangs corroded the ground, making it sizzle and smoke.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 当它们发出战吼时，獠牙间垂落的黏液竟腐蚀得地面滋滋冒烟。

0008.en: They're here, they're here...
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 来了，它们来了……

0008.en: Damn it, why is this different from the original story?
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 该死，这怎么和原剧情不一样？

0008.en: In the original plot, the demon army was supposed to surround this wasteland at dusk. Why are they so early?
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 原剧情魔族大军明明是在黄昏时分才将这个荒原围住，可为什么现在提前了这么多？

0008.en: Wait...
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 等等……

0008.en: Mara. It was her. Because of my interference, the key plot was rewritten. Due to the butterfly effect, a panicked Mara led the demon army to surround this place ahead of schedule.
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 玛拉，是她，因为自己的出手干预，导致关键剧情被改写，在蝴蝶效应的影响下，仓皇逃离的玛拉带领着魔族大军提前围了过来。

0008.en: Selen An's throat moved with difficulty, and cold sweat trickled down his back.
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 塞伦安的喉结艰难滚动，背脊渗出冷汗。

0008.en: Are you kidding me?
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 开什么玩笑？

0008.en: No matter how strong Serenia was, she couldn't face so many demons at once. Besides, with such a large army, there had to be a powerful demon general in command.
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅就算再能打，也无法一下子面对这么多魔族，况且如此大规模的军队，魔族阵中定有实力强悍的魔将指挥。

0008.en: Facing the surging black tide, Selen An felt that he and Serenia were like two insignificant ants, about to be swallowed up in an instant.
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 面对汹涌而至的黑潮，塞伦安只觉得自己和瑟蕾妮娅像两只微不足道的蝼蚁，瞬间被这黑潮吞没。

0008.en: His body froze in fear, but then a sudden force pushed him away, followed by a crisp shattering sound.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 身体因恐惧而僵硬，可这时却突然有一股力将自己拍了出去，随之而来的便是一身清脆的碎响。

0008.en: The restraints on his hands were released; the ice handcuffs were unlocked just as soon as they had been put on.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 双手之间的禁锢和束缚感被释放，寒冰，手铐刚戴上便被解开。

0008.en: In a daze, Selen An saw a snow-white figure blocking his path. With her long silver hair fluttering in the wind, Serenia turned, her arms still in a pushing motion, and yelled at him.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 塞伦安晃神间，只见一道雪白的身影已经挡在了自己的身前，银白的长发随风飘荡，瑟蕾妮娅转身，双臂还保持着推的动作，朝他吼道。

0008.en: "Go!"
0008.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅

0008.en: Her voice was like a stimulant injected into Selen An's body. He felt as if he was being carried by the wind, flying backward in the direction where there were no enemies.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 那声音仿若某种兴奋剂注入了塞伦安的体内，身体像是被风托举着，朝着没有敌人的方向倒飞了出去。

0008.en: As he flew backward, Selen An watched the elegant figure shrink in his vision, his pupils contracting violently.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 飞出去的塞伦安看着视野中越来越小的倩影，瞳孔猛地收缩。

0008.en: "Serenia!"
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅！”

0008.en: He subconsciously called out her name, but the girl didn't look back. Instead, she charged toward the black tide of the demon army.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 他下意识的喊出对方的名字，可少女没有回头，反倒是朝着那宛若黑潮般的魔族大军冲杀而去。

0008.en: A bone-chilling aura instantly swept across the battlefield. On this desolate and barren land, the girl held her sacred sword, stepped into a domain of ice and snow, and charged into the demon formation without hesitation, sounding the first horn of battle!
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 刺骨的寒罡瞬息间席卷整片战场，在这片荒芜的贫瘠土地之上，少女手持着圣剑，踏开冰雪般的领域，义无反顾的冲入魔族军阵之中，率先吹奏起厮杀的号角！

0008.en: Such a scene, such a choice, such an answer...
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 如此场景，如此选择，如此回答……

0008.en: As he flew backward, Selen An didn't know why, but upon seeing all this happen, he felt a sudden, sharp pain in his heart.
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 倒飞出去的塞伦安不知道为何，在看到这一切的发生，他的内心毫无预兆的感受到了一阵抽痛。

0008.en: In this sudden situation, Serenia staying behind to cover his escape was the best outcome for him, so why... why was this the first time he was experiencing this part of the story from a first-person perspective?
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 明明在这种突发情况下，瑟蕾妮娅主动留下来断后，让他逃跑是最符合自己利益的结果，可为什么……明明是第一次以第一视角亲身感受这段剧情。

0008.en: Where did this throbbing in his heart, this familiar feeling echoing in his chest, come from?
0008.speaker: 塞伦安
0008.cn: 那心中的抽悸，胸腔中回荡着的似曾相识的感觉又从何而来？

0009.en: Chapter 9: Reset 9 - Echoes of the Past
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 第9章 重置9 过去的回响

0009.en: It hurts... memories... it feels like they're evaporating!
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: 好疼，记忆…好似在蒸腾！

0009.en: "Hey, little crybaby, what are you doing curled up in the corner by yourself?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “喂，小哭包，你一个人蜷缩在角落干嘛呢？”

0009.en: "Don't... don't come over..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “别，别过来……”

0009.en: "Why are you hiding from me? It's not like I'm going to eat you."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “干嘛躲着我？我又不会吃的你。”

0009.en: "Wow, your hands are so cold! They feel nice. You're like a human ice cube. Holding your hand is even cooler than my family's icehouse~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “哇，你的手好冰啊，摸着真舒服，简直是人形冰块，握着你的手比本少爷家的冰室还要让人感到凉快～”

0009.en: "Let go! Or you'll... wait, you... you're okay?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “松手！不然你会……等等，你，你竟然没事？”

0009.en: "Why would something happen to me? I am blessed by the gods. Your body is a bit cold, but I'm just holding your hand. Nothing to be surprised about."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “我为什么要有事呢？本少爷乃是神眷之人，虽然你的身体比较凉，但也只是摸你个手而已，有什么好大惊小怪的。”

0009.en: "Hey, little crybaby, we meet again~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “喂，小哭包，我们又见面了～”

0009.en: "You, you are... you're that guy who held my hand last time!"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “你，你是……你是上次摸我手的那个家伙！”

0009.en: "Hey, what do you mean 'that guy'? You're so impolite. You're a young lady from the Glacies family, how can you have no noble manners?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “喂，什么叫那个家伙？你说话好没有礼貌，明明是格莱西斯家的小姐，怎么一点贵族教养都没有？”

0009.en: "I-I'm sorry, I, I..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “对，对不起，我，我……”

0009.en: "Alright, alright, don't look like you're about to cry. Here, this little flower is for you. Stop crying, or when your family sees, they'll think I'm bullying you~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “好啦好啦，别一副要哭的模样，喏，这朵小花送给你，别哭了，要不然你家族的人看见了，还以为本少爷欺负你呢～”

0009.en: "No, I can't touch flowers, I..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “不，我不能接触花的，我……”

0009.en: "Take it when I tell you to!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “给你就拿着！”

0009.en: "Huh?! The flower isn't affected? It didn't freeze?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “欸？！花朵竟然不受影响？没有结冰？”

0009.en: "Hmph~ Impressive, right?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “哼哼～厉害吧？”

0009.en: "It's so beautiful... What's this flower's name?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “好美……这花叫什么名字？”

0009.en: "Ice Beauty. I picked it from the garden in your outer courtyard. But you're strange. It's a flower from your own home, yet you look at it like you've never seen it before."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “冰美人，是我从你家外院花圃里摘来的，不过你这人也好奇怪，明明是自己家的花，就好像第一次见到一样。”

0009.en: "I-I'm sorry... I rarely get to leave my room, and I've never left the inner courtyard..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “对，对不起……我很少有机会离开自己的房间，也从来没离开过内院……”

0009.en: "Is that so... It's alright. Next time, if there's anything you want to eat or play with, just tell me, and I'll bring it to you."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “这样啊……没事，下次你如果有什么想吃的，想玩的跟本少爷说，本少爷带给你。”

0009.en: "R-Really?!"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “真，真的吗？！”

0009.en: "Of course~ What kind of person am I? I always keep my word. Would I lie to a little crybaby like you?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “那当然～本少爷什么身份？向来一言九鼎，还会骗你这个小哭包不成？”

0009.en: "Then can you... spend more time with me?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “那你能……多陪陪我吗？”

0009.en: "Huh?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安

0009.en: "Little crybaby, I'm here to play with you again~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “小哭包，我又来找你玩了～”

0009.en: "Selen An, I-I've told you many times, I have a name. It's not 'little crybaby'."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “塞伦安，都，都说过好几遍了，我有名字的，不叫小哭包。”

0009.en: "Nicknames are easier to remember than names, right, little crybaby~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “名字哪有外号好记？你说对吧，小哭包～”

0009.en: "Hey, alright, alright. I'll use your name, just don't cry, okay? Ahem... Bena, your loyal knight Selen An has come to fulfill his promise, as we agreed."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “哎呀，好了好了，我叫你名字就是了，别哭啊，咳咳……贝娜，您忠诚的骑士塞伦安按照约定，前来履行诺言。”

0009.en: "Thank you..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “谢谢你……”

0009.en: "What did you say? I didn't hear you clearly."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “你说什么？我没听清。”

0009.en: "N-Nothing. Let's go play in the backyard."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “没，没什么，我们去后院玩吧。”

0009.en: "Why are you crying? Did someone bully you?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “你怎么哭了？是有人欺负你了吗？”

0009.en: "N-No, Selen An, why are you here?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “没，没有，塞伦安，你怎么来了？”

0009.en: "Why can't I be here? I'm an honored guest at your house~ Honestly, as soon as this honored guest walked in, I saw someone curled up in a corner crying~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “我怎么不能来了？我可是你们家的贵客～真是的，我这个贵客一进你们家门，就看见某个人蜷缩在角落里哭唧唧呢～”

0009.en: "I-I'm sorry..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅

0009.en: "Don't always apologize to me. You haven't done anything wrong."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “不要老是向我道歉，你没做错什么。”

0009.en: "It's because of your bloodline, isn't it? Those people fear the uncontrollable power in your blood, so they've imprisoned you in this tiny room. Am I right, Serenia?"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “是因为血脉的问题吧？那些人恐惧你血脉中无法控制的力量，所以将你囚禁在这小小的房间里，我说的对吧？瑟蕾妮娅。”

0009.en: "You, you know who I am?!"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “你，你知道我的身份？！”

0009.en: "Yes, I know. 'Bena' is just a fake name. Your real identity is the eldest daughter of the Glacies family, Serenia. I've also heard people say you're not the descendant of a Saintess, but the Ice Calamity Witch."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “嗯，我知道，贝娜只是个假名，你的真实身份是格莱希斯家的大小姐，瑟蕾妮娅，我还听说有人称你不是圣女后裔，而是冰厄魔女。”

0009.en: "N-No, that's not true... I, I... Don't leave..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “不，不是的……我，我……不要离开……”

0009.en: "Sigh, don't cry again. I can't stand seeing girls cry."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “唉，别又哭了呀，我最见不得女孩子哭了。”

0009.en: "Okay, I'm not here to say goodbye to you. I won't leave you, I swear. As for those rumors outside, I don't pay any attention to them at all. What calamity, what witch, it's all just nonsense!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “好了，我又不是向你来道别的，我不会离开你的，我发誓，至于外面的那些流言，我根本没有放在心里，什么灾厄，什么魔女，简直就是胡扯！”

0009.en: "I've been by your side for so long, and I haven't been frozen into an ice cube. It hasn't affected me at all. You see, it's just idle gossip from outsiders, with no credibility."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “本少爷在你身边这么长时间了，也没见被冻成冰块，一点影响也没有，可见，这完全是外人的闲言碎语，没有任何可信度。”

0009.en: "But I..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “可是我……”

0009.en: "No buts. Don't tell me you're actually going to say you're the Ice Calamity Witch? Don't be ridiculous. I know you. You still look like you're about to cry. How is that like a witch? You're clearly just a little crybaby!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “别可是了，难不成你还想说自己真的是冰厄魔女？别开玩笑了，我还不知道你，现在还一副哭哭唧唧的模样，哪有魔女的样子，明明就是个小哭包！”

0009.en: "Selen An..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “塞伦安……”

0009.en: "Besides... about the bloodline, well, forget it. I have nothing to hide from you. The Saintess bloodline itself is extremely difficult to control. Your situation is that your power is overflowing and you can't control it effectively."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “而且……血脉什么的，哎呀，算了，在你面前本少爷没什么好隐瞒的，圣女血脉本身就极难把控，你的情况是力量溢出，无法有效控制。

0009.en: "For me, my bloodline is dormant and hasn't awakened. Of course, this is only temporary. With my talent, it won't be long before I fully awaken the power in my blood!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “本少爷是血脉沉睡，未能觉醒，当然，这只是暂时的，以本少爷的天资，要不了多久就能彻底觉醒血脉中的力量！”

0009.en: "So... our situations are very similar?"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “这么说……我们两个人的状况很相似？”

0009.en: "What do you mean similar? My situation is much better than yours... Ahem, of course, your foundation isn't bad. But if you want to catch up to me, you'll have to work a lot harder, little crybaby~"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “什么叫相似？本少爷的状况可比你好多了……咳咳，当然，你本身的底子也不差就是了，但想要追上本少爷的脚步，你还得多多努力呀！小哭包～”

0009.en: "Mhm! I will, Brother Selen An."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “嗯！我会的，塞伦安哥哥。”

0009.en: "If you want to catch up to me, you'll have to work harder. First, you need to get rid of this habit of crying. I heard from the adults that not crying is a sign of growing up. Only by growing up quickly can you become as strong as me."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “想追上我的脚步，那你还得多多努力呀，首先就是改掉你这个爱哭的习惯，我听大人说不哭泣，就是长大的象征，只有快快长大，你才能变得像我一样强。”

0009.en: "I-I will stop my crying habit. One day, I will catch up to Brother Selen An."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “我，我会改掉爱哭的习惯的，总有一天，我要追上塞伦安哥哥的脚步。”

0009.en: "Then let's pinky swear."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “那就拉勾吧。”

0009.en: "Pinky swear, for a hundred years, you can't take it back!"
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “拉勾～上吊～一百年～不许变！”

0009.en: "Hey, did you see? That witch was actually let out!"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “欸，你看到了吗？那个魔女竟然被放出来了！”

0009.en: "I saw her. How could I not? A little girl with silver hair on the street in broad daylight, it's hard to miss!"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “看到了，怎么可能没看到，光天化日的大街上，一个银头发的小女孩，想不看到都难！”

0009.en: "What is the Glacies family thinking?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “格莱西斯家到底怎么想的？”

0009.en: "But speaking of which, that little girl doesn't seem as scary as the rumors say. I dared to get a closer look, and besides the temperature dropping a few degrees around her, there was nothing unusual. She doesn't seem like a calamity witch at all."
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “不过话说回来，那个小女孩似乎没有传言中的那么可怕，我斗胆凑近了去看了两眼，除了周边的温度降了几度以外，没有什么异常，根本就不像什么灾厄的魔女。”

0009.en: "You were just charmed by her appearance. The knights have said that witch is very good at charming people. Once she gets a chance, she'll freeze you into a block of ice!"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “你那是被她的外貌魅惑到了，骑士老爷们都说过，那魔女啊，可会魅惑人了，一旦被她抓到机会，就会被整个人冻成冰块！”

0009.en: "Hey, did you hear?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “喂，你听说了吗？”

0009.en: "Hear what?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “听说什么？”

0009.en: "I work at the Count's mansion, and I was lucky enough to learn that the Count recently received an invitation from the Glacies family."
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “我是在伯爵府上做事的，有幸得知最近伯爵老爷得了格莱西斯家的请柬。”

0009.en: "What's so surprising about that? The Glacies family is a sacred Saintess family. Isn't it normal for a Saintess family to hold a sacred ritual or send out banquet invitations?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “这有什么好大惊小怪的，格兰西斯是神圣的圣女家族，圣女家族有圣祭仪式或发起宴会邀请什么的不是很正常吗？”

0009.en: "No, no, no, this time it's not normal. This invitation is for our Count to attend that witch's birthday banquet!"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “不不不，这次不正常，这次的请柬是邀请我们家伯爵老爷去参加那个魔女的生日宴！”

0009.en: "What?! The Glacies family is actually throwing a birthday party for that witch? I remember that they used to do everything they could to hide the girl's existence and identity. If it weren't for the great vision she caused at birth, no one would even know she exists~"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “什么？！格莱西斯家竟然给那个魔女开生日宴了，我记了曾经格莱西斯家不是极力掩盖那个女孩的存在和身份吗？要不是她出生时引动了很大的异象，估计现在这世上都不知道这一号人的存在呢～”

0009.en: "Isn't that the truth?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “谁说不是呢？”

0009.en: "This world is getting stranger and stranger. Just a few years ago, everyone stayed far away from the eldest daughter of the Glacies family, and the streets were full of rumors calling her a witch. I can't believe that now..."
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “这世道真是越来越奇怪了，明明前几年大家还对格莱西斯家的大小姐敬而远之，街上也是各种流言蜚语，说她是魔女，没想到如今……”

0009.en: "Be careful what you say, brother! What do you mean, 'witch'? She's now the successor to the Saintess. As soon as she turns sixteen, she will be Her Highness, the true Saintess!"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “说话小心点，兄弟！什么叫魔女？人家现在可是圣女的继位者，只要一到十六岁，她就是真正的圣女殿下了！”

0009.en: "What a huge change. Just a few days ago, I saw that young lady on the street. In the past, wherever she walked, you wouldn't see a single person. Now, if you want to get a close look at the little Saintess, you're completely blocked by the surrounding knights and maids."
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “变化可真大呀，前几日我还在街上看到那位小姐呢，以前但凡她行过的路上，一个人都看不到，现在是想去近距离一睹小圣女的真容，都被周围的骑士和女仆拦得死死的。”

0009.en: "Isn't that the truth? A large group of attendants and maids surround her, making it impossible to get close. In the past, whenever she was on the street, she was always alone, with only the young master of the Winterlein family occasionally by her side..."
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “谁说不是呢？一大群的侍从女仆围着，根本没办法凑近，以前只要是她上街就只有孤零零的一个人，偶尔的身边陪着一个，好像还是温特莱恩家的少爷……”

0009.en: "That one from the Winterlein family...唉, let's not talk about it. They used to walk together, but now one is in heaven and the other on earth."
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “温特莱恩家的那位……嗨，别说了，以前是两个人走在一起，现在是一个天上一个地下。”

0009.en: "What do you mean?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男2
0009.cn: “怎么说？”

0009.en: "Times have changed~ It used to be the little Saintess following that boy around. Now, the little Saintess's status has been confirmed, while the young master of the Winterlein family,呵呵, has consumed countless treasures, and even the Pope of The Church has sent nuns to assist him, but he still can't awaken his bloodline. He's just like you and me, an ordinary person who can't use a single spell~"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “今时不同往日喽～曾经是小圣女跟在那小子身后，如今，小圣女的身份地位得到了肯定，而温特莱恩家的那位少爷，呵呵，不知吃了多少天材地宝，就连教廷的教皇都派来了教养修女协助，结果愣是觉醒不了血脉，现在还与你我普通人一样，一个魔法都使不出来呢～”

0009.en: "Enough! Stop showing off in front of me!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “够了！不要在我面前炫耀了！”

0009.en: "I know you've awakened your bloodline, and I know you'll be a high and mighty Saintess in the future, so please stop bothering me!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “我知道你觉醒了血脉，知道了你日后就是高高在上的圣女了，所以请你不要再来烦我了！”

0009.en: "That's not it... Brother Selen An, I just wanted to share this joy with you, I didn't mean to..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “不是的……塞伦安哥哥，我只是想将这份喜悦一同分享给你，并没有……”

0009.en: "Shut up!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “闭嘴！”

0009.en: "Every sound you make seems to be mocking me, every word feels like it's satirizing me. Your very presence disgusts me!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “你的每一道声音都仿佛在嘲笑我，每一句话都好似在讽刺我，你的气息令我感到无比厌恶！”

0009.en: "That's not it, it's not like that, I..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0009.cn: “不是的，不是这样的，我……”

0009.en: "If it's not like that, then how is it? Do you know what the maid guarding your door said to me when I went to your house yesterday?!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “不是这样的，还能怎样？你知道我昨天去你家中，守在你门口的女仆是怎样一副嘴脸，是怎样对我说的吗？！”

0009.en: "She told me to stay away from you, said I wasn't worthy to stand by your side. A mere servant dared to mock me with such an arrogant tone. Is that possible without your and your family's silent approval?!! Answer me!!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “让我离你远一点，说我不配站在你的身旁，一个下人都敢用如此高高在上的语气讽刺我，这里面没有你，没有你家族的默许，可能吗？！！回答我！！”

0009.en: "I... didn't..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅

0009.en: "Full of lies. I won't believe another word you say. I treated you like a friend, like my own little sister, but you betrayed me. Now, you've become the high and mighty Saintess, and what about me? 呵呵..."
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “满口的谎言，我不会再相信你一句话了，我把你当做朋友，把你当做亲妹妹一般看待，而你却背叛了我。如今，你成了高高在上的圣女，而我呢？呵呵……“

0009.en: "I've become the background to highlight you, the noble Saintess!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “成了衬托你这位高贵圣女的背景板！”

0009.en: "What a transformation from an ugly duckling to a swan, what a case of a toad wanting to eat swan meat... Serenia, you and your family make me sick. Get out of here! Get out of my room! You are never welcome here!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “好一个丑小鸭蜕变的白天鹅，好一个癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉……瑟蕾妮娅，你和你的家族让我觉得恶心，离开这里！离开我的房间！这里永远不欢迎你！”

0009.en: "Serenia, I hate you! The sight of your face makes me want to vomit. Stop pretending to be a holy Saintess. Get out! I never want to see you again!"
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅，我讨厌你！一看到你那张脸，我就恶心的想要作呕，别装什么圣洁圣女了，滚！我永远都不想见到你！”

0009.en: "I'm sorry..."
0009.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅

0009.en: His head felt as if it had been pierced by a steel bar. Countless familiar yet strange memories flooded into his brain without reason. The pain was so intense it felt like his skull would split open, leaving him in agony every single moment.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 大脑仿佛被钢筋贯穿了一般，无数既熟悉又陌生的记忆毫无道理的灌输入大脑，那种脑壳好似要被撑裂的痛苦，让他的每分每秒都处于煎熬之中。

0009.en: Countless voices echoed one after another, the echoes of the past. The conversation between the boy and the girl stretched from the past to the present. The memories drew closer and closer with the passage of time, until his brain could temporarily hold no more, and the pain finally eased slightly...
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 数不清的声音接连的响起，那是属于过去的回响，少年与少女的对话从过去铺至现在，记忆伴随着时间的尺度一点点的拉近，直到他的大脑暂时容不下任何一点记忆，那种痛苦才稍稍缓解……

0009.en: Those memories... who do they belong to?
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: 那些记忆……好像，到底是属于谁的？

0009.en: In his unconscious state, his mind was a chaotic mess. Faced with an ocean of memories, his unclear consciousness only felt a deep sense of confusion.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 处于昏迷状态下的意义是一片混沌，面对海洋的记忆，意识并不清晰的他只感到浓郁的茫然。

0009.en: Those familiar voices, those fragmented images, all felt as if he had experienced them himself. Yet subconsciously, he seemed to have an instinctive resistance and distance towards them.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 那些熟悉的声音，那些破碎的画面都好似他亲身经历的一般，可潜意识里，他又好像对那些既有一种本能的抗拒和隔阂。

0009.en: It was as if accepting those memories would lead to something unpredictable.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 就好像只要接受了那些记忆，会发生一些难以预料的事情。

0009.en: Gradually, his sinking consciousness broke free from the ocean of memories and returned to his body. He could slowly feel his physical existence again, and the aching pain that came from every part of him.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 渐渐的，沉沦的意识从记忆的海洋中脱离，重新回到躯壳，他慢慢的能感受到身体的存在，以及那浑身无一不在传来的阵痛。

0009.en: The strong scent of medicine stimulated him to wake up faster. When he finally forced his eyelids open and didn't sense the heavy, murderous atmosphere of a battlefield, a guess instinctively formed in his mind.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 浓郁的药香刺激着他更快的清醒，直到他费力的撑开眼皮，没有从身边感受到战场上那浓重的肃杀味，脑海中才本能的浮现出一道猜想。

0009.en: Did I... manage to survive?
0009.speaker: 塞伦安
0009.cn: 自己这是，成功活下来了？

0010.en: Chapter 10: Reset 10 - Coincidence and Misfortune
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 第10章 重置10 巧合与不幸

0010.en: This time, he was woken up by the strong, unpleasant smell of herbs.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这次醒来，几乎是被浓郁且难闻的草药味儿给熏醒。

0010.en: "Cough, cough..."
0010.speaker: 塞伦安

0010.en: The first thing he felt after waking up was pain and weakness. The strong smell of herbs made him cough twice, and his fragile body felt like it might fall apart.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 清醒过来的第一感受就是疼痛与虚弱，被药草味呛的连咳嗽两声，这具虚弱的身子骨都差点被震散架了。

0010.en: He desperately tried to sit up from the dry straw, but his trembling body was wracked with a sharp pain from the wound on his left arm. He couldn't stop a pained cry from escaping his lips, as if the pain had drained all his remaining strength.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 他拼命的想要从干燥的稻草上坐起来，但腰部发力带动着颤抖的全身，左臂处的伤口传来钻心般的疼痛，他没忍住发出一声哀嚎，身体仅有的那一丝力气似乎都被疼痛抽走。

0010.en: Thankfully, a pair of hands suddenly supported him from behind, helping him to sit up and lean against the wall.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 好在这时，突然有一双手，从后背将他的身子托起，他这才艰难的在外力的搀扶下坐靠在了墙壁。

0010.en: His vision slowly came into focus. He struggled to turn his head and look around, finding himself in a simple wooden hut.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 视野从模糊逐渐转为清晰，他费力的扭动着脑袋转动眼珠，观察四周，只见自己现在身处在一间简陋的木屋。

0010.en: The walls of the hut were made of old wood, and the furniture was scarce. There was only a simple wooden bed, a wooden box, a small clay stove with a fire burning inside, and a pot bubbling with medicine on top of it. Nothing else...
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 木屋墙壁四周用材陈旧，屋内的家具陈设也少的可怜，除了一个简陋的木床，一个木箱子，一个正在冒火的土坯炉，以及架在炉上咕嘟咕嘟冒着烟药罐以外便再无其他……

0010.en: "Uh... where is this...?"
0010.speaker: 塞伦安
0010.cn: “呃…这里是……？”

0010.en: "Don't move. Your injuries are serious. It's best if you lie down."
0010.speaker: 陌生女1
0010.cn: “别乱动，你的伤很重，最好躺着。”

0010.en: A gentle female voice spoke by his ear as she pressed down on his body, forcing him to lean back again.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 一道温柔的女声响于耳畔，同时又摁住他乱动的身体，迫使他重新靠坐回去。

0010.en: Only then did he see clearly that the person who had helped him up was a young woman in a worn cloth dress with her hair tied up. Although her face was covered in dust and dirt, it was easy to tell that she was quite pretty underneath.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这时他才看清之前扶着他坐起来的是一位身着破旧布裙，头发扎起的姑娘，这姑娘的脸虽然布着灰尘与污垢，脏兮兮的，但不难看出其真实面貌定然清秀可人。

0010.en: "This is my home. I found you injured when I was out. Seeing how badly hurt you were, I took the liberty of bringing you back to treat you."
0010.speaker: 陌生女1
0010.cn: “这里是我家，我外出时偶遇受伤的你，见先生你身上伤势较重，就自作主张将你背回家救治了。”

0010.en: The young woman explained.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女如此解释道。

0010.en: Selen An looked down and saw that he was covered with his own tattered coat, which had been worn out during his escape. As for his left arm, which was still throbbing with pain, the gash on his upper arm was wrapped in yellowish gauze. The gauze was clearly mixed with herbs, showing green herbal juice and seeping blood.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 塞伦安一低头就发现自己身上盖着的布料正是自己那件逃跑时已经磨损的破破烂烂的外套，而至于还在剧烈作痛的左臂，大臂的撕裂处伤口已被用泛黄的纱布包裹，纱布中明显掺着草药，内部泛着绿色的草药汁液和渗透出的血色。

0010.en: Looking at his bandaged arm, Selen An forced a grateful smile for the young woman, moving his pale lips while enduring the intense pain.
0010.speaker: 塞伦安
0010.cn: 看着被纱布包裹的手臂，塞伦安强忍着剧烈的疼痛，蠕动着苍白的嘴唇，朝着少女扯出了一丝感谢的笑容。

0010.en: "Thank you for saving my life... cough, cough..."
0010.speaker: 塞伦安
0010.cn: “多谢，救命之恩……咳咳……”

0010.en: "Sir, you're too weak. You should talk less for now."
0010.speaker: 陌生女1
0010.cn: “先生，您的身体太虚弱了，先少说些话吧。”

0010.en: The young woman advised him softly. At the same time, a cough was heard from behind him.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女轻声劝道，与此同时，身后也传来了一道咳嗽声。

0010.en: The young woman quickly turned and went to the only wooden bed in the shabby hut. A woman was lying on it, and even under the covers, her swollen belly was clearly visible.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女急忙转身来到了这破旧屋子的唯一木床旁，床上躺着位妇人，即使有抹布被褥掩盖，也依旧能够看清那高高隆起的腹部。

0010.en: If he wasn't mistaken, the woman on the bed was pregnant, and far enough along that she could give birth at any moment.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 猜的没错的话，那床上的妇人应当是怀了孕，且肚子里的婴儿月份已经足够大，估计随时都可能分娩。

0010.en: "Mother, is your stomach hurting again?"
0010.speaker: 陌生女1
0010.cn: “妈妈，你的肚子又开始痛了吗？”

0010.en: "Ugh... it's alright. It's been like this all month. You, you should go check on that gentleman's injuries first..."
0010.speaker: 陌生女2
0010.cn: “呃啊……不要紧，这个月的老毛病了，你，你先去看看那位先生的伤势吧……”

0010.en: The woman's voice was clearly weak and breathless, but you could still tell she was a very gentle mother.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 妇人的声音带着明显的虚弱和喘息，但仅从声音依旧能够分辨出她应当是一位很温柔的母亲。

0010.en: The young woman looked worriedly at her mother's thin, pale face and her large belly, feeling anxious but helpless.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女担忧的看着母亲焦瘦枯黄的脸色，又了看了看那高高隆起的肚子，心中焦急却无可奈何。

0010.en: Her mother's stomach ache wasn't from sickness, but from hunger. As a woman about to give birth, she desperately needed nutrition and care. But here in the Craigmore wasteland, there was nothing but endless barren land.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 母亲的肚子疼并非生病，而是饥饿，作为一位即将妊娠的孕妇，临近生产期间本就急需营养和保护，可在这克雷格默荒原上，一眼望去，只有无边无际的贫瘠土地和枯黄。

0010.en: Food and water were scarce here.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 食物和水源在这里是稀缺物资。

0010.en: Even though she worked hard and searched for supplies every day, she could barely find enough for the two of them. Her mother was already pregnant when they fled, and now, in this harsh environment, she was suffering from malnutrition.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 即使她每日外出辛勤劳作和寻找，得来的物资也只能勉强两人糊口，出逃时，母亲肚里便怀了弟弟妹妹，此时，在这恶劣的环境下更是饿的营养不良。

0010.en: The woman stroked the young woman's hand and just shook her head, telling her not to worry.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 妇人抚摸着少女的手，只是摇头，让她不用担心。

0010.en: The young woman hid her anxiety, knowing that worrying alone wouldn't help. She got up to take care of the medicine pot bubbling on the clay stove.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女微微收敛起脸上的焦急，太明白单纯的担忧起不到任何作用，起身便去处理，那土炉上已经烧的咕噜咕噜的药罐。

0010.en: "Sir, can you lift your arm? Let me change your medicine."
0010.speaker: 陌生女1
0010.cn: “先生，手臂能抬起来吗？我帮您换一下药。”

0010.en: The young woman carefully placed the steaming pot on the ground and lifted the lid, revealing a dark green paste inside.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女小心翼翼地将还冒着烟的药罐端放在了地上，掀开药罐顶部的盖子，呈现出里面熬制出的深绿色糊状物质。

0010.en: As soon as Selen An lifted his hand, the small movement pulled at his wound, causing a sharp pain that made him grit his teeth and let out a miserable cry.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 塞伦安刚一抬手，不大的动作却扯到伤口，钻心的疼痛让他忍不住的呲牙，口中发出狼狈的哀嚎。

0010.en: Seeing this, the young woman felt sorry for him. She came forward and rested his arm on her knees, then began to unwrap the bandage to clean the wound and apply new medicine.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女见状，于心不忍，主动上前将青年的右臂搭在了自己并拢的双膝上，然后开始拆解绷带，清理伤口重新上药。

0010.en: He had barely survived, and now he was completely unable to move. At this moment, Selen An had no energy to worry about whether the Demon Clan's army was still chasing him or what had happened to Serenia. He just watched the young woman's face as she seriously cleaned his wound and changed the dressing.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 好不容易活下来，而现在，自己又一副根本没办法行动的样子，塞伦安此时已经没有心思关心魔族大军有没有追过来，瑟蕾妮娅到底怎么样了，他看着眼前那一脸认真为自己清理伤口换药的少女。

0010.en: At first, he thought it was just like a scene from an R-rated game. Any random commoner, an NPC in the game, looked incredibly beautiful up close in reality. But as he kept looking, he felt a strange sense of familiarity.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 一开始是觉得不愧是小黄油事件，这随便一个平民，放在游戏里NPC的存在，变成现实拉近距离，这颜值也是极其能打的，可看着看着他又有一股莫名的熟悉感。

0010.en: Perhaps feeling his gaze, the young woman looked away.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女或许是感受到了塞伦安的注视，眼神有些回避。

0010.en: "Miss, you saved my life, but I still don't know your name."
0010.speaker: 塞伦安
0010.cn: “这位小姐，得逢您的救命之恩，还不知道您的名字。”

0010.en: "...Anna. My name is Anna."
0010.speaker: 安娜
0010.cn: “……安娜，我的名字叫安娜。”

0010.en: The young woman was silent at first. When she had almost finished changing the dressing, she suddenly looked up and answered. Her clear eyes met Selen An's, as if she was trying to find something in them.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 少女先是沉默，等手上的药换的差不多了，突然，猛地一抬头，开口回答。那双清澈的眸子对上塞伦安的眼睛，像是要从自己的眼睛里得到些什么。

0010.en: Hearing the name "Anna" and seeing the young woman's face, the massive amount of information that had been poured into his brain began to churn again. Memories related to the keyword "Anna" surfaced.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 听到这个名字，配合上眼前少女的样貌，之前那被灌入大脑中的海量计又开始翻腾，其中，有关于安娜关键词的记忆浮现在脑海之中。

0010.en: So it was her...
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 原来是她……

0010.en: Selen An's feelings suddenly became very complicated.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 塞伦安的心情骤然变得复杂了起来。

0010.en: From a player's perspective, this young woman named Anna was not an ordinary NPC. She had appeared in the game's animated cutscenes.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 如果从玩家的角度来看，眼前，这名为安娜的少女的确不算是普通NPC，游戏剧情的CG动画中有出现过她的身影。

0010.en: The original Selen An was known as a profligate scion who had done many evil things. He had harmed many girls, and Anna was one of them.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 都说原主塞伦安是个十恶不作的纨绔恶少，从小到大，这位恶少手底下祸害过的女孩子不少，而安娜就是其中之一。

0010.en: Anna was originally an ordinary citizen in Saint-Contlan. But she was unlucky. Her greatest misfortune was being knocked over in the street by the great villain, Selen An. Because of her beauty and her simple, pure demeanor, which was different from that of noble ladies, Selen An took an interest in her.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 安娜本是圣克特兰领的一位普通市民，可它命中不幸，最大的不幸就是在街上被大恶少塞伦安撞倒，因本身的美貌以及身上那一股不同于贵族之女的质朴清纯，从而被塞伦安盯上。

0010.en: What followed was the familiar story of a noble oppressing a commoner. Selen An used his power to try and take Anna by force. When Anna's father found out, he impulsively went to Selen An's home and knelt, begging him to spare his daughter and their family.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 之后就是耳熟能详的贵族压迫平民，塞伦安仗着权势要强抢安娜，而安娜的父亲得知后一时冲动，就上门跪求塞伦安放过他的女儿，放过他们一家。

0010.en: The news that a commoner had kneeled before a direct descendant of a Saintess quickly spread throughout Saint-Contlan. Selen An was criticized and mocked by his family and the public. He held a grudge and designed a plot to beat the poor father to death in a small alley.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 平民上门跪求圣女直系一事很快传遍了整个圣克特兰领，塞伦安受到家中和外界指责与嘲笑，怀恨在心，设计在一条小巷子中活活将那位可怜的父亲打死。

0010.en: A neighbor happened to pass by and saw it, then ran home to tell Anna and her mother. Fortunately, Anna's family had a good relationship with their neighbors. They pooled their money and efforts to help the mother and daughter escape the city before Selen An could get to them.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而这一幕又被恰好路过的邻居看到，邻居跑回家中将事件告知安娜母女，好在安娜一家原本与周围的人际关系就很不错，周围邻里看在母女二人可怜的份上，便一同有钱出钱，有力出力，在塞伦安还没来得及将魔爪伸过来之前，就将母女二人送出了城。

0010.en: By the time Selen An realized what had happened, Anna's home was empty. With the neighbors covering for them, he saw that he couldn't catch them. At that time, Selen An had already given up on himself, so he didn't care much and went back to his life of indulgence.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 等塞伦安反应过来，安娜的家中早就空无一人，又有邻里之间的打掩护，眼看着人是追不回来了，而当时已经完全自暴自弃的塞伦安也就没将这回事放在心上，继续回去花天酒地。

0010.en: He never thought that what was a minor incident in his eyes had caused this mother and daughter to lose their family's provider, lose their home, and flee to this wasteland, suffering greatly along the way.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 没想到，在他眼中，只不过是一件微不足道的小事，却让这母女二人失去了家里的顶梁柱，家破人亡，一路逃命到这荒原之上，吃尽了苦头。

0010.en: Thinking of this, Selen An felt a strong sense of guilt, but at the same time, he kept telling himself that the original owner of this body had done these things, not him.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 一想到这塞伦安的心中便止不住的涌出浓烈的愧疚，可与此同时，他又在不断的告诫自己，这些是这具身体的原主所做的，与自己无关。

0010.en: He was just an unlucky guy who happened to transmigrate into this body. In a way, he was a victim too.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 自己只是一个碰巧穿越到这具身体里的倒霉蛋而已，换句话说，从某种意义上来讲，他也算是受害者。

0010.en: But no matter how he tried to comfort himself, the guilt and sinfulness churned inside him, and he couldn't find peace.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 可无论他心中怎么安慰自己，那种愧疚混合着罪恶感在心中翻涌的情绪，让他的内心迟迟无法平静下来。

0010.en: Having those memories made it feel as if he had done those terrible things himself...
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 拥有了那些记忆，就好像那些荒唐事是自己亲手所做一样……

0010.en: He felt confused. Feeling the young woman's intentional gaze on him, he subconsciously lowered his eyes to hide his panic.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 他觉得有些混乱，感受到少女有意投来的目光，只是下意识的垂下眼帘，按耐住心中的慌乱。

0010.en: "Is, is that so... Anna, that's a very nice name..."
0010.speaker: 塞伦安
0010.cn: “是，是吗……安娜，很好听的名字呢……”

0010.en: Then, the air fell silent.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 随即，空气陷入了一阵沉默。

0011.en: Chapter 11: Reset 11 Andre
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 第11章 重置11 安德烈

0011.en: "I-is that so... Anna, that's a very nice name..."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “是，是吗……安娜，很好听的名字呢……”

0011.en: As Selen An stammered out the hasty compliment, the air fell silent. Anna, who was applying his medicine, looked at the young man's evasive eyes and shook her head.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 随着塞伦安这一句磕磕绊绊，略显仓促的称赞，空气陷入了一片沉默，为他上药的安娜注视着青年有些躲闪的眼神，摇了摇头。

0011.en: "Nice? Not really. It's just a very common name. In the entire empire, I'm far from the only girl named Anna."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “好听吗？并没有，这只是个很普通的名字，在整个帝国之中，叫安娜的女孩子何止我一人。”

0011.en: The girl's flat statement seemed completely different from her earlier attitude when she was bandaging his wounds. Selen An's awkward expression froze, unsure how to respond.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 少女这不平不淡的一句似与之前为他包扎伤口的态度截然不同，塞伦安尴尬的神色僵住，不知该用什么话来回答。

0011.en: The continent he had transmigrated to was a typical Western fantasy world. In Western society, the name Anna was indeed as common as 'Liu Wei' in a certain large Eastern country.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 穿越到的大陆是典型的西幻世界，在西方社会中，安娜这个名字的确与某东方大国中的刘伟一样普遍。

0011.en: "But... thank you anyway."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “不过……还是谢谢你。”

0011.en: "Huh?!"
0011.speaker: 塞伦安

0011.en: Anna stood up, picked up the earthenware pot, and looked once more at the disheveled young man on the straw mat.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 安娜从地面上站起身，抱起瓦罐，再一次看一下稻草席上狼狈潦草的青年。

0011.en: "This is the first time in my life anyone has ever told me my name is nice."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “这是我从小到大，第一次有人夸我的名字好听。”

0011.en: After speaking, the girl left. She went to the simple earthen stove again, placed another pot on it, poured in water, and put in peas to cook.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 说完，少女便离开了，她再一次来到了那简陋的土炉灶旁，重新放了个陶罐上去，倒上水，放入豌豆开始蒸煮。

0011.en: Selen An watched Anna's back, opening his mouth several times, but he didn't know what to say.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 塞伦安安看着安娜的背影，几次张口，又不知该说什么。

0011.en: After the first attempt, there was no need for more compliments. As for conversation, what was there to talk about with this girl?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 夸奖的话，经过第一次尝试已没有必要，至于聊天，自己与这位少女有什么好聊的呢？

0011.en: In Anna's eyes, Selen An was the enemy who had ruined her family, an unforgivable existence. He was lucky to be rescued this time without being recognized, perhaps because he looked so different now.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 在安娜的眼中，塞伦安是令他家破人亡的仇人，是绝对无法被原谅的存在，这一次被他侥幸救下，没被认出，或许是形象上的差距太大。

0011.en: Thinking of this, he looked down at his tattered clothes, torn from his escape. The original Selen An he remembered always wore magnificent formal attire, his sea-blue hair impeccably styled by maids.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 想到这儿，他低下头看了看自己身上那因逃命而刮蹭的破破烂烂的衣服，记忆中的原主从来都是一身华贵的礼服，一头海蓝色的短发被女仆打理了格外有型。

0011.en: And now?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 如今呢？

0011.en: His clothes were rags, his face was filthy. Such a sloppy appearance was a world away from the glamorous young master. A normal person wouldn't connect the two without a closer look.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 衣服破烂，脸上脏兮兮的，这么副邋里邋遢的模样与光鲜亮丽的少爷，普通人不细看，细想确实对不上一块去。

0011.en: But had Anna really not recognized him?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 只是安娜真的没认出自己吗？

0011.en: He still had his doubts because of the look in her eyes—that cool, self-mocking gaze, and an emotion he couldn't decipher.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 他的心中还存有疑惑，因为那个眼神，那就不冷不淡的自嘲，以及她看向自己眼中自己读不懂的情绪。

0011.en: If she had recognized him, why would she save the villain who destroyed her family?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 如果她认出了自己，又为什么要救自己这个害她家破人亡的恶人呢？

0011.en: Selen An didn't understand.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 塞伦安不明白。

0011.en: Reason told him that since Anna saved him, she definitely hadn't recognized him. But his gut told him that her gaze, her words, held feelings and meanings he couldn't grasp.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 理性告诉他，安娜既然救了自己，就绝对没有认出他，可感性告诉他，那道眼神，那句话，绝对饱含着自己未能解读的感情和含义。

0011.en: After thinking it over and finding no answer, he gave up.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 想来想去无法得到答案，他索性放弃了。

0011.en: These weren't his most pressing concerns. Whether Anna recognized him or not, he was safe for now. But what about later?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 毕竟这些并不是他如今必要担忧的事，无论安娜有没有认出他，至少自己现在是得救了，可之后的事呢？

0011.en: Was he really safe? How was Serenia doing? Would the Demon Clan's cavalry track him down again using the Succubus Seed inside him?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 自己真的得救了吗？瑟蕾妮娅如今的状况又怎样？魔族铁骑会不会再次循着自己体内的魅魔之种追过来？

0011.en: A tangle of questions gave Selen An a splitting headache.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 一个个问题纠缠在一起，令塞伦安分外的头疼。

0011.en: He had transmigrated into a disastrous situation. His only paths seemed to be death or corruption. Without any special abilities, he couldn't seem to change the plot's direction.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 穿越就遇到这天崩开局，给他的路似乎除了死亡就是恶堕，没有金手指的他似乎根本无法真正改变剧情的走向。

0011.en: Even if he luckily survived the first wave, there would be a second, and a third...
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 即使侥幸躲过了第一波，还会有第二波，第三波……

0011.en: The peas bubbled in the pot, and the woman on the bed still breathed weakly. Selen An was lost in thought when he heard a grating creak.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 陶罐里的豌豆还在咕噜咕噜的蒸煮着，床上的妇人依旧呼吸虚弱，塞伦安心中有心事，却只听一声酸掉牙的嘎吱声。

0011.en: The old wooden door opened. The slender girl was already halfway out. The sky outside was nearing dusk. Seeing the sky through the crack in the door, the young man's throat tightened, and he quickly called out.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 破旧的木门被打开，身影单薄的少女已经半只脚踏出了门外，外面的天色已经接近黄昏，透过门缝看到天空，青年的喉咙下意识的一紧，急忙喊道。

0011.en: "Where are you going?"
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “你要去哪儿？”

0011.en: Anna stopped and looked back at Selen An.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 安娜的脚步顿住，回头看向塞伦安。

0011.en: "To find food."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “出去找食物。”

0011.en: Looking at the girl's sallow face, a result of food scarcity, the guilt he had just suppressed surged up again. He opened his mouth several times, but only a few dry words came out.
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: 望着少女因食物短缺而饥黄的脸庞，那刚刚压制的愧疚感再次泄露而出，他几经张口，最后也只吐出了那干巴巴的几个字。

0011.en: "But it's dangerous outside..."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “可是外面有危险……”

0011.en: "Sir, for ordinary people in this world, danger is everywhere. In this wasteland, there might be wolves and tigers that threaten my life, but even in the so-called civilized city-states, there are still people who would covet my body."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “先生，普通人活在这世上，哪里都是危险，这荒原上或许有豺狼虎豹危及我的生命，可就算是在以文明著称的城邦之中，也依旧会有人觊觎我的身体。”

0011.en: Anna's tone was extremely calm, a calmness that a child her age shouldn't possess. Her blue eyes were almost without a ripple.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 安娜的语气极为平静，平静到不像是这个年纪的孩子能展现出的，湛蓝色的眸子中几乎毫无波澜。

0011.en: Selen An was stunned at first, then his face burned with unstoppable heat and shame. The girl's words were like a sharp slap across his face.
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: 塞伦安先是一愣，紧接着，脸上便感到了那止不住的火热与羞耻，少女的话就仿佛一只巴掌狠狠的扇在了自己的脸上。

0011.en: He lowered his head, desperately trying to hide the guilt in his eyes.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 他低下了头，拼命的掩饰眼中的愧疚。

0011.en: I can't be too obvious. I can't let Anna discover the truth. Surviving is the ultimate goal. Even if I want to compensate this mother and daughter, it has to wait until I'm free.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 不能表现的太明显，不能让安娜发现真相，活下去是最终的目的，就算要补偿这对母女俩，也必须等自己脱困之后。

0011.en: He warned himself.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 他的心中如此的告诫自己。

0011.en: "I'm sorry..."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安

0011.en: "Sir, there's no need to apologize. I understand your good intentions, but without food, we will all die."
0011.speaker: 安娜
0011.cn: “先生，没必要道歉，我理解你的好意，但，没有食物，我们都会死。”

0011.en: With another weary creak, the wooden door closed, and the sound of the girl's footsteps faded into the distance.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 又随着一声老掉牙的嘎吱声，木门被关上，门外少女的脚步渐行渐远。

0011.en: The room fell silent again. The young man lifted his hand, enduring the pain, and stared at his palm. The girl's voice seemed to echo in his ears.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 屋内再次陷入了一片沉默，青年忍着痛抬起手，他默默的望着自己的掌心，少女的声音似还在不断的与耳边回荡。

0011.en: This dilapidated wooden hut was undoubtedly still within the Craigmore wasteland. It seemed safe for now, but once outside, he could easily run into the Demon Clan's cavalry searching for him.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 这间破旧的木屋，无疑还是处于克雷格默的荒原范围之内，眼下看似安全，可一旦出去，就极有可能撞到搜寻自己的魔族铁骑。

0011.en: In the story, causing the descendant of the Water Saintess to degenerate into a succubus was a key move in the Demon Clan's game. To ensure the plan's success, they had sent thousands of troops to support Mara, even at the risk of starting a war.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 剧情之中，令水之圣女的末裔堕落成魅魔，是魔族棋局中的一枚关键棋子，为了让计划成功，从魔族不惜可能会引起战争却依旧要派出数千魔族军队接应玛拉就能看出。

0011.en: The demons wouldn't let him go easily. They were surely still searching everywhere.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 魔族是不会轻易搜放过自己的，他们定然还在到处搜查。

0011.en: As for Serenia, without him as a burden, she should be able to survive against several thousand demon troops.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 至于瑟蕾妮娅，在没有自己这个拖累的存在下，面对数千魔族铁骑，保命还是可以的。

0011.en: But now, he was like a hunted dog, exhausted and battered despite racking his brain. His future was completely unknown.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 可进行到如今这种状况，自己如同一只被猎手追赶的衰犬，即使绞尽脑汁，也依旧被弄得狼狈不已，且前路如何完全未知。

0011.en: Guilt towards the girl, confusion about the future... he looked at his carefully bandaged arm, his mind a complete mess.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 对少女的愧疚，对未来的迷茫，他看着那被细心包扎过的手臂，只觉得脑子一片乱糟。

0011.en: The dim room had no luxurious crystal chandelier, not even a basic kerosene lamp for light. It was lit only by the faint twilight peeking through the wooden window and door cracks.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 昏暗的屋内，不说有奢华的水晶吊灯，就连用来基本照明的煤油灯都没有，并凭借着透过木窗和门缝几丝晚霞之光照明。

0011.en: "Cough, cough..."
0011.speaker: 妇人

0011.en: The woman's cough echoed beside him, making the wooden bed creak.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 妇人的咳嗽在耳边响起，震的木床嘎吱作响。

0011.en: The sound pulled Selen An's consciousness back to reality. He turned to look at the woman on the bed. Though her face was thin and her hair was dull, her beautiful eyes were still bright.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 外界的杂音将塞伦安的意识拉回了现实，他扭头看向木床上的妇人，却见那妇人虽面颊消瘦，发丝枯黄，可那一双美丽的眼睛却依旧奕奕有神。

0011.en: "Sir, could you come over for a moment?"
0011.speaker: 妇人
0011.cn: “先生，能否过来一下？”

0011.en: Her voice was weak and intermittent, but it couldn't hide the gentleness within it.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 她的声音很虚弱，似断断续续的，可这些也无法掩盖住那自声音中透出的温柔。

0011.en: Selen An followed her gaze, struggled up from the straw mat, and sat on the wooden chair near the bed.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 塞伦安顺着妇人看去的方向，艰难的从草席上站起，坐在了靠近床旁的木椅上。

0011.en: "Ma'am, are you not feeling well?"
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “夫人，你是身体有什么不舒服吗？”

0011.en: He looked at the mother's swollen belly, his heart in turmoil.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 他看着这位母亲高高隆起的肚子，心境无法平静。

0011.en: "Now that it's just the two of us in the room, would you be willing to talk with a simple village woman like me?"
0011.speaker: 妇人
0011.cn: “现在这屋里只剩我们两人，能否陪我这位村妇说说话呢？”

0011.en: "Of course, I..."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “当然可以，我……”

0011.en: "Hehe, you seem a bit shy, sir. When Anna brought you back, I was quite startled. I thought she had gotten into some trouble on the road..."
0011.speaker: 妇人
0011.cn: “呵呵，先生看起来有些腼腆呢，当时，安娜将先生背回来，我还吓了一大跳，以为是安娜在路上惹了什么事，遇到了麻烦……”

0011.en: "Thank you, ma'am, and Miss Anna, for saving my life. I will surely repay your kindness with all my strength in the future."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “感谢夫人和安娜小姐的救命之恩，日后我定当全力报答夫人与小姐的恩情。”

0011.en: Facing this pregnant woman, a mother of two, and being watched by her bright, beautiful eyes, Selen An felt as if he were a child again, being stared at by his mother after making a mistake.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 面对这位卧床的孕妇，同样也是两个孩子的母亲，被那双炯炯有神美眸注视着，塞伦安心中总有一种小时候犯错被母亲盯着的感觉。

0011.en: "You must be a nobleman, sir?"
0011.speaker: 妇人
0011.cn: “先生应该是贵族吧？”

0011.en: "You have an extraordinary air about you, sir. You must be a noble. May I ask your family name?"
0011.speaker: 妇人
0011.cn: “我看先生气质不凡，应当是贵族，不知先生姓氏。”

0011.en: Selen An wanted to refuse, but looking into the mother's eyes and thinking about who was responsible for the plight of this mother and daughter, he felt he couldn't deny her request.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 塞伦安本想拒绝，可看着这位母亲的眼神，在想到是谁害了这对母女俩轮到如此境地，他便愈发的觉得自己无法拒绝这位母亲的询问。

0011.en: After a long pause, he spoke.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 良久，他开口。

0011.en: "Andre. My name is Andre."
0011.speaker: 塞伦安
0011.cn: “安德烈，我的名字叫安德烈。”

0011.en: In the dim room, the young man spoke.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 昏暗的屋内，青年如此说道。

0012.en: Chapter 12: Reset 12 - Sin
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 第12章 重置12 罪恶

0012.en: Facing this kind mother, he finally couldn't stay silent.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 面对这位善良的母亲，他终究是无法保持沉默。

0012.en: "Andre, my name is Andre."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “安德烈，我的名字叫安德烈。”

0012.en: He didn't have to think hard; he just opened his mouth, and the very ordinary name came out.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 没有搜刮肚肠的苦想，他只是开口，这个平常到不能再平常的名字，便脱口而出。

0012.en: "Andre? What a brave child."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “安德烈吗？真是个勇敢的孩子。”

0012.en: The expression on Anna's mother's face grew even kinder.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 安娜母亲脸上的表情愈发的慈祥。

0012.en: But the more kindness he received from the mother and daughter, the more his guilt grew. Memories of his evil deeds played in his mind like a slideshow.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可就是如此，越是得到这母女两人的善意，塞伦安心中的愧疚就越发的无法抑制，那些记忆中自己作恶的画面如同幻灯片般不断的回放。

0012.en: The woman's smile and the girl's silence struck his heart again and again, and he felt as if he were about to be drowned by a tide of guilt.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 妇人的微笑，少女的沉默，都一遍又一遍的叩击着他的心弦，内心仿若要被罪恶感的潮水淹没。

0012.en: He wanted to apologize, or rather, apologize for the body's original owner, but he didn't dare. He was afraid apologizing would reveal his identity and that the kind mother and daughter would throw him out if they knew the truth.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他想要道歉，或者说替这个身体的原主道歉，但他却不敢，他害怕道歉会暴露身份，害怕这对善良的母女在得知真相后，会将自己这个伤病员赶出去。

0012.en: He wanted to live, so he could only lower his head in shame, letting guilt and sin wash over him.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他想活着，便只能懦弱的低下头，任由愧疚与罪恶冲击着心灵。

0012.en: "Ma'am, it's so late. Aren't you worried about Miss Anna being out alone?"
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “夫人都这么晚了，安娜小姐一个人出去，你不会担心吗？”

0012.en: Noticing the fading light from the crack in the door, Selen An realized night was coming. He looked at the woman on the bed and asked.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 看着门缝中越来越稀薄的光，察觉到夜晚即将降临，塞伦安看了看床上的妇人，问道。

0012.en: "Every mother worries about her child, but Mr. Andre, as you can see, I am pregnant and can only stay in bed. The whole family depends on Anna..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “没有哪个母亲不担心自己的孩子，可是安德烈先生你也看到了，在这种情况下，我一个怀有身孕的妇人只能卧在床上，家里所有的负担都压在了安娜一个人的肩上……”

0012.en: "As for my husband, Anna's father, I'm sure you can guess, Mr. Andre. He is no longer alive. He was cruelly murdered."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “至于我的丈夫，安娜的父亲，想必安德烈先生也能够猜出来，他已不在人世了，惨遭他人毒手。”

0012.en: Anna's mother's voice was gentle and calm, as if a family breaking apart, a wife losing her husband, and a daughter losing her father were completely normal.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 安娜母亲的声音极为的温柔与平静，平静到一个家庭的破碎，一位妻子失去丈夫，一位女儿失去父亲是一件极为平常的事。

0012.en: "I'm sorry..."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安

0012.en: In the dim light, Selen An lowered his head.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 昏暗中，塞伦安低下了头。

0012.en: "Mr. Andre, you don't have to be. You did nothing wrong. Life can be cruel, but that's how it is. Ordinary people like us are used to it. Just being able to live is the most we can hope for."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “安德烈先生不必如此，你并没有做错什么，现实或许很残酷，但现实就是现实，像我们这样的普通人已经习惯了这样的生活，好好活下去，已经是我们最大的奢望了。”

0012.en: "Ma'am... do you hate the person who caused you to lose your husband and ruined your family?"
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “夫人……你心里怨不怨恨那位导致你失去丈夫，使你家破人亡的罪魁祸首？”

0012.en: Suddenly, the young man looked up and asked the question as if compelled by something.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 蓦然，青年抬起头，鬼使神差的问了这么一句。

0012.en: But as soon as he asked, he regretted it. What a stupid question.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可问完他便后悔了，自己问的这到底是什么废话？

0012.en: How could she not hate him? If he were in her place, he would probably hate that villain Selen An for the rest of his life.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 怎么可能不恨呢？如果这件事发生在自己身上，或者说自己是卧在床上的那位妇人，自己恐怕此生都恨透了那位叫塞伦安的恶少吧。

0012.en: "Hate him? Maybe I do..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “恨吗？或许是恨的吧……”

0012.en: The woman looked at her pregnant belly, sadness filling her beautiful eyes.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 妇人看着自己因怀孕而高高隆起的肚子，那双漂亮的眸子中涌出悲伤的情绪。

0012.en: "That young master killed my husband because he wanted my daughter. He made it so my child will be born without a father."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “那位少爷因为觊觎我女儿的美貌，就杀死了我的丈夫，他让我肚子里的孩子，还没出生，就失去了父亲。”

0012.en: "But I don't feel that much hatred in my heart."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “可我的心中却好似没有那么多的恨意。”

0012.en: Selen An was stunned. He looked at her tear-filled eyes with deep confusion.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塞伦安愣住了，他望着对方那双被湿润包裹的眼睛，眼神中带着浓浓的困惑。

0012.en: "Why?"
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “为什么？”

0012.en: "Because I don't dare. When faced with power and wealth, I can't even feel too much hate, even though they killed my husband..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “因为不敢，在权势与财富面前，我甚至不敢有太多的怨恨，即使他们杀死了我的丈夫……”

0012.en: "My husband died protecting our daughter, but I can't do what he did. I have a child waiting to be born. I have a feeling it's a boy..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “我的丈夫为了保护我们的女儿而失去了生命，而我却不能如他那样，因为我的肚子里还有一位等待出生的孩子，我有预感，这胎是个男孩……”

0012.en: "He will be his father's legacy. As a wife, I should follow my husband and get revenge. But as a mother, I can't let my unborn child die because of its parents before it even has a chance to live."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “那将是他的延续，作为一位妻子，我理应追随着丈夫的脚步，为其报仇，可作为一位母亲，我不能让我这还未出生的孩子，还没出生在这个世界之前，就因父母而遭牵连夭折。”

0012.en: "Cough, cough, cough—"
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “咳咳咳——”

0012.en: After she spoke, the woman on the bed started coughing violently. Selen An stood up, worried, but the sudden movement made his wounds hurt badly.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 说完这些，床上的妇人开始剧烈咳嗽起来，塞伦安担心的站起身，却因动作幅度太大，扯的身上的伤口剧烈疼痛。

0012.en: He fought through the pain and tried to get her a cup of water, but there was only a single pot on the stove. He had no choice but to pat her back with his one good hand.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他强忍着疼，想要去端杯水，可这屋中，除了那土炉上唯一蒸煮的罐子，便无其他器皿，没办法，他只好用唯一能活动的手拍抚着她的后背。

0012.en: "I'm sorry..."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “对不起……”

0012.en: "Cough... You don't need to apologize, Mr. Andre. You are a good person."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “咳咳……没必要道歉的，安德烈先生，你是一个好人。”

0012.en: The coughing made the woman's face turn an unhealthy red. She breathed weakly, but her eyes were still gentle.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 因剧烈的咳嗽，夫人的脸上显出一丝不健康的潮红，她虚弱的喘着气，只是眼神依旧温柔。

0012.en: Selen An said nothing and just kept patting the woman's back.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塞伦安没有说话，是一味的帮忙拍着妇人的后背。

0012.en: No, Selen An (I) am a bastard.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不，塞伦安（我）是一个混蛋。

0012.en: The thought echoed in his mind. When Anna's mother stopped coughing, he sat back down.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这句话在他心中回荡，等到安娜母亲不再咳嗽，他才重新坐回了座位上。

0012.en: "Since you were harmed by a villain, why not move to another city? The empire is huge. The Craigmore wasteland is too harsh, it's hard to even survive here..."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “既然是被奸人迫害，那为何不搬到其他的城市中？帝国何其之大，克雷格默荒原实在是太过荒芜，就连生命都难以保障……”

0012.en: "Because no one comes here to collect taxes."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “因为这里没有人来收税。”

0012.en: Selen An was silent again.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塞伦安再次沉默了。

0012.en: When he played the game, he only cared about the story and the sexy CGs. But now, living in this adult game world, he finally understood how cruel this continent of sex, blood, and violence was for ordinary people.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 玩游戏时，他只关注着剧情和那些涩涩CG去了，可一旦亲身体会这个黄游的世界后，才能够真正的明白，在这款充斥着黄色血腥与暴力的大陆之中，对于普通人是有多么的残酷。

0012.en: And the one who pushed this mother and son to this point was himself.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 而将这对母子逼到这个境地的人，正是自己。

0012.en: Right now, he was in no mood to argue with himself about whether he was really Selen An. None of it mattered anymore...
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 此刻，他已经没有心情在心中给自己辩证，所谓的塞伦安是不是自己，这些都没有了意义……

0012.en: Because he was the one controlling this body, with all of Selen An's memories. And the hands of this body had truly committed unforgivable crimes.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 因为此时此刻操控着这具身体，拥有着塞伦安全部人生记忆的人只有他，而这具身体的这双手，也确确实实犯下了那些不可饶恕的罪行。

0012.en: He suddenly wanted to do something for this mother, as a way to atone for himself—no, for the body's original owner. He could consider it the price for taking over this body.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他突然想为眼前这位母亲做些什么，就当是为自己，不，为这些身体原来的主人赎罪，至于原因……就当是自己占据了这具身体应付的代价。

0012.en: He started searching his clothes. His jacket was torn and was being used as a blanket, so anything in its pockets was likely gone. Luckily, his pants pockets were intact.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他开始摸索全身，之前那件已经被划得破破烂烂的外套，完全是被当成了被子使用，口袋中的物品恐怕完全丢失了，好在裤子口袋并没有破个大洞。

0012.en: After searching all over, Selen An gathered a dozen gold coins and several dozen silver coins and pushed them into the woman's hands.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 在搜遍了自己全身之后，塞伦安将全身上下所搜集出来的十几枚金币和几十枚银币一股脑的塞入妇人的手中。

0012.en: "Mr. Andre, I-I can't take these!"
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “安德烈先生，这，这些我不能收！”

0012.en: The woman quickly shook her head and refused.
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: 妇人急忙摇头，推辞道。

0012.en: "No, you should take them. Your daughter saved my life, and you let me stay here, giving me a safe place for a while. You deserve this."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “不，你应该收下，您的女儿救了我的命，而夫人你也愿意让我留下，给我一个短暂的避风港，这些是你们应得的。”

0012.en: "But this is too much. We only used a few herbs, which my daughter picked herself. They're not worth this much..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “可这些实在是太多了，我们不过是花费了一些草药，而那都是我女儿在外面上寻找采摘的，不值这么多的……”

0012.en: She still wouldn't accept it, but the young man's next word stopped her.
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: 她还是不愿意接受，可却被青年的下一句话彻底打断。

0012.en: "Yes!"
0012.speaker: 塞伦安

0012.en: "You saved my life. No amount of money is enough to repay that. This is all I have on me. Please, take it. Otherwise..."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “你们救了我的命，不管多少钱都值，救命之恩仅用这些金钱是无法偿还的，而我身上也只有一些金币和银币了，还请夫人一定要收下，否则……”

0012.en: "Otherwise, I'll be too ashamed to stay in this house any longer."
0012.speaker: 塞伦安
0012.cn: “否则我也没有脸在这间屋子里继续待下去了。”

0012.en: Selen An's tone and expression were so sincere and firm that the woman felt he would really leave if she didn't accept the money.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塞伦安的语气和表情都异常的诚恳和坚定，这让妇人觉得自己如果不收下，眼前的这位安德烈先生真的会离开这间屋子。

0012.en: He was still injured, and the wasteland was extremely dangerous at night.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他的身上还有伤，夜晚在这荒原上是极其危险的。

0012.en: Finally, her heart softened and she took the money, but only ten silver coins. Selen An tried to insist, but this time, it was Anna's mother who was firm.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 最终她心一软，收下了钱，但也只是收下了十枚银币，塞伦安还想再劝，可这一次，却轮到安娜母亲的态度强硬起来。

0012.en: "Mr. Andre, if you insist, then I won't take a single copper coin."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “安德烈先生若执意如此的话，我便一枚铜币也不会再收了。”

0012.en: "I'm only taking this money because my small family really needs it. The baby will be born soon, and Anna has suffered a lot taking care of me. These silver coins will help us get through this difficult time..."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “收下这些钱，只是因为我这个小家庭的确需要，肚子里的孩子即将出生，安娜跟着我照顾我也吃了不少苦头，有了这些银币就能够度过这段困难的岁月……”

0012.en: "But Mr. Andre, you should understand that we didn't save you for money. If we took all of this, it would go against why we helped you in the first place."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “可安德烈先生，你也应当明白，我们救你并非是为了钱财，如果将这些钱全部收入口袋之中，这就违背了我们的最初意愿。”

0012.en: "Thank you so much for your help. Your character is just like your name: you are a kind and brave person."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “真的很感谢您给予的帮助，你的品行就犹如你的名字一样，是一个善良且勇敢的人。”

0012.en: "May the goddess bless you."
0012.speaker: 安娜母亲
0012.cn: “愿女神祝福你。”

0012.en: The woman's sincere blessing echoed in his ears. The young man just looked down and said nothing.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 女人诚挚的祝福在耳畔回荡，青年只是微微垂眸，并不言语。

0012.en: Because only he knew whether Selen An was a good person. As for the praise that he was like his name—even the name Andre was fake. Did he really deserve such praise?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 因为只有他自己明白，塞伦安到底是不是一个好人，至于前面人如其名的夸赞，连安德烈这个名字都是虚构的，这样的夸赞他真的配吗？

0013.en: Chapter 13: The Imposter
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第13章 重置13 冒牌货

0013.en: The night in the Craigmore Wasteland seemed exceptionally quiet.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 夜晚的克雷格莫荒原似乎格外的安静。

0013.en: But the young man lying on the straw mat couldn't sleep, not for any other reason than his rumbling stomach.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 躺在草席上的青年却怎么也睡不着，不因为别的，就因为那还在咕咕作响的肚子。

0013.en: For dinner, he had only half a bowl of boiled peas, a meal that Anna and her mother could only scrape together from their household stores because of him, their honored guest.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 晚饭就吃了半碗的煮豌豆，这还是在安娜母女二人看在有了自己这位贵客之后，拿出家里的存粮才能凑出的伙食。

0013.en: The diet of commoners in medieval Europe usually consisted of black bread and peas. While commoners might be used to it, for Selen An, who was accustomed to delicacies and had a pampered palate, it was exceptionally difficult.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 中世纪欧洲的平民伙食一般都是由黑面包和豌豆组成，平民吃习惯了这些食物或许无所谓，可这让吃惯了山珍海味，嘴被养叼了的塞伦安格外难受。

0013.en: If the soul in this body hadn't been replaced, its original owner would probably have rather died than swallow that bowl of tasteless boiled peas.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 若非这具身体的灵魂已经换了个新，身体的原主恐怕是打死也咽不下那碗味如嚼蜡得煮豌豆吧。

0013.en: But even after forcing himself to finish the half-bowl of peas, he couldn't avoid hunger at night. Half a bowl of peas was simply not enough. Selen An, who had never experienced hunger in his past or present life, couldn't fall asleep on an empty stomach.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可即使是强迫自己将那半碗豌豆吃的一干二净，到了晚上还是避免不了的饿肚子，半碗豌豆根本不抵饿，前世今生都从未体会过饥饿的塞伦安根本无法在没填饱肚子的情况下入睡。

0013.en: In the darkness, he lay with his eyes open, clearly sensing the two other breaths in the small hut. It was exceptionally quiet. If he didn't know that a large troop of Demon Clan cavalry was searching for him on the Craigmore Wasteland, he might have thought he was camping in the wild.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 黑暗中，他睁着眼，能明显的感受到这狭小的屋内另外两道呼吸声，周围格外的安静，若非知道此刻的克雷格默荒原之上正有一大批魔族铁骑搜寻自己，这环境还以为是来野外露营的呢。

0013.en: Perhaps exhausted from searching for food during the day, the mother and daughter were both sleeping soundly. Unable to sleep, Selen An sat up on his straw mat. He saw slivers of bright moonlight through the crack in the door. After a moment of internal debate, he finally decided to stand up, carefully pushed open the wooden door, and stepped out of the hut for the first time.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 或许是白天寻找食物，实在累了，屋内的母女二人都睡得十分的沉，实在无法入睡的塞伦安从草席上坐起身，透过门缝窥见那屋外皎洁的丝缕月光，在做了一阵的思想工作之后，他终于还是选择站了起来，小心翼翼的推开木门，第一次走出了这些木屋。

0013.en: A night breeze brushed his cheek, carrying a refreshing coolness unlike the stuffy air inside the hut. Under the moonlight, he looked around at the terrain and finally understood why this place could be a safe zone from the Demon Clan cavalry's search. The shadow cast by the high, steep cliff overhead made it easy to overlook the dilapidated wooden hut in this godforsaken place.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 夜风习习拂过脸颊，带着一份不似那封闭木屋中的清爽，借着月光，他四处张望地势，终于明白了这里为何能成为躲避魔族铁骑搜查的安全区——头顶那倾斜高耸的悬崖峭壁，遮盖下的阴影让人完全忽视了这鸟不拉屎的地方还存在一间破旧的木屋。

0013.en: In short, thanks to the terrain, unless something unexpected happened, the Demon Clan cavalry wouldn't be able to find this place anytime soon, no matter how efficient they were.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 总而言之，因为地形优势，如果不发生什么意外的话，魔族的铁骑就算再利索，短时间内也找不到这个地方。

0013.en: At this thought, Selen An breathed a sigh of relief.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一想到这，塞伦安松了口气。

0013.en: For some reason, after realizing he was temporarily safe, a weight was lifted from his heart. It wasn't just for his own safety, but more so because he wouldn't be a burden to the mother and daughter inside.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 不知为何，在意识到暂且安全之后，他心中的一块石头猛然放下，不单单是因为自身安全了，更多的一部分是因为不会拖累到屋内的母女俩。

0013.en: He felt a constant guilt towards Anna and her mother, even though their misfortune wasn't his fault. Perhaps because Anna's mother had accepted some of his money, he had found the courage to look them in the eye during dinner...
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 对于安娜和那位夫人，他始终带着愧疚的情绪，即使这份恶孽并非他所造成，或许是安娜的母亲收下了自己的一部分钱财，晚上进餐时，他才有勇气直视这对母女俩……
