0013.en: "Whew. I'll rest for one more day, then leave."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “呼，再休整一天，一天后就离开这。”

0013.en: Considering he was still injured and his ability to escape was greatly reduced, Selen An rationally decided to rest for another day. He would leave after getting a clear understanding of the terrain and figuring out the best escape route.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 鉴于自己现在还是个伤病员，逃跑能力大大下降，从理性角度考虑，塞伦安还是决定明天休整一天，在问清楚这里的地形，总结出最优先的逃跑路线后，再出发。

0013.en: "One day? I'm afraid you won't get your wish."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “一天吗？恐怕你不能如偿所愿了。”

0013.en: Just as Selen An felt the chill of the wind and decided to go back inside to sleep, a voice as clear and cold as the moonlight suddenly rang out. With it came an undeniable chill and sharpness against his neck.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 正当赛伦安觉得吹过了冷风，决定回屋入睡时，一道如明月般清冷的声线突兀响起，随之而来的，是架在脖子上无法忽略的寒意与锋锐。

0013.en: The young man's body froze.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 青年的身体猛地僵住。

0013.en: "Serenia..."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅……”

0013.en: "It's me."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “是我。”

0013.en: The ice sword at his neck didn't press forward. At the same time, he smelled a strong stench of blood.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 架在脖子上的冰剑并没有前进的意思，与此同时，鼻尖也嗅到了一股极其浓郁的血腥味。

0013.en: Selen An subconsciously raised his hands and turned around slowly. Under the moonlight, the girl, who was usually so cold and beautiful she seemed otherworldly, was now stained with the crimson of slaughter. Her sacred and noble saintess robe was covered in dried bloodstains.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 塞伦安下意识的抬起双手，进程且缓慢的转过身，月光下，原本清冷绝美到不似凡间之人的少女却沾满了杀戮的猩红，圣洁华贵的圣女袍上全是干涸的血渍。

0013.en: Clearly, after pushing him away, Serenia had been through an intense life-or-death battle. Fortunately, as an important character in the game's plot, she, the Ice Saintess, had managed to fight her way out of the Demon Clan cavalry's siege without him holding her back.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 很显然，再将自己推开之后，瑟蕾妮娅进行了一场极其激烈的生死搏杀，好在她本就是这个游戏重要的剧情角色之一，在没有自己拖累的情况下，身为冰之圣女的她活生生在魔族铁骑的围攻下，杀出了一条血路。

0013.en: This just went to show how terrifying Serenia's combat power truly was.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 由此可见，瑟蕾妮娅的战斗力当真恐怖。

0013.en: "How did you find me so quickly?"
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “你是怎样这么快就找到我的？”

0013.en: As mentioned before, due to the terrain, the area where Anna's hut was located was extremely difficult to find. The Craigmore Wasteland was vast, and even a large-scale search would take at least two to three days.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 之前提到过，因为地势的原因，安娜家的木屋所在的区域极难被找到，克雷格默荒原占地面积极大，就算进行大范围搜查也至少需要2到3天的时间。

0013.en: Less than a day had passed since he woke from his coma. Moreover, the bloodstains on Serenia's saintess robe were only half-dry, which meant she had likely found him immediately after shaking off the pursuing demons.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 和自己从昏迷到醒来，连一天的时间都没过，再者，瑟蕾妮娅身上圣女袍的血渍也是半干，可见她大概率是甩掉身后追击的魔族，就第一时间找到了自己。

0013.en: "I left a mark on you before I pushed you away."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “在把你拍出去之前，我在你的身上留了印记。”

0013.en: The girl's cold reply was exactly the kind of thing she would do.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 少女清冷冷的回答，答案也的确像是她能做出来的事。

0013.en: "Come with me."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “跟我走。”

0013.en: "Alright..."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安

0013.en: Selen An didn't refuse; he had no reason to.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 塞伦安没有拒绝，毕竟他没有拒绝的理由。

0013.en: His earlier plea for Serenia to spare him was based on his identity as a human. The Succubus Seed was constantly corrupting his body, so going with Serenia was the most logical choice. Refusing would mean contradicting everything he had just said about his identity.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 之前让瑟蕾妮娅放他一马，就是从人族身份上做文章，魅魔之中在不断的侵蚀自己的身体，跟瑟蕾妮娅是最符合逻辑的选择，如果拒绝，就相当于是自我否认了之前身份认定论的所有说辞。

0013.en: Serenia lowered her sword, gave him a deep look, and stepped forward, preparing to bind his hands again. But just then...
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅放下了手中的剑，深深的望了他一眼，走上前，就准备再次封住他的双手，可就在这时……

0013.en: "I'll go with you, but..."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “我会跟你离开，但……”

0013.en: The young man's gaze shifted to the hut, his voice tinged with a plea.
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: 青年的目光投向屋子，声音中带上了几分恳求。

0013.en: "Can you take them with us too?"
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “能不能也将他们一起带走？”

0013.en: "They're the ones who saved me. They took me in. If I just leave, the Demon Clan's hounds might follow my scent here. They'll all be in danger."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “他们是救我的恩人，收留了我，如果我就此离开的话，魔族的魔犬很有可能循着气味，找到这里，到时候他们就都危险了。”

0013.en: "That doesn't sound like something you would say."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “这不像是你会说出来的话。”

0013.en: The girl's cold words made the young man flinch, and a bitter smile appeared on his lips.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 少女冰冷的话语刺着青年一怔，旋即，嘴角露出一抹苦笑。

0013.en: "I just... don't want to keep making mistakes in the limited life I have left..."
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “我只是……不想在有限的生命里继续错下去了……”

0013.en: At these words, Serenia's expressionless face showed a hint of emotion. She sheathed her sword and came to stand before him, her beautiful eyes, like tranquil blue ice crystals, staring intently into his.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 此话一出，瑟蕾妮娅原本没有表情的脸上竟有些许的动容，她收起剑，来到了青年的跟前，一双宛若幽兰冰晶的美眸死死的盯着他的双眼。

0013.en: Now, there was no sound but the night wind.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 此时，耳边除了夜风，再无其他声音。

0013.en: After a long moment, Serenia suddenly raised her hand and pressed her palm firmly against Selen An's forehead. He instinctively wanted to struggle, but the girl's warning came.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 就这样持续了半晌，瑟蕾妮娅突然抬起了手，掌心紧紧的贴在了塞伦安的额头上，他下意识的想要挣扎，耳边却听少女发出警告。

0013.en: "Don't move, or you'll face the consequences."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “不要乱动，否则，后果自负。”

0013.en: "What are you trying to do?"
0013.speaker: 塞伦安
0013.cn: “你想干嘛？”

0013.en: There was a tremor in the young man's voice. He could clearly feel a strange energy moving inside him where Serenia's palm touched his skin.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 青年的声音中带着些许颤音，因为他那清晰的感觉到就在瑟雷尼亚掌心与自己头皮接触的区域，好似有一股奇异的能量正在游走于自己体内。

0013.en: "I'm checking your soul."
0013.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0013.cn: “检查你的灵魂。”

0013.en: That answer sent a cold sweat down Selen An's back.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这一声回答更是惊得塞伦恩出了一身的冷汗。

0013.en: Oh no, she's using the cheat detector!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 布豪，对方启用盒武器！

0013.en: The body was the original, so there was no problem. That was why Selen An dared to play the sympathy card while Serenia had a sword to his neck; he was essentially using this body's original connections.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 肉体是原装的，不存在问题，这也就是为什么塞伦安敢在被瑟蕾妮娅剑架脖子的情况下，打感情牌的原因，本质上还是利用了这具身体原主的关系网。

0013.en: But no matter how perfect the body was, his soul was a brand-new, unfamiliar account. It wouldn't stand up to inspection. One check and he was toast!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可再怎么无懈可击的，也只是肉体，灵魂方面自己可是崭新的陌生号，根本经不起查，一查就炸缸！

0013.en: But he couldn't stop it. The moment Serenia got close, his body felt frozen, completely unable to move. He could only let Serenia use some unknown method to expose him as an imposter...
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可他也无法阻止这一进程，因为就当瑟蕾妮娅近身之后，他的身体就像是被冻结了一般，根本无法动弹，只能任由瑟蕾妮娅用不知道什么样的手段即将揭穿自己这个冒牌货……

0013.en: If the memories he saw while unconscious were real, then this body's original owner held a special place in Serenia's heart. Although he had fallen from grace after everything that happened, a fallen white moonlight was still a white moonlight!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 如果说自己昏迷时看到的那些记忆都是真的，那么，这具身体的原主在瑟蕾妮娅心目中的地位绝对不一般，虽然经历了后面一系列的事情之后早已自甘堕落，但自甘堕落的白月光，依旧是白月光！

0013.en: And now, if she found out he was an imposter who had kicked out the saintess's precious white moonlight brother, well, the outcome didn't need much explanation, did it?
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 如今你说自己是个冒牌货，踢了圣女心中的白月光哥哥，那么，结局似乎也不用多说了吧？

0014.en: Chapter 14: You Can Go
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 第14章 重置14 你走吧

0014.en: The girl's palm on his forehead was cool and soft. It should have been a pleasant feeling, but Selen An was too nervous to move, his back drenched in cold sweat.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 少女的掌心贴着额头，传来清凉柔软的触感，这本应是一件极为享受之事，可塞伦安却紧张到不敢有丝毫动弹，后背更是被冷汗浸湿。

0014.en: Sixty seconds. The soul inspection lasted for a full sixty seconds. To Selen An, those sixty seconds felt as long as sixty years...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 六十秒，从被检查灵魂到结束，整整持续了六十秒，而在赛伦安的感受之中，这六十秒过的宛若六十年一般漫长……

0014.en: He didn't know the result of the inspection, but he was certain of one thing: he was an imposter.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 检查结果无从而知，但他心里很清楚，自己是个赝品的事实。

0014.en: Serenia withdrew her hand. She looked down, staring at her palm for a long time before looking up again, her beautiful ice-blue eyes locking with the young man's.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅收回手，她低垂着眸子，凝视着自己的掌心，良久，她才再次抬头，冰蓝色的美眸直勾勾的对上青年的目光。

0014.en: Under her stunningly beautiful gaze, it felt as if no lie could hide. Selen An tried desperately to still his pounding heart as she began to speak.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 在那双美得令人惊心动魄的眼眸注视下，一切谎言都好似无所遁形，塞伦安拼命的想要遏制下自己胸膛中砰砰直跳的心脏，却听她启口。

0014.en: His heart was in his throat. He had the strong feeling he was about to be exposed, as if his heart would burst from his chest at any moment.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 心被提到了嗓子眼，那种即将被识破的强烈预感，仿佛下一刻就会带动着自己的心脏冲破胸膛。

0014.en: "There is no problem."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “没有问题。”

0014.en: Phew...
0014.speaker: 旁白

0014.en: Selen An breathed a silent sigh of relief as the heavy stone in his heart finally lifted.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 塞伦安在心中默默地舒了口气，心中升起的那块大石头缓缓落下。

0014.en: That was close, I dodged that bullet... Wait!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 好险，躲过这一劫……等等！

0014.en: My soul has no problem?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 自己的灵魂没有问题？

0014.en: His heart, just put at ease, was once again on edge. What did she mean, 'no problem'?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 放下的心再次高悬起来，什么叫没问题？

0014.en: 'No problem' was the biggest problem of all. The original owner's soul had been replaced. Although the body was the same, the contents were completely different. It was like buying a down jacket only to find it stuffed with cotton—how could that be the same?!
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 没有问题就是最大的问题，身体原主的灵魂都被掉包了，虽然说皮囊还是那么一副皮囊，可内部的填充物完全不一样了，就像买的衣服是羽绒服，可里面填充的是棉花，这能一样吗？！

0014.en: Serenia had checked his soul directly. Why hadn't she noticed such an obvious problem?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅都已经直接的检查了自己的灵魂，这种一眼就能辨别的问题，为什么没有发现？

0014.en: Was Serenia not skilled enough to see the truth, or had she seen it but was lying to make him lower his guard and extract more information?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 是瑟蕾妮娅学术不精，真的没有发现自己的问题，还是说已经发现了问题，却故意说没有问题，想要以此让自己放下警惕，以图在自己身上得到更多的信息？

0014.en: He could rule out the first possibility. Serenia had become a Saintess through her own power. Her impressive record against the Demon Clan proved she wasn't some low-rated player who got carried to victory.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 第一个猜测，基本上可以排除，瑟蕾妮娅是真真实实靠自己实力打上去的圣女，那对魔族杀敌的傲人战绩足以证明她并非是评分3.0的躺赢狗。

0014.en: If it wasn't a mistake, then it was very likely...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 既然不是失误，那就极有可能是……

0014.en: Just as Selen An was racking his brain for a counter-plan, Serenia spoke again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 就当塞伦安满脑子想着反制手段之时，瑟蕾妮娅又开口了。

0014.en: "Saving that mother and daughter... I don't know what you were really thinking. Maybe you truly regret your past and want to change, or maybe you're just putting on an act to gain my trust..."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “救这对母女，我不知道你心中到底是如何所想的，是真的知错，迷途知返，还是仅仅想在我的面前做戏，博得我的信任……”

0014.en: The look Serenia gave Selen An was incredibly complex.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅看向塞伦恩的目光极为复杂。

0014.en: The young man sighed to himself. She was right. After all the terrible things the original Selen An had done, even the deep trust and affection from their childhood had probably been worn away by countless disappointments.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 青年心中悠悠叹气，也对，以原主做出来的那些天怒人怨的事，就算是曾经感情深厚的青梅竹马，那儿时积攒下来的信任与感情恐怕也在一次次的失望中磨损殆尽……

0014.en: "I... Forget it!"
0014.speaker: 塞伦安

0014.en: The young man, who had been struggling to find an explanation, suddenly seemed to give up and laughed bitterly.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 原本还在纠结如何解释的青年，却突然像自暴自弃了一般，自嘲苦笑了一声。

0014.en: "Just consider me a hypocrite. This is all an act to win your trust."
0014.speaker: 塞伦安
0014.cn: “你就当我这是伪善吧，在你面前演的这一出戏，为了博取你的这份信任。”

0014.en: Selen An didn't blame Serenia for her distrust. After all, doing anything to survive was exactly what the real Selen An would do, right?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 塞伦安在心中没有怪罪瑟蕾妮娅的不信任，毕竟在活命面前不择手段，这才是真正的塞伦安会做的事，不是吗？

0014.en: The night was unusually quiet, and their conversation came to a standstill once again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 夜出奇的静，二人的交谈再一次陷入了僵局。

0014.en: "Selen An, you should understand that the entire Craigmore wasteland is swarming with demons hunting for you. Even sneaking you away under the cover of night is already extremely dangerous. Taking two ordinary people who can't defend themselves makes it even harder."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “塞伦安，你应该明白，现在整个克雷格莫荒原上都是搜捕你的魔族，如今，趁着夜色带着你悄悄离开，都已凶险无比，再加上两个手无缚鸡之力的普通人，更是难上加难。”

0014.en: Hearing the girl's words, Selen An's heart sank.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 听着少女突然开口说话，塞伦安的心慢慢沉了下去。

0014.en: He didn't blame Serenia for being cold. After all, he was the one who had drawn the demons across the buffer zone, and he was the one who had put Anna and her mother in this situation. He had no right to blame anyone. Besides, what Serenia said was true. He...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他倒不是心理怪罪瑟蕾妮娅冰冷无情，毕竟，吸引魔族跨过缓冲区的人认识他，令安娜母子遭受如此境遇的人也是他，他根本就没有资格怪罪别人，况且瑟蕾妮娅说的也是事实，自己……

0014.en: Wait, why was he habitually thinking from Selen An's perspective again?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 等等，自己刚刚为什么又习惯性的以塞伦安的身份思考起事情来？

0014.en: He was a transmigrator. He should be thinking calmly about how to save himself from a bystander's point of view, not getting tangled up in the guilt from the sins of this body's original owner.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 自己是穿越者，应该以一个旁观者的角度冷静的去思考如何自救，而并非被这具身体原主所犯下的罪孽，产生的愧疚情绪缠住自身。

0014.en: It happened this time, and it happened when he was talking to Anna's mother. Was it because the body was influencing him?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这一次是这样，上一次跟安娜母亲交谈也是这样，是因为身体影响的缘故吗？

0014.en: The young man was silent.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 青年无言。

0014.en: "I will save them."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “我会救她们的。”

0014.en: For some reason, hearing these words, Selen An felt a great sense of relief, as if a huge problem had been solved.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 不知为何，在听到这句话时，塞伦安心中猛地松下了一口气，就好似解决了一件大事。

0014.en: "Thank you. You are a truly respectable Saintess."
0014.speaker: 塞伦安
0014.cn: “谢谢，你是一位令人值得尊敬的圣女。”

0014.en: "No, I'm not just saving them because it's my duty as a Saintess, but also..."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “不，救他们不仅仅是因为我身为圣女的职责，同样……”

0014.en: As Serenia spoke, she gave the young man a deep look with her ice-blue eyes.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅说到这儿，冰蓝色的眸子深深的望了青年一眼。

0014.en: "Because someone reached out to me when I was at my most desperate."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “也是因为，某个人在我最绝望的时候向我伸出了援手。”

0014.en: Her voice was filled with complex emotions, but before Selen An could process it, her tone turned cold again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 她的声音中夹杂着复杂的情绪，可容不得塞伦安去细细多品味，下一刻又变得冰冷。

0014.en: "Hold out your hands."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “伸手吧。”

0014.en: The girl's voice was cold, like a judge with no personal feelings.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 少女冷冷道，像是没有任何私情的审判官。

0014.en: Selen An obediently held out his hands. The girl's fingertips touched his wrists again, a chilling sensation spreading through his body.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 塞伦安乖乖伸出了双手，就见少女的指尖再次搭在了自己的手腕上，冰寒之意传遍了全身。

0014.en: Was he going to be put in ice cuffs and have his freedom restricted again?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 又要被戴上寒冰手铐，限制住人身自由吗？

0014.en: But maybe that was for the best. Being cuffed meant he was a prisoner, and Serenia wouldn't kill him for now. When they returned to his family, she would surely help him deal with the Succubus Seed in his body before deciding his punishment.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 不过这样也好，被戴上手铐，就意味着身为囚徒，瑟蕾妮娅暂时不会杀自己，回到家族，她也会坚定的先帮自己处理掉体内的魅魔之种，再论其罪行。

0014.en: As long as he wasn't executed immediately, there was room to maneuver...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 只要不是被立即行刑，就有可操作的空间……

0014.en: His hands were cuffed again by the ice shackles, and the coldness gathered in his abdomen slowly faded. Selen An shivered and looked toward the nearby wooden cabin.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 双手再次被寒冰手铐铐住，腹部凝聚的寒意也缓缓消失，塞伦安打了个冷颤，又望向不远旁的木屋。

0014.en: Inside the cabin were a mother, her daughter, and a new life about to be born. His actions might not wash away all his sins, but for him, the transmigrator, he had a clear conscience.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 木屋中有一对母女，以及一个即将出生的新生命，自己此番做法或许并不能洗刷全部的罪孽，但至少对于他这个穿越者而言，已然是做到了问心无愧。

0014.en: With this thought, his gaze toward the cabin softened, and the smile on his face became more relaxed and pure.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 如此想着他看向木屋的眼神多了份释然，脸上的微笑也轻松纯粹了许多。

0014.en: Serenia stared at the young man's relieved smile in profile, momentarily stunned.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅望着青年释然微笑的侧颜，一时间，竟有些愣住了。

0014.en: How long had it been since she had seen such a pure smile on his face?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 她已经多久没有从对方的脸上看到如此干净的笑容了？

0014.en: Perhaps it started when she was announced as the next Saintess. From then on, the hero in her heart slowly degenerated into an ignorant, selfish, profligate scion.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 或许是自己被宣布即将继承圣女之位开始吧，从那时以后，自己心目中的英雄，就慢慢堕落成了一个不学无术，自私自利的纨绔恶少。

0014.en: But was that really the truth?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 可事实真的是这样吗？

0014.en: If he were a completely selfish person, why would he be so insistent on saving the mother and daughter?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 如果他真的是一个彻头彻尾的自私者，又为何要如此执着的救助这对母女？

0014.en: Was it out of guilt?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 是因为愧疚？

0014.en: Maybe not entirely. Because of the mark she had left on Selen An, she had overheard his entire conversation with Anna's mother. As a hidden observer, it was the first time in their years of estrangement that she had felt his inner world through his words.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 或许并不尽然，因为在塞伦安身上留下印记的缘故，他与安娜母亲的聊天被她全程监听，她以一个隐藏的旁观者的角度，在双方关系疏离的几年后，第一次通过对话去深入的感受这位青年的内心。

0014.en: His repeated apologies sounded so much like his old self. He had emptied his pockets of all his money. Perhaps it was guilt, or perhaps it was the kindness in his soul that seemed buried but had never truly disappeared...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他的那一声声对不起和抱歉，多么像是原来的自己，他将自己口袋的所有钱币掏出，或许是心中的愧疚，又或许是他灵魂之中那看似被埋没却从未消失的那份善良……

0014.en: Selen An had made many, many mistakes. Anyone in the world could kill him and be praised for it, but not her. Only she could not.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 塞伦安犯了很多很多的错，天下所有人都可以杀之而后快，可唯有她不行，也唯有她不行。

0014.en: Even if his remorse was an act, even if his change of heart was a performance, even if there was only the slightest possibility, she had to try to believe...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 即使他的知错而改是装的，即使他的浪子回头是演的，即使只有那一丝一毫的可能，她也必须去尝试着相信……

0014.en: Just as Selen An was looking at the cabin, waiting for Serenia's next move, he heard a crisp cracking sound.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 正当塞伦安看着木屋等待瑟蕾妮娅下一步行动之际，耳边却传来了一声清脆的咔嚓声。

0014.en: He looked down at his wrists, which should have been locked, only to find in astonishment that the ice cuffs restricting his hands were now covered in cracks. A moment later, they shattered into countless ice shards and fell to the ground.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 他低头看向自己原本该被锁上的双手手腕，却愕然的发现，用于限制双手活动的寒冰手铐竟不知何时布满裂纹，不一会儿，便化作无数的冰渣落于地面。

0014.en: "This..."
0014.speaker: 塞伦安

0014.en: Before Selen An's brain could process what had just happened, the girl's cold voice echoed beside his ear.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 塞伦安的大脑还没有反应过来，到底算是发生了什么事，可少女清冷的声音却先一步于耳畔旁回响。

0014.en: "You can go."
0014.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0014.cn: “你走吧。”

0015.en: Chapter 15: Reset 15 - This Is What I Owe You
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 第15章 重置15 这是我欠你的

0015.en: "You can go."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “你走吧。”

0015.en: Those three short words entered Selen An's mind, making it freeze for a moment.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 短短三个字进入塞伦安的大脑，产生了片刻的宕机。

0015.en: Wait, didn't I just miss one full meal?
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 不是，自己不就一餐没吃饱吗？

0015.en: Is this body so weak that I'm starting to hear things?
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 这身体已经虚到出现幻听了吗？

0015.en: Seeing the young man's stunned and disbelieving look, Serenia turned her face away.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅见青年一脸不可置信的呆滞模样，偏过脸去。

0015.en: "Don't doubt it. I mean it. I will save the mother and daughter inside. Once I get the three of you out of danger, I'll let you go."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “不必怀疑，我就是那个意思，屋内的那对母女我会救，等我将你们三人带出危险范围，会放你们自由。”

0015.en: The girl's voice was very light, so light that a gust of wind could blow it away. Yet, her voice was also very heavy, striking Selen An's heart like a great hammer.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 少女的声音很轻，轻到一阵风吹过就会散去，少女的声音很重，重若一杆巨锤沉沉的敲击在塞伦安的心灵之上。

0015.en: "Why?"
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: “为什么？”

0015.en: When faced with something truly shocking and hard to understand, people often ignore the result and look for the reason instead.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 人在面对一件极其震撼且不理解的事情时，反而会忽略结果，寻求缘由。

0015.en: "There is no reason. It's simply what I want to do."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “没有为什么，仅是我想这么做。”

0015.en: "If you let me go, what will happen to you when you return?"
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: “把我放走，你回去后怎么办？”

0015.en: Looking at the seemingly cold girl before him, after hearing that she would let him go, the first emotion in Selen An's heart was not the secret joy of freedom, but an almost subconscious worry for Serenia.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 望着面前看起来冷冰冰的少女，在听到她要让自己放走之后，塞伦安心中第一产生的情绪竟不是即将获得自由的窃喜，而是近乎下意识的对瑟蕾妮娅的担忧。

0015.en: If I remember correctly, assassinating me was a divine oracle from the God of Ice. If Serenia didn't kill me and just took me back, she might have an excuse. But to just let me go...
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 如果没记错的话，刺杀自己是冰之神下达的神谕，如果瑟蕾妮娅没有刺杀自己，而是把自己押送回去的话，尚且可有理由解释，可如果直接把自己放了……

0015.en: How is that different from a prison guard simply letting a prisoner go free?
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 这和押送犯人的狱警直接将犯人放了有什么区别？

0015.en: A guard who breaks the law is punished by the law. But in this world, order is maintained by the gods, not by laws.
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 狱警违反了法律，自然会受到法律的惩罚，而维护这个世界秩序的不是法律，而是神明。

0015.en: Defying the will of a god will never lead to a good end.
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 违逆了神明的意志，就绝不会有什么好下场。

0015.en: "I am a Saintess. I have my ways..."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “我是圣女，自有办法……”

0015.en: The girl was still so cold, not giving him a reasonable answer. She paused, and a flicker of hard-to-see worry crossed her ice-blue eyes.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 少女仍是这样冷冷的，不给他一个合理的回答，说到此处她又一顿，冰蓝色的眼底闪过了一抹难以察觉的担忧。

0015.en: "You, after you leave here, change your name. Try not to have any connection to your old identity, especially The Church and the Winterlein Family."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “你，离开这里之后，换一个名字，尽量不要再和以前的身份沾上半点关系，特别是教廷和温特莱恩家族。”

0015.en: Serenia's sudden warning confused Selen An, but he wasn't a fool. Connecting it to the game's later plot and some hidden story threads only a player would know, he instantly guessed a possibility.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅突如其来的一声提醒，弄得塞伦安有些混乱，可他也并非傻子，联系起这款游戏的后续剧情，以及一些只有玩家才清楚的暗线，他瞬间猜到了一种可能。

0015.en: A mole!
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 内鬼！

0015.en: The mole here wasn't just Mara, who had infiltrated the Winterlein family, but also someone in the Saintess's family and The Church.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这里的内鬼不仅仅是指卧底入温特莱恩家族的码拉，同样也指向了圣女家族和教廷。

0015.en: As the direct descendant of the Water Saintess, Selen An's safety should have been treated as a rare treasure by the Winterlein Family. Even though he was a useless fighter who couldn't awaken his bloodline, his ability to continue the direct lineage of the Saintess was enough to warrant the family's strongest protection.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 作为水之圣女的直系末裔，塞伦安的人身安全理应被温特莱恩家族当做稀世珍宝一般重视和爱护，即使他本人在剧情里完全是个无法觉醒血脉的战五渣，但光延续圣女直系血脉这一能力，就值得温特兰家族投以最大力量的保护。

0015.en: But what was the reality?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 可事实上呢？

0015.en: Yes, on the surface, the Winterlein Family "protected" Selen An closely. No matter what terrible things he did, the family would clean up his mess. But this wasn't protection, it was covering for him! It was indulgence!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 是，温特莱恩家族表面上是对塞伦安“护”得紧，无论他干出了多么伤天害理的事，犯下了怎样天怒人怨的错，温特莱恩家族都会替他摆平，可这并非是保护，而是包庇！是纵容！

0015.en: On the surface, Selen An was the most noble person in the family. But if that were true, how could the son of the previous Saintess, a direct descendant, be silently implanted with a Succubus Seed by a demon spy under the family's protection?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 表面上，塞伦安是整个温特莱恩家族最尊贵之人，可事实真要是如此，堂堂上代圣女之子，直系末裔，又怎会在家族的庇护之中，被魔族的卧底悄无声息的种下了魅魔之种？

0015.en: To put it more harshly, the fact that a Succubus Seed was brought into the Saintess's family was, in itself, unforgivable!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 说句更难听点的，魅魔之种被带入圣女家族这件事，本身就是最不可饶恕的！

0015.en: But the plot still happened this way. The Saintess's son was implanted with the seed, and the Winterlein Family only woke up to it just before the crisis exploded. He would never believe that Mara had done it all by herself.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 可剧情还是这样发生了，圣女之子被种下，魅魔之种被魔族蛊惑这件事临近到剧情即将爆发，温特莱恩家族才堪堪醒悟，要说这其中只有玛拉一人从中操作，他是绝对不信的。

0015.en: There was another spy in the Winterlein Family, no, a traitor!
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 温特莱恩家族中还有卧底，不，是内鬼！

0015.en: Because it wasn't just the demons who wanted to harm him. His status was coveted, and his bloodline was feared, by his own siblings in the family, and by the Pope of The Church who had sent Mara to his family.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 因为想要害他的不仅仅是魔族，觊觎他身份的，忌惮他血脉的，还有家族中的那些同胞兄妹，还有将玛拉派入他家族之中的教廷教皇。

0015.en: The connections were incredibly complex, not something that could be sorted out in a short time.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这其中的关系线错综复杂，绝非一时半会儿可以理清的。

0015.en: But Serenia's warning made Selen An clearly understand how foolish his earlier idea of returning to the family to be a stud master was. Right now, the Winterlein Family was a dragon's den and a tiger's lair for him.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但瑟蕾妮娅的一句话提醒，却让塞伦恩清楚的明白了，自己之前想回到家族当种马少爷的想法是多么的愚蠢，眼下的温特莱恩家族对于自己而言无异于是龙潭虎穴。

0015.en: Those people in the family with bad intentions, since they succeeded once, could succeed a second time, a third time... The enemy was in the dark while I am in the light. There's no escaping it!
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: 家族之中那些不怀好意的人，既然能对自己下手成功一次，就能够成功第二次，第三次……敌明我暗，躲不掉的！

0015.en: "As for the Succubus Seed inside you, I've managed to seal it with ice. The seal is stable. As long as nothing unexpected happens, the seed won't be activated, even after a hundred years."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “至于你体内的魅魔之种，我已经设法将其冰封封印了，封印很稳固，只要不出意外，就算你百年之后，那枚种子也不会被催发。”

0015.en: Seeing Selen An's mind racing as he processed the information, Serenia added another comment.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 见塞伦安满脸的头脑风暴，消化信息之时，瑟蕾妮娅又再次补充道。

0015.en: The young man came back to his senses and looked at the girl before him. Her silver hair still shone like a river of stars in the moonlight, but her Saintess dress was stained with dried blood.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 青年回过神，看向面前的少女，银色的长发在月光的照耀下依旧如星河般璀璨，身上的圣女裙却沾染了无数干涸的血迹。

0015.en: She seemed as hard as ice, so cold that she kept people at a distance. But in Selen An's eyes, she was still the same little girl from his memories, carefully protecting the few "flames" in her world.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 她看似如一颗坚冰般，深寒到令人敬而远之，可实际上，在塞伦恩的眼中却依旧如记忆中的那个小女孩，小心翼翼的呵护着她世界中仅有的那么几束“火光”。

0015.en: "...Thank you."
0015.speaker: 塞伦安

0015.en: At this point, he couldn't find any other words of gratitude. As for repaying Serenia's kindness?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 事到如此，他已经说不出别的感谢的话了，至于报答瑟蕾妮娅的恩情？

0015.en: With his current identity and condition, not being a burden was already a blessing.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 以他现在的身份和状态，不拖后腿都算是谢天谢地了。

0015.en: "You don't need to thank me..."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “不必谢我……”

0015.en: The girl walked past the young man towards the wooden hut, her silver hair flying. The evening breeze seemed to leave a faint, sweet scent on the tip of his nose.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 少女同青年擦身而过走向木屋，银色的发丝飞扬，晚风轻习似是在青年的鼻尖留下了那点点的幽香。

0015.en: "After all, this is what I owe you."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “毕竟，这是我欠你的。”

0015.en: Selen An stared at the girl's back, stunned. The words felt strangely familiar, as if he had heard them somewhere before. Then, his clear vision began to blur and distort, followed by a sharp, needle-like pain in his mind.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 塞伦安看向少女的背影怔怔的，只觉得这句话莫名的熟悉，好像什么时候听过，紧接着，原本清晰的视线开始出现重影，模糊扭曲，脑海中犹如针扎般的刺痛感接踵而至。

0015.en: The feeling from when he was unconscious returned. Along with the strange sensation in his body, an image of being consumed by flames filled his vision.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 昏迷时的那种感觉又来了，伴随着身体上的异样，一幅逐渐被火焰吞噬的画面占据了他的全部视野。

0015.en: On a wasteland battlefield shrouded in black smoke, a dense tide of demon cavalry charged toward two figures. At the center of the battlefield, a girl blessed by ice and snow held a frost sword, carving a bloody path through the demon army's encirclement!
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 被黑色烟火笼罩的荒原战场上，漆黑密集如潮水般的魔族铁骑朝着目标二人扑涌而来，战场的中心，被冰雪眷顾的少女手持着霜剑，硬生生在魔族大军的包围之中撕开了一条血路！

0015.en: Blood stained her dress and messed up her long hair. The demons, feeling no fear or pain, constantly reached for the young man she protected behind her with their greedy claws. The fear of death terrified the young master, who was used to a life of comfort.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 鲜血染红了她的衣裙，凌乱了她的长发，那些不知恐惧，没有痛觉的魔族们不断的朝着被她护在身后的青年伸出贪欲的魔爪，死亡的恐惧令这位平日里养尊处优的少爷吓破了胆。

0015.en: Facing the demons' hideous faces and bloody blades, he collapsed to the ground, so scared he could only weakly grab Serenia's leg, seeking a bit of safety.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 面对魔族那狰狞可怖的面容与沾血的战刀，他吓得浑身瘫软在地，只会懦弱无能的伸出手抱着瑟蕾妮娅的大腿，寻求一丝安全。

0015.en: The two were like trapped animals in a swamp. No matter how brave and unstoppable the girl was, facing an endless horde of enemies while also taking care of a burdensome young master who only held her back, she was reaching the brink of collapse, both physically and mentally.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 二人如陷入泥潭的困兽，即使少女再神勇无比，再锐不可挡，面对无穷无尽的敌人消耗，还要再照顾一位只会拖累自己的累赘少爷，无论是肉体还是精神都已经渐渐到达了崩溃的边缘。

0015.en: "Hehe, give up, Saintess of the Ice God. The moment you were surrounded, your fate was sealed."
0015.speaker: 魔将
0015.cn: “呵呵，放弃挣扎吧，冰神的圣女，在你们被包围的那一刻，结局就已然注定。”

0015.en: Among the demon army, a general built like an iron tower, covered in black keratin armor, rode a hell-horse burning with hellfire and mocked the struggling girl.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 魔军军队中，一位身形宛若铁塔，浑身上下被深黑色角质层铠甲覆盖的魔将骑在浑身燃烧着地狱火的地狱马上，朝着垂死挣扎的少女戏谑道。

0015.en: The girl swung her sword, freezing three demon soldiers in front of her into ice. She then casually beheaded six demon hounds that leaped at her. The spoiled young master clinging to her leg was pale with fear from the scene.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 少女挥剑，极寒将身前的三位魔族士兵冻成冰块，霜剑又随手斩下了身侧六名扑上来的魔犬的头颅，抱着他大腿，满脸涕泪横流的纨绔少爷已经被这场面吓得面色苍白。

0015.en: "Serenia, save me, save me!"
0015.speaker: 塞伦安
0015.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅，救我，救我！”

0015.en: The general's laughter, the soldiers' screams, the pounding of the cavalry, and her childhood friend's weak pleas for help all mixed together, making every breath for the exhausted girl incredibly difficult.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 魔将的嘲笑声，士兵的嘶喊声，军队的铁骑声，以及青梅竹马懦弱无能的求饶声，所有的声音混杂在一起，令本就精疲力竭的少女每一次呼吸都变得无比艰难。

0015.en: With her strength, she could break out of the demon encirclement, but with Selen An, who was completely helpless, they would both be dragged down and killed here.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 以她的实力要杀出魔族的包围是可以的，但若加上一位手无缚鸡之力的塞伦安，他们二人只会被活活拖死在这儿。

0015.en: Should I give up?
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: 要放弃吗？

0015.en: Selen An was supposed to die anyway. This was decided by the Ice God's oracle.
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: 塞伦安本就该死，这是冰之神的神谕决定的。

0015.en: If she abandoned him now, she could still escape. She had already given him chances, many chances. She had done all she could. Even if she left Selen An and retreated alone, no one would blame or mock her, not even the demon general on the hell-horse.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 现在放弃他，还能够脱身，自己已经给过他机会，很多次机会，自己已经仁至义尽，就算现在丢下塞伦安一个人撤离，也绝不会有任何一人指责耻笑她，就连那骑在地狱马上的魔将也不会。

0015.en: Every intelligent being present saw it. They saw her fight with all her might to save her childhood friend. But even now, after so many warnings, he could only cling to her leg, crying weakly, begging to live.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 在场的所有智慧种族都看到了，看到了她拼尽全力想要挽救这位青梅竹马，可直到现在了，面对自己多少次的提醒，他也依旧只会一味的抱着自己的大腿，懦弱痛哭，乞求苟活。

0015.en: If he could just be a little tougher, not even to help, but just to stay quiet and follow closely behind her, she would never have thought of giving up. But carrying a burden who only cried was too tiring, so tiring that she wanted to just drop her sword and let things happen...
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但凡他能硬气起来，不说帮忙，哪怕只是不说话，紧紧跟在自己的身后，她也绝不会伸出放弃的想法，可这样带着一位只会哭的拖累实在是太累了，累到她想就此放下剑，任凭局势发展……

0015.en: What should I choose?
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: 该怎么选择呢？

0015.en: The remaining magic in her body was only enough for one more choice.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 体内仅存的魔力只够做出一次选择了。

0015.en: To retreat alone, or...
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: 是独自撤离，还是……

0015.en: Time seemed to stretch infinitely in that moment. The girl lowered her gaze, looking at the young man still clinging to her leg, crying like an immature child.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 时间在这一刻仿佛被无限拉长，少女垂下了眸，看着那依旧抱着自己大腿，哭的如同一位幼稚未懂事的孩童般的青年。

0015.en: She closed her eyes, perhaps tired, perhaps weary.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 她闭上了眼，许是累了，许是倦了。

0015.en: So, let it be...
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: 所以，就这样吧……

0015.en: As she opened her eyes again, a pale, mighty power swept across the battlefield. Ice crystals began to climb up her skin, taking away what little warmth she had left. And the power gained at this cost tore a gap in the tightly blocked battlefield.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 随着她再次睁开双眸，苍白的伟力瞬间席卷整片战场，冰晶开始攀岩上她的肌肤，夺走她所剩不多的体温，而以这份代价换取来的力量，也硬生生的在这片被堵的水泄不通的荒原战场上撕开了个缺口。

0015.en: Seizing the opportunity, she pulled the collapsed young man up, gathered magic in her palm, and pushed him on the back, sending him toward the gap filled with wreckage and flesh.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 趁此契机，她将瘫软在地的青年扯了起来，魔力汇聚于掌心，拍向他的后背，将她推向了那个布满残骸与血肉的缺口。

0015.en: The young man, flying through the air, stared blankly at the girl who was getting farther and farther away. He saw a smile on her pale, bloodless face. Was it relief, or a bitter smile?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 凌空飞出去的青年，愣愣的看着那个离自己越来越远的少女，只见那张苍白无血色的俏脸露出了一抹笑，是释然，还是苦笑？

0015.en: The young man couldn't see clearly, but as he watched the shape of her lips, her familiar voice exploded in his mind like thunder.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 青年看不清，可再看向她嘴唇的唇形变化时，那道熟悉的声音却如同惊雷般在脑海中炸响。

0015.en: "This is what I owe you."
0015.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0015.cn: “这是我欠你的。”

0016.en: Chapter 16: Reset 16 - Pregnancy
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 第16章 重置16 妊娠

0016.en: "Creaaak~"
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “嘎吱～”

0016.en: The old wooden door was pushed open, making a familiar, tired sound.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 破旧的木门被推开，发出了那老掉牙的声音。

0016.en: The sound pulled Selen An's mind back to reality. Everything he had just heard and seen, which felt so real, disappeared in an instant like smoke.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 塞伦安的意识被这道声音拉回了现实，那些耳边听见的，眼前看见的，仿佛亲身经历的，都如同一缕青烟顷刻间消散于无。

0016.en: He watched the back of the girl who pushed open the door and entered the hut. Then he looked down, staring blankly at his sweaty palm. The faint, sharp pain in his mind hadn't completely gone away, along with those last words...
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他看着那推门走入木屋的少女背影，又低头，有些愣愣的看着溢出些许手汗的掌心，脑海中那隐隐的刺痛还未完全散去，连同着那到最后的声音……

0016.en: "This is what I owe you."
0016.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0016.cn: “这是我欠你的。”

0016.en: Why, why did that scene feel so familiar?
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 为何，为何他会觉得那幅画面如此的熟悉？

0016.en: Heat and moisture spread in his palm. He stared, confused, at the wet drop that had landed there. He instinctively touched his cheek and felt a long, wet tear stain.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 炙热与温润在掌心中炸开，他迷茫地望着那滴于掌心中溅开的湿润，下意识的伸手抚摸自己的脸颊，指尖触碰到那一道长长的泪痕。

0016.en: I... cried?
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 自己，落泪了？

0016.en: He found it utterly absurd. He was from another world. If he hadn't been transported here, everything that happened in this world would just be an interesting but unimportant game plot to him.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 他顿时觉得荒唐无比，自己是穿越者，若非是穿越到这个世界，这个世界所发生的一切，对于他而言，不过是能提起他兴趣却又可有可无的的游戏剧情罢了。

0016.en: True, Serenia's last scene in the vision was very moving. Even after being dragged down by "himself," his useless childhood friend, she still gave him the hope of survival, along with those final silent words.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 确实，瑟蕾妮娅在画面的最后一幕确实很感人，即使被“自己”这位一无是处的青梅竹马拖累了一路，直到最后，仍将生的希望留给了自己，配合上那最后一句的无声之言。

0016.en: Even a cold-hearted person would be moved to tears. But that was Selen An, not me. I might be touched, but I would never cry over it!
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 恐怕塞伦恩就算是个铁石心肠的，都会感动落泪，可那是塞伦安，并不是自己，自己或许会感动，但绝不至于到落泪的那一地步！

0016.en: I've only been in this world for a day, but I'm already feeling the same things as this body, relating to these visions. Am I starting to take on Selen An's identity?
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 自己穿越过来，不过一天的时间竟然对这副身体，对看到的那些画面感同身受了，自己已经开始代入塞伦安这个身份了？

0016.en: How ridiculous. But the feeling growing in his chest was so real, and together with the tear on his palm, it completely confused his thoughts.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 这是何等的荒唐，可那酝酿在胸膛中的那份感情却又是何等的真实，连带着那在掌心中炸开的泪滴，一同将他的思绪揉乱。

0016.en: The guilt and emotions from Selen An's identity were controlling him, greatly influencing his actions. This went completely against his original goal of just surviving.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 被塞伦安这个身份所带来的愧疚，感情牵着鼻子走，甚至在很大程度上影响了自己的行为，这已经和自己一开始的求生理念背道而驰了。

0016.en: He was starting to lose his sense of self. The original owner's memories were seeping into his mind, trying to slowly turn him into a different person.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 他开始变得不像是自己了，这具身体原主的记忆侵入大脑，像是要潜移默化的将他活生生的变成另一个人。

0016.en: That's an unacceptable thought, isn't it?
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 可这种事想想都无法接受，不是吗？

0016.en: He was just a person from another world living in Selen An's body. He only wanted to survive this disaster of a plot. He couldn't worry about anyone else. He was just an ordinary, powerless person who could only look out for himself.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 他只是一个借塞伦安身体活过来的穿越者，他只想从这场剧情浩劫中活下来，至于其他人的死活，他一个普通人，人微言轻，什么也做不了，只能管好自己。

0016.en: He was just an ordinary person; he didn't want to be a hero.
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 他只是一个普通人，不想当什么大英雄。

0016.en: "Is there something wrong with me?"
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: “我这是病了吗？”

0016.en: He didn't understand, and he couldn't.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他不明白，也无法明白。

0016.en: First, a surprised, cautious shout came from inside the hut. It sounded like it was from Anna. Then, Serenia's uniquely cool and clear voice was heard. The tense mood inside seemed to be soothed, and their conversation became calm.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 木屋内先是传来惊叫警惕声，听声音应当是安娜，紧接着瑟蕾妮娅那极具特色的清冷声线响起，木屋内紧张的氛围像是被安抚，双方的交谈声逐渐平静了下来。

0016.en: Standing outside the door, Selen An caught a few muffled words carried by the wind. He picked out keywords like "danger" and "evacuate," and guessed that Serenia was explaining the situation to the mother and daughter so they could prepare to leave quickly.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 站在门外，借着风儿捎带来的三两句模糊语句，从中提炼出“危险”“撤离”等关键词，塞伦安猜测瑟蕾妮娅此时应当是给这对母女解释如今的状况，好，这二人能够更快的准备撤退。

0016.en: Selen An wasn't worried about whether Anna and her mother would doubt Serenia. His childhood friend was a real Saintess. Besides her incredible fighting skills, almost every Saintess had a special, holy presence that made people respect and trust them.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 至于安娜母女是否会怀疑瑟蕾妮娅所说的，塞伦安倒并不担心，“自己”这位青梅竹马可是货真价实的圣女，除去超凡的战力，几乎每一位圣女都有着一股令人崇敬信任的特殊圣洁气质。

0016.en: Thinking of this, he decided not to get involved. He would just wait for Serenia to convince the mother and daughter, and then they would leave this dangerous place tonight once everything was ready.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 想到此处，他便也不想再过多掺和一脚，只等着瑟蕾妮娅说服这对母女，准备完毕后，连夜离开这块是非之地。

0016.en: As for the future, he still had over a dozen gold coins that Anna's mother wouldn't accept. This was more than enough money for a family of three to live on for over a year.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 至于日后，自己的身上还留下了十几枚安娜母亲不愿收下的金币，这笔钱已经算得上是一个普通三口之家一年多的花销了。

0016.en: With this money to start, he could live under a new name. Using his knowledge of the game's plot, he could find the right opportunities and become a wealthy merchant. That shouldn't be a problem.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 有了这笔启动资金，日后自己隐姓埋名，再根据对剧情的了解，抓住时机，当一个富有的商人应当是不成问题的。

0016.en: And as for Anna and her mother, who had suffered because of him, Serenia knew their story and would definitely make sure they were taken care of. Once he had money, he could secretly help them financially to make up for the original Selen An's past mistakes.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而因为自己受苦受难的安娜母女，知道她们身世的瑟蕾妮娅也绝对会好好安置，绝不会亏待她们，到时候自己有了钱，在经济上暗中补偿一二，也当算是弥补原身当年的过失。

0016.en: It seemed like things were starting to look up, until...
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 事情似乎在朝好的一方发展，直到……

0016.en: A sharp groan broke the silence of the desolate night.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 一道刺耳的呻吟声，打破了这荒原寂静的夜。

0016.en: The sound was incredibly weak, yet so familiar. Selen An, who had been standing outside in the night breeze, whipped his head toward the hut and rushed inside without a second thought.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 那道声音无比的虚弱，却又是那么熟悉，正在外面吹着夜风的塞伦安猛地扭头看向屋内，不等有过多的思考就冲了进去。

0016.en: The hut was dark, but light soon pushed the darkness away. The silver-haired girl lit an ice-blue flame in her hand. Selen An used the light to look toward the source of the sound. On the simple wooden bed, an anxious Anna stood. The woman on the bed was covered in sweat, her swollen body twisting in pain.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 木屋里黑漆漆的，但很快就有光芒驱散了黑暗，银发的少女手中燃起冰蓝色的火焰，塞伦安借着这光看向了他音的源头，简陋的木床，安娜焦急的衣服在床榻旁，床上的妇人此时却满头大汗，臃肿的身子因痛苦而不断的蠕动。

0016.en: "Ma'am!"
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: “夫人！”

0016.en: "Mother, what's wrong? Mother!"
0016.speaker: 安娜
0016.cn: “母亲，你怎么了？母亲！”

0016.en: Anna asked anxiously.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 安娜焦急的询问道。

0016.en: "My stomach... the baby!"
0016.speaker: 母亲
0016.cn: “肚子……孩子！”

0016.en: "She's going into labor."
0016.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0016.cn: “她要生了。”

0016.en: Serenia suddenly spoke. Following her gaze, Selen An saw a startling patch of blood on the old blanket beneath the woman's lower body.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅突然开口，赛轮借着他所手指的方向，就见那妇人下半身所压破旧的被褥上不知何时多出了一抹刺眼的血迹。

0016.en: Her water broke!
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: 见红了！

0016.en: Even with his limited knowledge of biology, the moment Selen An saw the blood, he understood the situation.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 纵使生理知识并不丰富的塞伦安在看见妇人下身见红的那一刻，也立即明白了现状。

0016.en: At this critical moment, just as they were about to retreat, Anna's mother was having her baby!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 就在这即将撤退的关键时刻，安娜母亲肚子里的孩子竟然要出生了！

0016.en: Looking at the woman on the bed, sweating and in pain from the contractions, Selen An remembered her kind face from their conversation during the day, and his heart felt heavy.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 看着床上因即将分娩而痛得满头大汗的女人，再回想起白日这位妇人与自己对话时慈祥的面容，塞伦安的心也不自觉的被牵扯了起来。

0016.en: "What... what do we do? Is she going to give birth here?"
0016.speaker: 塞伦安
0016.cn: “这，这怎么办？就在这里生？”

0016.en: He instinctively looked around. There was no doctor, no modern medical equipment, not even a basin of hot water. In these conditions, could Anna's mother really deliver her baby successfully?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 他下意识的环顾了一下四周，没有医生，没有现代的医疗器材，甚至连一盆热水也没有，这种条件下，安娜的母亲真的能成功将肚子里的孩子生下来吗？

0016.en: Thinking this, he looked at Anna by the bed. The girl, who had seemed so mature and distant during the day, now had a face full of panic. Watching her mother groan in pain, she didn't know what to do.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 想到这，他又看向床榻旁的安娜，白日里一脸淡漠，看似成熟的少女，此时脸上也布满了焦急，看着床上痛苦呻吟的母亲 动作也变得手足无措起来。

0016.en: It seemed Anna didn't know how to deliver a baby either. It made sense. No matter how mature Anna was, she was still a young girl. How could she know how to deliver a baby when she had never been a mother herself?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 看来安娜也不会接生，想想也是，安娜就算再怎么成熟也不过只是个豆蔻年华的少女，自己都没做过母亲的她又何曾知道怎么生孩子？

0016.en: The environment was terrible, the conditions were poor, and there was no one to help with the delivery. The woman's already weak body couldn't take much more. Just as they were at a complete loss, the girl beside him thrust a lit torch into his hands and walked over to the bed.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 环境恶劣，条件不行，就连接生的人都没有，身体本就虚弱的妇人经不起折腾，正当陷入僵局之时，身旁的少女却已经将一支点着的火焰的火把塞到了青年的手中，走到了床榻旁。

0016.en: "I'll do it."
0016.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0016.cn: “我来。”

0016.en: Hearing this, Anna's eyes filled with hope, but her face quickly showed worry.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 安娜听到话眼睛中顿时绽放出希望的光芒，可脸上也很快露出了担忧之色。

0016.en: "But, Your Highness, how could we let you do something like this..."
0016.speaker: 安娜
0016.cn: “可是殿下，此等事情怎么能让您……”

0016.en: The body of a Saintess was pure and sacred. Before her family's tragedy, when she lived in the city, she had seen the Saintess who led the holy rites. After her ritual bath, the Saintess would walk on red carpets scattered with flower petals by countless clerics.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 殿下的身体乃是冰清玉洁的圣体，家庭未遭逢变故时，居于城中的她也见过主持圣祭的圣女，圣浴过的圣女披着圣女袍，光裸的足底便是有无数的神职人员铺开红毯，抛洒花瓣。

0016.en: In people's eyes, a Saintess was spotless, noble, and divine. How could one ever do something as bloody and messy as delivering a baby?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 人们眼中的圣女是一尘不染的，是高洁神性的，何曾会做接生此等血腥，脏手之事？

0016.en: "A life is at stake."
0016.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0016.cn: “人命要紧。”

0016.en: She didn't explain further. Those four simple words made Anna swallow all her worries. The look in her eyes now held a deep, heartfelt admiration.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她没有过多解释，只是简简单单四个字，便让安娜将心中的所有担忧吞回了肚子，看向她的眼神更多出一份发自内心的敬仰。

0016.en: This was a Saintess, a true Saintess. She had the blood of the gods but did not act high and mighty, showing compassion equally to everyone.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 这就是圣女，这才是圣女，流淌着神的血脉，却不以身份之高贵，将慈悲平等的播撒向每一个人。

0016.en: With no tools, she made them. The power of ice formed into ice-scissors and an ice-basin in the girl's hands. She told Anna to help her mother spread her legs to make the delivery easier, then turned to Selen An, who stood by, worried but helpless.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 没有工具就创造工具，冰寒之力在少女的手中凝聚成冰剪，冰盆等物，她一边指挥着安娜将其母亲的大腿叉开，方便后续的接生，又扭头看向站在一旁眼含担忧，却又无能为力的塞伦安。

0016.en: "You stand guard outside the door. Report immediately if you see anything strange!"
0016.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0016.cn: “你在门外守着，一旦有异动，立即汇报！”

0016.en: Their eyes met for a moment. Through her eyes, Selen An felt a flicker of the same emotion from his memories when he was unconscious. Without hesitation, he nodded with a serious expression.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 双方的眼神在那一刻交汇，透过眼睛，塞伦安似是寻回了一些昏迷时记忆中的悸动，没有多少犹豫，神情严肃的点下了头。

0016.en: "Okay."
0016.speaker: 塞伦安

0017.en: Chapter 17: Reset 17 - A Stormy Night of Childbirth
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 第17章 重置17 雨夜临盆

0017.en: Even standing outside, he could still clearly hear the moans from inside the house.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 即使站在屋外，他依旧能够清晰的听到屋内的呻吟声。

0017.en: It was a mother in labor. Just from the sound, Selen An could feel the tearing pain in his own body. He subconsciously clenched his fist, his palm slick with sweat.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 那是一位正在妊娠的母亲，光听声音，塞伦安就能够感同身受到那种下体撕裂的痛苦了，他下意识的握紧食指，掌心全是手汗。

0017.en: His heart pounded as if he were the one giving birth, not the woman in the house.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 心脏在咚咚直跳，好似那生孩子的，并非是屋中的妇人，而是自己。

0017.en: But soon, the feeling faded like a receding tide. A speck of light ignited in the dimness of the house, and an ice-blue magical power raised a hemispherical light barrier, like an inverted bowl, completely enveloping the wooden cabin.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 但很快，这种感觉便如潮水退潮般消退，随着一点光芒于屋内的昏暗中点亮，冰蓝色的魔力撑起一道半球状的光幕，似一只倒扣的圆碗将木屋完全笼罩其中。

0017.en: The woman's moans vanished. All sound was sealed within the light barrier, and even the faint smell of blood that had been seeping through the door crack completely disappeared.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 妇人的呻吟声随之消失，一切动静都被密封入光幕之中，就连原本从门缝中透出的隐隐血腥味都彻底清散。

0017.en: Selen An stood outside the light barrier. Without the sound, his immersive tension was greatly relieved, but his taut nerves didn't relax in the slightest.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 塞伦安站在光幕之外，没了声音的影响，那种身临其境的紧张感也得到了大大的缓解，可是他紧绷的精神却未有半分放松。

0017.en: At such a critical moment, right before their escape, something like this happening was never a good sign in any of the novels, games, or anime from his past life. He had a premonition...
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 在这种即将撤离的关键时刻，出了这种事，放在任何前世的小说，游戏，动漫之中都不是好兆头，他有预感……

0017.en: Tonight, the turmoil would not end here.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 今夜，不平静之事绝不仅止于此。

0017.en: Just as he had this thought, Selen An felt a chill on his scalp, as if a drop of water had fallen on his head. He touched his head but felt nothing. He had just started to think it was a hallucination from his nervousness when a second drop splashed on the back of his hand.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 只是刚刚有这念头，塞伦安便觉得头皮一凉，好像有水滴落在了头上，他摸了摸头，没摸到什么，刚以为是自己太过紧张出现了幻觉，第二滴水便在他的手背处溅开。

0017.en: The young man stared blankly at the damp spot on his hand. Feeling the cool sensation of the third and fourth raindrops hitting his body, he slowly looked up at the sky. In the pitch-black night, there was no moon and no stars.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 青年愣愣的看着手背处的湿润，感受着第三滴，第四滴的雨水打落在身上清凉，缓缓抬头望天，漆黑的夜幕，此时不见明月，也不见繁星。

0017.en: There was no light, only an increasingly dense rain falling on his face, his body, the wooden cabin, and the ground. The rain had come without warning, yet it seemed to be playing a kind of symphony, slowly pushing something buried in the night's darkness to the forefront.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 没有光，只有越来越密集的雨滴滴打在脸上，身上，木屋，土地上，这场雨来的毫无预兆，却像是奏响了某种乐章，将掩埋在夜幕中的某些事物缓缓推至面前。

0017.en: What came with the rain was not just the coolness on his skin, but also... the trembling of the earth, and the clash of armor and thundering hooves approaching from the distance!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 随着雨水而来的不仅仅只有肌肤上的清凉，还有……大地的震颤，以及那由远及近的金戈蹄鸣！

0017.en: Inside the house, the woman on the bed was too weak to moan. Giving birth was an exhausting affair, and in medieval times, it was like a trip to death's door for any woman, let alone this frail and skinny one.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 屋内，躺在床上的妇人已经无力呻吟，生孩子本就是一件极其耗费体力的事，而在中世纪，正常女人临盆也都跟鬼门关前走一趟无异，更何况床上这位肌瘦无力的妇人？

0017.en: The harsh environment, the lack of food and water... As a pregnant woman who needed nourishment, she had only eaten half a bowl of peas for dinner. Worn down by these hardships, she was as thin as a bundle of firewood, except for her swollen belly.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 恶劣的环境，加上少粮少水，身为孕妇，本就是要汲取营养的时候，晚饭却只吃了半碗豌豆，在这不断磋磨之下，妇人除了高高隆起的肚子，整个人瘦的简直就像是一捆劈柴。

0017.en: Anna held her mother's hand, which was as withered as an old tree branch. Her eyes were filled with tears and grief, but she bit her lip, not daring to make a sound.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 安娜抓着母亲的枯瘦如老树般的手，眼中虽蓄满了泪与悲痛，可却始终紧咬着牙不敢发出一丝一毫的声音。

0017.en: Serenia, in her ice-like dress, tore a strip of cloth from her hem and stuffed it into the woman's mouth for her to bite down on.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 一身冰裙的瑟蕾妮娅都是从自己的裙摆上撕下了一块破布，塞到了妇人的口中，让其咬住。

0017.en: "Don't make a sound."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “不要发出声音。”

0017.en: Although she had already set up a barrier, it was best not to make any noise at a time like this.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 虽然已经布下了结界，但这种时候能不发出声音就最好不要发出声音。

0017.en: Her voice was frighteningly calm, but she never stopped pressing on the woman's stomach to help with the birth.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她的声音冷静到可怕，同时手中按压肚子，帮忙助产的动作却始终未曾停下。

0017.en: Clearly, she had already sensed the commotion outside. She could smell the stench of blood from the demons hundreds of meters away. Normally, she would have either charged in with her sword or chosen to retreat and avoid a direct confrontation.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 很显然，外面的动静她早就察觉到了，魔族身上的那股血腥味，隔着数百米她都能够清晰嗅到，放到平时，遇到这种情况，她不是提剑已经杀入阵前，就是选择撤离，暂避锋芒。

0017.en: But now, a new life about to enter the world had disrupted all their plans. Helping with the delivery, she could neither fight nor flee. They were trapped here, sitting ducks for the Demon Clan's cavalry.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 可现在，一个即将降临于世上的新生命，打乱了她们的全部计划，帮忙生产的她既不能杀敌，也不能撤退，他们被拖在了这，成了魔族铁骑的活靶子。

0017.en: She looked down at the woman on the bed, pale-faced but still struggling on the brink of death. Without much hesitation, she quickly made a decision.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她低头看着床上面色苍白，还奋力在生死线上挣扎的女人，没有过多的纠结与挣扎，只是快速的做下决断。

0017.en: "Anna, did you remember the steps and actions I just showed you?"
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “安娜，我刚刚的那些动作和操作，你记住了吗？”

0017.en: She suddenly turned to the helpless girl. After her initial panic, the girl forced herself to calm down and nodded forcefully.
0017.speaker: 安娜
0017.cn: 她突然扭头看向手足无措的少女，少女经过了刚开始的慌乱，但又很快，强制镇定下来，用力的点了点头。

0017.en: "I-I remember!"
0017.speaker: 安娜
0017.cn: “我，给我记住了！”

0017.en: "Good. Now you will help your mother by pressing on her stomach. I need to go outside for a moment."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “那好，现在就由你给你的母亲按压助产，我需要出去一趟。”

0017.en: Selen An swore that in this life—no, in this life and the last combined—he had never witnessed such a scene.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 塞伦安发誓，自己这一世，不对，是这一世和上上一世加起来，都没有亲眼目睹过如此场面——

0017.en: Dark clouds crushed the last rays of twilight, and the thunder of hooves rolled across the plains. At the edge of the horizon, a black tide surged forward!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 阴云碾碎最后的天光，铁蹄声化作连绵惊雷碾过旷野，在视野所及的地平线的末端，黑潮汹涌而至！

0017.en: Selen An saw the demon cavalry in the pouring rain, like giant beasts breaking free from hell. Each step sent mud splashing like black waves. The foul wind they carried was so thick it tore the rain into tattered white shrouds. The sparse bushes in the distance snapped under the pressure, like straws crushed by an invisible hand.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 塞伦安看见暴雨中的魔族铁骑如同挣破地狱的巨兽，每踏一步都让泥浆迸溅成黑色浪涛。它们裹挟的腥风竟凝成实质，将雨幕撕扯成破碎的惨白裹尸布，远处稀疏的灌木在威压下成片折断，如同被无形巨手揉碎的麦秆。

0017.en: The entire land was turning into a boiling swamp, with mud splashing as if it were boiling. The stench of death from the cavalry was thicker than the rain, flooding his nostrils.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 整片大地正在化作蒸煮的泥潭，飞溅的泥水如若沸腾，骑兵阵列掀起的死亡气息比暴雨更稠密地灌入鼻腔。

0017.en: When lightning tore through the rain, Selen An saw the gaping mouths of the front-row demon riders. It was the entire army roaring in unison, their thousands of voices weaving a net that covered the sky and threatened to crush the small wooden house like a fragile seashell in a storm.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 当闪电撕开雨幕的刹那，塞伦安看见最前排魔骑张开的血盆大口，那分明是整支军队在同步嘶吼，千万道声浪织成铺天盖地的罗网，将木屋压成暴风雨中随时会碎裂的贝壳。

0017.en: "Aaaaargh!"
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: “嗷啊啊啊啊啊啊！”

0017.en: The hoarse battle cry felt like it would pierce his eardrums. Selen An instinctively covered his ears, his body trembling like a leaf. At this moment, only one thought filled his mind—
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 嘶哑的战吼像是要直接贯穿耳膜，塞伦安下意识的捂住双耳，身体抖得像是筛糠，此时此刻，他的脑中只有一种想法——

0017.en: Run, run now! The Demon Clan is unbeatable!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 跑，赶紧跑！魔族是不可战胜的！

0017.en: He was utterly terrified. His brain screamed at him to flee, but his body was as stiff as a puppet, his limbs refusing to obey.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 他这几乎算是被吓破了胆，大脑拼命的发出逃跑的讯号，身体僵硬的却如木偶一般，手脚根本不听使唤。

0017.en: A burning heat ignited in his lower abdomen. As the demons approached, the Succubus Seed inside him grew more active. If not for the seal Serenia had placed on him earlier, he would have likely reverted to the half-human, half-demon state he was in back in the carriage.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 下腹部也燃起了如火般灼烧的燥热，随着魔族的靠近，体内的魅魔之种变得愈发活跃，如果不是瑟蕾妮娅之前设下的封印，自己恐怕早已露出了最初在马车上的那副不人不魔的鬼样子。

0017.en: This was completely different from facing a single demon like Mara. Facing the demon cavalry was nothing like watching a game cutscene. The pressure and despair left only one word in his heart.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这与面对玛拉单个魔族的感觉根本不一样，直面魔族铁骑也和观看游戏CG完全无法相提并论，那种压迫感和绝望，他的心中只剩二字。

0017.en: GG.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 丸辣！

0017.en: The demons had come for him, saw him as prey, and now there was no escape.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 魔族为他而来，视他为猎物，如今他已无路可逃。

0017.en: In extreme despair, a person can feel their spirit detaching from their body. Selen An's vision began to blur, but a cold hand on his shoulder pulled his consciousness back from the brink.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 人在极度绝望下，就会产生出一种精神和灵魂脱离出肉体的恍惚感，塞伦安视野都开始模糊，可一只冰凉的手却拍在了他的肩膀上，将好似要灵魂出窍的他的意识拉回了身体。

0017.en: He turned to look at his shoulder. It was a slender, fair, and delicate hand. He was about to speak when he heard a cold, ethereal voice by his ear.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 他扭头看向自己的肩膀处，那只纤纤玉手，白皙娇嫩，他刚想开口说话，却听耳边传来那清冷空灵之声。

0017.en: "Switch."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “换人。”

0017.en: Serenia moved past him, standing in front of him.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅从他的身旁错过，挡在了他的身前。

0017.en: The wind and rain blew her skirt and loosened her tied-up silver hair. Her Saintess robe, embroidered with the Church's cross, whipped in the storm, its tight fabric outlining her proud figure. As the water neared her, it turned to ice from the pale chill radiating from her body and fell to the ground.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 风夹杂着雨吹起了她的裙摆，也吹散了她束起的银色长发，绣有教廷十字符文的圣女袍在暴风中猎猎作响，紧绷的衣裙勾勒出少女傲然的身姿，水在靠近她的周身附近时，便因她身上散发的苍白寒气，水滴成冰，坠落地面。

0017.en: Facing the black tide of the demon army, she stood alone, fearless. Her ice-blue eyes reflected the "black tide" churning in the stormy night.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 面对那如同黑潮汹涌而至的魔族大军，孤身一人的她毫无惧色，冰蓝色的双眸倒映出那雨夜中沸腾的“黑色潮水”。

0017.en: A pale, cold aura condensed in her hand, forming the holy sword that had slain countless enemies. With just one sword, she intended to stop a thousand-strong army.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 苍白寒罡在她的手中凝聚成那柄斩敌无数的圣剑，她仅凭一人一剑，就欲阻挡千军万马。

0017.en: "Go inside."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “进屋。”

0017.en: She said, her back to Selen An. The oncoming wind carried her voice into the young man's ears.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 背对着塞伦安的她言道，扑面而来的风，带着她的声音倒灌入青年的耳中。

0017.en: "Go inside!"
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “进屋！”

0017.en: The girl's voice suddenly became stern and undeniable. She asserted her authority as a Saintess and commanded him.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 少女的声音陡然变得严肃，变得无可置疑，她拿出了身为圣女的威严，命令道。

0017.en: "In the name of the Saintess, I order you to go into the house and help Anna."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “我以圣女的名义命令你，进入屋中，协助安娜。”

0017.en: "As for what's out here... I will handle it."
0017.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0017.cn: “至于眼前……我来解决。”

0018.en: Chapter 18 Reset 18: Death and Birth
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 第18章 重置18 死亡与诞生

0018.en: With a creak, the open wooden door closed again.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 随着“嘎吱”一声，打开的木门重新闭合。

0018.en: Outside, she was the only one left.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 屋外，只剩下她一人。

0018.en: An icy-blue, dome-shaped barrier covered the old wooden house. The barrier seemed unbreakable, but Serenia knew that under the attack of the black tide of demon cavalry, it would be torn apart like paper without a fixed magical anchor.
0018.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0018.cn: 冰蓝色的半球状结界将破旧的木屋笼罩其中，结界看似坚不可摧，可瑟蕾妮娅明白，在那如同黑色潮水的魔族骑兵冲击下，没有固定魔眼的结界将会如白纸般被撕碎。

0018.en: So, she drew her sword and walked forward slowly, facing the wind that smelled of blood.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 所以，她拔出了剑，迎着掺杂着血腥味的风，缓步向前。

0018.en: As the Ice Saintess, she was not good at healing or blessings. This was clear from when she was inside helping Anna's mother give birth. If she were the Water Saintess, the child would have likely been born safely by now.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 作为冰之圣女，她的确不擅长治愈与祈福，这在屋内帮助安娜母亲助产时便可窥见一二，若她是水之圣女，恐怕那位母亲肚子里的孩子已平安落地。

0018.en: But she was not. She was the Saintess who inherited the bloodline of the God of Ice, a symbol of judgment and moderation. Her duty was to deliver judgment to the evil creatures before her through slaughter!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 但她不是，她是继承了象征审判与节制的冰之神血脉的圣女，在杀戮中赐予眼前邪恶种族应有之审判，才是她该做的事！

0018.en: The heavy rain hit the ground, splashing mud. The girl tapped her toes lightly and charged into the enemy ranks.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 暴雨滴打在地面，溅起泥浆，少女脚尖轻点，杀入阵中。

0018.en: The moment the front of the demon cavalry crashed into the icy-blue figure, a fierce cold energy pierced the formation, tearing a large gap. The horses' hooves were covered in a thick layer of frost from the extreme cold. Due to the great momentum of the cavalry charge, the horses' frozen, brittle limbs snapped and broke.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 当魔族骑兵的排头与那冰蓝倩影相撞的一瞬间，肆虐的寒罡刺入阵中，硬生生撕开了一大段缺口，战马的蹄足在极低温的环境下凝成了一层厚厚的白霜，由于骑兵冲阵时极大的惯性，战马们冻成冰棍般的脆弱四肢纷纷应声而断。

0018.en: As the front line of soldiers and horses fell into chaos, the silver-haired girl stepped forward. Pure, surging magic flowed into the ground, and pale ice thorns burst from the earth, piercing the green-faced, tusked demons who tried to approach with their weapons, sending flesh and blood flying.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 在前排一众人仰马翻的情况下，银发的少女一脚踏出，汹涌精纯的魔力注入地面，苍白的冰之荆棘破土而出，将那些青面獠牙挥舞着武器意欲靠近的魔族刺的血肉横飞。

0018.en: The demons' tough, blade-proof armor was like paper in front of the frost Serenia controlled, breaking with a single touch.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 魔族身上那层刀枪不入的角质层铠甲，在瑟蕾妮娅操控的冰霜面前就如纸糊般一戳即破。

0018.en: The harsh, ugly roars of the demons exploded by her ears. Serenia's eyes seemed to be lit by a special flame, and as she looked around, her beautiful eyes left striking trails of icy-blue light in the night.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 嘶哑难听的魔族咆哮声于耳畔片炸响，瑟蕾妮娅的双瞳像是被某种特殊的火焰点燃，美眸转动的轨迹于夜幕之中留下了醒目的冰蓝残光。

0018.en: In just a moment, her ice sword had cut off the heads of dozens of demons. Dark purple blood sprayed from their necks and mixed with the rain, adding a cruel touch to the one-sided battle.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 仅是片刻，她手中的冰剑就以斩下的数十位魔族的首级，魔族脖颈的断口处喷涌出深紫色的血液，血液随雨水落下，更给这场数量悬殊巨大的战斗添上的一抹残酷。

0018.en: The battle outside the barrier was intense, and the tension inside was just as high.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 结界外的战斗异常的激烈，而结界内的紧张环境也丝毫不逊色。

0018.en: At some point, the cries of pain from inside the house had completely disappeared. Just a moment ago, standing outside, the night wind had made him feel cold. But now, Selen An's clothes were completely soaked, not with leftover rainwater, but with sweat dripping from his forehead!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 不知何时，屋内的哀嚎声已经彻底消失，明明刚刚站在屋外还被夜风吹的有些遍体发凉，可塞伦安现在的衣服布料已被完全浸透，那些从额头上滑落的不是遗留的雨水，而是汗水！

0018.en: Anna's mother was in a much worse condition than he had imagined!
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 安娜母亲的状况远比他想的还要严重！

0018.en: The thin mother had not received enough nutrition and was also frightened by the situation, which caused her to go into labor early. There were almost no medical facilities around.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 瘦骨嶙峋的母亲在没有得到足够的营养补充，还是在一定程度上受到了环境惊吓，导致早产，周围几乎可以算是没有任何的卫生医疗设施。

0018.en: In medieval times, childbirth was a matter of constitution and luck. Even noblewomen sometimes died from blood loss during labor, killing both mother and child. Right now, Anna's mother was in a situation that was like dancing on the edge of death's door.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 中世纪妇女生孩子完全拼的就是体质和运气，即使是贵族，有的时候也会因为生产时的大出血而一尸两命，眼下，安娜母亲的这种情况，几乎就算是在鬼门关面前来回蹦迪了。

0018.en: Anna was still continuously pressing on her mother's stomach to help with the birth. The mother was too weak to push anymore. No matter how much pressure was applied from the outside, the baby's head would not come down.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 安娜还在不断的按压着母亲的肚子，帮助其助产，产妇已经虚弱到没有力气生产了，无论外部怎么施加压力，婴儿的头部总是下不来。

0018.en: As a grown man, Selen An could only stand by and hand things to them. He saw the kind mother's suffering and felt anxious, but he couldn't help her give birth.
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 塞伦安一个大男人只能站在一旁，帮忙递个东西什么的，这位善良的母亲的遭遇，他看在眼里，急在心里，却也不能帮人生孩子。

0018.en: Outside, the battle was bloody and fierce. Inside the small house, it felt incredibly hot and stuffy, and everyone was sweating.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 外面血雨腥风，雪虐风饕‌，在狭小的屋内，却显得无比的闷热，每个人身上都被逼出了汗。

0018.en: Selen An's heart felt like it was about to jump out of his chest. He was worried about the pregnant woman's safety and also stressed about the battle outside. But in the original story, he was destined to become a demon's plaything and had no fighting ability at all.
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 塞伦安心脏好似要跳出胸膛，他现在是一边担心孕妇的安危，一边纠结着屋外战场的情况，可原剧情设定中为即将成为魔族绒布球的他毫无任何战斗力。

0018.en: In other words, he couldn't do anything.
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 也就是说，他什么都做不到。

0018.en: Just as he was hating himself for being so useless, Anna's panicked cry sounded in the room again.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 正当他心中为自己的无能而感到痛恨时，屋内却又响起了安娜，惊慌的惊呼。

0018.en: "Mother, don't sleep! Mother, wake up!"
0018.speaker: 安娜
0018.cn: “母亲，不要睡，母亲，快醒醒！”

0018.en: She kept shaking the woman's body on the wooden bed, as if trying to wake someone who was about to fall asleep.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 说着还不停的摇晃着木床上妇人的身体，好似要唤醒一位即将睡着的人。

0018.en: Hearing her voice, Selen An sensed something was wrong and took a step forward. He saw—
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 塞伦安听声音顿觉不妙，上前一步，只见——

0018.en: The pregnant woman was still lying on the simple, old wooden bed. Although she was still biting down hard on the cloth in her mouth, she couldn't hold on any longer. The whites of her eyes were showing, and her eyelids were drooping.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 孕妇仍仰躺在那张简陋破旧的木床上，嘴里虽还死死的咬着那张布，但人已经支撑不住，翻着白眼，眼皮子直往下坠。

0018.en: Even though Selen An was not a doctor and had little medical knowledge, his common sense told him that Anna's mother was not going to make it.
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 纵使塞伦安不是什么医生，也没有多少医疗知识，可仅凭常识看这状况也明白，安娜的母亲怕是要撑不住了！

0018.en: Anna was frantic with worry, patting her mother and trying to bring her back to consciousness. But she was also afraid of using too much force and hurting her weakened mother. She was completely at a loss.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 安娜在一旁急得心急如焚，不断的拍打，试图挽回母亲的神志，可又害怕自己的力道太大，将虚弱的母亲拍出个怎么样，俨然是一副手足无措的慌乱模样。

0018.en: For a moment, only the girl's tearful cries filled the room. No matter how mature Anna had acted before, she was still just a young girl. Her mother was her only family in this world. If something happened to her, she would probably lose all will to live.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 一时间，屋内只剩下少女泫然欲泣的呼喊声，安娜就算之前表现的再怎么成熟，可终究只是一名少女，母亲是她这世上唯一的亲人，如果母亲再出了什么意外，她恐怕对这个世界也没有半分眷恋了。

0018.en: Just as she was about to lose all hope, a figure moved past her from behind.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 就在她已经快绝望之际，一道身影，却从她的身后错身了过来。

0018.en: She was stunned by the sight...
0018.speaker: 安娜
0018.cn: 那道身影让她感到愕然……

0018.en: Ignoring the strong smell of blood, Selen An stepped up to the woman's side and pinched the spot below her nose, hard.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 塞伦安顶着浓烈的血腥味，跨步来到妇人身旁，探出手在她的人中狠狠掐了一下。

0018.en: He used so much force that he left a bloody nail mark on her skin. But it was surprisingly effective. The pain caused the pregnant woman, whose eyes had been rolling back, to show signs of waking up!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 这一下，他用劲极大，直接在妇人的人中处掐出了一个带血的指甲印，可这一下却又出奇的有效，这一痛，原本还翻白眼的孕妇，竟有悠悠转醒的迹象！

0018.en: But even though she was awake, Anna's mother still had no strength to give birth.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 可就算是醒了，安娜的母亲依旧是没有力气生产。

0018.en: Ultimately, she was just too weak. She hadn't received enough nutrition and had suffered in this harsh environment. It was only because of her naturally good constitution that she had held on this long.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 归根结底，她实在是太虚弱了，没有营养的摄入，又遭此恶劣环境的搓磨，能扛到现在，只能说他的天生体质还不错。

0018.en: Her renewed consciousness was fading as she fought against the pain of labor. Covered in sweat, Selen An reached out and pinched her again, even harder this time. Blood flowed from the nail mark.
0018.speaker: 塞伦安
0018.cn: 苏醒后的意识又在对抗着生产的痛苦中消磨，塞伦安满头大汗，伸手又在她的人中处狠狠一掐，这一次更用力，血水都顺着指甲印的凹陷处流出。

0018.en: But thankfully, it worked again. Perhaps it was a biological instinct, the will to survive, or a mother's devotion to her unborn child.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 但好在这一次还是奏效了，或许是生物的本能，或许是求生的天性，又或许是一位母亲对于自己那即将出生的孩子的执着。

0018.en: This time, she became fierce. Her beautiful, gentle eyes were filled with bloodshot veins, as if she was squeezing out every last bit of energy from her body. She gripped the edge of the wooden bed so hard that her nails dug into the wood, filling the cracks with dark splinters.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 这一次，她发了狠，那双充斥着温柔的美丽眸子中充斥着血丝，像是压榨出了这具身体的全部精力，她使劲抓着木床的边缘，指甲都嵌进了木头里，夹缝中全是黑屑与木屑。

0018.en: With a faint, crisp sound, the pregnant woman's eyes opened wide in a pained glare. She had bitten down on the cloth with so much force that she had broken one of her own teeth!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 听一声细微且清脆的响声，孕妇的眼睛睁的目眦欲裂，竟是咬着破布的力气过大，咬碎了自己的一颗板牙！

0018.en: Selen An broke out in a cold sweat watching this. She was being so harsh on herself for her child's sake. But it was extremely effective. Anna, who was helping by rubbing her mother's belly, felt the baby drop. She quickly looked down between her mother's legs and saw the baby's fluffy head.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 塞伦安看着直冒冷汗，为了自己的孩子，竟然对自己这么狠，但这一下却是极有用的，在一旁帮忙揉肚子助产的安娜只觉得隔层肚皮的孩子往下一坠，急忙低头朝着母亲的胯下一看，就见婴孩儿毛茸茸的头顶。

0018.en: Her body trembled with excitement. She pushed on the stomach with more effort while encouraging her.
0018.speaker: 安娜
0018.cn: 她激动的浑身身子一颤，急忙更加卖力的推肚子，同时，嘴中鼓励道。

0018.en: "Mother, push a little harder! I can see the head! Just a little more and the baby will be out!"
0018.speaker: 安娜
0018.cn: “母亲，再用点力，看到头了，再用点力就快生出来了！”

0018.en: Suddenly, the room became even more tense. There were three people in total. One was giving birth, but the other two were also at their breaking point, their breathing unconsciously syncing with the pregnant woman's, as if they were the ones giving birth.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 霎时间，整个屋内陷入到了一种更加紧张的情况，屋内总共三个人，一位正在生产，可剩下的两位精神却也崩到了极致，呼吸都不自觉的跟着孕妇同频，是那个生孩子的人是自己一样。

0018.en: Time passed, second by second. Outside, a river of purple blood was seeping under the door.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 时间就这样一分一秒的过去了，屋外正不断的有积流成河的紫色血液顺着门缝渗入屋内。

0018.en: Serenia had nearly gone berserk. In less than half an hour, her Ice Saintess sword had taken the heads of several hundred demons, and the number of demons she had killed with chantless magic was countless!
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅几乎已经杀疯了，她手中那柄冰之圣剑在这不到半个小时的时间中，已经砍下了数百之众的魔族首级，而被她无吟唱魔法轰杀的魔族，更是数不胜数！

0018.en: If Selen An had seen this, he would have been amazed. As expected of the Ice Saintess who symbolized judgment. She killed demons as if she were in a video game, cutting them down effortlessly, moving through the enemy ranks as if no one was there.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 如果塞伦安看到这一幕，恐怕高低也得惊叹一声，不愧是象征审判的冰之圣女，杀魔族简直跟开了无双一样，单人在阵中疯狂收割，如入无人之境。

0018.en: Normally, even a large group of demons like this wouldn't be able to defeat Serenia. But now, she had three people to protect behind her.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 若放在平时，就算有这么一大堆魔族追杀瑟蕾妮娅，估计也奈何不了她，但现在她的身后还有三位要保护的人。

0018.en: As long as she was still human and had people to worry about and protect, no matter how unstoppable she was on the battlefield, there would come a moment when she would run out of energy and be defeated. It was only a matter of time.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 只要还没有超脱人的范畴，有了顾忌和拖累，战场上再怎么无人可挡的她也必将有被耗死力竭的那一刻！崩盘只是时间问题。

0018.en: However, this stalemate was suddenly broken.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 然而，这样的僵持终于在某个时刻，突然被打破。

0018.en: When the baby took its first breath of air and let out its first sound, the cry of a newborn, like a clap of thunder, shattered the brief standoff.
0018.speaker: 旁白
0018.cn: 当婴儿呼吸到第一口空气，发出第一道声音，新生的哭声宛若雷鸣般，破了这短暂的僵持。

0019.en: Chapter 19: A Mysterious Voice
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 第19章 重置19 莫名的声音

0019.en: An ice-blue barrier split the world in two.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 冰蓝色的结界，将世界一分为二。

0019.en: Inside the barrier, a new life born into this world let out its first cry. The baby's wailing pierced through the barrier's soundproofing, playing the symphony of birth.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 结界内，有降生于这世界的新生命发出了第一声啼哭，婴儿的嚎啕大哭直接穿透了结界的隔音，吹响名为诞生的乐章。

0019.en: Outside the barrier, rain and frost played a dirge. Rainwater and blood splattered and mixed. With the night sky as her canvas and blood as her paint, the young woman used her sword to paint a scene of slaughter and death upon this vision of hell on earth.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 结界外，雨幕与冰霜齐奏哀歌，天水与血液飞溅交融，以夜幕为画布，以血液为染料，少女用手中的剑将杀戮与死亡点缀在这幅人间地狱图上。

0019.en: The pregnant woman lay on the bed. Anna was so exhausted from assisting with the birth that her body went limp. The first person to hold the child was surprisingly Selen An, who had no blood relation to them.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 孕妇躺在床上，安娜因为刚刚的按压与助产此刻已经累的浑身发软，第一个接下这孩子的竟是与他毫无血缘关系的塞伦安。

0019.en: In this setting, the newborn's cries were piercingly sharp. Holding the infant, Selen An felt like he was holding a red-hot iron, and he had the urge to throw it.
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 新生儿的啼哭声在这种环境下只显得的异常的尖锐且刺耳，环抱着婴儿的塞伦安只觉得自己像是抱着一块通红的烙铁，竟想将其扔出去。

0019.en: But he stopped himself from having such a dangerous thought. He had just risked everything to help the woman on the bed give birth to this child. Tossing it away now would mean denying all his previous efforts, wouldn't it?
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 但他还是止住了这种危险的想法，刚刚他拼了命的才帮助床上的这位妇人生下怀中的孩子，如今，要将其丢出去，不是否认了自己之前的所有行为吗？

0019.en: He didn't know where the sudden strength that pushed him to act so out of character had come from. But since the child was born with his help, his basic human conscience wouldn't let him abandon this new life.
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 虽然他也不知道之前体内为什么突然涌出了那么股力量，推动着他去做了那些他本不会做的事，既然这个孩子是在他的帮助下成功降生的，身为正常人的良知，也绝不会允许他将此新生命抛弃。

0019.en: He quickly grabbed the ice shears nearby, cut the umbilical cord, and casually wrapped the baby in a torn piece of cloth. He handed the bundle to Anna, who had gotten to her feet, and finally let out a sigh of relief.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他飞速的抄起一旁的冰剪，剪断脐带，就随意的扯了一块破布，将一中的婴儿裹住，递交到了站起来的安娜怀中，这才松了口气。

0019.en: The swaddled infant was a premature boy, wrinkled and tiny like a little red monkey. Anna took her younger brother, but before she could get a good look, she felt a tug on her skirt.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 襁褓中的婴儿是个早产的男婴，浑身皱巴巴的，瘦小的像是一只红皮猴子，安娜接过自己的弟弟，还没来得及多看两眼，就觉好像有什么东西在扯动自己的裙角。

0019.en: The woman on the wooden bed had blood trickling from the corners of her mouth, her lips pale as paper. Even so, her incredibly weak eyes were fixed on her own flesh and blood, the baby her daughter was holding.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 躺在木床上的妇人，嘴角两边淌着血，唇色苍白如纸，可即使是这样，那双虚弱到极致的眸子，依旧直勾勾的看着自己女儿怀中那从自己肚里刚刚降生的骨肉。

0019.en: Perhaps there truly is a special connection between a mother and child that others can't see. As the woman tugged Anna's skirt, the baby in the bundle began to cry even louder.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 或许是母子之间的确存在着某种旁人看不见的特殊感应，妇人扯着安娜的裙角，襁褓中的婴儿哭的更大声了。

0019.en: "My child... my child..."
0019.speaker: 母亲
0019.cn: “孩子，我的孩子……”

0019.en: The woman's voice was heartbreakingly weak. Anna carefully placed her brother in their mother's arms. Looking at the baby, whose hands and feet were as small as an adult's thumb, the woman began to cry, though it wasn't clear if it was from guilt or pain.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 女人的声音虚弱到令人心疼，安娜将弟弟小心翼翼地送到了母亲的怀中，看着那襁褓中小手小脚只如成年人拇指大小的孩子，女人不知是自责还是心疼的落泪。

0019.en: "Help me... undress..."
0019.speaker: 母亲
0019.cn: “帮我……解衣服……”

0019.en: She must have had no strength left, as she spoke with frequent pauses.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 或许是实在没有力气了，她说话时都是断断续续的。

0019.en: The two in the room froze for a second before they understood. Selen An quickly turned his back, while Anna lifted her mother's blouse, trying to quiet the baby whether there was milk or not.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 屋内的二人先是一愣，随后齐齐反应过来，塞伦安急忙转身背对，安娜则是掀开母亲的衣衫，也不管有没有奶水，先暂时堵住婴儿的嘴再说。

0019.en: After a moment of rustling, the nerve-wracking screams finally stopped.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 一阵悉索声过后，让人头皮发麻的嚎哭声终于是停了。

0019.en: Just as Selen An thought it was over and was about to relax, the young woman's panicked cry from behind him made his nerves tense up all over again!
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 就当塞伦安以为此事已结，刚准备松一口气时，身后少女惊慌的呼唤声，再一次帮他绷紧了大脑中的那根弦！

0019.en: "Mother, wake up! The bleeding... it won't stop!"
0019.speaker: 安娜
0019.cn: “母亲，快醒醒！血……止不住了！”

0019.en: Her cry, laced with tears, made his heart stop. He spun around and rushed to the bedside, the smell of blood suddenly stronger. He looked down and saw a pool of blood on the floor. The dress of the woman who had just given birth was already stained red.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 那夹杂着哭腔的呼喊，让他顿时只觉心脏骤停，一个转身踏步来到床边，就觉得血腥味更加浓郁，低头一看，地面已积了一滩血迹，床上刚刚生产完女人的裙边已尽数被血迹染红。

0019.en: That's a lot of blood...
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 这出血量……

0019.en: Selen An understood the severity of the situation with just one glance.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 塞伦安只是瞟了一眼，就明白了事情的严重性。

0019.en: Postpartum hemorrhage?
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 产后大出血吗？

0019.en: Sweat soaked his back, making his clothes stick to his skin. They say when it rains, it pours. Today's disasters were coming one after another, pushing him to the brink...
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 汗水浸透了后背，连带着衣服粘腻紧贴着肌肤，都说福无双至，祸不单行，今天的祸事还真是一茬接着一茬，把人往死里逼呀……

0019.en: Postpartum hemorrhage is a leading cause of death for mothers even in the modern era with its advanced medical technology. If it's that dangerous now, what about in this world with no medical facilities?
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 产后大出血，这种症状即使放在医疗技术发达的现代也依旧是孕妇致死的主要原因之一，现在都如此，更何况毫无医疗条件的现在？

0019.en: In this situation, it's almost a certain death sentence.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 遇到这种情况，几乎就是十死无生了。

0019.en: Wait, the Nephalem continent might not have advanced medicine, but it has magic that defies science!
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 不对，涅法雷姆大陆虽然没有发达的医学技术，但是有不讲科学的魔法呀！

0019.en: The good news is that healing magic can ignore logic and cure illnesses directly. The bad news is that neither of the two people in the room knew any healing magic. As for the one outside, Serenia, who was fighting alone, probably wasn't skilled in it either...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 好消息是治愈魔法可以不讲道理的，直接治愈病痛，坏消息是屋内的两个人都不会治愈魔法，至于屋外，还在一人奋力厮杀的瑟蕾妮娅，大概率也不擅长……

0019.en: And even if she was, she wouldn't have the chance to use it. Facing an endless army of demons, Serenia was already using all her strength just to hold them back.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 而就算擅长也没有机会，面对数不清的魔族军，瑟蕾妮娅光拖住一支部队就已经耗尽全力了。

0019.en: There's nothing to be done. He had already done his best. Helping her deliver the baby was already more than he should have been able to do. Asking a normal person who never studied medicine and can't use magic to save a woman suffering from massive postpartum bleeding was just impossible.
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 没办法了，自己已经尽力了，帮助她抱住她肚子里的孩子都算是超常发挥了，让他一个没学过医还不会魔法的普通人去拯救一位正在产后大出血的孕妇简直是天方夜谭。

0019.en: He really couldn't do it...
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 这真的做不到……

0019.en: A sense of powerlessness washed over him again. He didn't understand why. He had already done everything he could, even more than expected. But seeing the unconscious woman on the bed, the grieving, desperate girl beside her, and the baby, who was crying like a kitten now that he wasn't being fed...
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 无力感再次袭上全身，他不知为什么，明明自己已经尽力了，把力所能及的全做了，甚至超常发挥了，可看到那床上阴湿邪已失去意识的女人，趴在床上悲痛绝望的少女，以及并没有喝到奶水，失去安抚，发出如猫般哭声的婴儿……

0019.en: Why did his heart ache with such sharp pangs?
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 他的心脏为什么会一抽一抽的疼呢？

0019.en: He knew he wasn't a great humanitarian. He had normal sympathy for others, but in a situation where his own life was at risk, he would always prioritize his own safety. As for any lingering influence from this body's original owner?
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 他清楚，自己并不是这种拥有大爱的人，他有正常人的同情心，但在面对这种自身难保的情况下，也往往会以自身生命安全为第一，至于这具身体原主残留的影响？

0019.en: That was even more absurd. The real villain, Selen An, would have abandoned this mother and daughter and fled for his life long ago.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 那就更是天方夜谭了，真正的恶役男配塞伦安碰到这种状况，恐怕早就丢下这母女俩，独自逃命去了。

0019.en: So why? This guilt that wasn't his, that reckless rescue he shouldn't have attempted, and now... the restless, aching heart in his chest.
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 所以是为什么呢？那些不属于自己的愧疚感，刚刚那场自己本不会逞强的救援，以及现在……胸膛中那颗难以平静，隐隐作痛的心脏。

0019.en: What was happening to him? Why was he becoming so unlike himself?
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 自己这是怎么了？为什么会变得这么不像自己呢？

0019.en: He put a hand to his forehead, feeling dizzy. At the same time, besides the young woman's sobs and the infant's cries, he heard something else...
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 他伸手扶住自己的额头，大脑有些眩晕，与此同时，耳边听到的不仅有少女的呜咽和婴孩的嚎哭，他还听到了一些其他的东西……
