0019.en: "Save them... Use your hands to drive away death and sickness... No living being can take another's life without reason... If they do, then use your hands, your voice, your blood, to stop it... This is your promise, your mission..."
0019.speaker: 陌生女1
0019.cn: “去拯救他们……用你的双手祛除死亡与病痛……没有任何生灵能够毫无理由的夺取他人的生命……如果有，就请用你的双手，用你的声，用你的血，去阻止……这是你的承诺，你的使命……”

0019.en: That ethereal female voice, like a phantom yet incredibly gentle, seemed to echo directly in his mind. The voice was like an invisible, delicate hand, caressing his face like a mother, whispering softly in his ear.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 那仿若幻音却温柔到极致的空灵女声，更像是直接在脑海中响起，那声音像是一双无形的素手，如母亲般轻抚着他的脸庞，紧贴着他的耳边，柔声劝慰。

0019.en: In a daze, he thought he saw the source of the voice. It drifted before his eyes like smoke, then suddenly turned back, illusory as water. He subconsciously reached out to touch it, but just as he was about to make contact, the vision shattered. His outstretched hand felt something cold and hard in his palm. He looked closely—
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 恍惚间，他好似看清了那声音的来源，那从自己眼前如云雾袅袅，蓦然回首，如水似幻，他下意识的伸手要去触摸，可在即将碰到的那一刻，幻境破碎，而伸出去的那只手掌，心中冰冰凉凉的，定睛一看——

0019.en: Somehow, he was holding the ice shears Serenia had left behind. The unfamiliar woman's voice still echoed faintly in his ears.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他不知何时将瑟蕾妮娅留下的冰剪攥在了手中，陌生的女声余音依旧在耳畔依稀回荡。

0019.en: "With your hands, your voice, your blood..."
0019.speaker: 陌生女1
0019.cn: “用你的双手，你的声，你的血……”

0019.en: Selen An stared blankly at his palm, then at the dying woman on the bed. Unseen by him, a faint blue light flashed and vanished in the depths of his dark brown eyes.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 塞伦安愣愣地看着自己的掌心，又看向那床榻上倚危在旦夕的女人，在他自己都察觉不到的地方，深褐色的眼眸底一抹若隐若现的蓝光，闪烁即灭。

0019.en: His voice trembled slightly. He wasn't hesitating or struggling, but rather, he was afraid. Afraid of the voice and power that seemed to override his own will and influence this body.
0019.speaker: 塞伦安
0019.cn: 他的声音中带着一丝丝颤抖，他并不是在纠结和挣扎，而是在畏惧，畏惧那仿佛能够超过自身意志，影响这具身体的力量和声音。

0019.en: He was afraid of no longer being himself. The crying continued...
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 他在害怕自己变得不像是自己了，哭声仍旧持续……

0019.en: Until the dull sound of a sharp object piercing flesh was followed by the faint, sweet smell of blood trickling from between his fingers.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 直到一声沉闷的锐器入体声，带出那淡淡的……香甜的血腥，从他的指缝间滑落。

0020.en: Chapter 20: Holy Blood
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 第20章 重置20 圣血

0020.en: When the sharp point of the scissors pierced his palm, cutting the soft skin, a dark red liquid with a faintly sweet smell slid from his fingers and dripped onto the ground.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 当剪刀的锋利刺入掌心，划开柔软的皮肤，殷红中甚至带着点淡淡甘甜气味的液体从指间滑落，流淌滴落在地面。

0020.en: The pain was like a needle pricking his nerves. The color red was like the brightest paint, splashing the most eye-catching color onto the black-and-white scroll of the young man's vision.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 疼痛像是一根针，扎入了人体的神经，红色更如这世间最鲜明的颜料，在青年眼中的黑白画卷内泼洒最显眼的色彩。

0020.en: Pain, blood, dark red... When these real words pulled him back to reality, Selen An realized he had escaped the influence of that mysterious voice.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 疼痛，鲜血，殷红……当这些最真实的词汇将他拉回了现实，塞伦安也发现，自己已经脱离了那道神秘之音的影响。

0020.en: Her voice had disappeared, but the crying continued.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她的声音消失了，但哭声还在继续。

0020.en: Looking at the warm liquid flowing from his palm, Selen An's chest heaved a few times. He clenched his teeth, made up his mind, and in a few large strides, returned to the bedside. Ignoring whether Anna had noticed him, he pried open the woman's jaw and held his throbbing wound to her lips.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 看着自己掌心中流淌而出的温热液体，塞伦安的胸口剧烈起伏了几下，一咬牙，下定了决心，几个大跨步，又来到了床榻旁，不管安娜有没有注意到自己，掰开女人的下颌，将剧烈作痛的伤口对准了她的唇口。

0020.en: "You, what are you doing?!"
0020.speaker: 安娜
0020.cn: “你，你在干什么？！”

0020.en: Anna didn't know the truth. She only saw Selen An suddenly rush over, pry open her mother's mouth, and feed his blood to her.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 安娜不知道实情，只看见塞伦安突然冲了上来掰开自己母亲的嘴，将自己的血给她的母亲喂下。

0020.en: Feeding someone blood was already an unbelievable act, especially when her mother's life was in danger. Anna couldn't help but think the worst. The young girl stepped forward to stop him but was pushed back by the young man's other hand.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 喂人喝血本就是匪夷所思之事，更何况是母亲危在旦夕之际，这容不得安娜不去多想，少女上前想要阻止，却被青年的另一只手给挥退。

0020.en: "Be quiet! If you don't want to lose a family member tonight, please calm down... and give me some time..."
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: “安静！如果你不想在，今晚就失去一位亲人的话，请冷静些……也给我一点时间……”

0020.en: Selen An's attitude was unusually firm, but his voice trembled as he spoke. He wasn't sure if what the voice had said was true.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 塞伦安这态度异常强硬，可说话的话语中明显带着颤音，他也不确定那道声音所说的到底是不是真的。

0020.en: Or maybe, in this life-or-death moment, the pressure had been too great, and he had lost his mind, doing something so foolish like a madman. But what if?
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 亦或者自己只是在这生死存亡之际，压力过大，精神失常，如疯人般做出了此等不可理喻的蠢事，可万一呢？

0020.en: "Just give me a little time. Let me try. Even if things get worse, can they be any worse than they are now?"
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: “给我一点时间，让我尝试一下，就算情况再坏，还能比现在还坏吗？”

0020.en: He muttered to himself while enduring the sharp pain in his palm.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 他一边强忍着掌心的剧痛，一边自语着。

0020.en: It was unclear if he was explaining to Anna beside him or talking to himself. But the fact was, Anna really did quiet down. She hugged her swaddled younger brother tightly, her eyes, red from crying, fixed on the situation on the bed.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 这话不知是解释给旁边的安娜听，还是说给她自己听，可事实是，安娜真的安静了下来，紧紧的抱着襁褓中的弟弟，一双哭得有些通红的眼睛，死死地注视着床榻的情况。

0020.en: Perhaps even she couldn't believe it. Always rational and realistic, she had actually believed such a ridiculous claim in this situation. But the young man was right about one thing: could things get any worse than they already were?
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 或许连她自己也不相信，一向理智现实的她竟也在这种情况相信了如此荒唐的说辞，但青年有一句话说的没错，情况再坏，还能比现在还坏吗？

0020.en: Time passed, second by second. Selen An could clearly feel the blood from his wound flowing into the woman's mouth, carrying his body heat with it, being absorbed little by little.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 时间一分一秒的过去，塞伦安能够清晰的感知到血液自伤口流入女人的口中，连带着他的体温，一点一点的被吸收。

0020.en: She's drunk so much already, shouldn't there be some reaction?
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: 都喝了这么多了，该有点反应了吧？

0020.en: The young man's lips trembled uncontrollably. When the blood on the wound dried up, he ruthlessly used the scissors to cut it open again, just to save this family that had fallen into this state because of him.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 青年的唇齿都有些不自觉的颤抖了，中途伤口血液干涸，他甚至狠心的用剪刀将伤口重新划开，只为了拯救这个因他而沦落至此的家庭。

0020.en: He might not be the original Selen An, but Selen An was indeed a sinner. Occupying this body, he couldn't truly be a passerby and do nothing.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 他或许不是赛伦安，但塞伦安的确是罪人，占用着这具身体，他没办法真正做一个过客，完全的袖手旁观。

0020.en: Just as Selen An was swaying, unable to hold on and about to give up, Anna, who had been watching her mother's condition from the bedside, suddenly shouted excitedly.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 就当这书写书的塞伦安，自己都快摇摇晃晃，支撑不住，准备放弃，依偎在床边，一直观察自己母亲伤势的安娜，突然激动的大喊。

0020.en: "It's working, Mr. Selen An, it's working!"
0020.speaker: 安娜
0020.cn: “有效果，塞伦安先生，有效果！”

0020.en: Seeing the girl's delighted expression, the taut string in Selen An's mind finally relaxed. He lost his footing and stumbled against the corner of the bed, panting heavily.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 看到少女惊喜的神色，塞伦安大脑中那根紧绷的弦像是终于松弛了下去，整个人一个没站稳跌靠在了床榻的角落旁，气喘吁吁。

0020.en: With Selen An's continuous blood transfusion, the woman's complexion finally improved. Her pale lips and cheeks regained some color, her rapidly dropping body temperature began to warm up, and the bleeding from her lower body stopped. The hemorrhage seemed to have been staunched.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 女人的脸色在塞伦安源源不断的输血下，终于有了好转，苍白的嘴唇和脸颊有了血色，原本剧烈失温的体温也有了隐隐的回温，下身已不再流血，大出血像是被止住了。

0020.en: After a careful observation, Anna was finally convinced that her mother was out of danger. Just as she cast a grateful look at the young man in the corner, the sounds of fighting from outside exploded in the room like a clap of thunder!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 安娜那好一番仔细的观察，总算是相信自己的母亲已经脱离了危险，她刚向角落里的青年投去感激的目光，外面的厮杀声却如一道惊天之雷，突兀的在屋内炸响！

0020.en: The sounds of battle, the storm, and the danger, once held back by a barrier, seemed to lose control and flooded into the small, dark wooden house. Selen An, who hadn't even caught his breath, felt his limbs turn to ice, and the grateful joy on the girl's face froze...
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 那被结界抵御在外的厮杀声，暴雨和危险，仿佛失去了控制一下子涌入了这阴暗狭窄的木屋内，还没缓过气的塞伦安瞬间感觉手脚冰凉，少女脸上感激的欣喜也随之僵硬……

0020.en: The chill of death, mixed with the damp, bloody air, filled everyone's lungs.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 死亡的阴冷，随着空气中夹杂的湿润与血腥涌入每一个人的胸腔。

0020.en: The old wooden door was practically smashed open. Wind and rain poured into the house, along with a slender figure who desperately held the loose door shut until ice sealed the gap, stopping the wind and rain from pouring in...
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 破旧的木门几乎是被直接撞开，风与水灌入屋内，连带着一道纤弱的人影，死死将松垮的木门抵住，直到冰雪封住了缺口，风和雨水不再灌入……

0020.en: Selen An looked at the figure in astonishment. Hours of fighting had made her seem like a completely different person. Her ice-blue saintess robe was no longer clean and holy, but stained with blood and mud. She looked as if she had walked out of a mountain of corpses, the smell of blood on her so strong it could make one faint.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 塞伦安诧异的望向那道人影，近数个小时的厮杀，让她像完全变了一个人似的，身上的冰蓝圣女袍不再白净圣洁，而是沾满了血污与泥泞，他整个人也仿佛从尸山血海中走出一样，身上的血腥味浓郁的简直要让人晕厥过去。

0020.en: Leaning against the wall with her sword, her chest rose and fell rapidly. Her breath came out as visible white frost. Her ice sword was covered in flesh and gore, and deep purple blood dripped from the sharp blade, forming a small puddle on the ground.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她杵着剑背靠墙壁，胸脯急速起伏，口中呼出凝为实质的白霜，冰剑上沾满了血肉与残骸，深紫色的血液从锋利的剑刃滑落在地面蓄积起了浅浅一滩。

0020.en: "Sorry... I couldn't completely drive the enemies away."
0020.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0020.cn: “抱歉……没能彻底驱散敌人。”

0020.en: Serenia's words were filled with a clear apology.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅的话语中带着明显的歉意。

0020.en: The Saintess looked at the two people in the room and lowered her head in shame.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 圣女望向屋内的二人，羞愧的低下了头。

0020.en: Selen An was dumbfounded. Good heavens... You wanted to fight the entire demon army by yourself and push them back?
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 塞伦安都傻了，布施，各门……你还想一个人打魔族军队，反推回去？

0020.en: "Your Highness Serenia, your wounds..."
0020.speaker: 安娜
0020.cn: “瑟蕾妮娅殿下，您身上的伤……”

0020.en: Her mother was out of danger and her brother was born safely. Seeing the Saintess who was almost completely covered in blood, Anna began to worry again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 母亲脱离了危险，弟弟平安降世，安娜看到几乎被献鲜血染红的圣女，再次担忧起来。

0020.en: "I'm fine... I had to force the barrier open once, and the demons heard the newborn's cries, which attracted a demon general. This place won't hold for long..."
0020.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0020.cn: “我没事……结界被我强行打开了一次，再加上魔族听到了新生儿的哭声，引来了魔将，这里撑不了太久了……”

0020.en: "You two..."
0020.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅

0020.en: Serenia looked up and saw the young man, who had moved to her side at some point. Having just lost a lot of blood, his face was still pale. He raised his hand toward her, revealing the still-unhealed wound.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅抬起头，却看到了不知何时挪到自己身旁的青年，青年刚刚失去了大量新鲜血液，面色还有些苍白，他朝向自己抬起手掌，露出还未愈合的伤口。

0020.en: He swayed on his feet, forcing a smile that was uglier than crying.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 他的身形摇摇晃晃的，脸上挤出比哭还难看的笑容。

0020.en: "Want some?"
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: “要不，来点？”

0020.en: Serenia was stunned. She looked at the bitter, helpless smile on the young man's face and, for a moment, was lost in a daze.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅愣住了，她看向青年脸上苦涩无奈的笑容，一时间，竟失了神。

0020.en: She had seen such a clean and gentle smile before, on the same person...
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 这样干净温和的笑容她曾见过，在同一个人身上……

0020.en: Selen An didn't know what was on Serenia's mind. He only knew that after seeing it was Serenia who broke through the door, his heart, which had been trembling with fear of death, became incredibly calm.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 塞伦安不清楚瑟蕾妮娅的心境，他只知道，在看见破门而入的人是瑟蕾妮娅后，那颗因死亡而恐惧颤抖的心竟变得无比平静。

0020.en: It was as if... as if he and Serenia had faced this kind of desperate situation many times before. There was no need to be afraid, because Serenia was here.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 就好像……好像他和瑟蕾妮娅两人面对这样的绝境已经很多次了，没必要害怕和恐惧，因为瑟蕾妮娅在这儿。

0020.en: Serenia frowned when she saw the wound on Selen An's palm.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅看到塞伦安掌心的伤口，不禁皱眉。

0020.en: "Don't worry, I didn't do anything bad. I just had a sudden idea to save that lady and tried something. I found out..."
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: “不必担心，我没做什么不好的事，只是刚刚为了救那位夫人突发奇想做了一些尝试，我发现……”

0020.en: "My blood seems to have a special healing effect. So, would you like to try it?"
0020.speaker: 塞伦安
0020.cn: “我的血在治愈疗伤方面似乎有特殊的奇效，所以，你需要尝试一下吗？”

0020.en: He offered his blood to the young woman, waiting for her response.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 他将血送到了少女的面前，等待她的回应。

0021.en: Chapter 21: Reset 21 - Divine Art
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 第21章 重置21 神术

0021.en: Serenia didn't know why the young man before her had become like this, just as she hadn't known back then why that gentle older brother figure had turned into someone everyone despised.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅不知道眼前的青年为什么会变成这副模样，正如她当年也不知道那个温柔的哥哥为什么会变成人人唾弃的对象。

0021.en: The disheveled young man reached out to her, just like the first time they met, when he stood in the sunlight and extended a hand to her, who was huddled in a corner.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 狼狈的青年朝他伸出手，仿若他们的第一次相见，站在阳光里的他朝着蜷缩在角落里的自己第一次伸出手。

0021.en: They should have been inseparable childhood friends, a tight bond connecting the two great Saintess families. But all of that, along with their childhood and their growing distance, was now just a memory of the past.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他们本应该是一对亲密无间的青梅竹马，是连接两大圣女家族之间的紧密纽带，可这一切都伴随着童年的逝去和二人渐行渐远的步伐，留在了属于过去的记忆之中。

0021.en: Now, the unacknowledged girl had become a revered Saintess, while the noble-born boy had fallen into a despised profligate.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 如今，不被人认可的少女成了人人敬仰的圣女，身份尊贵的少年却沦落成了万人唾弃的纨绔子弟。

0021.en: Time and fate seemed to have played a joke on them, swapping their roles and severing the sincere friendship they had built as children.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 时间和命运似乎对他们开了个玩笑，让彼此双方的身份互换，从而断绝了这份孩童时期建立起来的真挚情谊。

0021.en: But now, it seemed...
0021.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0021.cn: 但现在看来，似乎……

0021.en: "There's no need."
0021.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0021.cn: “不必了。”

0021.en: Serenia lowered her head, rejecting his kind gesture.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅低下了头，回绝了这份好意。

0021.en: Selen An retracted his hand, showing no embarrassment at the rejection. As a villainous side character, he had to be self-aware. Isn't it perfectly normal to be rejected by the game's main heroine?
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 塞伦安收回了手，脸上倒也没什么被拒绝的尴尬，身为炮灰恶意男配就要有炮灰恶意男配的自觉，被游戏里的核心女主拒绝不是再正常不过的事吗？

0021.en: As a modern man who considered himself clear-headed, he had always thought his greatest strength was self-awareness.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 作为一个自认为清醒的现代人，他一直认为自身最大的优点就是有自知之明。

0021.en: Even if he avoided the bad ending of the original plot and returned to the main storyline, a chosen one like Serenia was not someone he could desire.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 就算规避了原剧情中的坏结局，回归了正规剧情主线，瑟蕾妮娅这样的天命之女也不是他能够觊觎的。

0021.en: Besides, now was not the time to worry about romance. His life was on the line. The bold decision he just made felt like an unconscious action from his body...
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 而且，现在也不是在意这种情情爱爱的时候，命都快马上没了，刚刚做出那种堪称大胆的决定，就好像身体的下意识而为……

0021.en: As expected, even though that mysterious voice was gone, its influence on this body and on himself continued.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 果然，那个神秘的声音，就算是消失了，对这具身体对自己的影响也还在持续。

0021.en: But what was the point of all this?
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 可这又到底有什么意义呢？

0021.en: Making him unconsciously grow close to Serenia, even develop feelings for her... their game identities made their positions naturally opposed. A holy Saintess would never associate with a worthless, profligate scion. Likewise, the chances of a villainous side character being redeemed in this kind of game were close to zero.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 让自己不知不觉中亲近，甚至对瑟蕾妮娅产生感情，游戏身份上的设定就导致了二人的立场是天生对立的，圣洁的圣女必然不会与不学无术的纨绔恶少同流合污，同样，恶役男配在这类游戏中的洗白概率无限接近于零。

0021.en: What's more, in a situation where everyone's life was in danger, even if they miraculously developed feelings for each other and he cleared his name, the huge gap in their combat power wouldn't change.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 更何况是在这种众人危在旦夕的情况下，就算彼此双方离了大谱，产生了感情，洗白身份，但战斗力之间的悬殊不会改变。

0021.en: Come on, this wasn't some magical girl anime where combat strength is based on willpower. Shouting about bonds and friendship while charging into the demon army would only get you instantly crushed.
0021.speaker: 塞伦安
0021.cn: 拜托，这又不是隔壁魔法少女的片场，战力全靠唯心，高喊着羁绊和友谊冲进魔族军队中，只会被瞬间腐乳。

0021.en: The wooden hut creaked and swayed unsettlingly. The faltering barrier outside was about to break under the demons' charge. Anna's mother, having just given birth, was severely weakened and had only just been saved from death by Selen An's blood transfusion. Serenia had retreated back into the hut, her aura clearly much weaker. The only one in the room in relatively good condition was Anna.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 木屋晃动发出令人牙酸般的咯吱声，外围摇摇欲坠的结界即将在魔族的冲锋中破裂，安娜母亲刚刚生完孩子，元气大伤，好不容易被塞伦安输血从鬼门关捞回来，瑟蕾妮娅败退回屋，周身气息明显弱了许多，满屋子里唯一状态还算好的只有安娜。

0021.en: The silence inside the hut was terrifying. The only sounds that could be heard were the creaking of the wood and the gasps for breath.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 木屋内寂静的可怕，耳边能捕捉到的声音只剩下木屋的摇晃声和喘息声。

0021.en: "Anna..."
0021.speaker: 安娜母亲

0021.en: The woman on the bed had woken up at some point and called out weakly.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 床榻上的女人不知何时醒来，虚弱的喊道。

0021.en: Anna rushed to the bedside, her eyes filled with heartache and sorrow as she looked at her mother, who was struggling even to open her eyes.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 安娜急忙凑到床旁，看着连睁眼都费劲的母亲，满眼的心疼与悲伤。

0021.en: The woman was withered and thin, her rough, branch-like hand gently caressed the girl's face. She then looked down at the swaddled baby, and a spark of determination lit up her gentle eyes.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 女人身处枯瘦，粗糙如老，树枝的手轻轻抚摸着少女的脸庞，又低头看了眼襁褓中的婴儿，那温柔的眼睛中迸发出了一丝坚定。

0021.en: "Your Holiness, the Saintess..."
0021.speaker: 安娜母亲
0021.cn: “圣女殿下……”

0021.en: She mustered her remaining strength to turn and look at the silver-haired girl guarding the door.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她拼尽为数不多的力量，扭头看一下守在门旁的银发少女。

0021.en: "Madam, I am here."
0021.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0021.cn: “夫人，我在。”

0021.en: Serenia also came to the bedside and knelt down.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅也来到床榻旁，半蹲下身。

0021.en: "Your Holiness, I know of your kindness and I believe in your faith, but this time, I beg you to listen to the words of an ignorant woman. Think of it as a mother's humblest request..."
0021.speaker: 安娜母亲
0021.cn: “圣女殿下，我知晓您的仁慈，也相信您的信仰，但这一次，我请求您倾听一下我这无知妇人之言，就当是一位母亲最卑微的请求……”

0021.en: The fierce storm was like a thousand steel blades chopping at the ice-blue, hemispherical barrier, creating dense, overlapping ripples. Fireballs engulfed in steam exploded against it, adding yet another crack to the already fractured shield.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 疾风骤雨如千万把钢刀劈斩在冰蓝色的半球形光幕上，建起密密麻麻，连续不断交叠的涟漪，火球卷席着蒸汽在光幕上炸开，为光幕上本就密集的裂缝更添一条。

0021.en: Amidst the black tide of the army, a tower-like figure on a tall demonic steed watched the small "fortress" swaying in the wind and rain. Encased in black heavy armor, only a pair of crimson eyes, like burning hellfire, were exposed, exceptionally conspicuous in the night.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 黑潮大军之中，一位骑在高大魔驹身上如铁塔般的身影注视着那在风雨中摇摇欲坠的小型“堡垒”，被包裹在漆黑重铠的全身唯有一双仿佛点燃的地狱之火的猩红之瞳裸露在外，于黑夜中异常显眼。

0021.en: "General Kegesa..."
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: “克格萨将军……”

0021.en: Before him, on a patch of ground intentionally left empty by the demon soldiers, a succubus in a revealing leather skirt was prostrated on the ground, trembling. Compared to the heavily armored general on his tall steed, the succubus, who usually slaughtered commoners like chickens, was now a shivering ant.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 在他的面前，魔族士兵有意空出的一块空地上，一位衣着暴露皮裙的魅魔正跪伏在地上瑟瑟发抖，与其在高头大马上的重铠将军相比，平日里虐杀平民似杀鸡仔般的魅魔也成了瑟瑟发抖的蝼蚁。

0021.en: "Useless."
0021.speaker: 克格萨
0021.cn: “废物。”

0021.en: In the downpour, the demon general's voice, though hoarse, boomed like thunder in the succubus's ear, making the already trembling purple-skinned succubus shake like a leaf.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 暴雨中，魔将的声音沙哑却如雷鸣般在魅魔的耳边炸响，让原本就瑟瑟发抖的紫皮魅魔身体抖的更是如筛糠一般。

0021.en: "Give me another chance, General Kegesa, just one more chance!"
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: “再给我一次机会，克格萨将军，再给我一次机会！”

0021.en: Mara resisted the mountain-like pressure and with great difficulty, raised her head to beg.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 玛拉顶住那如同山岳一般的威压，艰难的抬起头哀求道。

0021.en: "This time, this time, I will definitely not let that bastard go! I won't give him another chance. I will make him fall into the most despised form in humanity through pain and humiliation!"
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: “这一次，这一次，我绝对不会放过那个贱人！我不会再给他半点机会了，不会让他在痛苦和屈辱中彻底堕落成人类最唾弃的样子！”

0021.en: Mara's voice was filled with deep resentment and venom.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 玛拉的声音中蕴含着深刻的愤恨与怨毒。

0021.en: If Serenia hadn't arrived in time, she would have almost succeeded. If she had, she wouldn't be kneeling so humiliatingly before General Kegesa now, but sitting in a high position, toying with the tip of her foot on a succubus Selen An who wished he was dead.
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: 要不是瑟蕾妮娅及时赶到，她几乎就已经得手了，如果得手，现在自己也不会如此屈辱的跪在克格萨将军的面前，而是坐在高位上，用脚尖去调弄生不如死的魅魔塞伦安。

0021.en: Just a little bit more!
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: 就差了一点点！

0021.en: And now I'm being scolded by General Kegesa! It's all those two bastards' fault!
0021.speaker: 玛拉
0021.cn: 导致自己被克格萨将军责骂！全都是那两个贱人的错！

0021.en: Her sharp, resentful nails dug so hard into her palms that purple demon blood mixed with the muddy water.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她怨恨的尖锐的指甲都用力的嵌入手掌血肉之中，任由紫色的魔族血液混入泥水。

0021.en: "Do you think your lowly existence is worth another chance from me?"
0021.speaker: 克格萨
0021.cn: “你认为，你那卑微的价值足够我再给你一次机会吗？”

0021.en: Kegesa looked down at the succubus on the ground, his burning eyes seeming to want to incinerate the entire world.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 克格萨俯视着地上的魅魔，燃烧的双瞳像是要焚灭整个世界。

0021.en: The cold words made Mara feel as if all the blood in her body had frozen. This time, she didn't even dare to tremble. The stench of death approached. Just as Mara thought she would die here, the terrifying pressure vanished.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 冰冷的话语令玛拉感觉全身的血液仿佛都被冻结，这下子他要是连抖都不敢抖了，死亡的气息开始逼近，就当玛拉以为自己会死在这里之时，那种恐怖的压迫感却消失了。

0021.en: "For now, I'll consider your worthless body to still have some value. Remember what you just said, bring back that kid from the Winterlein family..."
0021.speaker: 克格萨
0021.cn: “姑且就当你这贱陋之躯，还有那些许价值，记住你刚刚说的话，把温特莱恩家的那小子带回来……”

0021.en: "Remember, I want him alive. I want to personally taste a descendant with divine blood flowing in their veins!"
0021.speaker: 克格萨
0021.cn: “记住要活的，我要亲自品尝体内流淌着神血后裔的滋味！”

0021.en: "Yes!"
0021.speaker: 玛拉

0021.en: As if she had just survived a disaster, Mara kowtowed forcefully, her forehead hitting the ground hard enough to leave a deep imprint.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 玛拉像是劫后余生般狠狠叩首，额头用力刀在地面砸出了一个不浅的凹印。

0021.en: At the same time, she converted this humiliation into a more turbulent rage against Selen An. The once kind nun had fallen into a demon of all evil. The kindness of humanity had vanished, leaving only the dregs of evil.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 同时，她心中将这份屈辱转化成对塞伦安更汹涌的怒火，曾经善良的修女已堕落成了万物之恶的魔族，人性的善良已消失殆尽，残留的只有名为恶的渣子。

0021.en: She swore to make Selen An pay the ultimate price, to return the humiliation she had suffered twofold, so that he would never be able to recover!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 势必要让塞伦安付出最大的代价，将自己承受的屈辱加倍奉还，让他永世不得翻身！

0021.en: She spread her fleshy wings and flew to the front of the formation.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她展开肉翅，飞向阵列最前方。

0021.en: Just then, the ice-blue barrier that had been holding back the demon army finally gave way and shattered completely!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 恰好此时，阻挡魔族军队步伐的冰蓝色结界终于不堪重负，彻底碎了！

0021.en: And at the same time, the door of the wooden hut opened. An ice-blue magic halo burst forth with a dazzling light that illuminated the darkness. The brilliance of the divine age tore through the clamor of wind and rain. Pale frost roared like a howling azure dragon, bringing a judgment of ice and cold!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 而与此同时，木屋的门被打开，照亮黑暗的冰蓝魔法光环绽放出夺目的光耀，神代的光华撕破了风和雨的嘈杂，苍白的冰霜呼啸如苍龙咆哮，带来冰寒的审判！

0021.en: [Divine Art - Ice Type - Pale Dragon's Glacial Roar]
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 【神术•冰系•苍白之龙的冰渊咆哮】

0022.en: Chapter 22: Reset 22 - Damn it, they're still chasing!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 第22章 重置22 tmd，还在追

0022.en: Rain fell from the sky, but froze into ice before touching the ground, dancing with the wind.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 雨自天而落，却在接触到地面之前凝结成冰，与风共舞。

0022.en: Before this, the storm and rain were their enemies, but now, the forces of nature, wrapped in an ice-blue magical glow, had become the sharpest sword in their hands!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 在这之前，暴风和雨是她们的敌人，而在这之后，被冰蓝色魔法光华裹挟的自然之力，却成了她们手中最锋利的利剑！

0022.en: Ice and snow set the main tone for this blizzard's song, and half the wasteland shook from the sudden, huge commotion as if it were the apocalypse.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 冰和雪成了这曲暴风雪之歌的主基调，半片荒原都因这突如其来的巨大动静宛若世界末日般震动。

0022.en: The temperature in the air dropped rapidly, and white frost began to cover the surface of every touchable object, not even sparing the hard, rough, black armor of the demon soldiers. Under the corrosion of the extreme cold, everything, whether living or not, became extremely fragile.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 空气中的温度开始急速下降，白霜开始爬满任何可触摸物质的表面，就连魔族士兵坚硬粗糙的漆黑角质层铠甲也不例外，在极寒低温的侵蚀下，一切无论是有生命的还是无生命的存在，其本身都变得极为脆弱。

0022.en: Many demon soldiers in the front were the first to be hit. Before they could react, they were covered in white frost. Then, caught in the inescapable blizzard, they were torn to pieces by the powerful storm like fragile sheets of paper.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 前排的大量魔族士兵最先被波及，来不及做出任何反应的他们先是被白霜覆盖，紧接着，在这场无法逃开的暴风雪覆盖下，似一张张脆弱的纸片，被强劲的风暴撕碎。

0022.en: In the dark wasteland, a sun of ice began to rise, accompanied by what sounded like a great dragon's roar.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 黑夜荒原，冰日初升，如有巨龙咆哮。

0022.en: Beneath the ice sun in the dark night, the pale frost and snow seemed to form the phantom of a holy ice dragon. Its mouth opened as if to swallow the icy sun, the source of the endless dragon's roar.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 而在那黑夜的冰日之下，苍白霜雪似是凝成冰之圣龙虚影，龙口张开，像是要将那轮冰日吞下，无尽龙之咆哮之音正是从此发出。

0022.en: This divine spell, a blow that struck the souls of everyone present, seemed to show the world the mighty power of the holy element. At the center of the light, the silver-haired Saintess was surrounded by countless divine halos. The radiance of the gods shone upon her as she condensed ice, blew frost, and drove the snow. The power that could make all things stand still was the breath of ice.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 这直击全场灵魂一击的神术，仿若向这世间诠释名神圣元素的伟力，光芒的正中心，银发的圣女全身被无数的神术光环笼罩，神代的光华在其身上演绎，她凝结了冰，吹起了霜，带动了雪，那能令万物陷入凝滞的力量乃是冰的气息。

0022.en: The wild dance of ice and snow was unleashed with the holy dragon's roar. As she raised her hands, the white snow falling from the sky flew upward instead!
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 冰雪的狂舞在圣龙的咆哮中肆意释放，从天而落的白雪，随着她双手上抬，逆空而起！

0022.en: For a moment, her figure no longer seemed human. Her blurred form revealed a pure divinity. It was as if an ice god danced, its flowing skirt kicking up a pale wave. The young woman's chanting was like a soaring song, like a movement in a sacred ritual.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 刹那间，她的身影不似人，模糊的身影显露出纯粹的神性，冰神舞动裙摆，掀起了苍白的浪潮，少女的吟唱声像高歌，又如祭礼的奏章。

0022.en: At the edge of the blizzard, the demon general Kegsa stared intently at the strange sight connecting heaven and earth, a rare look of gravity in his flame-like eyes.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 处于暴风雪边缘的魔将克格萨深沉的凝望着那能连接天与地的异象，如火焰摇曳般的双眸中罕见流淌着名为凝重的神色。

0022.en: After being worn down so much, he didn't expect the Saintess to still be able to unleash such power. The force of the divine spell far exceeded his predictions; otherwise, he wouldn't have let his army get so close to the barrier.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 经过了那么多轮的消耗，没想到那位圣女竟然还能掀起如此伟力，神术造成的威力远超出了他的预料，不然他也不会让大军靠结界那么近。

0022.en: But it was useless to say anything now. If the soldiers in the front were dead, they were dead. To be buried under the terrifying power of such a divine spell, the weak among his kin were destined to be nothing more than cannon fodder. And the deaths of his cannon fodder kin were not meaningless...
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 可现在说什么都没意义了，前排的那些士兵死了就死了吧，被葬送在此等神术的恐怖威力之下，没有实力的同族也只有沦为炮灰的命运，而炮灰同族的死亡并非没有意义……

0022.en: Divine spells are powerful not only because the caster can borrow a measure of a god's power, but also because the price for casting one is something no ordinary person can bear.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 神术之所以强大，不仅仅是因为施术者可以在一定程度上借用神之伟力，同样，释放神术的代价也绝非常人可以承担。

0022.en: Once the power of this divine spell fades, the Ice Saintess, having exhausted all her strength, will be a lamb for the slaughter.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 等这一波神术的威力过去，耗尽所有力量的冰之圣女也就成了待宰的羔羊。

0022.en: This was an unexpected gain. The original plan was just to take the Winterlein boy. I didn't expect the current Saintess from the Glacies family to be so foolishly cute, putting herself in danger for a blasphemous traitor.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 这是意料之外的收获，原计划是只需要带走温特莱恩家的小子便足够了，没想到格莱西斯家的当代剩女也傻的可爱，竟然为了这么一位亵渎信仰神明的背叛者而让自己陷入险境。

0022.en: With such a foolish choice, I certainly won't pass up a buy-one-get-one-free opportunity.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 如此愚蠢的选择，他自然不会放弃买一送一的机会。

0022.en: If I can capture two direct descendants of a Saintess at once, then my status in the Demon General's council will skyrocket. I might even be able to claim a spot in the top three.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 如果一下子能抓住两位圣女嫡系血脉者，那么，他克格萨在魔将会议的身份将直线上升，甚至有可能直接跻身前三的宝座。

0022.en: Thinking this, his single exposed, blood-red eye couldn't help but burn with greedy fire, as if he couldn't wait to grab the weak humans and enjoy defiling them.
0022.speaker: 克格萨
0022.cn: 如此想着，唯一裸露在外的血红之瞳不禁迸发出贪婪火热的情绪，好似已经迫不及待的要将孱弱的人类抓到手，肆意享受和凌辱。

0022.en: Serenia had created such a huge commotion that she had drawn nearly everyone's attention. But in a place no one was watching, two figures were running desperately through a clearing that the divine spell had made in the pale blizzard.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅全力弄出了如此大的动静，几乎将全场的目光都吸引到了她一人的身上，而在人没注意到的地方，苍白的暴风雪中，两道身影在神术清扫出的空地内拼命狂奔。

0022.en: The power of the ice, which could easily freeze and tear flesh, was nullified by an ice-blue barrier of light around them. On the back of the young man's hand, an ancient blue magic pattern glowed. It was the ice and snow "pass" that Serenia had left on him for his escape.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 能轻易将血肉冻烂撕碎的寒冰之力却在接近他们的瞬间，被其周身的冰蓝色光幕底下，青年的手背上泛着蓝色的古代魔法纹路，那是瑟蕾妮娅在其身上留下的用来逃跑时的冰雪“通行证”。

0022.en: All threats from the ice and snow vanished the moment they came into contact with them.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 一切来自冰雪的威胁在接触他们一刹那尽皆退散。

0022.en: But even so, the escape was incredibly difficult. Selen An was practically dragging Anna, who followed behind him. The young woman clutched a newborn in her thin coat, but her head was turned back. Warm tears streamed down her face as she ran, falling to the ground and freezing into ice.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 可即使是这样，这一趟逃跑的路也异常难走，塞伦安几乎是拖着身后的安娜逃跑，身后的少女用单薄的外套搂住怀中的新生儿，可她的头却一直朝着后方，少女温热的泪水在逃跑的路程中不断的滑落，滴落在地，凝结成冰。

0022.en: "Mother!"
0022.speaker: 安娜
0022.cn: “母亲！”

0022.en: She cried out in uncontrollable grief, watching the two figures behind her grow fainter and fainter.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 她望着身后那两道愈来愈模糊的身影，无法抑制的悲伤痛哭。

0022.en: When surrounded, the only way to survive was to break out. As the Saintess, Serenia was responsible for tearing open a gap, drawing attention, and covering the rear. Those who broke out needed to seize the opportunity and run for the designated location.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 在被包围的情况下，想要活下来的唯一选择就是突围，身为圣女的瑟蕾妮娅负责撕开缺口和吸引注意力，最后断后，而突围的人则需要抓住这个间隙，朝着预定的的方向一路狂奔。

0022.en: Among them, Anna's mother, who had just given birth, had trouble moving. Bringing her along would have greatly slowed the escape and increased the danger.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 这其中，刚刚生产完的安娜母亲腿脚不便，如果突围时将其带上，这会大大拖延突围队伍的速度，增加危险。

0022.en: The gentle mother, clearly aware of this, chose to stay behind, giving the hope of life to her two children.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 那位温柔的母亲显然是知道这一点，主动选择了留了下来，将生的希望留给了她的两个孩子。

0022.en: The wind carried the girl's cries to the young man's ears. Selen An was sweating with anxiety. In this life-or-death moment, his heart was beating so fast it felt like it would explode. With his brain flooded with blood, his senses were abnormally sharp.
0022.speaker: 塞伦安
0022.cn: 风夹杂着少女的哭泣声灌入青年的耳中，塞伦安急得满头是汗，这种事关生死的关键时刻，他的心脏快的好似要爆了一样，大脑在急速充血的状态下周边环境的感知异常的敏感。

0022.en: The divine spell's power was already weakening after its initial, ferocious phase. In the lingering blizzard, a demon with a familiar aura was braving the cold and snow, chasing right after him.
0022.speaker: 塞伦安
0022.cn: 神术的释放在经过了初期的最凶猛阶段，威力已经渐渐衰弱，而在那残留的暴风雪中，真有一个携带有熟悉气息的魔族顶着冰寒与风雪，朝着他所在的方向急速追来。

0022.en: Damn it, the demons are still chasing me!
0022.speaker: 塞伦安
0022.cn: TMD，魔族还在追我！

0022.en: Selen An was so angry he wanted to curse. Serenia's attack was like a miracle, a divine manifestation. Any normal creature would be terrified after seeing its power and the miserable state of their comrades. Even the emotionally detached demons should have hesitated, feeling their lives were threatened.
0022.speaker: 塞伦安
0022.cn: 塞伦安气的都想爆粗口了，瑟蕾妮娅的这一击都恍若神迹降世了，正常的生灵都应该在见识到神术的伟力和同伴的惨状后产生畏惧，即使是情感淡漠的魔族也会因为感受到生命的威胁而犹豫。

0022.en: But the one chasing him now seemed to feel no pain or fear, ignoring the threat of the ice and snow and rapidly closing in.
0022.speaker: 塞伦安
0022.cn: 可眼下正在追自己的这一只，是根本感受不到疼痛和害怕一般，无视冰雪带来的威胁，快速接近他们。

0022.en: In the blizzard, a purple-skinned Mara frantically beat her fleshy wings. The extreme cold felt like steel knives scraping her skin, making her expression ferocious with pain. At the same time, her resentment toward Selen An grew stronger.
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: 风雪中，一身紫皮的玛拉疯狂煽动自己身后的一对肉翅，极寒的风宛若钢刀般从她的肌肤上刮过，疼痛令她脸上的神情极为的狰狞，同时，心中对于塞伦安的怨恨成倍增长。

0022.en: She had personally planted the Succubus Seed in Selen An, so she was familiar with its aura. She had to catch him herself this time. If he escaped again, or if another demon soldier caught him, she would fail to prove her worth to the Demon General and would surely suffer an unspeakable punishment.
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: 塞伦安体内的魅魔之种是她亲手种下的，她自然熟悉那道气息，这一次必须亲手抓住塞伦安，如果再塞伦安逃掉，或让其他魔族士兵抓到，没能让魔将大人看到自身价值的她必然会遭受到难以言喻的惩罚。

0022.en: High-ranking demons had absolute power over lower-ranking ones. Remembering what Demon General Kegsa had said to her, Mara endured the searing pain of her skin being torn and desperately flew toward the aura.
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: 上位魔族对下位魔族有着绝对的压制，一想到之前魔将克格萨对她所说的话，玛拉强忍着肌肤被撕裂的剧痛，拼命的朝着气息的方向赶去。

0022.en: Finally, two dark figures running in the snow appeared in her vision.
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: 终于在她的视野中，出现了两道在雪地中狂奔的黑影。

0022.en: "Master Selen An, this time, I will not let you get away!"
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: “塞伦安少爷，这一次，我绝不会再放过你了！”

0022.en: Mara's hoarse voice, like a dark thunderclap, mixed with the wind and exploded in the young man's ears.
0022.speaker: 玛拉
0022.cn: 玛拉沙哑的声音犹如阴雷般，混入风中，在青年的耳畔炸响。

0023.en: Chapter 23: Reset 23 - Confrontation
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第23章 重置23 直面

0023.en: Mara, flying with her wings spread wide, was like a falcon diving low. Her demon-strengthened body tore a path through the weakening blizzard, and her sharp claws made a piercing sound in the wind.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 展翅疾飞的玛拉犹如低空俯冲的猎鹰，魔族强化过的身躯硬生生在这削弱的暴风雪中撕开一条缝，锋利的尖爪在风中划过，发出尖锐的摩擦声。

0023.en: Selen An, pulling Anna along in a desperate run, sensed danger behind him. His mind went blank, but his body instinctively dove forward, causing Anna and the baby she held to fall with him into the snow.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 拉着安娜一路狂奔的塞伦安预感到身后有危险，大脑一片空白，身体却下意识的前倾下趴，连带着身后的安娜抱着怀中的婴儿直接卧倒在雪地之中。

0023.en: The moment his body hit the freezing snow, he felt a foul wind brush past his back. The edge of his thin clothes was torn open in three places, and the cold wind rushed in, making Selen An’s teeth chatter.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 在身体与冰寒刺骨的霜雪接触的瞬间，只觉一阵腥风几乎是贴着后背滑过，单薄的衣衫仅边缘的接触，又被划开了三道狰狞的口子，冷风顿时灌入体内，冷的塞伦恩牙齿打颤。

0023.en: Lying face down in the snow, the young man quickly lifted his head and saw the figure of a deep-purple succubus who had dropped from the sky to block his path.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 俯趴在雪地中的青年，猛地抬起头，就看见那从天而落挡在前路的深紫色魅魔身影。

0023.en: In the blizzard, their eyes met. Mara folded her flesh wings, which were almost numb from movement, but the twisted, evil smile on her face didn't stiffen in the extreme cold.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 暴风雪中，双方四目相对，玛拉收起了背后动到几乎麻木的肉翅，脸上狰狞扭曲的邪恶笑容，却并没有因空气的极寒而半点僵硬。

0023.en: "Master, what are you afraid of? I'm your governess. When you see me, you should trust me."
0023.speaker: 玛拉
0023.cn: “少爷，你在害怕什么？我是你的教养修女啊，看见我，你应该信任我才对。”

0023.en: In the snowstorm, Mara's purple-green demon eyes openly showed her evil desires. Her bare feet left footprints in the snow as she slowly moved closer.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 风雪中，玛拉一双青紫色的魔瞳毫不掩饰地释放着邪恶的欲念，裸露的双足踩在雪地之中，留下一道又一道脚印，不断逼近。

0023.en: Pieces of torn cloth hung from her sharp nails, and her mocking expression was terrifying.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 尖锐的指甲上还勾着残余的布料，戏谑的神情不禁令人胆寒。

0023.en: Selen An struggled to get up from the snow. His survival instinct made him want to run, but after taking only half a step back, he bumped into the girl's soft body and the newborn baby in her arms.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 塞伦安艰难的从雪地中爬起，求生的欲望，让他本能的想要向后逃去，可脚步刚退半步，后背却撞到了少女柔弱的身体以及怀中那刚刚降生的婴儿。

0023.en: Perhaps because it was bumped, or because it lost the familiar scent of its holder, the swaddled baby finally began to cry loudly. Selen An stopped his retreat.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 或许是被撞疼了，又或许是丢失了母亲的气息，襁褓中的婴儿终是哇哇大哭起来，塞伦安撤退的脚步一顿。

0023.en: Should I really run?
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: 真的要跑吗？

0023.en: If it comes to running, Anna, a girl holding a baby, definitely can't run faster than me. But aren't I the one who brought all this trouble?
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: 真要论起逃跑抱着婴儿又是女儿身的安娜肯定跑不过自己，可带来这些灾祸的不正是自己吗？

0023.en: My arrival attracted these demon predators, putting the already unfortunate sister and brother in danger. And besides, I am the original cause of their misfortune...
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: 是自己的到来，引来了这群魔族的豺狼，让原本就不幸的母女二人陷入危险之地，况且他们不幸的本源，也正是因为自己呀……

0023.en: Should I run? Follow my cowardly instinct? But even if I run, I'll be caught. Normal humans can't defeat demons. How can someone on two legs outrun someone with wings?
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: 要逃吗？遵守自己懦弱的本能，可就算逃了也会被抓住的吧，普通人类根本无法战胜魔族，靠两条腿跑的又怎么能比得过长翅膀飞的呢？

0023.en: The fear deep in his bones reached its peak and twisted into a different extreme. Though his body was still shaking, Selen An didn't retreat another step. He desperately tried to steady his breath and stood protectively in front of the sister and brother.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刻入骨子内的恐惧发挥到了极致，情绪的本身就被扭曲成了另一种极端，即使身体还在颤抖，可塞伦安却没有再退一步了，他拼命的稳住自己的呼吸，艰难的挡在了这对姐弟的面前。

0023.en: Maybe running is a living creature's instinct, but standing in front of this girl who was harmed because of him was also an instinct.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 也许逃命是生物的本能，而挡在这位因自己而受害的少女面前，也是一种本能。

0023.en: Is it because of guilt?
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: 因为愧疚吗？

0023.en: Perhaps there's some, but not entirely. He never felt he was the real Selen An—that greedy, cowardly, and useless villain from the game who had no good qualities.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 或许是有的吧，但不全是，他始终觉得自己不是塞伦安，不是那个游戏中贪，生怕死不学无术，毫无任何闪光点的恶役纨绔。

0023.en: Although he wasn't some great hero before he transmigrated, the socialist education he grew up with taught him that it's okay to be afraid of death, but sometimes, some things are far more important than death.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 虽然穿越前他也并非是什么万人景仰的英雄，但从小到大的社会主义教育告诉他，人可以怕死，但有些时候，有些东西，远比死亡更重要。

0023.en: Anna, holding the swaddled baby, stared blankly at the determined but not-so-tall figure standing before her.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 安娜抱着怀中襁褓中的婴儿，双眼微怔的望着挡在自己面前那坚定却并不高大的身影。

0023.en: "Mr. Andre..."
0023.speaker: 安娜
0023.cn: “安德烈先生……”

0023.en: She murmured, stunned.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她失声喃喃。

0023.en: "Don't call me Andre. You must have recognized me long ago, right?"
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: “不要叫我安德烈，你应该早就认出我来了吧？”

0023.en: The young man's voice trembled noticeably, and his breath turned into white mist in the cold air.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 青年的声音带着明显的颤音，呼出的气在寒冷的空气中化作白雾。

0023.en: "After my blood successfully saved your mother, you accidentally called out my name. And the look on your face when we first saw each other after I woke up... I don't think I was mistaken."
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: “在我的血液成功救下你母亲后，你曾失口喊出过我的名字，还有我刚刚醒来时你我对视时的那种表情，我应当没有看错……”

0023.en: Selen An wasn't stupid. When it came to feelings and emotions, he was more sensitive than most people. After hearing that mysterious voice, this ability seemed to have become even sharper and more refined.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 塞伦安不傻，就说在于感情和情绪方面，他比普通人都要敏感，而在经历了那道神秘的声音之后，这方面的能力似乎更加敏锐和细腻了。

0023.en: He didn't know if he had been influenced or changed by that voice, but right now, he truly wanted to "protect" the two lives behind him.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 他不知道自己是不是被那道声音影响或改变了，但至少现在的他，确确实实是想“保护”身后的这两条生命。

0023.en: Whether it was for personal heroism or for atonement...
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 无论是出于所谓的个人英雄，还是赎罪的角度……

0023.en: "I'm sorry. I caused you to lose your father. That was my mistake. But you saved me without holding a grudge, and I'm very grateful. This whole situation is because of me..."
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: “抱歉，因为我让你失去了父亲，这是我犯的错，而你却能不计前嫌的救下我，我很感激，眼下诸多情况都因我而起……”

0023.en: "A life for a life, it's a simple truth. Miss Anna, whether you accept it or not, this is the only thing I can do for you."
0023.speaker: 塞伦安
0023.cn: “以命抵命，这是再简单不过的道理了，安娜小姐，无论你是否接受，这是我唯一能为你做的了。”

0023.en: "Go!"
0023.speaker: 塞伦安

0023.en: He ordered in a low, trembling voice.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 他声音颤抖的低喝道。

0023.en: Anna looked with complicated feelings at this young man, who was completely different from her memory. She once hated this noble, who used his power to kill her father out of lust for her, forcing her and her mother to flee. The hardships and pain she endured over the years only deepened her hatred for Selen An.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 安娜神色复杂的看着这位与记忆中截然不同的青年，她曾痛恨这位贵公子，因为贪图自己的美色，借用权势害死了自己的父亲，逼得他和母亲颠沛流离，这些年遇到的困难，吃过的苦，每一份痛都更加加深了她心中对于塞伦安的恨。

0023.en: Until that day she was out looking for food and found this unconscious person by the road, who looked almost like a corpse. Although his face was covered in mud, she could still recognize his fine features and the tattered but once-luxurious clothes. She would recognize him even if he were ashes.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 直到那天在外寻找食物，路边捡到了这犹如尸体般的昏迷之人，虽然脸上的外貌被泥沙掩盖模糊，但身上残破却依稀华贵的华服，以及那棱角分明的五五，即使化成灰，她也永远认得出来。

0023.en: That was her enemy, her father's killer. Seeing him, she should have killed the villain herself, or just ignored him and let him die. But when she made up her mind, her wood knife just couldn't pierce his chest. She forced herself to turn away from that area, but then she inexplicably walked back...
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 那是她的仇人，杀父仇人，眼见杀父仇人，她理应亲手手刃了这恶少，或者干脆视若无睹，任凭他自然消亡，可当他下定了决心，手中的柴刀却始终扎不进对方的胸膛，狠心背对远离了那块区域，又还是莫名其妙的走了回来……

0023.en: She didn't know why she saved this man who deserved to be cut into a thousand pieces. Maybe it was the pity she felt for a dying creature, or maybe the kindness in her heart wouldn't let her kill someone on the verge of death.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她不知自己出于什么原因救了这位理应千刀万剐的恶人，或许是见到濒死的生灵，心中生出的那一份恻隐，或许是少女心中的那份善良，让她不忍对一位将死之人去真正的痛下杀手。

0023.en: She would not forget her hatred, and if she had the chance, she would get her revenge. But not when a person's life was in danger.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她不会忘记仇恨，若有机会，她也一定会报仇，可却不是在一个人因祸事生命危机的情况下。

0023.en: She saved him and brought him home with complex feelings. She hid a knife in her sleeve while talking to the awakened young man, trying to find the familiar, disgusting aura she remembered from him.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她将其救了回来，以复杂的情绪带回了家中，她手袖中隐藏着柴刀，与清醒过来的青年对话，将要从他的身上搜寻到那曾令自己无比熟悉的厌恶的气息。

0023.en: But until now, she hadn't found it. In her and her mother's eyes, he was humble, he was modest, he was polite. He seemed just like his alias, Andre, a brave and upright gentleman. Even knowing his identity was fake, Anna couldn't find a single trace of the spoiled villain in him.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 可直到现在，都没有，在自己和母亲的眼中，他谦逊，他谦卑，他有礼，他仿佛真如那安德烈的假名一般，是一位勇敢而正直的君子，即使知道他的身份是假的，可安娜却无法从他的身上找到任何一丝往日中那纨绔恶少的影子。

0023.en: He had changed. Maybe he changed during the time she was away, or maybe he changed after a near-death experience. It was undeniable that he had become someone she couldn't hate—especially after he saved her mother with his blood.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 他变了，可能是在自己离开的这段时间变了，也可能是经历过死亡边缘的徘徊，发生了改变，不可否认的是，他变成了一位让她提不起任何仇恨的人——特别是在用他的血救下自己母亲的那一刻。

0023.en: From that moment on, the desire for revenge might still be there, but it was not as strong as before. She began to see this transformed master with a complex gaze, and only now did she truly understand...
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 从那时开始，复仇的情绪或许还有，但远不似之前那般强烈了，她开始用复杂的目光看待这位脱胎换骨的少爷，直到现在，她才真正的领悟到……

0023.en: Selen An might really be different now.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 塞伦安或许真的不一样了。

0023.en: "Take care."
0023.speaker: 安娜
0023.cn: “保重。”

0023.en: She held her swaddled brother tighter, clenched her jaw as if making a hard decision, and hurried past the young man's side, disappearing into the white blizzard.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她裹紧了襁褓中的弟弟，咬牙像是下定了狠心，从青年的身侧擦边而过，朝着风雪白忙中疾行而去。

0023.en: Mara, now less than ten meters away, didn't stop the fleeing sister and brother. Instead, she looked playfully at the young man facing her directly.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 距离已经不到十米的玛拉并没有阻拦那对逃跑的姐弟，而是眼神玩味的看一下眼前直面自己的青年。

0023.en: "Your change is really surprising, Master."
0023.speaker: 玛拉
0023.cn: “你的改变还真是令人惊讶啊，少爷。”

0023.en: She said with a smile.
0023.speaker: 玛拉
0023.cn: 她笑着说道。

0023.en: "A noble master whose mind was only filled with sex, money, and greed can actually make a decision to sacrifice himself at the moment of life and death. You truly both surprise and delight me..."
0023.speaker: 玛拉
0023.cn: “一个满脑子只有色情，金钱和贪婪的贵族少爷，竟能在生死的时刻做出自我牺牲的决定，你可真是令我既惊讶又惊喜啊……”

0023.en: "But it doesn't matter. Whether you have truly changed for the better or have other plans, your life ends here. Next, I will help you shed this human shell and welcome your new life as a demon!"
0023.speaker: 玛拉
0023.cn: “不过无所谓，无论少爷你是否真的改过自新，还是另有图谋，你的人生都已到此为止了，接下来我将帮你褪去这人类的皮囊，迎接魔生！”

0023.en: PS: The transformation plot is locked for Chapter 25. Please be patient, dear readers. I am already updating at full speed.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: ps：变身剧情锁定在25章，还请各位观众老爷保持耐心，我已经在加足马力的更新了。

0024.en: Chapter 24: Reset 24 - Undead Killer MAX
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 第24章 重置24 亡灵杀手MAX

0024.en: "Believe me, Master. After you have fallen, you will surely go after them and drag back that brother and sister you just swore to protect."
0024.speaker: 玛拉
0024.cn: “相信我，堕落之后的少爷您一定会重新追上去，将那对您刚刚誓死保护的姐弟，亲手抓回来的。”

0024.en: Mara was certain of this, because she had experienced it firsthand.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉对此深信不疑，因为她是亲身经历者。

0024.en: Once the demonic degeneration is complete, a power far beyond that of mortals will not only warp the body but also twist the mind, stripping away all sense of shame, faith, and honor. The moral boundaries once held sacred by humans will be instantly shattered by overwhelming desire.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一旦彻底魔堕，那股远超凡人的力量不仅会从肉体层面，甚至会从精神层面彻底扭曲剥夺所谓的廉耻信仰和荣耀，那些曾被人类视为不可触碰的道德底线会在魔堕完的一瞬间彻底被升腾起的欲望粉碎。

0024.en: This is the birth of a new demon, a being completely superior to mortals.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而这就是新魔族的诞生，一个彻底凌驾于凡人的存在。

0024.en: Mara didn't think she was doing anything wrong. In fact, she believed that after his fall, the young noble before her would thank her passionately.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉不觉得自己在做什么坏事，甚至从某种层面上来看，她甚至觉得眼前的这位贵族少爷在堕落之后会狂热的感谢自己。

0024.en: Thank her for leading him out of suffering, thank her for helping him understand the true meaning of life!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 感谢自己带领她脱离苦海，感谢自己带领她领悟到生命的真谛！

0024.en: "Is that so? But it's hard to believe such words coming from the mouth of a demon..."
0024.speaker: 塞伦安
0024.cn: “是吗？不过这种话从一个魔鬼口中说出，还真是令人难以相信呢……”

0024.en: Perhaps because he had sent the siblings away and was no longer held back, Selen An's trembling body stabilized. He did his best to stand straight in the blizzard, his gaze meeting Mara's violet demon eyes without hesitation.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 不知是不是因为赶走了身后的那对姐弟，没有了拖累，塞伦安颤抖的身躯稳定了许多，他尽力的在这暴风雪中站直身体，目光则毫无避讳的对上了玛拉的那双青紫色魔瞳。

0024.en: This small act slightly shocked Mara. In the empire, a nation heavily influenced by the Church, looking a demon in the eyes was taboo. People firmly believed that meeting a demon's gaze would contaminate both body and soul.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这一小小举动令玛拉稍感震惊，要知道，在帝国这个被教会深度影响的国度中，人们视对上魔鬼的眼睛是一种禁忌，他们深信，只要与魔鬼的双目对视，肉体和精神就会被污染。

0024.en: Commoners would often run to a church in a panic to pray after supposedly seeing a demon, and nobles were even more convinced of this, often washing their eyes with holy water after seeing something unclean just to be safe.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 平民们往往会因为所谓的看到魔鬼，而惊慌失措的跑向教堂祈祷，贵族们更是对此深信不疑，往往看到不净之物，都要用圣水洗涤双目才能放心。

0024.en: "Master, your changes are truly surprising me more and more."
0024.speaker: 玛拉
0024.cn: “少爷，您的变化真的是令我越来越惊讶了。”

0024.en: "I should be the one who is surprised. To infiltrate a saintess's family so quietly, and even get close to a direct blood relative... your identity as a governess supposedly sent by the Pope, and the power behind you, are truly something else..."
0024.speaker: 塞伦安
0024.cn: “该感到惊讶的应该是我吧，能悄无声息的渗入圣女家族，甚至混到血脉直系成员的身旁，你这个名义上被教皇指派过来的教养修女，身份和背后的势力还真是不一般啊……”

0024.en: "That's because of human foolishness and greed. You don't need to be confused by it, Master. Once you are reborn, all these questions will be answered. For now, you just need to close your eyes and entrust yourself completely to me..."
0024.speaker: 玛拉
0024.cn: “那是因为人类的愚蠢和贪婪，少爷不必因此而感到困惑，等到你获得新生，这些疑题自然就迎刃而解，而现在，你只需闭上双眼，全身心的交于我……”

0024.en: The distance between them was less than ten meters, and Selen An showed no sign of running. In reality, at this distance, even if her prey tried to flee, a succubus would give them no chance to escape.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 双方的距离已不足十米，塞伦安还没有逃跑的迹象，实际上，这个距离对于一位魅魔来说即使猎物撒开步子逃跑，也没有逃掉的可能了。

0024.en: What surprised Mara even more was that the greatly changed Master Selen An did as he said, standing perfectly still. He seemed to have given up all resistance, his expression completely relaxed as he closed his eyes.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 而更令玛拉感到惊讶的是，变化颇大的塞伦安少爷真如他所说那般，站在原地一动不动，他看似放弃了抵抗，神情更是刻彻底放松，闭上了双眸。

0024.en: Has he accepted his fate?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这是接受自己的命运了吗？

0024.en: Mara thought so, and the smile on her face grew wider and more unrestrained.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉如此想，脸上的笑容也不禁愈发肆意。

0024.en: The outcome was set. There would be no divine intervention this time. The only threat was already surrounded by the demon cavalry led by General Kegesa. Although that burst of ice magic had startled everyone for a moment, but...
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 结局已定，这一次不再会有神兵天降了，唯一的威胁已经被克格萨将军所率领的魔族铁骑包围，虽然那道冰系神术在释放的瞬间确实有惊骇到所有人，但……

0024.en: It was meaningless. A Saintess was powerful on her own, but unless she reached the legendary demigod level, a powerful individual on the battlefield could still be overwhelmed by numbers. If the Ice Saintess had brought her personally-appointed Holy Knights to this fight, the outcome might have been different.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这是毫无意义的，圣女个体固然强大，但只要没有强大到传说中的半神境界，战场上强大的个体依旧能够用数量弥补差距，如果这次战斗，那位冰之圣女殿下是带领着她所亲自册封的圣骑士团，那么结果或许还有所悬殊。

0024.en: But there are no 'ifs' in this world. This generation's Ice Saintess was an idiot. Trying to snatch someone from a cavalry legion led by a demon general all by herself would only end with her own capture.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 可世界上没有那么多如果，这一代的冰之圣女是个蠢货，单枪匹马想要从一位魔将领导的铁骑军团口中抢人，最终只会把自己也搭进去。

0024.en: By the time she was finished here, the demon general would have probably captured that little wench. Once she became a prisoner, the Saintess's so-called noble blood and status would only further ignite the demons' desire to defile and corrupt her.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 想必等自己这里结束了，魔将大人那边恐怕也已拿下了那个贱.蹄子，等她沦为了阶下囚，圣女所谓的高贵血脉和身份，只会愈发点燃魔族想要对其玷污和污染的欲望。

0024.en: This plan was undoubtedly a great success.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这一次计划，无疑是一场大丰收。

0024.en: Mara stood before Selen An. The blue-haired boy still showed no sign of resistance. He just stood quietly in the snow with his eyes closed, like a statue.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉来到了塞伦安的面前，蓝发的少年依旧没有抵抗的迹象，他只是静静的站在雪地中，紧闭双眼，如同一尊雕像。

0024.en: "Get ready to be reborn!"
0024.speaker: 玛拉
0024.cn: “准备好迎接新生吧！”

0024.en: Mara declared, and at the same time, her left hand gripped his neck to hold him still and prevent his escape, while her right hand, with fingers slightly curved, rested gently on the top of the young man's head.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉宣告道，与此同时，她的左手掐住了对方的脖子，以此固定身形，防止魔堕对象逃脱，右手则五指微微勾曲，不轻不重地扣在了青年的天灵盖上。

0024.en: The best way to activate the Succubus Seed's magic was to pour it in from the crown of the head. That way, the fallen one's soul would be completely saturated with the demonic aura. This was a step she knew from personal experience—just as she had accepted General Kegesa's baptism in her own moment of despair.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 引动魅魔之种的魔力最好是自头顶灌入，这样才能彻彻底底的让堕落者自身的灵魂彻底染上魔族的气息，这是他作为一个亲身经历者必然知道的步骤——就如他当年万念俱灰下接受了克格萨将军的洗礼。

0024.en: Everything seemed to be heading in an uncontrollable direction. Just like him now, he seemed to be unavoidably falling into the abyss of demonic degeneration.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一切都似乎朝着无法控制的方向发展，就如他现在，已经看似无可避免的坠向了名为魔堕的深渊。

0024.en: He had nowhere left to run. Or rather, even if he had chosen the dirty tactic the original owner of the body might have used—sacrificing the siblings to buy time—he didn't think he could escape a succubus's pursuit. He believed this was a turning point of fate, an unavoidable intersection.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 他已逃无可逃，或者说，即使他选择了身体原主可能做出的肮脏做法，将安娜姐弟作为拖延时间的诱饵，他亦不觉得自己可以逃脱一位魅魔的追踪——他相信，这是命运的节点，是无法避免的交汇。

0024.en: If that was the case, running was not an option and would be the act of a shameful coward. Fate had pushed him onto the stage, pressing a gun to his forehead. Fear was meaningless. So, why not bet this free life and use his remaining courage to burn the hand holding the gun?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 既然如此，逃避不可行，又视作可耻的懦夫行为，命运将他推至台前，将枪口抵制他的额头，恐惧毫无意义，那么不如拼上这条白送的命，以仅剩勇气去灼烧持枪的手。

0024.en: At the very least, before the threads of fate pierced his limbs, he could make the hand playing with his destiny feel the same pain he felt!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 至少在命运之线贯穿自己的四肢关节之前，也能让那双玩弄着自己的命运之手，感受到与己身同等的疼痛！

0024.en: Even though the demonic power flowing from the top of his head was filled with restless desire, he could clearly feel his body temperature dropping, being drawn away. It felt as if his humanity was gradually leaving him...
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 明明那股自头顶汇入的魔力掺杂着躁动的欲望，可他却能明显的感觉到自己的体温在不断下降，不停的被抽离，那种感觉就好像逐渐远离自己的人类身份……

0024.en: Did I mess up? But if I don't take this chance, what other choice do I have?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 自己好像玩脱了，但不拼一把，还有其他机会吗？

0024.en: The curve of Mara's smile grew wider. Her magic had already seeped into his body and touched the Succubus Seed. Although a layer of sealing ice covered the seed, it couldn't stop her. After all, the ice was not a sealing spell, it had only frozen the seed's development.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 玛拉嘴角咧开的弧度越来越大，它的魔力已经渗入了对方的体内，接触到了魅魔之种，那颗种子的外围虽然凝结了一层封印之冰，但这阻止不了她，毕竟那些冰元素并非封印魔法，只是单纯的冻住了魅魔之种的发育。

0024.en: Her magic was constantly melting the ice, and it was doing so quickly. Once it was all melted and the Succubus Seed was activated, then...
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 它的魔力在不断的融化这些冰，且速度很快，只等彻底融化完，激活魅魔之种，就……

0024.en: "Ssssh!"
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: “撕啦！”

0024.en: A sharp sound, like a ghoul sizzling in the sunlight, was followed by a burning pain that spread from his abdomen to his chest. The agony forced her to stop the spell. She opened her eyes, and what she saw was the young man's pale, mocking smile.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 如阳光照射到食尸鬼冒出白烟时的激烈声响，像火般的灼烧剧痛从如线状般腹部蔓延到胸口，剧痛迫使她停下了施法的过程，睁开眼，映入眼帘的是青年那苍白而嘲弄的笑容。

0024.en: Her body fell back. Her combat instincts made her leap backward, creating distance between them. The pain was like a shot of strong medicine, making her back break out in a cold sweat. What terrified her most was the sword that had appeared out of nowhere in his hand.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 身体向后倾倒，战斗的本能让他一个大后跳，拉开了双方的距离，疼痛如一剂猛药让她的后背渗出汗来，最令她感到恐惧的是对方手中那柄凭空出现的剑。

0024.en: From its design, it didn't look like a sword for fighting. It looked more like a sacred object used for court ceremonies or worshiping gods.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 看造型，那不像是一柄用来战斗的剑，反倒更像是作用于宫廷礼节，或神明祭祀时所用的圣器。

0024.en: Mara bent over, clutching the gruesome wound that stretches from her abdomen to her chest, and gritted her teeth.
0024.speaker: 玛拉
0024.cn: 玛拉弯腰捂着那从腹部延伸至胸口的狰狞伤口，咬牙切齿道。

0024.en: "A-a holy sword?!"
0024.speaker: 玛拉

0024.en: "Idiot. Did you really think I would just give up?"
0024.speaker: 塞伦安
0024.cn: “蠢货，真以为我会束手就擒？”

0024.en: Selen An panted heavily. Although the holy sword in his hands was a light one-handed sword by design, in his current state, he needed both hands to hold it tightly.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 塞伦安喘着粗气，虽然他手中的这柄圣剑，从造型来看是一柄质量较轻的单手剑，可以他现在的状态想要握紧还需双手握持。

0024.en: His pale face showed a hint of excitement. He mocked the fearful and furious succubus from a distance, like a child who had just turned the tables in a game, his faint fear mixed with an unstoppable excitement and nervousness.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苍白的脸色显现出激动的神色，他讥讽的望着不远处面露恐惧和愤怒的魅魔，像是一个扳回一局的孩子，淡淡的恐惧中掺杂着无法抑制的兴奋与紧张。

0024.en: He had gambled correctly. This body might be useless, but it had inherited the direct bloodline of a Saintess. No matter how incapable he was, there was still some magic to be squeezed out of it.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 自己赌对了，这具身体虽然是个真正的废柴，但毕竟是遗传了圣女的直系血脉者，就算再怎么无能，身体里也还是能炸出些许魔力的。

0024.en: When he first arrived, he was too unfamiliar with this body, let alone how to use the pitiful amount of magic within it. But ever since hearing that mysterious voice, he found himself becoming more and more familiar with this body that wasn't his, so familiar that it felt like it had been his all along.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 刚穿越过来时，对于这具身体还过于陌生，更别提运用身体里那点少的可怜的魔力，自从听过那道神秘的声音之后，他便发现自己对这具本不属于自己的身体愈发的熟悉了，熟悉到这具身体，好似原本就属于自己。

0024.en: The status panel showed that a holy sword was among his treasures. Since he chose to rise up and fight against fate, this sword was the only weapon he could bring out—although the description said it was an unsharpened sword.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 面板装显示自己所持有的宝具中就包含圣剑，既然选择奋起与命运抵抗，那么，这柄剑就是自己唯一能拿出的武器——其实简介上说，这柄剑是一柄无锋剑。

0024.en: But judging from its actual effect, unsharpened was fine. While it lacked the physical damage of a blade, the holy sword's magical damage against demons was maxed out.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 但从实战效果来看，无锋就无锋，虽然不开锋少了冷兵器本身的物理杀伤，但圣剑本身对于魔族特攻的法伤是叠满的。

0024.en: Whether he won this battle or not wasn't the point. But before he lost this cheap life, he had to at least take an arm to make it even!
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这一场战斗能不能赢不是关键，但至少在自己丢掉这条便宜命之前，少说也得让对方断条胳膊才算回本！

0024.en: Selen An thought to himself, his hands gripping the hilt of the holy sword even tighter.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 塞伦安如此想，双手愈发握紧圣剑的剑柄。

0025.en: Chapter 25: Reset 25 - Corrupted
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 第25章 重置25 魔堕了

0025.en: The battle between an ordinary person and a demon was like a weak lamb challenging a wolf.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 普通人与魔族的战斗宛若，孱弱的羊羔向豺狼发起挑战。

0025.en: But Selen An, armed with the holy sword, was no ordinary lamb. He was a horned goat. The difference in their strength was still vast, but if the wolf wanted to devour the goat, it might get scratched by the sharp horns in the process.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而拥有圣剑的塞伦安显然不是普通的羊羔，它是一只长了角的山羊，双方的战斗力依旧悬殊，可豺狼想要吞食山羊，亦有可能在战斗中被锋利的羊角所划伤。

0025.en: Although the bladeless Sword of Peace had never been sharpened, it was still a holy sword. It might not be good for cutting people, but against demons, it dealt pure magical damage.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 无锋的和平之剑虽从未开封，但其本质仍为圣剑，砍人或许不好使，但砍模组打出来的可就全是魔法伤害了。

0025.en: "Clang!"
0025.speaker: 旁白

0025.en: Sharp claws scraped across the sword, creating a harsh noise. Mara's speed was like lightning. Selen An held his sword ready, but could only see a purple afterimage flash past his eyes. Then, she appeared right in front of him, attacking fiercely with her claws.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 尖锐的利爪划过剑身，顿时摩擦出刺耳的噪音，玛拉的速度快若闪电，塞伦安持剑以待，却只看清紫色的残影在视野中一闪而逝，紧接着便显现在自己的身前，挥爪猛攻。

0025.en: He instinctively raised his sword to block. A piercing sound of metal scraping filled his ears, and the force from the impact made the web of his thumb ache. Having never received any formal combat training, he couldn't hold his weapon steady.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 他下意识的提剑挡在了身前，耳边随之响起金属摩擦的刺耳声音，从剑身传递来的聚力震得他虎口生疼，从未接受过任何正规格斗体质的他根本无法在这种情况下抓稳武器。

0025.en: He had underestimated the power gap between humans and demons. Even a female succubus, not known for her strength, could crush his head more easily than piercing a sheet of paper.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 他小看了人类和魔族之间的力量差距，即使是不以力量著称的雌性魅魔，想要捏碎他的脑袋不戳破一张白纸难。

0025.en: The holy sword spun out of his hand and fell into the snow.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 圣剑旋转着，从手中脱落，掉入雪地。

0025.en: Stunned by the blow, he lost his last bit of resistance. Mara seized the opportunity, reached out, and grabbed his throat, securing her victory.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 被打出僵直的他更是丧失了最后一点抵抗能力，玛拉抓准时机，伸手一把掐住他的喉咙，抓取锁定胜局。

0025.en: Looking at the young man struggling as she held him up with one hand, Mara's face was full of mockery and scorn.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这被自己单只手提起来奋力挣扎的青年，玛拉满脸都是戏谑与嘲弄。

0025.en: She had thought that when Selen An summoned the holy sword, he was about to unleash a powerful move, and they might be locked in a long battle.
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 原以为塞伦安召唤出圣剑，要给她来波大的，彼此可能陷入鏖战。

0025.en: But in the end... he was taken down in one hit. How about that?
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 结果……一A秒了，如何呢？

0025.en: "A mortal is just a mortal. A weak body, even with a holy sword, cannot change the outcome."
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: “凡人就是凡人，孱弱的身躯即使拥有了圣剑，也依旧改变不了结局。”

0025.en: Learning from her last mistake, Mara didn't hesitate this time. A continuous stream of enchanting purple demonic energy flowed into Selen An's body. The invading magic, like summoned venomous snakes, spread towards the Succubus Seed in his abdomen, nourishing the restless seed like morning dew...
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 吸取了上次的教训，这一次，玛拉没有犹豫，充满魅惑色彩的紫色魔力源源不断的注入塞伦安体内，侵入体内的魔力如同受到召唤的毒蛇，源源不断地朝着腹部的魅魔之种扩散，如雨露般滋润着这颗蠢蠢欲动的种子……

0025.en: Nourished by the energy, the seed was no longer dormant. Thousands of tiny blood vessels, like roots, extended from its base, digging into his body, into every important vessel and nerve. A deep bud sprouted from the top of the seed, and the sprout grew until a bewitching flower bloomed!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 得到营养滋润的种子，终于不再沉寂，万千细小的血管犹如根须般从种子的下方延伸，榨干入身体，各个重要的血管与神经，种子的上方吐出深邃的芽，嫩芽蔓延最后开出妖艳的花！

0025.en: The moment the succubus transformation fully bloomed, it released an immense power of corruption, enough to reshape a living being. His weak flesh could not resist this force at all and could only let it freely mold his blood and body into the shape of desire.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 邓美模制化完全绽放的那一刻，喷发出无数足以改造生命体的堕落之力，孱弱的肉体根本无法抵御这股力量，只能任由接受这股力量肆意的将血与肉捏造成欲望的模样。

0025.en: "Arrrghhhh...!"
0025.speaker: 塞伦安
0025.cn: “呃啊啊啊啊……！”

0025.en: An indescribable pain exploded inside him. Selen An's pupils dilated, and as she choked him, a hoarse, ugly scream escaped his throat.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 难以言喻的痛苦在体内炸开，塞伦安的瞳孔猛地放大，掐住脖子的他，嗓中发出嘶哑难听的哀嚎。

0025.en: Under Mara's delighted gaze, the changes of the Corruption began:
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 在玛拉充满愉悦的注视下，魔堕的变化开始了：

0025.en: Deep purple demonic energy, like a fire, burned from within Selen An's body and spread to every inch of his skin. Under the corrosion and reshaping of this fire of desire, his broad male frame shrank wildly in an unbelievable way.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 深紫色的魔力如同火焰般，从塞伦安的体内燃烧蔓延至每一寸肌肤，在欲望之火的侵蚀和改造下，男性宽大的骨架以一种不可思议的方式疯狂缩水。

0025.en: The Winterlein family's signature blue hair and blue eyes also began to change. His messy, weed-like blue hair lost its sky-blue color, turning a desperate, pale white. In the center of his jewel-like blue eyes, a desire the color of powder pink expanded wildly, eventually taking over his pupils and leaving a tempting heart-shaped pattern in the very center.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 温特莱恩家族标志性的蓝发和蓝瞳也开始遭到篡改，杂乱如杂草般的蓝发褪去了天空的蔚蓝，沦为绝望的苍白，蔚蓝如宝石般的眼眸中央名为粉丝的欲望肆意扩张，最后完全占据了瞳孔，在正中心留下了诱人的爱心花纹。

0025.en: The fabric on his chest and hips was clearly pushed up by swelling flesh. A strong itch appeared on his forehead, back, and tailbone. The itch grew stronger and stronger, making him want to scratch it, as if something was about to break through the skin from underneath!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 胸口与臀部的布料明显被突隆的脂肪血肉顶起，额头，背部以及尾椎骨出现了强烈的刺痒，而那令人忍不住伸手去挠的刺痒感还在不断的变得强烈，貌似那些血肉的底部有什么东西正要破土而出！

0025.en: Mara admired the young man in her grasp, who was in the critical stage of his Corruption. No, from any angle, Selen An could no longer be called a young man. The obvious secondary sexual characteristics and the increasingly tempting curves of his body announced to the world that a new succubus was about to be born!
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 玛拉欣赏着手中正处于堕落关键时期的青年，不，不管从哪个角度来看，眼下的塞尔伦安都不能被称之为青年了，明显的第二性特征以及不断的变得诱人的身体曲线都在向世间宣告着，即将有一位新生的魅魔诞生！

0025.en: And this succubus was even a descendant of a saintess, carrying noble, divine blood!
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 而这个魅魔竟还是有怀揣着高贵神之血的圣女后裔！

0025.en: Once Selen An completely degenerated, it would not only bring utter shame to the Winterlein family but also cast a shadow over the bloodline of every saintess in the world. A descendant of a saintess, proclaimed by the Church to be innately noble and holy, could fall and become the filthiest of succubi in the eyes of the common people. This would be the strongest spiritual blow to all the saintess families and the Church!
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 塞伦安一旦彻底堕落，不仅仅是让温特莱恩家族彻底蒙羞，也是为这世间每一个圣女的血脉蒙上阴影，教会所宣传的天生高贵的圣洁的圣女后裔亦能沦落成平民眼中最肮脏的魅魔，这将是在精神上对各个圣女家族和教廷最强烈打击！

0025.en: From then on, whenever people saw a saintess from the Church, they would inevitably think of Selen An, who had degenerated into a succubus. This would become a stain that the Pope, and every member of the clergy, would want to erase but never could.
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 此后，人们每每看到教廷的圣女，就一定会联想到堕落成魅魔的塞伦安，这将成为教廷教皇，乃至每一位圣职人员心中最想抹除，却又抹除不掉的污点。

0025.en: His Majesty, the great Demon King, had calculated everything. The saintesses of this world would eventually become mere pawns in His Majesty's plan to rule the world!
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 伟大的魔王陛下算计到了一切，而这世间的诸位圣女也终将沦为陛下统治世界的棋子！

0025.en: The first move begins with the corruption of the water bloodline!
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 第一步棋就从水之血脉的堕落开始！

0025.en: "Hmm?"
0025.speaker: 玛拉

0025.en: Time ticked by. Mara frowned as she looked at Selen An, whom she held by the neck, his body burning with purple fire. So much time had passed. Her own corruption ritual as a nun had only taken three or four minutes, but now ten minutes had gone by. Even if the saintess blood in his body had some resistance to the Corruption, it was just an unawakened, useless bloodline. That shouldn't be possible...
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 时间一分一秒的过去，玛拉看着被自己掐着脖子，身上燃着紫火的塞伦安不禁皱起了眉，这都过去多久了，自己作为首届多年的修女魔堕仪式也不过用了三四分钟，而现在十分钟都过去了，就算这小子体内的圣女血脉对于魔堕有一定的抵抗，但那也只是未觉醒的废血脉，不应该呀……

0025.en: Seeing that Selen An showed no more succubus features apart from his hair color and the pattern in his pupils, Mara was surprised, but she also smiled, ready to give the young master who was about to become her sister a little push.
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 看着除了发色和瞳孔花纹外，并没有显现出更多魅魔特征的塞伦安，玛拉感到惊讶的同时，也咧开笑容，准备推一把这位即将成为自己姐妹的少爷。

0025.en: She cut the tip of her index finger with her sharp thumbnail. Instantly, the smell of blood with a special scent filled the air.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 她用大拇指尖锐的指甲划破了食指指肚，顿时，一股充斥着特殊气息的血腥味，弥漫在空气中。

0025.en: "You're truly an eye-opener, Master. To be able to resist with just your consciousness for so long, I guess you're not as useless as you look. But so what?"
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: “还真是令我大开眼界呀，少爷，毕竟能凭借意识抵抗这么久，只能说你实际上并不如表面看起来的那样废物，可那又如何呢？”

0025.en: "Unable to awaken your bloodline, no matter how smart you are, or how strong-willed you are, you can't gain any freedom from fate's control. People without power can only accept what fate arranges..."
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: “无法觉醒血脉，就算你再怎么聪明，再怎么意志坚定，也无法在命运的操控下获得一点自由，没有力量的人，就只能接受命运的安排……”

0025.en: "Accept your fate, Master. This is the last moment of your life!"
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: “接受你的命运吧，少爷，这将是你人生的最后时刻了！”

0025.en: As she spoke, she took advantage of the moment Selen An opened his mouth to scream in pain and inserted her bleeding index finger into his mouth.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 说着，她趁着塞伦安痛苦哀嚎时，张开嘴的间隙，将流淌着魅魔之血的食指插入了他的嘴中。

0025.en: The purple blood exploded on his taste buds. Selen An, struggling in chaos and pain, felt an irresistible heat sweep through his already terrible body. The evil fire seemed about to consume the last shred of reason he had left!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 紫色的血液在味蕾中炸开，正处于混沌与痛苦中挣扎沉浮的塞伦安只觉得原本就糟糕的身体，顿时有一股无法抵御的燥热席卷全身，那股邪火仿佛要吞没他最后一丝还在苦苦抵抗的理智！

0025.en: The succubus Mara admired Selen An, whose face and skin were now an unnaturally alluring red. Her narrowed eyes were full of delight.
0025.speaker: 玛拉
0025.cn: 魅魔玛拉欣赏着脸上和全身肌肤都出现不正常诱人嫣红的塞伦安，眯起的眸子中满是愉悦。

0025.en: They say a succubus is the incarnation of desire. Mara was here today to clarify that this was not a rumor. Not only is a succubus herself an irresistible creature to males, but even the blood that sustains them has been evolved to have a strong aphrodisiac effect.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 都说魅魔是欲望的化身，她玛拉今天就要澄清一下，这不是谣言，先不论魅魔本身就是令雄性无法拒绝的尤物，就说任何生物体内用于维持生命的血液，魅魔也将其进化出了强烈的媚药效果。

0025.en: In other words, when she just dripped her blood into Selen An's mouth, it was like feeding him a super-effective aphrodisiac!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 也就是说，她刚刚将自己的血液滴入塞伦安的口中，就相当于给他喂了一瓶超强效果媚药！

0025.en: Now, no matter how strong Selen An's will was, he would surely be pushed into the abyss by the succubus blood and become a slave to desire.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这下就算塞伦安的意志再怎么强大，也必然会被魅魔之血推下深渊，沦为欲望的奴隶。

0025.en: PS: The thought of readers who are off for the May 1st holiday, eagerly opening their phones and the Fanqie app, excited to read the scene of the transformation into a saintess, only to finish today's chapter and hum a little tune themselves~
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: ps：一想到今天51放假，放学的读者迫不及待的打开手机，点开番茄，兴奋的想要阅读变身圣女的画面，然后看完我今天更新的章节，也是忍不住轻哼了起来～

0026.en: Chapter 26 Reset 26: Only Another Succubus Can Kill a Succubus
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第26章 重置26 能杀死魅魔的只有另一个魅魔

0026.en: Is it... really going to end like this?
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: 真的，就要这样结束了吗？

0026.en: His consciousness, about to be lost in the storm of desire, had almost no strength left to resist. In the moment before defeat, this was the only thought left in his mind...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 即将迷失于欲望冲击下的意识，几乎丧失了抵抗力，在溃败的前一刻，他的脑海中只剩下了这个想法……

0026.en: He knew he couldn't win.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 根本赢不了，他是很明白的。

0026.en: When he tried to be a hero, giving up the chance to escape and staying to face Mara alone, he should have known this would be the end.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 在逞英雄，放弃逃跑的机会，留下来独自面对玛拉的时候，他就应该已经料到自己会有这个结局。

0026.en: How could a normal person possibly defeat a succubus?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 普通人怎么可能战胜魅魔呢？

0026.en: Even before he was transported into this game, the game's text descriptions and CGs had clearly shown the huge gap between mortals and demons.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 即使没有穿越到这游戏中，游戏文本的描述以及CG画面的展示，都充分说明了凡人与魔族之间的巨大差距。

0026.en: Staying behind meant certain death, he understood that well. But as his body was about to be reshaped into flesh driven by desire, the last bit of his spirit was incredibly calm...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 留下来是必死的，他很明白，可在这具身体即将被改造成欲望驱使的血肉之时，他仅剩的一丝精神，却无比的平静……

0026.en: Does he regret it? Facing death directly, he didn't seem to have any regrets.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 后悔吗？当直面死亡时，他好似并不后悔。

0026.en: Why did he go this far?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 为什么要做到这种程度呢？

0026.en: When he first arrived, his mind was filled with thoughts of how to survive. But his body seemed to move on its own, not controlled by his mind, leading him step by step to this point. When and why did he start to stray from his original path?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 明明刚穿越过来的时候，他可是满心满脑子都想着如何活下来，可身体就好似不受意识控制一般，是自己一步步走到了现在，那又是什么时候，什么原因导致自己一步步偏离了原定的轨迹呢？

0026.en: Was it the moment Serenia pushed him away? Was it the sight of Anna when he woke up? Was it that mother's gentle and kind treatment of him, or was it...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 是瑟蕾妮娅将自己推开的那一瞬间，是自己清醒时见到安娜的那一幕，是那位母亲对于自己的温柔慈祥以待，还是……

0026.en: The distant memories that burst forth like a slideshow deep in his mind while he was unconscious.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 昏迷时，那些深埋在脑海之中，如幻灯片般迸发出的久远记忆。

0026.en: Those distant, forgotten memories felt like a lost treasure returning to his hands, without any sense of strangeness or distance.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 那些久远的，被遗忘的记忆，仿佛丢失的珍惜之物重回手中，没有一丝一毫的陌生与隔阂。

0026.en: Actually, he had guessed the answer long ago but was just unwilling to accept it. So was this a punishment from the gods, or was it a chance for redemption woven by fate?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 其实答案他早就有所猜测过了，只是不愿意接受罢了，所以这一切是神明给予自己的惩罚，还是命运编织时，必然留于自己的赎罪呢？

0026.en: "Don't give up... Embrace it, accept it... I have always been here, waiting for you..."
0026.speaker: 陌生女1
0026.cn: “不要放弃……去包容，去接受……我一直在这里，等待着你……”

0026.en: A mysterious, otherworldly female voice suddenly sounded again. Its appearance was like a clear spring, putting out the evil fire of desire that was about to consume his final moment. A gentle, cool touch brushed past his weak soul. In the hot purple flames, pure water tied itself around his wrist like a thin string.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 神秘空灵的女声再次毫无预兆的响起，而这道声音的出现也如一汪清泉，浇灭了那即将吞没它最后一时的欲望邪火，温柔清凉的爱抚擦过虚弱的灵魂，燥热的紫色火焰中，纯澈的水如一根细绳般系住了自己的手腕。

0026.en: The water was pulling him up.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 水，再将自己往上拉。

0026.en: In reality, because of the push from the succubus blood, the physical changes that had been slow to happen all erupted at once. Small, black bat-like wings sprouted from his fair, smooth back, curved ram's horns grew from the sides of his flawless forehead, and at the base of his spine, a new, heart-tipped tail unfolded from behind him.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 现实中，由于魅魔之血催化的缘故，肉体上迟迟无法推进的变化在这一瞬间全部反弹了出来，白皙软玉般的后背延伸出漆黑似蝠翼的小巧翅膀，无瑕的额头两侧生长出弯曲的绵羊角，臀部贴近尾椎骨处，新生的桃心尾巴从身后展开。

0026.en: At this moment, Mara could no longer hold back the excitement in her eyes. She let go of the throat she was gripping, allowing him to collapse onto the snow, legs spread apart, his body trembling slightly.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 此时此刻，玛拉再也无法抑制住眼底的兴奋，他松开了，掐住对方喉咙的手，任由对方双腿叉开瘫坐在雪地中，身躯微微颤抖。

0026.en: The ritual was over. From the looks of it, Selen An had undoubtedly and completely fallen and become a succubus. But one thing surprised her—judging by the new succubus features, Selen An had actually transformed into a rather rare high-tier succubus.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 仪式已经结束了，从结果上来看，毫无疑问，塞伦安已经彻彻底底的堕落成了魅魔，只是有一点让她感到意外——从对方心生的魅魔特征来看，塞伦安竟然还转化成了较为稀有的高阶魅魔。

0026.en: Normal demons could judge a bloodline's rank just by the wings. A succubus with black bat wings was nothing like a low or mid-tier succubus with ugly, fleshy wings.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 正常魔族仅凭双方的翅膀就可以判断出血统的高低，漆黑的蝙蝠翅魅魔可不是区区丑陋肉翅的中低阶魅魔可以比拟。

0026.en: Could this be the power of someone with a saintess's bloodline?
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 只能说不愧是圣女血脉的持有者吗？

0026.en: No matter how weak the person was, once their bloodline was tainted and corrupted, it could still show talent beyond the reach of ordinary people if it was nourished by some kind of power.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 即使本身再怎么差劲，血脉被污浊堕坏，可一旦得到了某种力量上的滋润，依旧能展现出常人可望而不可及的天赋。

0026.en: At this thought, the flames of jealousy burned fiercely in Mara's heart. Why was it that when they were both human, Selen An was a high and mighty noble, while she was a nameless nun whose cries for justice no one would hear? Now that they were both succubi, even though she had transformed years before, Selen An had still become a high-tier demon that she had to look up to.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 想到这，玛拉心中嫉妒的火焰熊熊燃烧，凭什么大家都是人类的时候，塞伦安是高高在上的贵族大少，她则是一个喊冤都无人聆听的无名修女，现在大家都成了魅魔，即使自己比她早几年惰化，现在她依旧成了高高在上，让自己需要抬头仰望的高阶魔族。

0026.en: The jealousy in a human's heart might be held back by reason and morals. But demons are a race without moral limits. Once jealousy filled her heart, revenge followed...
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 人类心中的嫉妒，或许还会因理智和道德稍加以压制，可魔族本身就是没有道德限制的种族，嫉妒一旦袭上心头，报复就随之而来……

0026.en: A demonic light flashed in Mara's hand, and a metal collar with mysterious magic symbols appeared in her palm. She looked at Selen An, who was still sitting on the snow as if dazed from the rebirth, and a cruel smile appeared on her lips.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 玛拉手中魔光闪烁，顿时，一个铭刻着有神秘魔法符文的金属项圈出现在她的掌心，她看向还瘫坐在雪地，仿佛刚刚经历新生，没缓过神来的塞伦安，嘴角露出一抹残忍的笑容。

0026.en: So what if she's a high-tier succubus?
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 高阶魅魔又如何？

0026.en: A newborn succubus is as fragile as a baby. As long as this slave collar is on her neck, even a high-tier succubus will be mine to command.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 新生的魅魔也如婴儿般脆弱，只要将这个奴隶项圈套在她的脖子上，即使是高阶魅魔也任由她摆布。

0026.en: A prisoner should kneel at my feet like a dog, begging for the victor's mercy and charity. I didn't drag Selen An into the abyss of corruption just to find myself a new master!
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 阶下囚就应该如狗一般跪趴在她的脚边，祈求胜利者的怜悯和施舍，她将塞伦安拖入堕落的深渊，可不是为了给自己找一个祖宗的！

0026.en: Once this slave collar is on her, no matter what incredible power she has, she won't be able to cause any trouble. If my plan succeeds, my own status among the demons will rise, since I will control a high-tier succubus.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 只要给她套上这个奴隶项圈，任被套上项圈者有通天的本事，也翻不出一丝浪花来，只要计划成功，日后在魔族中，掌控了一位高阶魅魔的自己地位也将水涨船高。

0026.en: Thinking this, Mara opened the collar in her hand, knelt down, and without any caution, prepared to put it on her...
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 如此想着玛拉打开了手中的项圈，蹲下身，毫无防备的准备，给对方戴上……

0026.en: A newborn succubus's body and mind are greatly shocked and twisted, so for a while after their transformation, they are in a state of extreme confusion. This was why Mara dared to be so careless while putting on the collar; after all, she had gone through the same thing.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 新生的魅魔肉体和精神都受到了极大的冲击和扭曲，所以在刚刚转化后的一段时间里，她们都处于一种极度恍神的状态，这也就是玛拉为什么敢如此不设防备的套项圈，毕竟自己当时就是这么过来的。

0026.en: But, just as the open collar was behind her neck and about to click shut, the smile on Mara's face froze. In the fading blizzard, the muffled sound of something sharp piercing flesh was exceptionally clear.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 可，眼看着打开的项圈已经绕到了脖子后，项圈的卡扣处即将扣紧，玛拉脸上的笑容却瞬间僵住，在愈发减弱的暴风雪中，那如利器入体的沉闷声异常的清晰。

0026.en: She looked down and saw a hand completely buried in her own stomach, like a sharp spear piercing through her.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 她低下头，只见一只手完全没入自己的腹部，就如锋利的长矛般，深深贯穿。

0026.en: The collar in her hand fell silently into the snow.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 手中的项圈随之掉落在雪地中，沉闷无声。

0026.en: Purple succubus blood splattered onto the white snow like paint. She looked up in disbelief and met that face, so alluring and demonic it seemed unreal.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 紫色的魅魔之血，如颜料般泼洒在洁白的雪地上，她不敢置信的抬起头，正对上那张魅惑妖异到不真实的脸庞。

0026.en: "It seems a succubus's claws can easily break through its own skin."
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
