0026.cn: “看来魅魔的利爪确实能轻易破开自身肌肤的防御。”

0026.en: The white-haired girl said calmly, her pink, heart-shaped pupils showing a deep, perhaps intentional, mockery.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 白发少女淡淡道，粉色的爱心瞳中似是有意无意的流露出深刻的讥讽。

0026.en: After speaking, she pulled her hand out from the other's stomach, bringing a large amount of blood and torn flesh with it.
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: 说完，她抽出了塞入对方腹部的手，连带出大量的血液与碎肉。

0026.en: Such a bad wound would be enough to make a person pass out from the pain. As the hand was pulled out, stirring the wound, Mara, despite the massive blood loss, still managed to endure the pain, beat her wings, and quickly retreat to create distance.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 如此严重的贯穿伤，几乎能让一个人彻底痛死晕厥过去，伤口被搅动拔出，大失血的情况下，玛拉依旧能忍住疼痛，振动翅膀急速后腿拉开距离。

0026.en: "It wasn't a fatal blow, huh~"
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: “没能一击毙命啊～”

0026.en: The white-haired succubus, who had been sitting on her knees in the snow, stood up. She tilted her head slightly, looking at the other's blood on her hand, her charming voice carrying a hint of madness.
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: 之前还以鸭子坐跪坐在雪地中的白发魅魔站了起来，她微微侧头看了看，手中沾染着对方的血迹，柔媚入骨的声音带着若有若无的癫狂。

0026.en: She sniffed her kin's blood in the air and couldn't help but stick out her tongue to lick her lips. Her body felt like a huge furnace, and inside that furnace, a fire called desire was burning fiercely.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她轻嗅空气中同族的血味，情不自禁的伸出香舌，舔了下嘴唇，自己的身体像是一个巨大的火炉，火炉庄正熊熊燃烧着名为欲望的火焰。

0026.en: Driven by desire and instinct, she now had two very strong urges.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 在欲望和本能的驱使下，现在的她有两种最强烈的冲动。

0026.en: The blood-stained hand instinctively wanted to reach for that untouched, pure place that no one had ever violated. But this body was ultimately still controlled by reason. She bit her tongue hard, and the sharp pain stopped her from this absurd act.
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: 沾染血迹的那一只手，情不自禁的想要伸向剩下那未经有任何人侵犯的纯洁之地，可这具身体终究还是由理智占据了主导，她猛地咬破了舌尖，刺痛让他阻止了这荒唐的行为。

0026.en: No, I can't do that. If I really did something like that on the battlefield, what would be the difference between me and Mara?
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: 不能，不能这么做，如果真的在战场上做出那种事情，自己和玛拉又有何区别？

0026.en: Since one of the strongest desires could not be released, it had to be directed to the other one—the nature of every demon, the nature called slaughter!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 既然最强烈的欲望，其中之一得不到释放，那就只能将其转向另一个，那一生每一个魔族的天性，名为杀戮的天性！

0026.en: Mara felt the newborn succubus's gaze on her, and it carried an unconcealed killing intent. Rage instantly exploded in her chest.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 玛拉感受到了对面那只新生魅魔看向自己的目光，竟然带上了那毫无遮掩的杀意，怒火顿时在胸腔中炸开。

0026.en: Her recent prey, who had just had a moment of luck, now dares to bare its teeth at her in a show of force. Unforgivable!
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 刚刚的猎物，不过是得到了片刻幸运的瞥视，眼下竟敢朝自己龇牙咧嘴，预想示威了，不可饶恕！

0026.en: The huge wound in her abdomen healed by more than half in just a few breaths. The bleeding stopped, and the tender new flesh at the wound was visibly squirming and closing.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 腹部巨大的贯穿伤仅仅几个呼吸的时间就已经愈合了大半，血液停止流淌，而伤口处娇嫩的肉芽正在以肉眼可见的速度蠕动并愈合。

0026.en: This was the powerful life force of demons, a powerful body that humans could never hope to match.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 这就是魔族强大的生命力，也是人类永远也无法企及的强大肉体。

0026.en: "You... you still have your consciousness from when you were human?"
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: “你竟然还保留了人类时期的意识？”

0026.en: Mara clutched her nearly healed wound, her eyes filled not only with anger but also with shock.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 玛拉捂着即将愈合的伤口，眼中不仅有愤怒，还有震惊。

0026.en: Why? The plan had gone exactly as she had expected. But not only had the other person turned into a higher-tier succubus than her, she had also retained her clear, human consciousness after the corruption.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 为什么？明明计划都是按照自己预料中进行，可对方不仅仅变成了比自己更高阶的高阶魅魔，还在经历了魔堕后，保留了清醒的人类意识。

0026.en: This was almost unheard of!
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 这几乎闻所未闻？！

0026.en: The power of corruption should have destroyed her human understanding and stripped away her original values and morals. But those eyes and that tone, besides the madness and killing intent of a demon, mostly showed a human's desire for revenge.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 堕落的力量本应该摧毁他人类的认知，剥夺原本的价值观和道德，那双眼睛和语气，除了附带了魔族的癫狂与杀戮，更多的则是一个人性的报仇。

0026.en: "Are you surprised? You should be. After all, if the life-and-death gamble I made couldn't make you panic, that would be against the rules of fate, wouldn't it?~"
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: “惊讶吗？惊讶就对了，毕竟我拿命赌来的可能不能令你惊慌失措，那可就太不符合命运的规则了～”

0026.en: A wild, crazed smile spread across "Selen An's" dangerously beautiful face. This mix of beauty and madness made Mara feel a new kind of fear.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 肆意癫狂的笑容，洋溢在“塞伦安”那张天生尤物的脸上，美与疯的交织，更让玛拉的心中升起了一股未知的恐惧。

0026.en: To be honest, from a magical power perspective, the current Selen An was still weaker than her. But facing this newborn demon, she felt a familiar sense of pressure, like when she faced General Kogsar.
0026.speaker: 玛拉
0026.cn: 实话说，现在的塞伦安从魔力角度上来看，虽然依旧不如她，可面对这么一只弱于她的初生恶魔，她却有一种面对克格萨将军时的熟悉感觉。

0026.en: "Only another succubus can kill a succubus. That's why I let you do what you wanted, Mara..."
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: “能杀死魅魔的只有另一个魅魔，所以这就是我任由你摆布的原因啊，玛拉……”

0026.en: "If you didn't turn me into a succubus, how could I use this power to kill you?"
0026.speaker: 塞伦安
0026.cn: “你不把我变成魅魔，我又怎么能够拿着这股力量来杀死你呢？”

0027.en: Chapter 27: Reset 27 Pure Combat
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 第27章 重置27 纯粹的战斗

0027.en: In the dying blizzard, two fires of sinful desire burned fiercely in the white snow.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 即将停歇的暴风雪中，两股名为欲望罪火在白皑中熊熊燃烧。

0027.en: Then they rushed at each other, leaving only afterimages. The intensity of the fight scattered the snow on the ground. The rapidly rising heat from their bodies melted the snow and evaporated the moisture, creating a cloud of steam in the extremely cold environment.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 然后相互扑向对方，只留残影于原地，战斗的激烈程度震荡到地面覆盖的雪花四溅，体表迅速升起的高温，融化了白雪，蒸发了水分，在这极度寒冷的环境下硬生生创造出一片水蒸白雾。

0027.en: This was a true battle between demons. There was no hint of thought, only pure killing intent. Every move was aimed at killing the other, a duel fought purely on the body's beastly instincts!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这才是魔族之间的战斗，没有感觉到一丝一毫的思考痕迹，只有纯粹的杀意，一招一式都只是想着致对方于死地，只凭自己身体野兽的本能厮杀的决斗！

0027.en: The fight was dazzling, not because it was filled with magic and light effects. On the contrary, both sides used their magic in a primitive way. Two forces of desire-filled magic clashed, strengthening their own bodies.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 战斗的实况太过眼花缭乱，这并非是因为这场决斗掺杂了太多的魔法元素与光污染，偏偏相反，双方对于魔力的使用都相对原始，两股充斥着欲望的魔力碰撞，强化作用于自身。

0027.en: The clash of succubus claws sparked. They seemed evenly matched, but Mara was older and had a clear advantage in combat experience over the newborn succubus. She forcefully parried "Selen An's" attack, and during that brief moment of stiffness, she quickly followed up. Her right hand swung at the succubus's relatively fragile neck, creating a sharp sound that tore through the air.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 魅魔利爪之间的交错，溅起点点火星，双方看似势均力敌，可玛拉毕竟年龄大，战斗经验方面相比于新生的魅魔也有较明显的优势，只见她用力抓弹开了“塞伦安”的进攻，趁此片刻僵直迅速追击，右手掀起撕裂空气的尖锐爆鸣朝着魅魔相对脆弱的脖颈挥出。

0027.en: Facing a strike so fast it was just an afterimage, the human Selen An would never have been able to dodge. Even if his eyes caught the trajectory of the attack, his stiff body could not have reacted in time. To attack and dodge like Mara required long-term training to activate the body and even develop muscle memory.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 面对这快到只有残影的一击，若是人类时期的塞伦安绝对躲不过，即使眼睛捕捉到了攻击的轨迹，可那僵硬的身体也绝对反应不过来，想要玛雅攻击并闪避，需要长时间的训练，以活化身体，甚至练出相应的肌肉记忆才行。

0027.en: But with no combat experience, she dodged it with a risky backbend. While the demon body's enhancement was a factor, this dodge was driven more by instinct.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 可毫无战斗经验的她却一个下腰险之又险的躲开，魔族身体的加成固然存在，但这一次闪避的成分，更多的是本能。

0027.en: Combat is a demon's instinct, even for a succubus, who is not skilled in fighting among demons. Killing and dodging are etched into their very genes.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 战斗是魔族的本能，即使是魔族中不善于战斗的魅魔亦是如此，厮杀与躲闪攻击是刻印进骨子里的基因。

0027.en: "Die! Die! Die!"
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “快去死！快去死！快去死！”

0027.en: In the blur of afterimages, Mara's eyes were red with killing intent. At this moment, she had lost all desire to toy with her prey. Her attacks were vicious, cunning, and venomous, aimed only at quickly taking her opponent's life.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 在交错的残影中，玛拉已经完全杀红了眼，此刻，她已完全没了那种调戏猎物的心情，攻击角度凶残而刁钻阴毒，只想迅速取了对方的性命。

0027.en: The longer it dragged on, the more shocked and angry she became. It was just a newborn succubus, even if it was a high-ranking one, it was still just a sprout that hadn't grown. Even a powerful dragon whelp could still be easily hunted by an experienced knight.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 时间拖的越长，她就越发的感到惊怒交加，明明只是个新生不久的魅魔，就算是高阶魅魔，也不过是还未成长起来的嫩芽，就是强大如巨龙的幼崽，依旧容易被老练的骑士猎杀。

0027.en: That was the theory. But why, in her case, was she sweating more and more as the fight went on?
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 理论上是如此，可为什么到了她这儿，这战斗怎么越打背后的汗越多？

0027.en: Perhaps the human body had sealed his bloodline and talents. Once corrupted, although the bloodline was tainted, it also, in a way, unleashed the power locked within the divine blood. An adult succubus fighting a newborn succubus to a sweat? What a joke!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 或许是人类的身躯封锁了他的血脉与天赋，一旦魔堕，虽然污染了血脉，却也从另一种层面上解放了那封锁在神之血脉中的力量，成年的魅魔打一只新生魅魔打的满头是汗，开什么玩笑？！

0027.en: Shifting the perspective to Selen An, her side wasn't easy either. Although the succubus body had boosted her combat power for a short time, she had been a succubus for too little time. So little time that she didn't have a chance to get used to this body before being forced into battle.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 视角转移到塞伦安这里，她这边其实也并不轻松，魅魔的身体虽然短时间内提升了她的战斗力，可他成为魅魔的时间太过短暂，短暂到甚至没容她完全熟悉这副身躯就不得不仓促进入战斗。

0027.en: Facing Mara's almost crazed assault, she could only manage to defend herself through instinct. Although they both managed to injure each other, the wounds on her own body were clearly more numerous. Even though her healing was faster than Mara's, the constant self-healing was making her body feel tired and sore...
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 面对玛拉近乎疯狂般的进攻，她也只能凭借本能勉强招架，虽然彼此都对对方成功造成了伤害，可自己身上的伤痕明显居多，即使愈合速度快于玛拉，但连续不断的自愈消耗，也让这具身躯感到疲倦和酸痛……

0027.en: Her stamina was draining like an open floodgate. A high-ranking succubus certainly had a higher potential than Mara, but having just become one, how could she reach that limit? Mara was clearly superior in terms of endurance. This could be seen from the frequency of their attacks. Her own claw strikes were getting slower, gradually unable to keep up with Mara's speed. While Mara was also tiring, her condition was visibly better.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 体力如开闸泄水般迅速消耗，高阶魅魔的上限的确比玛拉高，可刚刚成为魅魔的她怎么可能摸到上限，耐力方面玛拉明显更优于自己，这从双方的攻击频率可以看出，自己挥爪的速度越来越慢，逐渐跟不上玛拉的速度，而玛拉虽也有体力消耗，状态却肉眼可见的看得出来比她好。

0027.en: Demons are extremely sensitive to the details of a fight. Mara noticed that Selen An's attacks were losing their rhythm and immediately pressed her advantage. More and more of her attacks landed, and the dense wounds came too fast to heal. This new body was about to be overwhelmed...
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 魔族对于战斗细节极其敏锐，玛拉察觉到塞伦安的攻势逐渐跟不上节奏，立即乘胜追击，落在他身上的攻击越来越多，密集的伤口多到来不及自愈，这具新身体即将被拖垮……

0027.en: Finally, Mara caught a major opening in Selen An's defense. Instantly, all her magic power gathered in her right hand. The fleshy wings on her back trembled, and the powerful thrust propelled the succubus's light body forward in a nearly unavoidable rush. Her right hand, with fingers held together like a spear and enhanced by magic, pierced through Selen An's undefended abdomen.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 终于，玛拉抓住了塞伦安一个较大的间隙，顿时，全身的魔力汇聚右手，身后肉翅震颤，强大的推动力带动魅魔轻盈的身躯以几乎无法躲避的姿态突进，右手五指并拢如矛，在魔力的加持下，洞穿了来不及防御的塞伦安的腹部。

0027.en: Her arm went straight through from front to back. The blood splattered on Mara's face, making the fanatical excitement in her eyes look even more demonic.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 手臂直接从身前贯穿到了身后，身上的血液溅在玛拉的脸上，令她眼中狂热的兴奋更显妖异。

0027.en: She met the other's wide, rapidly fading pink, heart-shaped pupils. Her long tongue licked the blood from her face with great pleasure.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她对上了对方放大又迅速失神的粉红色桃心瞳，细长的舌头舔拭着脸上残留的血液，无比陶醉。

0027.en: "It seems I've won, Master."
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “看来是我赢了呢，少爷。”

0027.en: Selen An seemed to want to speak, but the blood rising in her throat only allowed her to utter a hoarse "You."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 塞伦安看似想要发出声音，可已经涌上喉头的鲜血让她只能发出沙哑的一声“你”字。

0027.en: "Even with your abdomen pierced, a succubus doesn't die so easily. But even if you don't die, Master, you must pay the price for your foolish actions."
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “即使被洞穿了腹部，魅魔也没有那么容易死亡，不过就算不死，少爷，你也必须为自己愚蠢的行为付出代价。”

0027.en: As she spoke, Mara's eyes were filled with cruelty and bloodlust.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 说话时，玛拉的眼中充满了残忍与血腥。

0027.en: "This noble demon bloodline is truly wasted on you. Since this was a battle for our fates, the loser should give up everything. Now, I will devour your bloodline!"
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “这副高贵的魔族血统给你可真是浪费了，既然是赌上命运的战斗，败者就应该付出一切，如今我要吞噬掉你的血统！”

0027.en: Mara's body was trembling, not from fear, but from excitement.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 玛拉的身体在抖，可这非害怕，而是激动的在抖。

0027.en: Selen An's accidental transformation into a high-ranking succubus was both an accident and an opportunity. Bloodlines were extremely important among demons. A demon transformed from a human usually had a very low status, just a slave to be ordered around, as General Kexar saw them.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 塞伦安偶然堕落成高阶魅魔，是意外，也是机会，魔族之间也极其看重血统，像由人类转化成的魔族往往地位极其低下，就如在克克萨将军眼里一样，只是个任由驱使的奴隶。

0027.en: But it would be different once she devoured Selen An's bloodline. Besides inheriting bloodlines like humans, demons also had the bloody method of devouring. A low-ranking demon could evolve into a high-ranking demon by devouring the bloodline of a high-ranking one.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 可一旦吞食了塞伦安的血统就不一样了，魔族的血统除了与人类相同的血脉遗传，还存在吞噬这一血腥的方式，低阶魔族可以通过吞噬高阶魔族的血脉，从而进化成上位魔族。

0027.en: However, in the normal demon world, this was almost impossible. Not to mention that it was nearly impossible for a low-ranking demon to defeat a high-ranking one. In a battle with the goal of seizing the opponent's bloodline, defeat meant death. Even a newborn high-ranking demon would be protected by other high-ranking demons, who would never allow a malicious demon a chance to strike.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 只是这种情况放在正常的魔界，几乎不可能，先不说低阶魔族几乎没有战胜高阶魔族的可能，像这种以夺取对方血脉为目标的战斗，败之即死，就算是还未成长起来的高阶魔族新生儿，身旁也必然有高阶魔族的守护，绝无可能放任让心怀不轨的魔族有下手的机会。

0027.en: But right here, right now, was such an opportunity: a newborn, still weak, high-ranking succubus.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 可眼下就有这么一个机会放在眼前，新生的还处于虚弱的高阶魅魔。

0027.en: Currently, she was the only one who knew that Selen An had become a high-ranking succubus. If she devoured her bloodline, no one would stop her. General Kogsath only wanted Selen An alive after her corruption anyway.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 如今得知塞伦安成为高阶魅魔的消息只有自己一人知道，自己如要吞噬她的血脉，不会有任何人来阻止，反正克格萨将军只是要堕落后活着的塞伦安。

0027.en: Due to the strong life force of demons, Selen An wouldn't die even if her bloodline was devoured. She would become a useless demon without a bloodline, with no chance of ever rising again. Her status in the demon world would be so low that she might even be classified among the lowest and filthiest ranks, like ghouls.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 由于魔族生命力极强的缘故，塞伦安即使被自己吞噬了血脉，也并不会死去，她会沦落成毫无血脉的废魔族，这样她就再无翻身的可能，在魔界地位低下到甚至会被归类为食尸鬼这样最卑贱肮脏的地位。

0027.en: Even if General Kogsath investigated later, so what?
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 就算克格萨将军事后追究起来，那又如何呢？

0027.en: In the demon world, strength was what mattered. Once she devoured the bloodline and became a high-ranking succubus, she would escape her previously humble status. Combined with the credit for capturing Selen An, she might even rise to a position equal to General Kogsath!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 在魔界，魔族是以实力说话的，等自己吞食的血脉，成为了高阶魅魔，她就将脱离原先那等卑微的地位，再加上抓到塞伦安的头功，她甚至有可能上升到与克格萨将军平起平坐！

0027.en: At this thought, her gaze on Selen An grew even more feverish.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 一想到这，她看你像塞伦安的眼神愈发火热。

0027.en: "Don't worry, your bloodline will be well nurtured within my body, and I will take your place as a new great demon in the demon world!"
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “放心，你的血脉将在我的体内好好酝酿，而我将代替你成为魔界中的新生代大魔族！”

0027.en: The heavily injured Selen An lifted her head. There was no despair in her pink, heart-shaped pupils. Under Mara's confused gaze, she suddenly shot out her left hand and placed it on the other's shoulder, her five fingers gripping like iron pincers.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 重伤的塞伦安抬起头，粉色的桃心瞳中却看不到绝望，她只是在玛拉不解的目光中猛的伸出左手，搭在对方的肩头上，五指如铁钳般死死钳住了对方的双肩。

0027.en: "This way... you can't escape, can you?"
0027.speaker: 塞伦安
0027.cn: “这样……你就逃不掉了吧？”

0027.en: Her voice was weak, but it carried a thick, noticeable smile.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她的声音虚弱，却带着浓郁可查的笑意。

0027.en: "What are you talking about... Agh?!"
0027.speaker: 玛拉
0027.cn: “你在说什么……呃啊？！”

0027.en: A vaguely familiar feeling, the dull sound of a sharp object piercing flesh.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 略感熟悉的感觉，那是锐气刺入体内的沉闷声响。

0027.en: "Tsssss..."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: “滋滋滋滋……”

0027.en: White smoke was accompanied by a piercing sizzle. Besides the smell of blood, the air now carried the scent of burnt flesh.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 白烟伴随着刺耳的滋滋声，空气中除开血腥味，又多出了火焰炙烤血肉的焦炭味。

0027.en: She looked down and saw that the beautiful, unsharpened holy sword, which looked like a work of art, was halfway buried in her abdomen. The hand gripping the hilt, still sizzling with white smoke, belonged to Selen An, who had become a succubus.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她低下头，只见那柄华美达犹如艺术品般的无锋圣剑，半段剑身没入自己的腹部，抓着剑柄还呲呲冒白烟的的手，来自已经成为魅魔的塞伦安。

0027.en: PS: Happy May Day, everyone!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: ps：各位，五一快乐！

0028.en: Chapter 28: Reset 28 - Lay Down Your Sword and Be My Wife
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 第28章 重置28 放下剑，做吾的妻子

0028.en: "You're insane..."
0028.speaker: 玛拉
0028.cn: “你疯了……”

0028.en: The blunt ceremonial sword went through Mara's body. It was a terrible wound, but she felt no pain. She didn't fight back because all her power was gone.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 无锋的祭礼圣剑贯穿了玛拉的身躯，如此重的伤，她却未感到任何痛苦，没有疼痛，没有反抗，因为身体内的所有力量都被抽空。

0028.en: The Sword of Peace was not made for killing, but its purpose was to stop demons.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 和平的圣剑本身不愿带来杀戮，可它创造出来的意义就是为了克制魔族。

0028.en: Blood came from the corner of Selen An's mouth. As a newborn demon, not yet strong, a wound through her abdomen was serious enough to kill her.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 塞伦安嘴角沁出鲜血，作为一个魔族新生儿，还未来得及发育成长就被贯穿腹部，这样的重伤也足以危及到她的性命。

0028.en: But compared to holding the holy sword, the wound in her abdomen felt like nothing. For a succubus to hold a holy sword brought immediate punishment. Her new skin felt like it was burning on red-hot iron. White smoke rose with the smell of burnt flesh.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可相比较于双手与圣剑剑柄的接触，腹部的贯穿伤也好似并没有想象中那般严重，以魅魔之躯手握圣剑，惩罚也随之而临，崭新的肌肤像是被直接摁在了烧红的烙铁上炙烤，呲呲冒出的白烟混杂着血肉烧灼后的焦炭味。

0028.en: The pain was unbearable, like being thrown into molten steel. Her skin and bones felt like they were turning to ash under the sword's judgment.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 那难以忍受的疼痛，更像是将他全身扔入了千度高温的钢水，肌肤与骨骼都将在圣剑审判下碳化。

0028.en: Even so, she didn't dare let go of the sword. She had paid a high price for this moment. Selen An knew a beginner couldn't beat an expert. To kill her enemy, she had to use tempting bait.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可即便如此，她仍不敢放下手中的剑，付出了如此大的代价，她就为此刻一瞬，塞伦安深知新生的雏儿定然斗不过老辣的姜，想要杀死对方，就必定要付出足够诱人的饵。

0028.en: The bait was herself. Whether Mara wanted to kill or capture her, she needed to find a moment to lock them together, making sure neither could escape. Only then could she be sure to strike true.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而这个诱饵就是她自己，无论玛拉是想杀死自己，还是抓住自己，她都将寻找一个机会，一个将双方死死固定在一起，确保哪一方都无法逃脱的时刻，只有这样才能确保一击必中。

0028.en: She didn't even know what would happen to her for using the holy sword. A demon touching a holy sword was an insult to the divine. Anyone who broke the rules and insulted the sacred had to pay a terrible price.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 因为连她自己也不知道，使用圣剑的自己会怎么样，魔族触碰圣剑这一行为本身就是对神性的玷污，而作为神明的造物，违反规则玷污者，必然要付出惨痛的代价。

0028.en: She was already tasting that price—a pain worse than death. But even so, she had to do it...
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 如今的她已经品尝到代价的滋味，是一种生不如死的煎熬，可即便如此，她也要这么做……

0028.en: Watching Mara's face dry up and lose its life, she used her last bit of strength to form a weak but triumphant smile.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 望着玛拉逐渐干枯失去生命的脸庞，她挤出全身的最后一丝力气，扯动嘴角，露出了一抹虚弱而又得意的微笑。

0028.en: "Mara, I won this time."
0028.speaker: 塞伦安
0028.cn: “玛拉，这一次是我赢了。”

0028.en: Only when the succubus before her was a dried corpse did Selen An try to let go of the sword. But she had held it too long. Her punished hands were nearly burned and stuck to the hilt.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 直到面前的魅魔被彻底抽干了生机，成了一具干尸，塞伦安才肯松开剑柄，可由于握剑的时间太长，遭到惩罚的双手几乎被烧糊粘在了剑柄上，无法松开。

0028.en: She fell weakly into the snow, taking Mara's body with her. The blizzard was ending, and the last few snowflakes fell. The cool drops on her cheek felt refreshing.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她无力的歪倒在雪地中，连带着玛拉的身体，逐渐停息的暴风雪降下了最后几点雪花，冰凉的白沫滴在脸颊带来淡淡凉意。

0028.en: She was so weak she couldn't feel her hands. Her vision turned black, and her eyelids felt heavy as lead.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 虚弱的她已感受不到双手的存在，视野中一阵泛黑，眼皮也如住了铅般沉重。

0028.en: Am I going to die? she wondered.
0028.speaker: 塞伦安
0028.cn: 要死了吗？

0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她心中喃喃。

0028.en: Mara was right. What she did was insane. A succubus killing another succubus with a holy sword... whether she succeeded or not, she was doomed to die from the sword's punishment.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 玛拉说的对，她这一举动与疯了无异，魅魔用圣剑杀死魅魔，无论这个计划是否成功，她都必然在圣剑的惩罚机制下失去生命。

0028.en: But she had won her bet. She took Mara with her before she died. It was an extreme plan, but she had to do it...
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但好在她赌对了，临死之前带走了玛拉，虽然说这么做很激进，可她必须这么做……

0028.en: Killing Mara meant she had broken free from the original story's fate. She had changed the future, rewriting destiny with her life and her enemy's blood.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 杀死玛拉，从某种意义上来讲，意味着她挣脱了原剧情与命运的束缚和操控，她改变了未来既定的事实，用这条命和敌人的血篡改了命运的发展。

0028.en: Heh, in the end, this body's luck wasn't so bad after all...
0028.speaker: 塞伦安
0028.cn: 呵，到头来，这具身体的运气也不是那么狗屎嘛……

0028.en: I wonder if this little change will affect everyone else's fate...
0028.speaker: 塞伦安
0028.cn: 也不知道自己的这点改变，是否能影响到大家的命运呢……

0028.en: She heard footsteps in the distance. She had lost too much blood and could only see a blurry shape. It looked like a young woman running toward her, and she could faintly hear someone calling her name.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 远处传来脚步声，失血过多的她只能捕捉到模糊的画面，远处好似一个人类少女的身影朝着她跑来，却能隐约的听到有人呼唤自己的名字。

0028.en: It must be a hallucination...
0028.speaker: 塞伦安
0028.cn: 是幻觉吧……

0028.en: she thought mockingly as the darkness swallowed her consciousness and the sky grew dim.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 黑暗吞没意识的前一刻，她看着逐渐暗下的天空，心中自嘲。

0028.en: On another battlefield, the extreme cold had killed countless demons. The one who created this ice field was also at her limit.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 另一片战场，极寒夺走了无数魔族的生命，而创造出这片冰雪领域的始作俑者也已经油尽灯枯。

0028.en: The Saintess leaned on her sword, kneeling in the blood-stained snow. Her sacred dress was torn and damaged, and her silver hair was matted with blood and dirt.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 圣女杵着剑，半跪在染满鲜血的雪地中，圣洁的裙袍被砍出无数的破损与缺口，银色的长发也染满了血渍与污秽。

0028.en: Her body, which once had almost endless magic, could not produce another drop. She had no idea how many demons she had killed. The number was probably too high to count.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 往日里近乎拥有无穷无尽魔力的身躯，此刻却再难以榨出哪怕一丝一点的魔力，她已不知道凭借这双手斩首了多少魔族，庞大的数字恐怕无法计算。

0028.en: But after sending away so many demons, she had no strength left to deal with the most important one. The ground trembled as he walked. His tower-like body approached, and his shadow completely covered the kneeling Serenia.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只是送走了这么多魔族，却唯独没有力气解决最重要的那位——大地因他的脚步而震颤，如铁塔般的身躯靠近，移动的阴影将半跪在地的瑟蕾妮娅完全笼罩。

0028.en: She raised her head to meet the hellish eyes of Demon General Kog'Soth.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她昂起头，对上魔将克格萨的地狱双瞳。

0028.en: "Impressive. You killed so many of my soldiers and even my mount, right under my nose. I admire your strength."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “真是了不起，杀了吾这么多士兵，还能在吾的眼皮子底下斩杀吾的坐骑，你的实力令人钦佩。”

0028.en: The Demon General's voice was hoarse and deep.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 魔将的声音沙哑且厚重。

0028.en: He knew how terrifying this young woman was. She had single-handedly caused devastating damage to an entire cavalry of demons, all while protecting three burdens.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他深知眼前这位少女的恐怖，单枪匹马给一整只魔族铁骑带来近乎毁灭性的杀伤，这还是在带了三个累赘的情况下。

0028.en: He had watched as the demon cavalry was about to destroy the old wooden hut. Serenia had crushed a space crystal to teleport away that useless woman.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他亲眼看见当魔族的铁骑即将冲垮那间腐朽的木屋，瑟蕾妮娅捏碎了空间水晶，将那个毫无作用的女人传送走了。

0028.en: She had used her most important life-saving item on a commoner who had nothing to do with her. This left her with only one option: to fight alone in a desperate situation.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她将身上最重要的保命底牌用在了一位与自己毫无干系的贱民身上，而这也就导致了他只剩下孤身苦战这一条堪称绝境的道路。

0028.en: Serenia showed no reaction to the Demon General's praise. Even her ice-blue eyes were empty of emotion.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 面对大魔族将军的赞赏，瑟蕾妮娅毫无表情，就连那双冰蓝色的眸子没有任何波澜。

0028.en: "A pity. If you had brought your own holy knights, you might have actually won this time."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “可惜了，如果你带了自己的圣骑士团，这一次或许还真有可能被你得逞。”

0028.en: As the most direct link to the gods, a Saintess not only had divine power but also commanded her own Holy Knight Order. Each knight in this order was personally chosen and blessed by the Saintess herself.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 圣女作为与神明最直接的关联和象征，除了自身拥有能创造神迹的力量，每一位圣女都拥有着一整队神圣骑士团，而这支骑士团里面的骑士全都由圣女本人亲自册封加以赐福。

0028.en: It was, in effect, her private army. Their only purpose was to ensure her safety, and not even the Church could command them.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可以说，这完全是一支独属于圣女的私兵，他们的存在只为保证圣女的安全，即使教廷也无权调遣和管控。

0028.en: He had also heard rumors about the Ice Saintess's Holy Knight Order. In the years since she took her title, the most important position of First Knight had remained empty. This strange fact had attracted the attention of the demon world.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 还有关于冰之圣女的圣骑士团，他也有所耳闻，听说这位冰之圣女的继位几年间，圣骑士团中最重要的首席圣骑士却迟迟没有册封，而这个异常也足以引起了魔界的关注。

0028.en: As for the reason, perhaps only the Ice Saintess herself knew.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 至于原因，或许只有冰之圣女本人才知道了。

0028.en: Kog'Soth stared deeply at the cold, stubborn girl kneeling on the ground. He admired her, but he also did not hide his desire to possess her.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 克格萨深深地望着半跪在地面上冰冷而倔强的少女，他欣赏这位少女，同时也丝毫不加以掩饰对她的占有和贪欲。

0028.en: "Daughter of Glacies, your beauty and strength have earned my respect. Especially those stubborn eyes... they truly delight me. So..."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “格莱西斯的子嗣啊，你的美貌与实力得到了吾的认可，特别是那双倔强的眸子，真是令吾欢喜，所以……”

0028.en: "Lay down your sword and become my wife."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “放下剑，成为吾的妻子。”

0028.en: Demon General Kog'Soth crossed his arms and made his declaration like a king.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 大魔族克格萨双手环抱于胸前，如同君王般如此宣告道。

0028.en: Serenia froze. She looked down, her exhausted body trembling. But she still used all her strength to stand up, leaning on her sword. Her blood-stained silver hair blew in the wind. She pulled her sword from the ground, pointed it at Kog'Soth, her ice-blue eyes filled with endless cold.
0028.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0028.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅一怔，低下头，力竭的娇躯在颤抖，可她还是拼尽全力撑着剑艰难的站了起来，沾满血渍的银发在风中飘扬，她拔出嵌入土中的剑，指向克格萨，冰蓝色的眼眸中是无尽的寒意。

0028.en: "In your dreams!"
0028.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0028.cn: “你做梦！”

0028.en: The next second, four dark spears pierced her limbs, nailing her to the ground on her knees.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 下一秒，她的四肢被四根漆黑的凶矛贯穿，双膝跪倒着钉在了地上。

0028.en: Red blood splattered, and her torn dress fluttered like a canary with broken wings, about to be chained and locked in a cage.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 殷红的鲜血飞溅，残破的裙摆飘扬，如同被折翼的金丝雀，即将被带上镣铐，锁住牢笼。

0028.en: "I am making a declaration, not asking for your consent."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “吾是在宣告，而非征求你的同意。”

0028.en: "You will be my wife. This is a fact that cannot be changed. Give up your useless resistance. I will perform a baptism here and grant you the body of my kin..."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “你将成为吾的妻子，这将是无法更改的事实，放弃无谓的抵抗，吾将会在此，降下洗礼，赐予你同族的身躯……”

0028.en: "Then, you will no longer be the Saintess of the human race, but my own Demon Queen."
0028.speaker: 克格萨
0028.cn: “如此一来，你将不再是人族的圣女，而是独属于吾的魔族王妃。”

0029.en: Chapter 29: Reset 29 - The Death of Selen An
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 第29章 重置29 塞伦安之死

0029.en: Four black spears pierced her four limbs, leaving Serenia unable to move.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 四根黑矛分别贯穿了四肢，令瑟蕾妮娅动弹不得。

0029.en: The silver-haired girl gritted her teeth. Even with her pale face, she never let out a single cry of pain or a moan. The black spears in her body sealed her magic flow, completely blocking the only way for it to recover naturally.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 银发少女紧咬牙关，纵使面色苍白，她却始终未发出哪怕一丝痛呼或呻吟，入体的黑矛封锁了魔力的流动，更是完全堵死了魔力自然恢复的唯一途径。

0029.en: The great demon, who was built like an iron tower, approached step by step. His hell-red eyes stared at the stubborn girl before him as if admiring an item.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 身形似铁塔般的大魔族一步步的靠近，地狱的赤红之瞳用欣赏物品般的眼神打量着眼前这位倔强的少女。

0029.en: On this expedition, not only had he retrieved the pawn, Selen An, as ordered, but he had also unexpectedly captured the Saintess of the Glacies family. He thought about how this pure Saintess, worshiped by thousands in the human kingdom and chosen by the gods, would be claimed by him today and become his wife.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这一次出征，不仅按要求回收了塞伦安这枚棋子，现在竟还意外的抓住了格莱西斯家的圣女，一想到人类国度万人崇敬，神明选定的纯洁圣女今日就要染上他的颜色，成为他的妻子。

0029.en: If his face wasn't covered by a heavy visor, he, a great demon, would have probably burst into joyful laughter.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 若不是脸部被厚重的面甲遮盖，身为大魔族的他恐怕也要愉悦大笑起来。

0029.en: When his heavy shadow completely covered the girl, Kogsa leaned down slightly, reached out, and lifted her chin, forcing her to meet his gaze.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 当厚重的阴影完全将少女遮盖，克格萨微微俯下身，伸出手挑起了少女的下颌，迫使她与自己对视。

0029.en: "You are quite good, but you have been made weak by human emotions. If not for that useless boy, I would never have been able to catch you. But since you have fallen into my hands, I will make you understand that strong and beautiful females are born to be conquered..."
0029.speaker: 克格萨
0029.cn: “你很不错，但却因人类的感情而变得软弱，若非为了那个废物小子吾根本不可能抓到你，但既然你落到了吾的手上，吾就要让你明白，强大而美丽的雌性天生就是要被征服的……”

0029.en: "That boy clearly does not deserve you. The one destined to conquer you is me!"
0029.speaker: 克格萨
0029.cn: “那个小子显然不配拥有你，而命中注定征服你的人，便是吾！”

0029.en: "Whether you accept or refuse, you will eventually find pleasure beneath me. Once you taste that unforgettable joy, even the most holy Saintess will not be able to turn back."
0029.speaker: 克格萨
0029.cn: “无论你是接受还是拒绝，最后都必然承欢于吾的胯下，一旦品尝到那刻骨铭心的欢愉，就算是再圣洁的圣女，也都将无法回头。”

0029.en: Kogsa's words were a shameless spiritual defilement for a Saintess. Serenia glared back at him with eyes that wanted to kill him. Interested, Kogsa increased his aura of pressure, wanting to force her to submit.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 克格萨所说的话，对于一位圣女而言已然是肆无忌惮的精神玷污，瑟蕾妮娅用要杀了他的眼神与之对视，克格萨则饶有兴趣的加大自身的威压，想要借此让其臣服。

0029.en: In Kogsa's eyes, this was like breaking a hawk. Only by completely crushing the girl's pride with raw power could he double the enjoyment of the Saintess's soft and sweet submission in humiliation.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 在克格萨的眼中，此举就类比熬鹰，只有凭借硬实力彻底压垮少女的骄傲，才能加倍享受圣女屈辱臣服后的柔软与香甜。

0029.en: Throughout history, every Saintess had only two fates on the battlefield: victory or death. Even in desperate situations, they would rather take their own lives than give the demons a chance to capture them. They would never allow the demons an opportunity to defile their purity, which they valued more than life itself.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 历史上，历代圣女在战场上都只有凯旋和战死两种结局，即使陷入绝境，就算是自杀，她们也不会给魔族俘虏自己的机会，绝不允许让魔族有玷污自身贞洁的机会，这在她们眼中是比生命还要重要之物。

0029.en: Previous generations of great demons never had the chance, but now the opportunity had fallen into his hands. Kogsa believed he would be the first great demon in the history of the demon world to enjoy such an honor.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 以前的历代大魔族是没有机会，而今机会落到了他手中，克格萨相信自己将是魔界历史上第一个享有此等殊荣的大魔族。

0029.en: The powerful pressure made it incredibly difficult for the already weak girl to even breathe, but she did not back down. Just when Kogsa thought this would be a long struggle, the stubborn girl, who had been unyielding just a moment ago, suddenly lowered her head as if giving up, her body trembling slightly.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 强大的威压令本就虚弱的少女连呼吸都变得无比艰难，可她还是一步不退，就当克格萨以为这将是一场持久战时，刚刚还宁折不屈的倔强少女，却突然像是放弃般低垂下了头，连带着她的身躯都有隐隐的颤抖。

0029.en: Ha, has she realized the gap between us and finally accepted her fate?
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 呵，是意识到与自己的差距，彻底接受命运了吗？

0029.en: "Selen An..."
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “塞伦安……”

0029.en: But where he couldn't see, the girl's lowered face was not one of surrender, but a deathly, ashen gray.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 可就在他看不到的地方，垂头的少女脸色不像是放弃挣扎，而是灰白的……死寂。

0029.en: She whispered the familiar name to herself in disbelief, her once-brilliant ice-blue eyes losing all their color.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 她不可置信的自言自语呢喃着那熟悉的名字，昔日璀璨的冰蓝色美眸，失去了所有色彩。

0029.en: How is this possible?
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: 怎么可能？

0029.en: The mark she had left on Selen An was sending a signal of death. Selen An was dead. Through the mark, she could no longer feel any sign of life or warmth from him. His heartbeat had stopped, declaring his end.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 自己在塞伦安身上留下来的印记，竟然传来了死亡的讯号，塞伦安死了，通过印记，她再也无法感受到对方身上任何一点生机和温度，心脏的跳动戛然而止，宣告了那人的结局。

0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “为什么……”

0029.en: "Hm?"
0029.speaker: 克格萨

0029.en: Kogsa caught the lowered girl's whisper, feeling confused.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 克格萨捕捉到了垂头少女的低语，感到疑惑。

0029.en: Just as he was about to reach out and force her head up again, Serenia's face lifted without warning. Their eyes met again, and in that brief moment of contact, Kogsa felt a chilling sensation, as if his hands and feet had turned to ice.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 就当他再次准备伸手欲故技重施的将少女的头强行抬起时，瑟蕾妮娅的脸颊毫无预兆的抬起，双方的眸子再次与之对视，仅仅是这一瞬间的接触，却让克格萨有了一丝紧刻间手脚冰凉的错觉。

0029.en: Her original sapphire-like eyes had lost all their brilliance. They were still beautiful, but it was as if something had stolen all their light in that short time, leaving behind only the gray emptiness of despair.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 原先那双蓝宝石般的眸子失去了所有光彩，美眸依旧是美眸，可就像是有什么东西在这短暂的时间内夺去了她的所有光彩，剩下的便是万念俱灰的灰白。

0029.en: "Why did you kill him?"
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “为什么要杀死他？”

0029.en: "Why would you rather kill him than let him live?! It's always like this... Everyone, you just take away the most precious things in my life, one by one, even the faintest, fleeting flicker of light..."
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “为什么你们宁愿杀死他，也不愿意放他一条生路？！永远都是这样……无论是谁，你们只会将我生命中最宝贵的东西一一剥夺，哪怕是转瞬即逝的微弱火光……”

0029.en: "You wouldn't even spare that?!"
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “你们也不愿意放过吗？！”

0029.en: Her desperate questions were tinged with a sob she didn't even notice. Large teardrops rolled down her cheeks. A beauty was in tears, yet no one felt any tenderness, because the moment the hot tears fell, they froze into ice!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 绝望的质问，连带着少女自己都未察觉的哭腔，豆大般的泪珠从她的脸颊滑落，美人落泪，可却无一人感到娇俏怜惜，因为那滴滚烫的泪在滴落的瞬间并凝结成冰！

0029.en: The blizzard that had stopped, like embers fanned back to life in a pile of ash, was reignited once more...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 原本已经停息的暴风雪，像是灰烬堆中重新被风吹亮的余烬，再一次被重新点燃……

0029.en: But this time was different from the last. There was no divine radiance, no brilliant holy light. The cold wind no longer scraped against the face like a steel knife but was a chill that came from the bottom of the heart.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 而这一次不同于上一次，没有神代的光华，没有璀璨的神辉，那寒冷的风不再如钢刀般刮过脸庞，而是发自心底的冰凉。

0029.en: "You!"
0029.speaker: 克格萨

0029.en: Kogsa suddenly felt something was wrong. He was about to retreat but found his legs covered in a thick layer of white frost. From discovery to reaction, it took only a few seconds, and his legs, which were merely trapped by ice and snow, had quickly gone numb.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 克格萨顿感不妙，刚想后撤，却发现自己的双腿不知何时已附上了一层厚厚的白霜，从发现到反应过来，不过短短数秒，原本只是被冰雪简单禁锢的双腿已迅速没了知觉。

0029.en: A touch of fear crept into Kogsa's heart. He was a great demon of the demon world, a noble existence second only to the Demon King. His powerful bloodline made him invincible on the battlefield, yet this power was crumbling before a chill as pale as death itself, which stole all life...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 一抹恐惧漫上了克格萨的心头，要知道他可是魔界中的大魔族，是仅次于魔王的高贵存在，强大的血脉让他在战场上无往不利，可这份力量却在面对苍白如死神般夺取生机的冰寒下溃退……

0029.en: This was not the power a normal person should have, not even a Saintess who inherited the blood of a god.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这不是一个正常人该有的力量，即使是继承神明之血的圣女，也不可能。

0029.en: Realizing something was wrong, Kogsa didn't hesitate. It was too late to stop the deathly blizzard the girl had unleashed. Dark demonic power gathered in his hand, and a giant bone axe glowing with a faint light suddenly appeared. Kogsa twisted his waist and mercilessly swung the giant axe at his own legs.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 意识到不对劲的克格萨没有丝毫的犹豫，由少女掀起的这场死亡暴风雪已来不及阻止，只见他手中幽暗魔力汇聚，一柄凝聚着幽光的白骨巨斧骤然出现在他的手中，克格萨腰部发力，毫不留情的轮动巨斧斩向自己的双腿。

0029.en: Ordinary demons had extremely strong life force, let alone a noble great demon. Even if he lost his legs, as long as he could return to the demon world alive, there were ways to recover. But if he were to perish in this deathly blizzard...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 普通魔族的生命力都极为顽强，更何况是高贵的大魔族，即使失去了双腿，只要能活着回到魔界，就有办法恢复，可要是葬送在场死亡暴风雪中……

0029.en: Whether human or demon, everyone only has one life!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 无论是人类还是魔族，都只有一条生命！

0029.en: His body, with its legs severed, lost balance and fell to the ground. Kogsa wretchedly clawed at the ground with his hands, about to use his magic to distance himself from this madwoman, but it was too late...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 斩断双腿的身子，失去平衡，跌倒在地，克格萨狼狈的用双手扒拉着地面，刚想运用魔力与这个女疯子拉开距离，可为时已晚……

0029.en: At the center of this pale blizzard, all things would fall silent in the embrace of extreme cold.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 身处于这场苍白暴风雪的中心，万物都将沉寂在极度冰寒的怀抱中。

0029.en: [Forbidden Curse: Ice Calamity Body Fully Unleashed]
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 【禁咒•冰厄之体完全解放】

0029.en: The white frost spread inch by inch, covering the girl's face. She stared blankly at this world about to be enveloped in whiteness, shedding one last warm tear as she cried out.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 白霜一寸寸的侵蚀，覆盖少女的脸颊，她无神的看着这方即将被苍白笼罩的世界，只是最后流出了一滴尚有温度的泪珠，哭着呐喊。

0029.en: "Selen An, you big liar!"
0029.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0029.cn: “塞伦安，你这个大骗子！”

0029.en: The girl's final shout seemed to contain some kind of power. The sound pierced through the barrier of the snowstorm, ignoring the decay of distance, and carried its emotion thousands of meters away, to the ears of the cold body half-buried in the snow.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 少女最后一声呐喊，像是蕴含着某种力量，声音贯穿了风雪的阻隔，无视了距离的消耗，将其中蕴含的情感送至了千米之外，那具半埋在雪地之中，已经失去了温度的尸体耳畔。

0029.en: So dark, so cold. My body feels like it has fallen into a silent ice cave.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 好黑，好冷，身体仿若坠入了沉寂的冰窟。

0029.en: Is this what death feels like?
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这就是死亡的感觉吗？

0029.en: I've lost all conscious control, as if I'm sinking into a chaotic river, drifting endlessly with the current, as if the long passage of time will wear away this last bit of spirit.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 丧失了一切掌握自主力量的意识，好似沉入那混沌的河水随波逐流，无休无止的飘荡，像是要借助时间的漫长尺度将这仅存的精神消磨殆尽。

0029.en: Everything is over. I killed Mara, saved Anna, and changed the predetermined fate. With no lingering attachments, I should accept death, close my eyes forever in this chaotic darkness. But for some reason, even in this sunless dark, I feel as if a rope is pulling me, refusing death, as if there is still something important left to do...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 一切都已经结束了，自己杀死了玛拉，拯救了安娜，改变了既定的命运，没了执念的他理应接受死亡，在这混沌黑暗中，永远的闭上双眼，可不知为何，即使在这不见天日的黑暗中，他依旧觉得似乎有一根绳牵引着他，拒绝着死亡，好似有什么重要的事依旧未能完成……

0029.en: Until a voice, from a distant, unknown place, faintly pierced through the barrier of life and death.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 直到一声从遥远未知之地，穿透生死隔阂的声音模模糊糊的传来。

0029.en: "Selen An..."
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: “塞伦安……”

0029.en: Someone is calling me. Who could it be?
0029.speaker: 塞伦安
0029.cn: 有人在叫他，会是谁呢？

0029.en: This voice... is so familiar...
0029.speaker: 塞伦安
0029.cn: 这声音……好熟悉啊……

0029.en: "You big liar!"
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: “你这个大骗子！”

0029.en: Another voice came, this time clearer than the one that called his name. The tone of the voice was like a heavy hammer, striking the soul that was about to fall into a deep slumber.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 接连又一道声音传来，这一次比呼唤他的名字更加清晰，连带着声音的音色，也如一柄重锤，重重的砸在那即将陷入沉睡的灵魂上。

0029.en: With the voice, the thread pulling at him suddenly tightened. Like a fish caught on a hook, he was forcefully dragged out of the dark, chaotic river by the suddenly taut line.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 随着声音那根牵引着自己的线骤然发力，它像是一条被鱼钩钩住的鱼儿一般，被骤然发力的鱼线，狠狠的拖出了那暗无天日的混沌河水。

0029.en: His vision turned from black to white, no longer chaotic. As his sight gradually returned, a blurry figure appeared before him...
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 视野由黑转白，不再混沌，而逐渐恢复的视野中，面前似多了一道模糊的身影……

0030.en: Chapter 30: Reset 30 - The First Saintess
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 第30章 重置30 初代圣女

0030.en: A holy light illuminated the darkness ahead, but it wasn't blinding.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 圣洁的光照亮了眼前的黑暗，却并不显得刺眼。

0030.en: In a daze, his consciousness felt as if it had been pulled into another world. His vision went from blurry to clear, until he could see his surroundings perfectly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 恍惚间，自己的意识仿佛被拉到了另一个世界，视野由模糊逐渐变得清晰，直到他完全看清自己所处的环境，只见：

0030.en: Blue-green spots of light from stained-glass windows moved across the walls. Seven spiral stone pillars held up the grand hall. Looking closely, each pillar was carved with ancient, holy symbols. The light inside the sacred cathedral was hazy and soft, making it feel unreal.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 彩色琉璃窗投射的蓝绿色光斑在墙壁游移，七根螺旋石柱支撑着整座殿堂，细细看去每根柱身都镌刻有古老的神代纹路，神圣的大教堂内部光线氤氲朦胧，给人以强烈的不真实感。

0030.en: Where am I?
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 这里是？

0030.en: The question appeared in Selen An's mind, but he quickly pushed it aside. His attention was drawn to something else: at the front of the grand cathedral was an altar, and on the altar stood a giant statue.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 塞伦安的脑海中下意识的冒出这个问题，但很快问题就……就被他抛之脑后了，因为他的注意力和目光被另一件事物所吸引——宏伟教堂的最前端设立有神坛，而神坛之上矗立着一尊巨大的神像。

0030.en: The statue was huge and solemn. Behind it, three pairs of wings were spread out. Its arms were crossed tightly over its chest, as if protecting something. The statue was faceless. Light from the stained glass window shone on one side of the statue, giving the lifeless stone an incredible divine power.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 神像宏伟肃穆，巨大的神像后方张开三对羽翼，双臂并未张开，而是像在保护什么东西一般交叠紧紧贴于胸口，神像无面，透过琉璃彩窗的光芒拂照在石像的一侧，本为死物的神明石却拥有那震人心魄的神性。

0030.en: Selen An recognized this statue. Or rather, as a veteran player, he knew every statue of the creator gods on the continent of Nephalem. This statue was one of the six creator gods: the God of Water, ****, who represents life and peace.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 塞伦安认得这尊神像，或者说，作为潜意识资深老玩家的他认识涅法雷姆大陆每一尊创世阵神的神像，眼前这尊神像正是创世六神之一——象征生命与和平的水之神，****。

0030.en: About the God of Water's name, Selen An wasn't joking. As a veteran player of the game in his past life, even he didn't know the god's real name. In almost all the game's texts, the God of Water was referred to as the "Goddess of Life," the "God of Peace," or simply with four asterisks (*). They didn't even try to hide it.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 关于水之神的神名，塞伦安并不是开玩笑，作为前世这款游戏的资深老玩家，就连他也并不知道水之神的真正名讳，整个游戏几乎所有的游戏文本中但凡提及水之神，都会用生命女神，和平之神或直接打出四个“*”来代替，简直都是演都不演了。

0030.en: As these thoughts popped into his head, he was surprised to find he had somehow walked from the back of the cathedral to the front of the statue. He looked up at the faceless, mysterious, and solemn figure, but for some reason...
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 脑海中蹦哒出这些信息，等他回过神来时，惊讶的发现自己不知何时才从教堂的最末端已来到了神像的面前，抬头仰望神像，无面的神像神秘而肃穆，可不知为何……

0030.en: He felt a deep sense of familiarity he couldn't shake.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 他的心底竟有一股挥之不去的熟悉感。

0030.en: "How ridiculous," he muttered to himself.
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 真是荒唐，他心中自语道。

0030.en: "You've finally come, Mother."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “你终于来了，母亲。”

0030.en: Almost without warning, a warm and healing voice came from behind him. The voice was very familiar; he must have heard it somewhere before.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 几乎是毫无预兆的，一道温暖而治愈的声线自他身后传来，这声音很是熟悉，他应该从哪听过。

0030.en: That's right, it was the voice that had suddenly appeared in his mind and influenced his actions several times. But unlike before, this voice was less ethereal and more gentle and motherly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 对了，是那个在自己脑海中突兀出现，多次影响改变他行为的声音，只是不同于现实，这声音少了份不真切的空灵，更增添了几分温柔与母性。

0030.en: He whipped his head around to look behind him, and his pupils dilated uncontrollably.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 他猛的扭头看向身后，直线在自己的正后方，然后瞳孔不受控制的放大。

0030.en: "Holy crap, you're not human!"
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 卧槽，真特么不是人！

0030.en: Of course, Selen An didn't mean to be rude. He was just stating a fact in a dramatic way, because the one who had appeared behind him like a ghost really wasn't human!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 当然，塞伦安没有骂人的意思，它只是用一种夸张的口吻来陈述事实，毕竟如鬼魅般出现在他身后的这位，真的不是人！

0030.en: Her skin was as delicate as water, her long hair as blue as the ocean, and her deep, serene eyes were so clear you could see a perfect reflection in them. She wore a blue-green fishtail gown that shimmered like a pearl from the deep sea. But he also noticed some unusual details—she had fins the color of stained glass instead of human ears, and pale gold scales dotted her neck and the edges of her cheeks like teardrops.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 娇嫩如水的肌肤，蔚蓝如海洋般的长发，深邃宁静的双瞳更是清澈到能直接看清倒映出的外物景象，一袭青蓝似海底明珠般的燕尾裙，这是他所看到的，但与此同时，他也注意到了一些特别的地方——琉璃色耳鳍代替了人类的双耳，淡金鳞片如泪痕点缀在脖颈和脸颊的边缘。

0030.en: The holy maiden before him, glowing with a unique motherly light, was clearly not purely human. She was of the Merfolk!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 眼前，这位圣洁却蕴含独特母性光辉的少女明显不是纯粹的人族，而是鲛人族！

0030.en: He had never seen such a beautiful Merfolk before... No, something felt off. Wait, if that voice came from this Merfolk maiden, what did she just call him?
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 这么漂亮的鲛人族，他还真是第一次见……不对，总觉得有些不对劲的地方，等等，如果那道声音是眼前这位鲛人少女发出的，那她刚刚叫了自己什么？

0030.en: Selen An thought he must have misheard. The Merfolk maiden in front of him seemed to read his mind, and a gentle smile that was impossible to refuse bloomed on her beautiful, holy face. Her sapphire eyes were filled with affection and other complex emotions he couldn't understand.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 塞伦安怀疑自己听错了，而面前的鲛人少女似是能读懂他的内心，圣洁倾城的脸庞绽放出一抹让人无法拒绝的笑容，宝蓝色的眸中包含着宠溺以及一些他无法读懂的复杂情绪。

0030.en: "You've finally come, my child."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “你终于来了，我的孩子。”

0030.en: "Ah, that's more like it."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 欸，这就对了嘛。

0030.en: Selen An immediately felt relieved. Although he didn't know the true identity of the Merfolk maiden before him, since she appeared under the statue in a church dedicated to the God of Water, and with the faint divine aura around her, he made a bold guess. She was probably...
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 塞伦安心中立即松了口气，虽然还未得知眼前这位鲛人少女的真实身份，可既然出现在供奉水之神教堂的神像下，再加上她身上那一股若有若无的神性，大胆猜想，她应该是……

0030.en: "Just as you think, I am a devout follower of my Lord and your ancestor. My name is Sabella, the first Water Saintess."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “如你所想，我即为吾主的虔诚信徒，亦是你的先祖，我名为莎蓓拉，初代水之圣女。”

0030.en: "As I thought... Wait, what did she just say?"
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 果然不出……等等，她刚才说啥？

0030.en: This Merfolk maiden, who called herself Sabella, was the first Water Saintess and his ancestor?
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 眼前这位自称为莎蓓拉的鲛人族少女竟然是初代水之圣女，还是自己的祖先？

0030.en: "You, me, this, that, but..."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “你，我，这，那，不是……”

0030.en: At that moment, his mind was a complete mess, and he was stammering.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 此刻，他大脑彻底混乱了，甚至有些语无伦次。

0030.en: A refreshing fragrance wafted over, and a slender, fair finger was placed on his lips.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 一阵清香袭来，一只白玉葱葱的食指抵在了他的唇前。

0030.en: "If your thoughts are confused, don't think about it for now. These questions will be answered later. What I can promise you is that I am indeed your ancestor, the first believer of my Lord in this world."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “如果觉得逻辑混乱的话，就暂且不要考虑这么多了，这些问题以后会得到解答，而我能保证的是，我的的确确是你的先祖，是这世间吾主的第一个信徒。”

0030.en: Sabella smiled sweetly. Her smile seemed to have a special magic that, combined with her voice, could instantly calm one's heart.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 莎蓓拉巧笑嫣然，她的笑容似乎蕴含一种别样的魔力，配合她的声音，能令人的心境瞬间平和。

0030.en: Selen An felt his head go light, and he nodded along with her words.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 塞伦安只觉脑袋飘飘的，就顺着她话的意思点了点头。

0030.en: "So why did I come here?"
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “所以我为什么会来到这儿？”

0030.en: He collected his thoughts and asked Sabella politely. Usually, when a game character has a flashback or dies and their consciousness is pulled into a special space, it's for a wave of memories, and then they get a power-up.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 他整理好思绪组织语言，向眼前的莎蓓拉虚心询问，一般游戏角色走马灯或战死，意识被拉入特殊空间，大多情况就是要来一波回忆杀，然后开挂。

0030.en: After all, the magical girls next door followed the same pattern.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 毕竟隔壁魔法少女就是这么个套路的。

0030.en: So, had his hard work finally paid off? Was heaven smiling on him, and was he about to awaken his bloodline power?
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: 所以，这是皇天不负有心人，上天眷顾，自己要觉醒血脉之力了？

0030.en: "Because fate has brought our paths together. Because you already know the truth. If you hadn't figured out the answer, you wouldn't have done that, even with my power influencing you..."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “因为命运使我们的轨迹相交，因为你已经知晓了真相，如果不是想明白了答案，就算有我的力量影响，你也不会那么做……”

0030.en: "An act is a choice in itself. So, have you figured it out, Selen An?"
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “行为本身就是选择，所以你想明白了吗？塞伦安。”

0030.en: Sabella's voice was like a stone dropped into the lake of his heart, causing ripples.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 莎蓓拉的声音就像是一颗石子掉入他的心湖，激起阵阵涟漪。

0030.en: The young man lowered his head and looked at his palm, a bitter smile unconsciously forming on his lips.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 青年低垂下了头，看向自己的掌心，嘴角下意识地勾勒出一丝苦笑。

0030.en: "Of course. I suspected it for a long time. Actually, this incident can't be called transmigration. It's rebirth."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “当然，我早就有所察觉了，其实，这场意外并不能被称之为穿越，而是重生。”

0030.en: With a self-mocking laugh, the blue-haired young man looked up and spoke calmly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 伴随着自嘲的笑声，蓝发青年抬起头，声音平静道。

0030.en: "From the moment I woke up and took over this body, I never felt even the slightest bit of unfamiliarity. Even though I was in a game character's body, I didn't feel any separation or unreality. And all those feelings buried deep in my heart..."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “从清醒到接管，这具身体，我从未感受到，哪怕是一丝丝的陌生，明明穿越到了一个游戏人物的身体里，可我却感受不到半分的割裂与不真实感，还有那些埋藏在我心底的那些感情……”

0030.en: "Because I am Selen An, I couldn't help but feel guilty when I saw Anna. Because I am Selen An, Serenia's image was always in my mind. Because I am Selen An, I wanted to break free from the chains of fate, even if it cost me my life..."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “因为我是塞伦安，所以看到安娜，我会无法抑制的自责，因为我是塞伦安，所以我的脑海中始终有着瑟蕾妮娅的身影，因为我是塞伦安，所以即使拼上这条性命，我也想挣脱命运的枷锁……”

0030.en: "The guilt, the regret, the memories that fit so perfectly with my soul—all this evidence was constantly telling me that I am Selen An."
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “那些愧疚，那些悔恨，那些能完美融入我灵魂的回忆，这些证据都在无时不刻的告诉着我，我就是塞伦安。”

0030.en: "Miss Sabella, am I right about all this?"
0030.speaker: 塞伦安
0030.cn: “莎蓓拉小姐，我说的这些，对吗？”

0030.en: The boy poured out the secret he had hidden in his heart for so long. Finally, he looked at the Merfolk maiden who had listened to his confession and asked bitterly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 男孩像是将埋藏在自己心底已久的秘密，一口气全部倾泻了出来，直到最后，他望向全程倾听完自己倾诉和秘密的鲛人少女，苦涩询问。

0030.en: Sabella didn't answer him. She opened her arms and hugged the young man tightly. She let Selen An bury his head in her embrace, while her soft, white hands gently patted his back.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 莎蓓拉没有回答他，她张开了双臂，紧紧的抱住了眼前的青年，她让塞伦安将头埋入自己的怀中，雪白的柔荑则轻柔又有节奏的拍抚着他的后背。

0030.en: "If your heart hurts, just cry it out..."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “心里堵的话，就哭出来吧……”

0030.en: "Tears are the embrace of the Mother God. It's just you and me here. If you cry, you'll feel better."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “泪水是母神的怀抱，这里仅有你和我，只要哭出来，就不难受了。”

0030.en: "So, go ahead and cry."
0030.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0030.cn: “所以，哭吧。”

0030.en: She said softly, her warm embrace and words capable of making anyone let down their guard.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 她柔声说道，温暖的怀抱与话语能让任何人放下心中的警惕和戒备。

0031.en: The gentle saintess extended her hands to the confused child, embracing him.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 温柔的圣女朝迷茫孩子伸出双手，拥他入怀。

0031.en: The expected sobbing did not happen. Shabella's voice and embrace were as warm as a spring stream, but Selen An, who was receiving this honor, kept his lips tightly sealed. The corners of his eyes were red, but not a single tear fell.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 想象中的嚎啕大哭并没有出现，莎蓓拉的声音与怀抱如春水般温暖，享受此等殊荣的塞伦安却始终紧抿着唇，他的眼角泛红，却没留下一滴泪。

0031.en: After a long while, Shabella released her embrace. She looked at the awkward and stubborn young man before her, the gentleness in her eyes not diminishing in the slightest.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 许久，莎蓓拉睁开了怀抱，她看向了身前别扭又倔强的青年，眼眸中的温柔依旧未减半分。

0031.en: "Why do you still suppress yourself? You should be able to feel that I mean you no harm. This place is not reality; you can release all the emotions you've buried in your heart, instead of being like this..."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “为什么还要压抑着自己呢？你应该感受得到我对你并无恶意，此处也非现实，你完全可以发泄出那些压在心底的情绪，而不是像现在这样……”

0031.en: "Because I don't think I'm worthy."
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “因为我觉得我不配。”

0031.en: Selen An suddenly interrupted.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 塞伦安突然出声打断。

0031.en: "I don't think I'm the one who should be crying. At least in this world, there are many families broken because of me, many people who have shed tears of despair because of me..."
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “我不觉得我是那个该哭的人，至少在这个世界上，有更多的家庭因我而破碎，有更多的人因我而绝望落泪……”

0031.en: "Those innocent people are not at fault, I am. They suffered this world's evil because of me, yet under the heavy pressure of life, they don't even dare to cry."
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “那些无辜的人没有错，有错的人是我，他们因我而遭到了这世间的恶念，却在生活的重压下，连哭都不敢。”

0031.en: He raised his hand and looked at his palm. His five pale fingers were as slender as those of a noble girl who had never done manual labor. At the same time, the image of Anna's rough, calloused hands, worn from a life of hard work, appeared before his eyes.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他抬手看向自己的掌心，白皙的五指如那些十指不沾阳春水的贵族少女一样纤细，同时，眼前也浮现出安娜那双因生活操劳粗糙，布满老茧的手。

0031.en: "Because I didn't dare. In the face of power and wealth, I didn't even dare to hold much resentment, even if they killed my husband..."
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “因为不敢，在权势与财富面前，我甚至不敢有太多的怨恨，即使他们杀死了我的丈夫……”

0031.en: The lady's words echoed in his ears once more.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 那位夫人的话语又一次在耳畔回荡。

0031.en: Perhaps at the beginning, when he didn't understand the situation, he could have listened to the lady's tragic past as if it were just a story, justifying it by ignoring his own actions. Although there was guilt in his heart, it was more a feeling of sympathy and pity.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 或许一开始没能明白现状，自己还能心安理得的以这些都无视自己做的为理由，将那位夫人悲惨的过去当成一场故事听，虽心中也有愧疚，可更多的是一种感慨与怜悯。

0031.en: But once he learned the truth, an overwhelming sense of guilt, so strong it could not be greater, almost swallowed him whole.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 可一旦得知了真相，那种强烈到无以复加的负罪感几乎要将他整个人吞没。

0031.en: And Anna and her mother were just a small example among the vast number of people he had harmed. When he thought of the many sins he had committed, and the numb expressions of the victims in their suffering, what right did he have to cry?
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 而安娜母女只是被他所祸害的庞大人群的一个缩影，一想到自己犯下的诸多罪孽，一想到那些被害者因苦难而麻木的神情，自己又有何资格落泪？

0031.en: If he were to cry grievously in Shabella's arms, it would be nothing more than crocodile tears...
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 真要是趴在莎蓓拉怀中委屈的大哭，那也不过是鳄鱼的眼泪罢了……

0031.en: Shabella still watched him quietly, but the smile on her face faded. A tranquility that came with age settled in the sacred church, where time itself seemed to have stopped.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 莎蓓拉依旧是静静的望着他，却也收敛了脸上的微笑，一股来自岁月的宁静，在这间仿佛时间都停止流动的神圣教堂中沉淀。

0031.en: "Indeed, these are all sins you committed with your own hands. I am glad you can recognize this."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “的确，这些都是你亲手犯下的罪孽，我很高兴你能认清这些。”

0031.en: "So death is the end I deserve. If my death can atone for even a small part of my sins, then I will have died for a worthy cause."
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “所以死亡是我应有的结局，如果用我的死哪怕能赎清一小部分我的罪孽，那么也算是我死得其所。”

0031.en: With that, he turned and looked up again at the statue in the church. The faceless goddess opened her arms, spreading her love to the world, wishing for all life to live happily in a world of peace.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 说着，他转身再次抬头看向那个传立在教堂的神像，无面的女神张开双臂，祂向世间播撒慈爱，愿诸般生命皆能在和平的世界幸福生活下去。

0031.en: His emotions churned like waves. A descendant of the goddess of peace and life had turned a butcher's knife on the people he was supposed to protect. Perhaps the taint of the Succubus Seed wasn't even necessary; his very existence was a stain and shame on the name of the Water Saintess.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他心中的情绪如波涛般翻涌，象征着和平与生命的女神后裔却将屠刀伸向了身后那些他理应保护的人民，或许根本就不用魅魔之种的污染，他的存在本身就是让水之圣女之名的玷污与蒙羞。

0031.en: "So you think death is your best choice?"
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “所以你认为死亡是你最好的选择？”

0031.en: Shabella walked to his side, also looking up at the statue bathed in holy light.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 莎蓓拉走到他的身侧，同样也抬头仰望起沐浴在圣光下的神像。

0031.en: "Isn't it?"
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “难道不是吗？”

0031.en: Selen An's voice was filled with a deep weariness. He slowly closed his eyes, unwilling to gaze upon this purely good goddess, for her light was too dazzling, making a rat like him, from the gutters, feel there was nowhere to hide.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 塞伦安的声音中带着深深的疲倦，他缓缓合上了双眼，不愿再凝视这尊纯善的女神，因为祂身上的光芒太过耀眼，刺的他这只阴沟里的老鼠感到无处可避。

0031.en: The tide of his sins crushed him, leaving him unable to breathe. The gentleness and kindness Anna and her mother had shown him before he knew the truth now made him despise his own existence even more.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 如潮水般的罪孽压着他喘不过气来，生前，安娜与其母亲向她传递的温柔与善良，却令得知真相的他愈发厌恶自身的存在。

0031.en: How could someone like him deserve the kindness of his victims?
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: 像他这样的人，又凭什么得到受害者的善意呢？

0031.en: He was simply... unworthy of the Winterlein name.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他根本……就配不上温特莱恩这一姓氏。

0031.en: "No."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉

0031.en: Her voice suddenly lost its gentleness, becoming as clear as a mountain spring.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她的话语突然变得不再温柔，而是清冽如山间泉水。

0031.en: "Death is not a choice. It is a coward's escape."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “死亡并非选择，而是懦弱的逃避。”

0031.en: She declared.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她如此道。

0031.en: "Fate has let you experience two cycles, and now, the thread of your destiny has returned to this most crucial node. If the great power of fate brought you back only to watch this thread destroy itself, then this will be the most failed choice of your life..."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “命运曾让你经历两次轮回，至此，你命运的丝线又重新回到了这最重要的节点上，如果命运的伟力将你送回，只是想眼睁睁的看着这根丝线自行融毁，那么这将是你人生中最失败的一次选择……”

0031.en: "Such a choice is far more absurd than all the sins and mistakes you have committed before combined."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “这样的选择远比你之前犯下的种种罪孽与错误加起来还要荒谬。”

0031.en: The blue-haired mermaid girl suddenly reached out and gently held the young man's face, forcing him to meet her gaze. When their identical sapphire-blue eyes met, Selen An felt his soul being bathed in sunlight, cleansed by holy water.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 蓝发的鲛人少女，突然伸出双手，轻轻的搂在了青年的脸颊两侧，迫使他与自己对视，当两双相同的宝蓝色瞳孔视线接触，塞伦安感觉到自己的灵魂仿佛在阳光的照耀下，沐浴圣水的洗涤。

0031.en: The crushing weight of his sins, which had left him breathless, did not disappear, but it felt as if half its weight was now shared by the person before him. She healed the self-blaming scars on his heart with a patient and gentle gaze.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 那些压的他喘不过气来的罪孽的沉重，并未消失，可其中的重量像是有一半被眼前之人分担，她用耐心而温柔的眼神治愈着自己内心自责的伤疤。

0031.en: The purest kindness, the purest love, the purest tolerance and maternal instinct were all perfectly displayed in that moment.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 那最纯粹的善良，纯粹的爱意，纯粹的包容与母性在这一瞬展现的淋漓尽致。

0031.en: Is this the Water Saintess... the legendary, perfectly good and pure saintess? Just by meeting her gaze, the darkness buried in his heart was no longer suppressed. Darkness was still darkness, but in the sunlight, it was merely the shadow that every living being has behind them.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这就是水之圣女吗……传说中至善至纯的圣女，仅凭借眼神的接触，那些埋藏在心底的黑暗便不再压抑，黑暗依旧是黑暗，可在阳光下，那也不过是众生背后皆有的阴影。

0031.en: "What else can I do?"
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “我还能怎么做？”

0031.en: He was like a lost lamb, not knowing the path ahead, not knowing what salvation was.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他如同一只迷茫的羔羊，不知前路为何，不知救赎为何？

0031.en: Unconsciously, he tightly gripped the hem of the girl's skirt, as if holding onto a life-saving straw.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 不知不觉间，他紧紧的抓住了眼前少女的裙角，像是握紧了救命稻草。

0031.en: "Death is the end of the road, but your mission is not over."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “死亡是道路的终点，可你的使命并未结束。”

0031.en: "Do not be sad, do not grieve. I am not asking you to forget the sins you have committed. But to walk towards self-destruction out of fear of facing your sins is the choice of a coward. You are a child of the Winterlein family, the one who carries the will of that great mother goddess!"
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “不要悲伤，不要难过，我并非是让你忘却那些你曾犯下的罪孽，可因畏惧面对罪孽而走向自毁，那是懦夫的选择，你是温特莱恩家的孩子，是继承了那位伟大母神血脉的意志代行者！”

0031.en: "Listen to me, my child. The mistakes a person makes can only be repaid by themselves. You talk about dying to atone for your sins, but can the lives of those you persecuted truly be repaid with just one life?"
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “听我说，我的孩子，一个人所犯下的错误，只有自己才能偿还，你口口声声说着死亡是为了赎罪，可那些因你而遭到迫害的人真的只是一条命就能偿还的吗？”

0031.en: "If you truly want to atone, then live on. Recognizing your mistakes is a good thing, but only those who are still alive in this moment can correct them."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “你如果真的想赎罪就好好活下去，认清自己的错误固然是好事，而能改正错误的也唯有此时此刻依旧活着的人。”

0031.en: Shabella's words were like an icebreaker cutting through the frozen river of the underworld. Amidst the crisp sound of cracking ice, Selen An suddenly saw a spark ignite in the eyes of the self cowering in the depths of his soul—that faint light resembled the flickering flame under the pot where Anna brewed herbs for him when he awoke from his pain.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 莎蓓拉的话语犹如破冰船切开冻结的冥河，冰层崩裂的脆响中，塞伦安突然看见自己灵魂深处蜷缩在黑暗中的自己眼底突然冒出一丝星火——那簇微光好似自己从疼痛中清醒时，安娜为自己蒸煮草药的药罐下摇曳的火光。

0031.en: The girl's call also reappeared. Beneath the desperate paleness, she shouted his name, her voice traveling along the thread of fate to reach him here.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 少女的呼唤也一并重现，绝望的苍白之下，她呐喊着自己的名字，声音循着的命运之丝传递至此。

0031.en: The moment his stubborn thinking was broken, the tears that had been suppressed instantly streamed down his cheeks from the corners of his eyes. The tears wet the back of his hand, and his eyes, like those of a child waking from a dream, regained their childhood brightness and clarity.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 固执的思维，被打通的一瞬，那些原本被抑制的泪水瞬间顺着眼角从脸颊滑落，泪水打湿了他的手背，他的眼神像是如梦初醒的稚童，恢复了儿时的明亮与清澈。

0031.en: "The shackles of your bloodline have been broken. Your future path has been extended once more. Now, the time to return has come. In the land of the living, an ice lotus about to fall into eternal sleep needs you to pour the spring of life into it."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “血脉的枷锁已经打破，你未来的道路已再次延伸，而今，归去之时已至，那还在生者的国度，即将陷入永眠的冰莲需要你去为其注入生命的源泉。”

0031.en: "But, but I've already degenerated into a succubus. I can never go back. Do I really still have the right to represent the Winterleins? Do I really still have the right to touch her?"
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: “可，可我已经堕落成魅魔了，我再也回不去了，我真的还有资格代表温特莱恩吗？我真的还有资格去触碰她吗？”

0031.en: The young man's eyes were once again clouded with a confused white mist.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 青年的眼眸再次染上迷茫的白雾。

0031.en: "Child, do not be afraid. Water embraces all things. As long as you still hold a heart of mercy to save the suffering, the Mother Goddess's embrace will always be open to you."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “孩子，不要怕，水会包容万物，只要你仍怀有一颗救苦济世的仁慈之心，母神的怀抱就会永远向你敞开。”

0031.en: "Come, open your heart and mind. The power of your bloodline will change you back to the form you should have. You will walk the world in that form, to atone for your sins, to complete your mission..."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “来吧，放开自己的心神，血脉的力量将把你变回应有的模样，你也将以那副姿态行走人间，去赎清自己的罪孽，去完成自己的使命……”

0031.en: "And I will be here, watching over you forever."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “而我会在这儿，永远的注视你。”

0031.en: A voice that nourished all things, a murmur as gentle as water.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 滋润万物的声线，温柔似水般的呢喃。

0031.en: The holy and flawless mermaid girl opened her arms to him. His body instinctively could not refuse this gesture. A water-like care enveloped him from all directions. In a daze, behind the girl, the faceless statue in the church burst forth with a thousand rays of light. It seemed to come alive. The divine radiance from it was clearly brighter than any light, yet it did not feel piercing to the eyes.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 圣洁无暇的鲛人少女朝他张开了双臂，身体本能的无法拒绝这一举措，如水般的呵护从四面八方将他包裹，朦胧中，少女身后，那尊教堂的无面神像绽放出万道霞光，祂活过来了一般，祂身上神性的光辉明明比任何光都要耀眼，可落入眼中，却并不感到刺痛。

0031.en: Sacred six wings, like the hands of a god, embraced the two of them from both sides. It still stood there, watching this descendant who, under the protection of the bloodline, had inherited the mission.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 神圣的六翼从两侧像是神明之手般，将二人拥入怀中，祂依旧矗立在此，注视着这对在血脉的庇护下，继承的使命的后裔。

0031.en: "Oh, my child, you will walk the earth with a new identity, and look up at the starry sky with a new name. Lobelia Winterlein, please, with your hands, your voice, your blood, spread the light of the saintess to every corner of this world."
0031.speaker: 莎蓓拉
0031.cn: “我的孩子啊，你将以新的身份行走于大地，以新的名字仰望头顶的星空，洛蓓莉娅•温特莱恩，请用你的手，你的声，你的血，将圣女的光辉泼洒向这世间的每一个角落吧。”

0031.en: His consciousness sank into a boundless expanse of white light. It was a comfort and warmth he could not refuse, like a mother's embrace.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 意识陷入无垠的白光笼罩之中，那是他无法拒绝的安心和温暖，好似母亲的怀抱。

0031.en: Is it time to go back?
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: 要回去了吗？

0031.en: To correct my mistakes, to atone for my sins, to...
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: 去改正自己的错误，去偿还自己的罪孽，去……

0031.en: Wait!
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: 等等！

0031.en: Saintess?
0031.speaker: 塞伦安
0031.cn: 圣女？

0031.en: Me?!
0031.speaker: 塞伦安

0032.en: Chapter 32: Reset 32 - Back from the Dead
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 第32章 重置32 死而复生

0032.en: "Drip... drip..."
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: “滴答……滴答……”

0032.en: It sounded like raindrops falling into a palm, splashing softly.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 像是雨水坠落掌心，溅起的水花声。

0032.en: "Drip... drip..."
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: “滴答……滴答……”

0032.en: The burning wetness carried the warmth of a young woman. As Selen An slowly woke up, he realized it wasn't rain from the sky, but a girl's tears.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 灼热的湿润附带着少女的体温，让逐渐苏醒的塞伦安明白，这并非从苍穹而落的天水，而是少女的眼泪。

0032.en: His chest was being pressed with a steady rhythm, and his lips were covered from time to time. The girl's sweet scent and softness lingered on his lips. She was blowing large breaths of air into his body. Her hands didn't stop, and neither did her prayers.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 胸腔在被有节奏的按压着，嘴唇则是被间歇性的盖住，少女的清香与柔软仍残留唇齿间，她将大口大口的空气吹入自己的体内，她手中的动作不停，口中的祈祷也同样不停歇。

0032.en: "Wake up, wake up! Mr. Selen An, wake up!"
0032.speaker: 安娜
0032.cn: “快醒醒，快醒醒！塞伦安先生，快醒醒！”

0032.en: "Please, don't die, don't die..."
0032.speaker: 安娜
0032.cn: “求求了，不要死，不要死……”

0032.en: The girl's crying voice and hot tears were like a magic spell meant to awaken a sleeping beauty, pouring into the white-haired succubus who lay lifeless in the snow.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 少女的哭腔伴随着滚烫的泪珠像是某种能唤醒睡美人的魔咒灌入那躺在雪地里已经失去了生机的白发魅魔。

0032.en: Heat, sound, touch—he could feel all these things from the outside world clearly. But even as his mind became clearer, the body holding his soul felt as if it had been dead for half a day, too stiff to control at all.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 温度，声音，触感，这些来自外界的信息他都能够清晰的感受到，可无论意识逐渐清醒，装载着灵魂的肉体却像是死了半天有余，全身僵硬到根本无法控制半分。

0032.en: What's going on? Why can't I control this body?
0032.speaker: 塞伦安
0032.cn: 怎么回事？为什么没办法控制这具身体？

0032.en: Selen An was confused, but he also noticed something strange. It was so hot, coming from his palms. Before he died, his hands were still gripping the holy sword that had burned onto them.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 塞伦安心中感到疑惑，但又同时察觉到了异常，好烫，是从掌心那传来的，而临死前的他双手依旧抓握着那柄已经完全烫粘在手上的圣剑。

0032.en: The strange heat came from the holy sword. As time passed, the ceremonial sword, half-buried in the snow, grew hotter. In the real world, Anna, who was still performing CPR, also noticed something was wrong.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 温度的异常是来自圣剑，随着时间的推移，半掩埋在雪地里的祭礼圣剑温度逐渐升高，而现实中，不停的人工呼吸的安娜也发现了不对劲。

0032.en: But it wasn't because of the heat, but because of light.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 但她并非因为温度，而是光。

0032.en: The long sword held tightly in Selen An's hands suddenly began to glow. As the light grew stronger, she could clearly feel the body she had been giving CPR to for so long was slowly warming up.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 那柄被塞伦安紧紧攥在双手中的长剑，突然绽放出光芒，随着光芒变强，她明显感觉到身下自己已经做了许久人工呼吸的尸体竟然在逐渐回温。

0032.en: She stared in shock at the incredible scene before her, forgetting to breathe for a moment.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她惊骇的望着眼前这不可思议的一幕，霎时间，竟连呼吸都忘记了。

0032.en: Until...
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 直到……

0032.en: Until the Demon Clan's iron cavalry broke the silence of the snowy battlefield. Anna looked cautiously toward the sound and saw dozens of dark figures riding quickly in their direction from a distance.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 直到魔族的铁骑打破了这片沉寂的雪地战场，安娜警惕的朝着声音的来源望去，只见不远处隐约有数十道黑影正朝着这里的方向疾驰而来。

0032.en: It was the Demon Clan's pursuers. They must have followed some kind of signal, riding hard to catch up to this place.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 是魔族的追兵，魔族的追兵应是循着某种讯号，一路快马加鞭追赶到了这里。

0032.en: The warning of danger made Anna want to run away instinctively. But the glowing sword in the snow and the white-haired succubus beneath her, who was miraculously warming up, made her hesitate for a moment.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 危险的预警让安娜本能的就想拔腿就跑，可雪地里那柄泛着光的长剑，以及自己身下奇迹般逐渐回温的白发魅魔都让她产生了片刻的犹豫。

0032.en: Fortunately, she was a decisive girl. After only a moment's hesitation, she gritted her teeth, pushed down the fearful urge to flee, and placed her hands on Selen An's chest, pressing down to make every second count.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 好在她是个果断的女孩，犹豫只有片刻之际，她猛的一咬牙，强行摁下了心中因恐惧想逃跑的冲动，双手交叠于塞伦安的胸腹部，争分夺秒的按压。

0032.en: She didn't want to give up this chance. There was finally a sign of hope. Maybe the gods had heard her prayers, or maybe members of the Winterlein family just had miraculous powers. But none of that mattered to her. She just wanted the person lying in the snow to stand up again.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她不想放弃这个机会，好不容易有了一点起色，或许是神明听到了自己的祈祷，又或许是温特莱恩的家族成员本身就掌握着奇迹般的力量，但这些都与她无关，她只想，只想让这个倒在雪地里的人重新站起来。

0032.en: She didn't care about hatred or suffering. The moment he had stood in front of her to protect her, she might have already let go of her hate.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 无所谓仇恨，无所谓苦难，当他主动挡在自己身前的那一刹那，她或许就已经放下了心中的仇恨。

0032.en: The Demon Clan's cavalry was now 500 meters away.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 魔族铁骑已经进军到五百米的距离。

0032.en: Anna felt the body under her hands had become soft again.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 安娜感觉到按压下的身体已经完全恢复了柔软。

0032.en: The Demon Clan's cavalry was now 300 meters away.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 魔族铁骑距离此处还剩三百米。

0032.en: Color was returning to his pale lips and cheeks.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 苍白的唇角与脸颊重新拥有了血色。

0032.en: Only a hundred meters left. She could almost smell the strong stench of blood and filth from the demons.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 只剩下最后百米了，此处已几乎能闻到那群魔族身上浓烈的血腥与恶臭味。

0032.en: Beads of sweat rolled down the girl's forehead and cheeks, dripping onto Selen An's torn clothes. She bit her lip so hard from the tension that it started to bleed, and small drops of red blood fell onto the snow like tiny plum blossoms.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 少女的汗珠顺着额角脸颊滑落滴答在塞伦安破旧的衣衫上，贝齿紧咬着红唇，她因紧张而用力到咬破了嘴唇，丝丝殷红色的血珠滴落雪地，染出一朵朵娇小的梅花。

0032.en: Wake up, wake up...
0032.speaker: 安娜
0032.cn: 快醒醒，快醒醒……

0032.en: Fifty meters...
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 五十米……

0032.en: The roars of the demons were right beside them. The demon soldiers on their mounts had already raised their spears, ready to throw.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 魔族的咆哮声已近在咫尺，坐骑上的魔族士兵已高举长矛准备投掷。

0032.en: Anna used all her strength, continuing the CPR without stopping. Just as she was about to collapse from exhaustion and despair, she felt a tiny vibration through the touch of their skin.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 安娜几乎是使出了吃奶的劲儿，不停的做着心肺复苏，就当她即将绝望力竭之际，一丝微小的震动，随着皮肤之间的接触，被她清晰感知。

0032.en: It's a heartbeat. His heartbeat has returned.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 是心跳，心跳恢复了。

0032.en: The girl's body froze. Her eyes widened as she stared at the succubus in the snow, as if she had forgotten the danger and death that were so close.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 少女的身体猛地僵住，瞪大了双眼，死死的盯着雪地中的魅魔，好似忘记了近在咫尺的危险与死亡。

0032.en: "Whoosh!"
0032.speaker: 旁白

0032.en: A spear tore through the air, flying straight toward Anna's back. Death came so quickly that by the time the girl realized she was about to be attacked, she had no time to dodge or turn around.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 长矛撕裂了空气，径直朝着安娜的后背飞来，死亡降临速度实在是太快，当少女意识到自己即将被攻击，她甚至来不及躲闪或回头。

0032.en: Pale despair washed over her face. She was too exhausted to escape. As death approached, she closed her eyes, and time seemed to slow down infinitely in that instant.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 苍白的绝望袭上了她的脸颊，早已力竭的她根本没办法躲避，死亡的迫近令她闭上了双眼，时间的流逝，在这一瞬，仿佛被无限放慢。

0032.en: "Drip... drip..."
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: “滴答……滴答……”

0032.en: It sounded like raindrops falling into a palm, splashing softly.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 像是雨水坠落掌心，溅起的水花声。

0032.en: "Drip... drip..."
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: “滴答……滴答……”

0032.en: It felt like a mother's gentle hand wiping away her tears, holding her tightly in an embrace. The wind was no longer cold. Even though she was about to die, she felt as if she had returned to a warm house. A light, elegant scent filled her nose, and the warm hug was so comfortable that she wanted to stay in it forever.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 像是母亲的手温柔的拭去眼角的泪，将哭泣中的自己紧紧拥入怀中，四周的风不再寒冷，明明即将面临死亡，可她却觉得像是回到了温暖的屋中，鼻尖沁着淡雅的幽香，温暖的怀抱舒适到让人想永远的沉浸下去。

0032.en: The sound of water, like a mountain spring, flowed by her ears. The feeling of peace was like a dream. Is this the "life review" that old people talk about?
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 涓涓如山泉流动的水流声在耳畔流动，安心的感觉好像在做梦，这就是老人常说的走马灯吗？

0032.en: Death didn't seem as painful as she had imagined.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 死亡似乎也没有想象中的那么痛苦。

0032.en: "Am I dead?"
0032.speaker: 安娜
0032.cn: “我已经死了吗？”

0032.en: "I don't think so."
0032.speaker: 水之圣女
0032.cn: “我想，应该是没有的。”

0032.en: The sudden, unfamiliar female voice made Anna open her eyes. The first thing she saw was a face so magnificent it made her forget to breathe for a moment.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 突兀的出现的陌生女声令安娜猛然的睁开了眼，而首先映入眼帘的，是一张能让她短暂忘记呼吸的伟大脸庞。

0032.en: At this moment, Selen An had completely lost the seductive look of a succubus. His facial features were like a work of art carved by the gods themselves.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 此刻的塞伦安彻底褪去了魅魔的妖冶感，面部轮廓如同被神明亲手雕刻的艺术品。

0032.en: The young woman wore a golden crown, and her sea-blue hair flowed like a sunlit tide, reaching her waist. The end of each strand shimmered with a rainbow-like halo.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 少女头戴金色冠冕，海蓝色的长发犹如阳光下荡漾的潮汐，长发及至腰间，每一根发梢的末端都荡漾着极光般的虹晕。

0032.en: At first glance, her blue eyes seemed as gentle as water, but a closer look revealed a deep and quiet mystery, like an endless ocean hiding countless secrets. The center of her blue pupils was marked with a unique water-drop pattern.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 一双蔚蓝色的眼眸初看温柔似水，近看又觉深邃静谧，仿若无垠的大海埋藏着无数无人知晓的奥秘，蔚蓝色瞳孔的中心点缀着独特的水滴纹路。

0032.en: Her holy, water-drop blue eyes looked past Anna. The spear that should have pierced her back was now frozen in mid-air, held by an invisible force. If you looked closely, you could see the spear's tip was stuck on a thin film of water.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 神圣的水滴蓝眸注视着安娜的背后，那只本应该精准贯穿她后背的长矛，却像是被一股无形的力定格在半空中一般，仔细观察就能发现，长矛的尖端正卡在一层薄薄的水膜之上。

0032.en: The water film looked like it would break with a single touch, but the sharp spearhead could not move forward another inch. All of its force was being completely spread out by the water elements in the film.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 水膜看似一戳即破，可尖锐的矛锋却不能再前进半寸，所有前进的力量都被水膜中的水元素完全平摊。

0032.en: The rain, which had stopped because of the blizzard, began to fall again. But the raindrops silently avoided her, and she stood up from the rain, her holy dress, which she had changed into at some point, now fully revealed.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 天空中本因暴风雪而停止的雨再次淅淅沥沥的落下，可雨水却在即将滴答在少女身上之前悄无声息的避开，她从雨中站直了身子，身上不知何时换装的圣裙终于能完全舒展。

0032.en: The swallow-tailed holy dress had a front hem that fell just three inches above her knees, fully showing the long, rounded legs wrapped in side-laced white stockings and the pure white high heels on her feet. The back of the dress spread out on the snow like a mermaid's tail fin, the moon-blue satin fabric embroidered with divine patterns.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 燕尾式圣裙前摆仅垂至膝上三寸，完全露出了裙摆下那双被侧边系带式的白丝包裹的修长浑圆双腿，以及脚上的纯白高跟鞋，后幅如人鱼尾鳍铺展在雪地间，月光蓝色的绸缎面料上绣有绝代的神纹。

0032.en: The holy and magnificent dress outlined the young woman's perfect female curves. Her shoulders were bare, and her hands were covered in white lace gloves that extended to her arms. The gloves did not cover her entire hand, but instead had a loop of fabric that went around her middle finger.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 圣洁而华丽的圣女裙袍勾勒出少女堪称完美的女性曲线，双肩露出在外，双手被延伸至手臂的白色蕾丝手套包裹，手套没有包住整只手，只是勾连着布料抽出一只环，套在中指上。

0032.en: Her blue eyelashes were like a pair of small fans. Her water-drop blue eyes were breathtakingly beautiful. Pure streams of water, as if summoned, circled around her like ceremonial ribbons. She stood up and walked in front of Anna, shielding her with her body.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 蓝色的睫毛如同一对小巧的蒲扇，蔚蓝色的水滴眸子美得惊心动魄，纯净的水流像是受到召唤在她的身旁似礼绳萦绕，她站起身，走到了安娜的身前，用身体将其护到身后。

0032.en: She didn't know that this single action had made Anna, who was looking up at her profile, completely mesmerized. Anna was now speechless. It was a kind of shock from beauty. Being at a loss for words was the best way to describe her appearance. If one had to describe it, the saintess's beauty was beyond the limits of mortal appreciation. It was a holy beauty that transcended gender.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 殊不知，仅是这一举动，让仰望着她侧颜的安娜彻底看痴了，此时的安娜已经完全失语，那是一种被美的震撼，词穷是对她容貌的最好表达，若要形容，圣女的美丽已超越了凡俗审美的极限，那是种超越性别的神圣之美。

0032.en: It was a beauty so extreme, so pure and divine, that it infected all who looked upon her, inspiring reverence and a desire to worship.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 美到一种极致，沁入心扉的圣洁与神性让目光所及之人皆受感染，心生虔诚与朝拜之意。

0033.en: Chapter 33 Reset 33: The Will Not to Fight
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 第33章 重置33 不战意志

0033.en: Gods! Is this really not a dream?
0033.speaker: 安娜
0033.cn: 神啊！这真的不是梦吗？

0033.en: Anna could hardly believe her eyes. The dreamlike scene made her feel a strong sense of unreality.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 安娜简直不敢相信自己的眼睛，这仿若梦幻般的画面，令她感到了一股强烈的不真实感。

0033.en: Could any living being in this world be so beautiful?
0033.speaker: 安娜
0033.cn: 这世间真的有生灵美到如此境地吗？

0033.en: If she wasn't dreaming and everything she saw was real, then perhaps the true face of a god wouldn't be much different. For a moment, a thought that could be considered blasphemous crossed the young girl's mind.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 倘若她不是在做梦，眼中所看到的一切都是真实的，那么神明的真容或许也与这相差无几了，一时间，少女的心中竟冒出了这简直能算是亵渎神明的话。

0033.en: The gods are all-knowing and all-powerful, and no mortal is worthy of looking upon their true form. This is why all known public statues of gods in churches are faceless.
0033.speaker: 旁白
