0040.en: "Tell me... why must there be war in this world?"
0040.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0040.cn: “你说……这世界上为什么要有战争呢？”

0040.en: Such a broad question caught Serenia completely off guard.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如此广泛的提问，着实是一下子问住了瑟蕾妮娅。

0040.en: At a moment of life and death, for the other person to suddenly raise such a deeply philosophical question was completely irrational. But when she met Lobelia's droplet-like eyes, which were as calm as still water, all the chaos in her heart quieted.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 生死关头，对方突然提起了这么一个有浓重哲学气息的问题，完全是不符合常理的，可当她对上了洛蓓莉娅那静如止水的水滴眸时，心中的一切杂乱都归于平静。

0040.en: She took a deep breath, and after a moment of consideration, gave her answer.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她深吸了口气，斟酌片刻后，给出了自己的回答。

0040.en: "Because of conflict. Conflict between people, between nations, between races, and even between gods. Conflict is what leads to war."
0040.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0040.cn: “因为矛盾，人与人之间的矛盾，国家与国家之间的矛盾，种族与种族之间的矛盾，甚至是神明与神明之间的矛盾，因为矛盾，所以引发了战争。”

0040.en: "Then why is there conflict?"
0040.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0040.cn: “那为什么会有矛盾呢？”

0040.en: Lobelia pressed on.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 洛蓓莉娅继续追问。

0040.en: "Because of desire and injustice. Desire drives people to want more, and in the process of trying to get more, injustice is created. That is where conflict comes from."
0040.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0040.cn: “因为欲望和不公，欲望驱使山林企图得到更多，而想得到更多的这一过程之中，又会创造出不公，矛盾就此而来。”

0040.en: The blue-haired girl didn't ask any more questions. She just crouched down and gently stroked the soft grass beneath her feet.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 蓝发少女没有继续追问，她只是蹲下身，伸手轻轻的抚摸着脚下柔软的草地。

0040.en: "So, for the sake of one's own selfish desires, is it okay to just take the lives of others?"
0040.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0040.cn: “所以为了一己之私欲，就能肆意的夺走他人的生命吗？”

0040.en: "Lobelia..."
0040.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0040.cn: “洛蓓莉娅……”

0040.en: Serenia sensed that something was wrong with the blue-haired girl's tone and couldn't help but call out her name in worry.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 瑟蕾妮娅有些察觉到蓝发少女语气的不对，不禁担忧呼唤道。

0040.en: "It's alright. Actually... I understand all of this."
0040.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0040.cn: “不要紧，其实……这些我都明白的。”

0040.en: The girl stood up, turned her head, and gave a gentle smile. But buried within that smile were complex emotions, like guilt and self-blame.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 少女起身扭头露出温婉一笑，只是这笑容中却埋藏着一些不加复杂的情绪，例如愧疚，例如自责。

0040.en: Did she ask these questions because she was truly a naive girl who didn't understand the ways of the world?
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她问出这些问题，难道真的是一位天真的少女不谙世事吗？

0040.en: No, she understood. Among all the Water Saintesses in history, she was likely the one who understood this truth the best.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 不，她明白，历代的水之圣女之中，她应该是最能明白这个道理的人了。

0040.en: After all, she had done these things with her own hands, staining them with the blood and cries of countless innocent people.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 毕竟这些事，她都亲手做过，以这双手沾染了无数无辜之人的鲜血与哀嚎。

0040.en: But it was precisely because she had experienced it firsthand that she understood how sinful and unforgivable such actions were, just like the sinful self she now carried...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 但也正是因为亲身经历过，她才明白这种行为，是如何的罪孽深重，是如何的不可饶恕，正如身负罪孽的她自己一般……

0040.en: "War only brings death and pain, but sometimes, living beings have no choice but to use war to defend what they have. War itself is not wrong. What's wrong is the side that harbors selfish desires, unjustly provokes conflict, and initiates the war."
0040.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0040.cn: “战争只会带来死亡与伤痛，可有些时候，生灵却不得不以战争的方式来捍卫现在所拥有的一切，战争本身并无错，错的是包藏私欲，亦不公挑起矛盾，主动发起战争的那一方。”

0040.en: Perhaps the sins of the past surfaced before her eyes, causing her to close them instinctively. The weight of it, like a tidal wave, crushed her until she could barely breathe. But escaping was not an option. The moment she became Lobelia, it signified that she would repay this sin, no matter the cost.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 或许是往日的罪孽浮现在眼前，令她忍不住的闭上了双眸，那如海潮般覆盖而来的重担压得她喘不过气来，可逃避并不是她的选择，当她成为洛蓓莉娅的那一刻，便预示着她将不顾一切代价，去偿还这份罪孽。

0040.en: Even if she spent her whole life, she could not repay it all. Even if she shed all her blood, she could not cleanse herself. But once on this path, there was no turning back, no regret!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 即使倾尽此生，也无法偿还全部，即使流尽血液，也无法涤净自身，但只要走上了这条路，就没有回头后悔一说！

0040.en: So... if the world's wars, born of conflict and injustice, could never end, then she, Lobelia, would intervene. Even if war could not truly be ended, she would do her part.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 所以……如果世界的战争因矛盾与不公，永远无法终结，那么就由她洛蓓莉娅来干涉这一切，就算世界上的战争无法真正意义上的结束，那也请让她付出自己的一份力。

0040.en: Save one more person, please. Let her save just one more innocent soul caught in the crossfire before her strength gives out!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 多救一个，拜托了，被卷入战争中的无辜生灵，请让她在力竭之前，多救一个吧！

0040.en: The girl's noble conviction ignited the flame of a miracle. The world's gate opened to her. The goddess of peace shed her blood as sweet dew, establishing the first divine oath in this world.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 少女崇高的信念点燃了神迹的火焰，世界的门扉向她打开，和平的女神以血滴下甘露，立下了这世间最初的神之誓言。

0040.en: [Divine Art • Oath of No War]
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 【神术•不战誓约】

0040.en: Unlike Serenia's earlier [Divine Art • Pale Dragon's Glacial Roar], there was no vast power that caused a great vision, no brilliant divine light, and no divine art matrix connecting heaven and earth. It was merely a flash of golden divinity in the girl's right eye, and the seal of the oath covered her droplet-pupil.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 不同于瑟蕾妮娅之前释放的【神术•苍白之龙的冰渊咆哮】，没有引动异象的浩瀚伟力，没有耀眼辉煌的神代光华，更没有连通天地的神术矩阵，仅仅只是一道金灿的神性光芒在少女的右眼中一闪而逝，誓约之印覆盖了水滴瞳孔。

0040.en: The holy sword of peace materialized from the light. Lobelia did not hold it with both hands, but embraced the unsharpened sword in the most gentle manner.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 和平的圣剑自光中汇聚，洛蓓莉娅并未双手持剑，而是以最温柔的姿态将这柄无锋的圣剑环抱于怀中。

0040.en: At the same time, outside the barrier, the deadly thunder roared and the storm was about to reach its peak. Just as Kogsa thought he was about to witness the tragic fall of two saintesses, the burning scroll floating in mid-air...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 同一时间，结界之外，那死雷轰鸣，狂风骤雨之势眼看着就要凝聚到最顶点，就当克格萨以为，自己即将目睹两位圣女陨落时的惨状，悬浮在半空中燃烧的卷轴……

0040.en: ...fell, landing right on his head and dropping by his feet.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 掉了下来，还砸在了他的头上，恰好落到了脚边。

0040.en: Kogsa touched his head, a series of question marks popping up over it. He first looked at the object by his feet, rubbed his eyes, suspecting a trick of the light, then looked again. He confirmed it; he wasn't seeing things.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 克格萨伸手摸了摸头，不明所以的头顶不过了一连串的问号，他先是看了看自己脚旁的那物件，揉了揉眼睛，怀疑自己是眼花，再看一遍，确认了，没看眼花。

0040.en: How did this already activated scroll just fall down?
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 这已经被激发的卷轴好好的怎么掉了下来？

0040.en: He scanned his surroundings but found nothing unusual. The two saintesses were still inside the barrier created by the ancient tree. Besides the Water Saintess suddenly holding a holy sword with an exceptionally peaceful posture, there seemed to be no other surprises.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 他环顾四周，没有发现异常，两位圣女也呆在古树撑开的结界内，除了水之圣女突然抱着圣剑，姿态有些格外的安详以外，好似没有什么其他意外。

0040.en: He quickly bent down to pick up the scroll and check what was wrong, but as he did, a golden ray of sunlight shone on the back of his outstretched hand.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 他快速的蹲下身，捡起卷轴检查一下问题，可当他蹲下身，金色的阳光却照在了他伸出的手背上。

0040.en: Kogsa's body stiffened, and his head mechanically looked up. It wasn't until the scorching sun, too bright to look at directly, burned his eyes that he realized in horror that the "Great Annihilation," which had been gathering power to its final stage, was gone...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 克格萨的身体猛地一僵，脑袋则是机械性的抬头，直到那一轮不可直视的烈阳灼痛了他的双眸，他才惊恐的发现，聚力到最终阶段的【大破灭】，没了……

0040.en: No, it wasn't just gone. It was more like the "Great Annihilation," on the verge of being unleashed, was snuffed out by an irresistible force.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 不，与其说是没了，倒不如说是即将释放的【大破灭】被一股无可违抗的力量给中途掐灭了。

0040.en: It was like preparing for a cannon shot for ages, stuffing the shell into the barrel, the fuse already burned away. Just as the artilleryman covered his ears, ready for the deafening blast, a puff of smoke came out of the muzzle, firing a completely silent dud.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 这就像是准备工序准备了半天，炮弹塞进炮膛了，引线都已经烧没了，就当炮兵捂着耳朵准备迎接那震耳欲聋的炮鸣时，炮口冒出了一阵青烟，打出了一发无语至极的哑弹。

0040.en: Realizing the situation was lost, Kogsa's eyes locked onto the girl peacefully holding the sword, as if tracing the source of it all.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 意识到大势已去，克格萨像是追踪溯源般，一双瞳孔死死的锁定抱剑安宁的少女。

0040.en: For crying out loud!
0040.speaker: 克格萨
0040.cn: 布施，各门！

0040.en: He had thought the troublesome Will of No War was the Water Saintess's trump card. Now he knew that was just a passive skill that triggered automatically. She had been saving her real ultimate move for him, hadn't she?
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 他以为之前那难缠的不战意志就已经是水之圣女的底牌了，现在才知道，感情那只是个随身触发的被动技能，真正的必杀技留着等着他呢？

0040.en: As expected of the Saintess of Peace. So, by forcibly disabling all damaging abilities, this is how you maintain peace?
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 不愧是象征和平的圣女，所以只要强制禁用所有伤害性技能，这就算是维护和平了吗？

0040.en: Kogsa stood alone on the grass, silently enduring the sun's glare, feeling completely bewildered...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 克格萨一个人孤零零的站在草地上，沉默迎接着太阳的暴晒，只觉自己有些凌乱……

0040.en: And for Lobelia, as she activated her divine art, a golden panel automatically opened in her changed right eye.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 而在洛蓓莉娅这里，开启神术，有所变化的右眼中，金色的面板自动打开。

0040.en: "Where strife ceases, there the God's tear of pity is seen" — The divine eyes of past Saintesses appear as a phantasm at the center of the ripple.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: “止戈之处，方见神垂怜之泪” ——波纹中心浮现历代圣女的水神明眸虚影。

Restriction: This ability only affects intelligent species and all their subordinates, indirect abilities, and summons.】
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 【展开半径50米的神性结界，强制终止所有攻击性或间接伤害性技能释放进程，结界内所有伤害判定归零。限制：该能力只作用于智慧种及其所有附属，间接能力和召唤物。】

0040.en: "True peace requires no bloodshed, for at this moment, war is dead" — The tear-shaped origin mark of the Water God floats at the core of the barrier.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: “真正的和平无需流血，因战争在此刻已死”——结界核心悬浮着泪滴状的水之神本源印记。

0040.en: 「Divine Water's Aegis • Mirror Realm's Grace」 (Domain Summon | Embodiment of the Water God's Authority over Life)
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 「神水庇护•镜界恩泽」（领域召唤 | 水之神生命权柄的具现化）

0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: “流动即永恒，镜中倒影不映死亡” ——水域边界浮现《水之圣典》中“生命如瀑不可截断”的铭文。

0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 第41章 重置41 你要与我为敌吗？

0041.en: In the ancient beginning, elements formed the most basic framework of the world.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 在远古的创世纪，元素构成的世间最基本的框架。

0041.en: The gods were born from these elements. They mastered a supreme power called the Law, a force of order completely opposite to the original chaos. The gods then lifted the carving knife of order and, upon the rough shape of the new world, sculpted the sky, the land, and the sea.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 神明从元素中诞生，祂们掌握着名为法则的无上伟力，法则代表的是与最原始混沌截然相反的秩序力量，诸神们则举起秩序的刻刀，在这初生粗糙的世界雏体上，雕刻出了天空，陆地与海洋。

0041.en: After finishing the first creation, the gods looked upon the magnificent world and did not want such a perfect work to remain silent. So, they created life according to their own preferences. From then on, life spread to every corner of the world, and guided by fate, it created its own unique civilizations.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 在完成了最初的创世之后，诸神还是巍峨壮丽的世界，不甘如此完美的作品归于寂静，而后，他们根据自我的喜好创造出了生命，从此，生命遍布了世界的各个角落，又因命运的点拨，开创出了独属于自己的文明。

0041.en: Today, on the continent of Nephalem, there are many different races, and most of them believe in different gods. But when thinking about the origin of life, even the blessed races who have the favor of the gods would undoubtedly think of that merciful deity—the God of Water, who governs life and peace.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 如今的涅法雷姆大陆，有着各种各样不同的种族，不同的种族几乎都信仰着不同的神明，但对于生命最初的起源，即使是拥有着神明赐福的眷族也都会毫无疑问的想到那位仁慈的神明——即掌管生命与和平的水之神。

0041.en: Of course, this knowledge didn't just pop into Kegesa's mind because he was bored or daydreaming. It also wasn't because he was beaten so badly that he was dizzy and confused.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 当然，这些知识突然从克格萨的脑海中迸发出来，并不是因为无聊而胡思乱想，也绝非是被打得头晕目眩，开始神志不清。

0041.en: He just stared blankly at the scroll in his hand. Even though he was standing under the burning sun, he felt an unusual chill deep inside.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他只是茫然的望着自己手掌中握着的卷轴，明明身处烈阳底下暴晒，可他却觉得内心异常的冰凉。

0041.en: As a high-ranking demon of noble blood from the Demon Realm, Kegesa had a long life. When a race or individual lives for a long time, their brain naturally gathers a lot of knowledge, even without trying to learn. Kegesa considered this knowledge his combat experience, and it had often helped him overcome difficult situations.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 作为魔界血统高贵的大魔族，克格萨拥有着悠长的寿命，而一旦一个种族或个体活得长了，即使不去学习，大脑中也会本能的积累起不俗的知识，这些知识被克格萨视作他战斗时的经验，曾为他面临困局时，攻克难关提供了不少助力。

0041.en: But now, as he searched through all his memories and knowledge, he was horrified to find that there was very little information or rumors about the abilities of the Water Saintess.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 可如今，他翻遍了大脑中的记忆与知识，却惊恐的发现，有关于水之圣女的能力与传闻少之又少。

0041.en: Although the Winterlein family was one of the Church's six great Saintess families, along with the other five, there was nothing known about the Water Saintess's abilities, except for what everyone on the continent knew: she had mastered the strongest arts of healing and purification. Beyond that, there was nothing.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 虽然温特莱恩与其他五大家族同属教廷的六大圣女家族，可有关于水之圣女的能力，除了全大陆众所周知的，掌握了最强的治愈和净化之术，其他的便空空如也……

0041.en: The Demon Realm, which was always very cautious about the six Saintesses, seemed to focus most of its attention on the other five families. As for the Water Saintess and her Winterlein family, the demons just treated them as support-class priests who could heal.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 而对于六大圣女极为警惕的魔界，似乎也只将绝大部分的注意力放在了其余五大圣女家族上，至于水之圣女以及所属的温特莱恩家族，魔族们也只是习惯性的将其当做辅助治愈的牧师看待。

0041.en: The priest profession was often the one most looked down upon by the demons. After all, on a battlefield that was like a meat grinder, death was often instant and injuries were common. Weak humans needed immediate treatment from a priest after being hurt to stop their wounds from getting worse, or their lives would be in danger.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 牧师这种职业往往是最不被魔族看得起的，毕竟在如同绞肉机般的战场上，死亡往往是一瞬间的事，受伤更是家常便饭，孱弱的人类在受到伤害后，往往需及时受到牧师救治，抑制伤势恶化，不然就极有可能危及生命。

0041.en: But the demons didn't have this worry. Their powerful life force and regenerative abilities meant that most demons were not afraid of pain. Except for a few fatal wounds, physical pain would only excite their bloodlust and greatly increase their combat power.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 但魔族没有这种担忧，强大的生命力与恢复能力让大多数魔族几乎不惧伤痛，除去极少部分的致命伤，肉体上的疼痛只会更加激发魔族骨子里的嗜血，从而大大提高战力。

0041.en: In the eyes of the demons, healing magic was completely useless and a waste of time. Priests who specialized in it were just another word for weak and incompetent.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 治愈魔法什么的在魔族的眼中，完全就是无用又耽误时间的冷门魔法，而专门掌握这门技术的牧师，则更是孱弱又无能的代名词。

0041.en: At least, that's what he personally thought. But now, as he faced the Water Saintess directly, he felt a difficulty that he had never experienced before in his life.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 至少他个人是这么看待的，但如今，当他真正正面碰到水之圣女，他却感受到了平生无与伦比的棘手。

0041.en: The girl in front of him didn't seem to be doing anything, yet Kegesa felt an indescribable sense of powerlessness.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 面前的少女明明看似什么都没做，可克格萨却感受到了一股难以形容的无力感。

0041.en: He tried to put more magic into the scroll in his hand. The magic flowed freely inside his body, but the magic he sent into the scroll was like a stone sinking into the sea. The scroll, covered in forbidden runes, didn't react at all, as if he were holding a fake.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他尝试着往手中的卷轴重新注入魔力，体内的魔力流转自如，但注入到卷轴中的魔力却像是石沉大海，布满禁忌符文的卷轴没有一点反应，就感觉他手中拿的似乎是个假货。

0041.en: Throwing away the scroll, he tried to cast a spell directly. But whenever an attack spell came to mind, his throat felt like it was blocked by an invisible stone. No matter how hard he tried, his face turning red, he couldn't speak a single syllable.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 扔掉的卷轴，他试图直接吟唱魔法，可只要是脑海中浮现出那些攻击性的魔法，自己的嗓子就像是堵了一颗无形的石子，即使拼命到面色涨红，也无法发出其中的任何一个音节。

0041.en: Finally, he looked at his own hands. He drew his demon-forged dagger and pointed the tip at his own palm. His Hellfire Eye, burning with flames, narrowed. Without hesitation, he stabbed the dagger toward his palm, but...
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 最后，他将目光放在了自己的双手，他拔出了随身携带的魔刃小刀，刀尖却朝向了自己的掌心，燃烧着火焰的地狱之瞳猛地一缩，他毫不犹豫的将刀捅向了自己的手掌心，可……

0041.en: The pain he expected never came. The tip of the blade stopped just a hair's breadth from his palm. No matter how much force he used, the blade wouldn't move any further.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 预想中的疼痛并没有到来，刀尖在距离自己掌心仅有米粒般大小的距离前，停了下来，无论施加多少力，刀刃都无法再向前推进一步。

0041.en: Finally, he dropped the dagger, his face as pale as ash, and looked at the blue-haired Saintess, who was as calm as still water.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 终于，他丢下了刀，面如死灰的看向了如水般宁静的蓝发圣女。

0041.en: The battle had lost all meaning at this point. On a battlefield where no one could get hurt and no blood could be spilled, neither side could use violence to get what they wanted.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 战斗在此刻已经失去了意义，因为在一个无法造成伤痛，不会流血的战场上，双方再也无法以暴力得到自己想要的结果。

0041.en: He couldn't even harm himself, let alone kill the enemy. This strange feeling, as if his own life was not under his control, made Kegesa feel a long-forgotten fear. He even started to regret coming here...
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 不说是杀死敌人，现在的他连伤害自己都做不到，这种生命仿佛不归于自己管束的陌生，让克格萨感受到了久远的恐惧，他甚至有些后悔来到这里了……

0041.en: If he hadn't accepted the Demon King's order, he wouldn't have given that useless kid from the Winterlein family a second thought. It was a Saintess family with little combat power, and its current heir couldn't even awaken his bloodline. Such a worthless ant didn't deserve any of his attention.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 如果没有接下魔王的命令，他根本就不会把温特莱恩家的那个废物小子放在眼里，本身就是个没什么战力的圣女家族，现在的嫡系后裔还无法觉醒血脉，这种废物和蝼蚁根本就不配他多关注一眼。

0041.en: If only His Majesty the Demon King hadn't been planning this for so long, if only His Majesty hadn't insisted on sending him here, if only...
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 若不是魔王陛下为此已计划许久，若不是魔王陛下执意派他来此，若不是……

0041.en: The battle seemed to have reached a strange stalemate. Serenia watched it all unfold. She stared at the Saintess's holy and compassionate back for a long moment before finally speaking.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 战况仿佛陷入到了一种诡异的僵局，瑟蕾妮娅当这一切尽收眼中，她注视着少女圣洁慈悲的背影，好一会儿才开口发声。

0041.en: "Lobelia..."
0041.speaker: 瑟蕾妮娅
0041.cn: “洛蓓莉娅……”

0041.en: The ability of the girl before her was not only despairing for Kegesa, but it was also completely beyond her expectations. Even as Selen An's childhood friend, she never knew that the line of the Water Saintess possessed such an "unbeatable" power.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 眼前这位少女的能力不禁令克格萨绝望，也完完全全超出了她的预料，即使是作为塞伦安的青梅竹马，她也从不知道水之圣女一脉竟拥有如此堪称“无解”的能力。

0041.en: It didn't need any reason, any threat of force, or even the agreement of the two sides on the battlefield. It just forcibly ended the war... No, that's not quite right. It forcibly made the war meaningless.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 不需要任何理由，不需要武力的威慑，甚至不需要战场双方的同意，强制性的结束战争……不，这么说不准确，而是强制另一场战争失去意义。

0041.en: A battlefield without bloodshed, could it still be called a battlefield?
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 不会流血的战场，还能被称之为战场吗？

0041.en: At least until now, Serenia had never considered a situation that was supposed to be impossible.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 至少在这之前，瑟蕾妮娅从来没有考虑过这种根本不会发生的情况。

0041.en: But unbeatable as it was, a new problem had now emerged.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 但无解是无解，可现在又有一个新的问题浮了上来。

0041.en: The fight couldn't continue, but what about the result?
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 战斗是无法继续下去了，可结果呢？

0041.en: Just like now, Kegesa had completely lost the will to fight. But as a high-ranking demon of the Demon Realm, his duty and his pride would not allow him to retreat. Even if he couldn't fight, he would wait it out.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 就像眼下这样，克格萨斯彻底失去了战意，但身为魔界的大魔族，他的职责，他的骄傲，不允许他退却，就算无法战斗，耗，他也会一直耗下去。

0041.en: And her side could only do the same: see who runs out of patience first, see who retreats first.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 而己方这边似乎也只能这样，一起拼时间，拼对方先失去耐心，拼对方先行撤退。

0041.en: If that was the case, the outcome of the war would depend on whose reinforcements arrived first. After all, the battlefield Lobelia could control had a limited range. As long as one went around the area of the "Pact of No War," the battle could still go on.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 如果是这样的话，战争的胜负似乎只能看双方的援兵了，毕竟洛蓓莉娅能控制的战场有一定范围的限制，只要绕开【不战誓约】的影响范围，战斗仍能够正常进行。

0041.en: As if sensing Serenia's doubts and worries, Lobelia, who had been holding her holy sword in a prayer for peace, suddenly opened her eyes. She turned her head and said softly to reassure her.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 似乎是察觉到了瑟蕾妮娅心中的疑惑和担忧，一直环抱圣剑作安宁祈祷状的洛蓓莉娅突然睁开了眼，她转身扭头，柔声劝慰道。

0041.en: "Do not worry."
0041.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0041.cn: “不必担心。”

0041.en: Then she turned back, and for the first time, her watery blue eyes lost their look of love and pity. They became quiet like a still tide, holding a divine quality that was hard to describe.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 而后再次转身，蔚蓝色的水滴眸第一次收敛起了慈爱与悲悯，如起伏的潮汐沉寂，带着一份难以言喻的神性。

0041.en: "Will you be my enemy?"
0041.speaker: 洛蓓莉娅
0041.cn: “你要与我为敌吗？”

0041.en: Her voice was not loud, but it sounded directly in the minds of every intelligent creature within the area.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 她的声音不大，却是直接在范围内每一个智慧生灵的脑海中响起。

0041.en: Kegesa's body froze, and then he suddenly burst out laughing.
0041.speaker: 克格萨
0041.cn: 克格萨的身体猛的一僵，随即猛地狂笑起来。

0041.en: "Water Saintess, I admit I can't break your ability. But that doesn't mean you can kill me. I bet you absolutely do not dare, and absolutely cannot, make a move."
0041.speaker: 克格萨
0041.cn: “水之圣女，我承认无法破解你的能力，可这并不代表，你能杀死我，我敢打赌，你绝不敢，也绝不能动手。”

0041.en: The despair of not being able to cause harm may have completely taken away his will to fight, but Kegesa had not lost his mind. He understood very well that the biggest weakness of this seemingly unbeatable "Pact of No War" was the Water Saintess herself.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 无法造成伤害的绝望或许彻底剥夺了他的战意，但克格萨没有失去理智，他很明白这看似无解的【不战誓约】，其最大的破绽，就是水之圣女本人。

0041.en: As long as the Water Saintess attacked first and broke the balance, then this "Pact of No War," which was as powerful as a law of the world, would be broken.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 只要水之圣女本人率先动手，打破这份平衡，那么，这堪称规则级别无解的【不战契约】也就不攻自破了。

0041.en: The more powerful the magic, the more powerful the divine art, the greater the price and limitations it must have. A Saintess of peace can forbid fighting on a battlefield, but she also cannot raise her sword to kill an enemy in that same domain.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 越强大的魔法，越强大的神术，就必然有相匹配的代价和局限性，象征着和平的圣女可以禁止一片战场的厮杀，却也无法在这片领域中提剑杀敌。
